context: Supported by the new generation of information technology, the key breakthroughs are made in network collaboration, distributed systems, clinical decision support, and other key technologies. An integrated, fused, shared, and multidisciplinary collaborative service model based on data, information, and knowledge is established to support hierarchical diagnosis and treatment, regional collaboration, and integrated services. This model aims to improve the quality of medical service supply and enhance the healthcare system by addressing the challenges of insufficient medical resources and underutilization, improving the accessibility of medical and health services, and promoting the transformation of the medical service model. Column 5: Collaborative Medical Services. Remote medical and mobile medical services. In response to the serious imbalance in the allocation of medical resources, efforts are made to actively develop mobile medical technology products and services, accelerate the development and integration of remote technology and equipment, carry out integrated innovation and typical application demonstrations, promote the construction of a remote and mobile medical health service system that covers grassroots levels, optimize the allocation of medical resources, promote the optimization and upgrading of the medical service model, and improve the problem of public access to medical care. Specialized collaborative services. In response to major diseases such as cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, metabolic diseases, tumors, as well as common diseases such as obstetrics and gynecology, and oral diseases, key technologies such as specialized disease information and process modeling, specialized disease clinical pathway implementation, specialized data integration visualization, and specialized disease medical knowledge sharing are developed. Specialized disease electronic medical record systems, clinical decision support systems, and diagnosis and treatment business collaboration systems are developed to establish an information-linked and integrated service model for specialized collaborative diagnosis and treatment services, effectively improving the level of diagnosis and treatment for specialized diseases.

zh_context: 在已有工作基础上，大力培育数字经济新业态，深入推进企业数字化转型，打造数据供应链，以数据流引领物资流、人才流、技术流、资金流，形成产业链上下游和跨行业融合的数字化生态体系，构建设备数字化-生产线数字化-车间数字化-工厂数字化-企业数字化-产业链数字化-数字化生态的典型范式。打造数字化企业。在企业“上云”等工作基础上，促进企业研发设计、生产加工、经营管理、销售服务等业务数字化转型。支持平台企业帮助中小微企业渡过难关，提供多层次、多样化服务，减成本、降门槛、缩周期，提高转型成功率，提升企业发展活力。构建数字化产业链。打通产业链上下游企业数据通道，促进全渠道、全链路供需调配和精准对接，以数据供应链引领物资链，促进产业链高效协同，有力支撑产业基础高级化和产业链现代化。培育数字化生态。打破传统商业模式，通过产业与金融、物流、交易市场、社交网络等生产性服务业的跨界融合，着力推进农业、工业服务型创新，培育新业态。以数字化平台为依托，构建“生产服务+商业模式+金融服务”数字化生态，形成数字经济新实体，充分发掘新内需。

context: By 2025, a relatively complete system of policies and regulations for the development of the hydrogen energy industry will be established. The industry's innovation capabilities will significantly improve, with a basic mastery of core technologies and manufacturing processes, and the initial establishment of a relatively complete supply chain and industrial system. Demonstrations of hydrogen energy applications will achieve significant results, and progress will be made in clean energy hydrogen production and hydrogen storage and transportation technologies. Market competitiveness will greatly increase, and a preliminary hydrogen energy supply system will be established, with industrial by-product hydrogen and the local utilization of renewable energy for hydrogen production as the main sources. The number of fuel cell vehicles in use will reach approximately 50,000, and a number of hydrogen refueling stations will be deployed and constructed. The production of renewable energy hydrogen will reach 100,000 to 200,000 tons per year, becoming an important component of the increasing hydrogen energy consumption and achieving a reduction of 1 to 2 million tons of carbon dioxide emissions per year. After another 5 years of development, by 2030, a more comprehensive system of technological innovation, clean energy hydrogen production, and supply systems for the hydrogen energy industry will be formed. The industrial layout will be reasonable and orderly, and the widespread application of renewable energy hydrogen will effectively support the achievement of carbon peak targets. By 2035, a hydrogen energy industry system will be formed, creating a diverse hydrogen energy application ecosystem covering transportation, energy storage, industry, and other fields. The proportion of renewable energy hydrogen in end-use energy consumption will significantly increase, playing an important supporting role in the green transformation and development of energy.
extended_context: 节能环保++新能源汽车++氢能产业发展中长期规划（2021-2035年）（发展改革委、国家能源局/2022年3月）++nan++其他政策++2022-3++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 到2025年，形成较为完善的氢能产业发展制度政策环境，产业创新能力显著提高，基本掌握核心技术和制造工艺，初步建立较为完整的供应链和产业体系。氢能示范应用取得明显成效，清洁能源制氢及氢能储运技术取得较大进展，市场竞争力大幅提升，初步建立以工业副产氢和可再生能源制氢就近利用为主的氢能供应体系。燃料电池车辆保有量约5万辆，部署建设一批加氢站。可再生能源制氢量达到10-20万吨/年，成为新增氢能消费的重要组成部分，实现二氧化碳减排100-200万吨/年。再经过5年的发展，到2030年，形成较为完备的氢能产业技术创新体系、清洁能源制氢及供应体系，产业布局合理有序，可再生能源制氢广泛应用，有力支撑碳达峰目标实现。到2035年，形成氢能产业体系，构建涵盖交通、储能、工业等领域的多元氢能应用生态。可再生能源制氢在终端能源消费中的比重明显提升，对能源绿色转型发展起到重要支撑作用。

context: Build a new type of power system with gradually increasing proportion of new energy, and promote the optimization of clean power resource allocation on a large scale. Greatly enhance the comprehensive regulation capacity of the power system, accelerate the construction of flexible regulation power sources, guide self-owned power plants, traditional high-energy-consuming industrial loads, interruptible loads in commercial and industrial sectors, electric vehicle charging networks, virtual power plants, and other participants in system regulation, construct a strong and intelligent power grid, and improve the level of power grid security. Actively develop new energy + energy storage, integrated generation-transmission-load-storage, and multi-energy complementarity, and support the rational allocation of energy storage systems for distributed new energy. Formulate a long-term development plan for the next round of pumped storage power stations and improve policies and mechanisms to promote the development of pumped storage. Accelerate the demonstration and promotion of new energy storage applications. Deepen the reform of the power system and accelerate the construction of a unified national electricity market system. By 2025, the installed capacity of new energy storage will reach over 30 million kilowatts. By 2030, the installed capacity of pumped storage power stations will reach approximately 120 million kilowatts, and provincial-level power grids will have a peak load response capacity of over 5%.

zh_context: 构建新能源占比逐渐提高的新型电力系统，推动清洁电力资源大范围优化配置。大力提升电力系统综合调节能力，加快灵活调节电源建设，引导自备电厂、传统高载能工业负荷、工商业可中断负荷、电动汽车充电网络、虚拟电厂等参与系统调节，建设坚强智能电网，提升电网安全保障水平。积极发展“新能源+储能”、源网荷储一体化和多能互补，支持分布式新能源合理配置储能系统。制定新一轮抽水蓄能电站中长期发展规划，完善促进抽水蓄能发展的政策机制。加快新型储能示范推广应用。深化电力体制改革，加快构建全国统一电力市场体系。到2025年，新型储能装机容量达到3000万千瓦以上。到2030年，抽水蓄能电站装机容量达到1.2亿千瓦左右，省级电网基本具备5%以上的尖峰负荷响应能力。

Develop industry-specific industrial software for key areas such as CNC machine tools, integrated circuits, aerospace equipment, ships, as well as new energy and intelligent connected vehicles, strengthen integration and verification, and form systematic service capabilities. Column 1: Key basic software shortcomings. Operating system. Strengthen the overall architecture design and technical path planning of the operating system, promote joint research and development of key operating system technologies among chip design, operating system, system integration enterprises, research institutes, and universities, improve the compatibility of the operating system with underlying hardware and interoperability with upper-layer applications. Database. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as full-memory high-speed data engines, high-reliability data storage engines, distributed data processing and task scheduling architectures, large-scale parallel graph data processing, etc. Promote the application of high-performance databases in key industries such as finance, telecommunications, and energy. Development support software. Improve the integration and stability of software development tools, break through key technologies such as code resource reuse and recommendation, large-scale cross-language analysis, etc. Accelerate the research and development of testing tools such as program static analysis, dynamic testing, simulation testing, and automated testing platforms. Design and simulation system software. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as three-dimensional geometric modeling engines, constraint solving engines, etc., explore open industrial software architecture, system-level design and simulation, and other technical paths. Focus on supporting the development of three-dimensional computer-aided design, multi-physics field computer-aided calculation such as structure/fluid, model-based system engineering, and other product research and development. Electronic Design Automation (EDA). Establish a joint technical research and development mechanism for EDA developers, chip design companies, foundries, etc., break through key technologies for the entire process of digital, analog, and mixed-signal circuit design, verification, physical implementation, and manufacturing testing, and improve advanced process toolkits. Industrial control software. Focus on industrial control systems such as programmable logic controllers (PLCs), distributed control systems (DCS), safety instrumented systems (SIS), etc., carry out joint research and development and adaptation migration of software products with multi-point, low-latency, high-reliability, and low-energy consumption, promote the development of safety monitoring and management systems for manufacturing enterprise-side security functions, and accelerate the integrated application of products in key industries. Collaborative development of application software. Focus on key industries such as finance, construction, energy, transportation, etc., accelerate breakthroughs in financial core business systems, building information modeling and fire simulation, smart energy management, intelligent traffic management, intelligent office, etc. Research and promote software products related to the Beidou satellite navigation system. Develop new-generation software integration application infrastructure around new infrastructure construction such as 5G base stations, big data centers, etc. Encourage leading companies in the industry to collaborate with software companies to jointly develop industry-specific software products. Proactively layout emerging platform software. Accelerate the cultivation of internationally competitive software technologies and products in fields such as cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, 5G, blockchain, industrial internet, etc. Support the development of new lightweight platforms such as mini-programs and quick applications. Accelerate the research and development of software technologies in frontier areas such as the sixth-generation mobile communication (6G), quantum information, satellite internet, brain-like intelligence, and cultivate a batch of landmark products. Column 2: Strengthen emerging platform software strengths. Cloud computing. Accelerate the research and development of technologies such as ultra-large-scale distributed storage, elastic computing, virtual isolation, heterogeneous resource scheduling, etc., speed up the iteration and upgrade of cloud operating systems, and layout the next-generation cloud computing software system. Encourage enterprises to build high-performance cloud platforms, optimize the layout of public clouds, industry-specific clouds, and regional hybrid cloud platforms. Improve cloud security levels and intelligent cloud service capabilities. Big data. Support key technological innovations such as high-performance data acquisition, high-capacity storage, massive information processing, heterogeneous data management, real-time monitoring of sensitive information, chip integration of storage and computing, platform security control, etc. In key areas such as industry, communication, finance, medical care, emergency response, agriculture, public security, transportation, power, etc., develop a batch of leading software products and solutions. Artificial intelligence. Support the research and development of artificial intelligence algorithm libraries, toolkits, etc. Accelerate the development of new machine learning, biometric recognition, natural language understanding, new human-computer interaction, intelligent control and decision-making, and other products and services. Promote the construction of open platforms for artificial intelligence. Blockchain. Accelerate the research and development of key technologies such as blockchain consensus algorithms, encryption algorithms, efficient and secure smart contracts, distributed systems, etc. Support the construction of underlying technology platforms and blockchain service platforms. Strengthen key areas of application such as financial technology, supply chain management, and government services. Virtual reality and augmented reality. Promote technological innovations such as three-dimensional graphics production, dynamic environment modeling, real-time motion capture, fast rendering processing, etc., develop virtual reality-related development tool software and industry solutions. Actively cultivate embedded software. Carry out research and development of embedded software systems for major equipment needs such as CNC machine tools, intelligent robots, new energy and intelligent connected vehicles, communication equipment, aerospace engines, etc. Breakthroughs in embedded operating systems, embedded database core technologies, accelerate the research and development and application promotion of related products. Optimize information technology services. Facing the needs of digitalization, networking, and intelligent applications, strengthen algorithm services in typical scenarios, promote technological innovations related to enterprise-level business continuity management (BCM). Improve the information technology service system around digital management consulting, integrated integration, intelligent operation and maintenance, etc., and enhance specialized information technology service capabilities in key industries and fields. Support the construction of an information technology service ecosystem with perception, control, and decision-making capabilities. Column 3: Demonstration of information technology service applications. Strengthen the research and development of key information technology services. Carry out technological research and development in data governance, data analysis, knowledge graphs, data security containers, intelligent monitoring and early warning, multi-source data integration, etc., and build a new information technology service technical system. Promote intelligent service applications for industry enterprises. For industries such as finance, telecommunications, energy, etc., promote the construction and application of intelligent information technology service platforms and build an intelligent service system. Select key enterprises to carry out the construction and application of digital transformation support platforms, and cultivate a group of digital transformation solution providers.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++发展形势,推动软件产业链升级
zh_context: 围绕软件产业链，加速“补短板、锻长板、优服务”，夯实开发环境、工具等产业链上游基础软件实力，提升工业软件、应用软件、平台软件、嵌入式软件等产业链中游的软件水平，增加产业链下游信息技术服务产品供给，提升软件产业链现代化水平。聚力攻坚基础软件。完善桌面、服务器、移动终端、车载等操作系统产。品及配套工具集，推动操作系统与数据库、中间件、办公套件、安全软件及。各类应用的集成、适配、优化。加速分布式数据库、混合事务分析处理数据库、共享内存数据库集群等产品研发和应用推广。开展高性能、高可靠的中间件关键产品及构件研发。丰富数据备份、灾难恢复、工业控制系统防护等安全软件产品和服务。推进软件集成开发环境相关产品和关键测试工具的研发与应用推广。重点突破工业软件。研发推广计算机辅助设计、仿真、计算等工具软件，大力发展关键工业控制软件，加快高附加值的运营维护和经营管理软件产业化部署。面向数控机床、集成电路、航空航天装备、船舶等重大技术装备以及新能源和智能网联汽车等重点领域需求，发展行业专用工业软件，加强集成验证，形成体系化服务能力。专栏1关键基础软件补短板。操作系统。加强操作系统总体架构设计和技术路径规划，推动芯片设计、操作系统、系统集成企业与科研院所、高校开展操作系统关键技术联合攻关，提升操作系统与底层硬件的兼容性、与上层应用的互操作性。数据库。突破全内存高速数据引擎、高可靠数据存储引擎、分布式数据处理与任务调度架构、大规模并行图数据处理等关键技术。推动高性能数据库在金融、电信、能源等重点行业关键业务系统应用。开发支撑软件。提升软件开发工具集成性、稳定性，突破代码资源复用与推荐、大规模跨语言分析等关键技术。加速程序静态分析、动态测试、仿真测试、自动化测试平台等测试工具研发。设计仿真系统软件。突破三维几何建模引擎、约束求解引擎等关键技术，探索开放式工业软件架构、系统级设计与仿真等技术路径。重点支持三维计算机辅助设计、结构/流体等多物理场计算机辅助计算、基于模型的系统工程等产品研发。电子设计自动化软件（EDA）。建立EDA开发商、芯片设计企业、代工厂商等上下游企业联合技术攻关机制，突破针对数字、模拟及数模混合电路设计、验证、物理实现、制造测试全流程的关键技术，完善先进工艺工具包。工业控制软件。聚焦可编程逻辑控制器（PLC）、分布式控制系统（DCS）、安全仪表系统（SIS）等工业控制系统，开展多点位、低延时、高可靠、低能耗软件产品的联合攻关和适配迁移，推动制造企业侧安全监测与管理系统等安全功能开发，加快产品在重点行业的集成应用。协同攻关应用软件。面向金融、建筑、能源、交通等重点行业领域应用。需求，加快突破金融核心业务系统、建筑信息建模和建筑防火模拟、智慧能。源管理、智能交通管理、智能办公等应用软件。研发推广北斗卫星导航系统相关软件产品。围绕5G基站、大数据中心等新型基础设施建设，发展新一代软件融合应用基础设施。鼓励行业龙头企业联合软件企业，协同研发行业专用软件产品。前瞻布局新兴平台软件。加快培育云计算、大数据、人工智能、5G、区块链、工业互联网等领域具有国际竞争力的软件技术和产品。支持小程序、快应用等新型轻量化平台发展。加快第六代移动通信（6G）、量子信息、卫星互联网、类脑智能等前沿领域软件技术研发，培育一批标志性产品。专栏2新兴平台软件锻长板。云计算。加快超大规模分布式存储、弹性计算、虚拟隔离、异构资源调度等技术研发，加速云操作系统迭代升级，布局下一代云计算软件体系。鼓励企业构建高性能云平台，优化公有云、行业专有云、区域混合云平台布局。提升云安全水平和智能云服务能力。大数据。支持高性能采集、高容量存储、海量信息处理、异构数据管理、敏感信息实时监测、存算一体芯片、平台安全管控等关键技术创新。在工业、通信、金融、医疗、应急、农业、公安、交通、电力等重点领域，研发一批技术领先软件产品和解决方案。人工智能。支持人工智能算法库、工具集等研发。加快发展新型机器学习、生物特征识别、自然语言理解、新型人机交互、智能控制与决策等产品和服务。推动人工智能开放平台建设。区块链。加快区块链共识算法、加密算法、高效安全智能合约、分布式系统等关键技术研发。支持区块链底层技术平台、区块链服务平台等建设。加强金融科技、供应链管理、政府服务等重点领域应用。虚拟现实和增强现实。推动三维图形生产、动态环境建模、实时动作捕捉、快速渲染处理等技术创新，发展虚拟现实相关开发工具软件和行业解决方案。积极培育嵌入式软件。面向数控机床、智能机器人、新能源和智能网联汽车、通信设备、航空发动机等重大装备需求，开展嵌入式软件系统研发。突破嵌入式操作系统、嵌入式数据库核心技术，加快相关产品研发与应用推广。优化信息技术服务。面向数字化、网络化、智能化应用需求，加强典型场景下的算法服务，推进企业级业务连续性管理（BCM）相关技术创新。围绕数字化管理咨询、一体化集成、智能运维等，完善信息技术服务体系，提升。重点行业和领域专业化信息技术服务能力。支撑构建具备感知力、控制力和决策力的信息技术服务生态。专栏3信息技术服务应用示范。加强信息技术服务关键技术研发。开展数据治理、数据分析、知识图谱、数据安全容器、智能监控预警、多源数据集成等技术研发，构建新型信息技术服务技术体系。推进面向行业企业智能服务应用。面向金融、电信、能源等行业，推动智能信息技术服务平台的建设应用，构建智能服务体系。选取重点企业开展数字化转型支撑平台建设应用，培育形成一批数字化转型解决方案提供商。

context: Build the 32/28nm production line as soon as possible to achieve capacity expansion for the 40nm process. Establish an integrated circuit research and development center to form continuous support for key common technology. Support the construction of a process IP library to enhance the maturity of advanced processes and improve the service capabilities and levels of manufacturing companies. Support the introduction and scale application of advanced packaging and testing technologies such as CSP, WLP, and TSV-3D to improve the level of testing technology and the scale of the industry. Support the application of domestically produced equipment and materials in integrated circuit production lines.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++工程组织实施方式,投资重点,芯片制造
zh_context: 尽快建成32/28nm生产线，实现40nm工艺产能扩充。建设集成电路研发中心，形成关键共性技术持续支撑能力。支持工艺IP库的建设，提升先进工艺的成熟度，提高制造企业的服务能力和水平。支持CSP、WLP、TSV-3D等先进封装和测试技术的导入和规模应用，提高测试技术水平和产业规模。支持国产装备、材料在集成电路生产线上的应用。

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is as follows:The manufacturing of new electronic components and equipment mainly includes the manufacturing of specialized equipment for semiconductor devices, electronic components and electromechanical component equipment manufacturing, other specialized electronic equipment manufacturing, wire and cable manufacturing, fiber optic manufacturing, electronic vacuum device manufacturing, semiconductor discrete device manufacturing, display device manufacturing, semiconductor lighting device manufacturing, optoelectronic device manufacturing, other electronic device manufacturing, resistor, capacitor, and inductor component manufacturing, electronic circuit manufacturing, sensitive component and sensor manufacturing, electroacoustic device and component manufacturing, and other electronic component manufacturing. The manufacturing of electronic vacuum devices mainly includes special-purpose vacuum devices. The manufacturing of semiconductor discrete devices mainly includes new crystal devices, medium and high power high voltage insulated gate bipolar transistors (IGBT) power transistors, fast recovery diode (FRD) chips and modules, and sensor devices. The manufacturing of semiconductor lighting devices mainly includes LED backlight sources and semiconductor light-emitting diodes (LED). The manufacturing of other electronic devices mainly includes driver circuits, electronic paper, 3.5-13.5 inch capacitive touch screens, laser displays, LED epitaxial wafers, LED chips, LED devices, LED application products, high-speed A/D and D/A devices, and wideband power amplifiers for mobile communications.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++1.2.1++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新一代信息技术产业,电子核心产业,新型电子元器件及设备制造
zh_context: 新型电子元器件及设备制造，主要包括半导体器件专用设备制造、电子元器件与机电组件设备制造、其他电子专用设备制造、电线、电缆制造、光纤制造、电子真空器件制造、半导体分立器件制造、显示器件制造、半导体照明器件制造、光电子器件制造、其他电子器件制造、电阻电容电感元件制造、电子电路制造、敏感元件及传感器制造、电声器件及零件制造、其他电子元件制造等。电子真空器件制造，主要包括特种用途真空器件。半导体分立器件制造，主要包括新型晶体器件、中大功率高压绝缘栅双极晶体管（IGBT）功率晶体管、快恢复二极管（FRD）芯片和模块、传感器件。半导体照明器件制造，主要包括LED背光源、半导体发光二极管（LED）。其他电子器件制造，主要包括驱动电路、电子纸、3.5-13.5英寸电容式触摸屏、激光显示、LED外延片、LED芯片、LED器件、LED应用产品、高速A/D和D/A器件、移动通信用宽频带功率放大器。。

context: Action goals: By 2018, carry out research and testing of 5G network technology, deploy and commercialize Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) on a large scale. By 2020, complete the research, testing, and commercial deployment of 5G technology, fully evolve and upgrade the internet to IPv6, and achieve significant breakthroughs in future network architecture and key technologies. Accelerate the research and industrialization of 5G technology. Coordinate domestic industry, academia, research, and application forces to promote the development of key 5G technologies, conduct technology trials, and establish standards, enhance 5G network capabilities and innovative business applications. Focus on the long-term development needs of 5G technology and business, coordinate and optimize the allocation of 5G spectrum resources, and strengthen radio spectrum management. Timely launch commercial 5G services, support enterprise development in mobile internet and Internet of Things (IoT) innovation applications, actively expand the scope of 5G business applications. Accelerate the construction and integration of the next-generation broadcasting and television network. Coordinate the coordinated development of wired, wireless, and satellite networks, enhance the carrying capacity of broadcasting and television for massive video content and innovative converged media services, promote the integration of wired, wireless, and satellite networks with the internet, build an integrated broadcasting and television transmission and coverage network that is interconnected, broadband, interactive, intelligent, manageable, and controllable, and support the development of mobile, broadband, interactive, and cross-screen broadcasting and television convergence services. Promote the commercialization of the next-generation internet. Accelerate the comprehensive evolution and upgrade of network infrastructure to IPv6, enhance the rapid distribution capability of content delivery networks for IPv6 content. Accelerate the development of IPv6 terminals and application systems, promote the support of IPv6 by smart terminals, and achieve end-to-end support for IPv6 in 4G networks. Accelerate the commercialization of mobile internet based on IPv6, actively guide commercial websites, government, and public enterprise websites to migrate to IPv6. Proactively layout the future network. Layout the future network architecture, accelerate the construction of new network facilities such as industrial internet, energy internet, and space internet, and promote the compatible development of future networks with existing networks. Accelerate the construction of the future network technology system, establish a national-level network testbed, and promote key breakthroughs and testing verification of future network core technologies. Strengthen future network security, actively prevent future network security risks.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++关于印发“十三五”国家信息化规划的通知（节选）（国发〔2016〕73号）（国务院/2016年12月27日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++优先行动,新一代信息网络技术超前部署行动
zh_context: 行动目标：到2018年，开展5G网络技术研发和测试工作，互联网协议第6版（IPv6）大规模部署和商用；到2020年，5G完成技术研发测试并商用部署，互联网全面演进升级至IPv6，未来网络架构和关键技术取得重大突破。加快推进5G技术研究和产业化。统筹国内产学研用力量，推进5G关键技术研发、技术试验和标准制定，提升5G组网能力、业务应用创新能力。着眼5G技术和业务长期发展需求，统筹优化5G频谱资源配置，加强无线电频谱管理。适时启动5G商用，支持企业发展面向移动互联网、物联网的5G创新应用，积极拓展5G业务应用领域。加快推进下一代广播电视网建设与融合。统筹有线无线卫星协调发展，提升广播电视海量视频内容和融合媒体创新业务的承载能力，推动有线无线卫星融合一体化及与互联网的融合发展，构建天地一体、互联互通、宽带交互、智能协调、可管可控的广播电视融合传输覆盖网，支持移动、宽带、交互、跨屏广播电视融合业务的开展。推动下一代互联网商用进程。加快网络基础设施全面向IPv6演进升级，提升内容分发网络对IPv6内容的快速分发能力。加快IPv6终端和应用系统研发，推动智能终端支持IPv6，实现4G对IPv6的端到端支持。加快推动基于IPv6的移动互联网商用进程，积极引导商业网站、政府及公共企事业单位网站向IPv6迁移。超前布局未来网络。布局未来网络架构，加快工业互联网、能源互联网、空间互联网等新型网络设施建设，推动未来网络与现有网络兼容发展。加快构建未来网络技术体系，加快建立国家级网络试验床，推进未来网络核心技术重点突破和测试验证。加强未来网络安全保障，积极防范未来网络安全风险。

context: Artificial intelligence has significant spillover effects, which will further drive the progress of other technologies, promote breakthroughs in strategic emerging industries, and become a new driving force for advancing supply-side structural reforms, revitalizing the real economy, and building a strong manufacturing and network country. In order to implement the Development Plan for the New Generation of Artificial Intelligence, seize historical opportunities, break through key areas, promote the development of the artificial intelligence industry, enhance the level of intelligent manufacturing, promote deep integration of artificial intelligence and the real economy, this action plan is formulated.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++人工智能++促进新一代人工智能产业发展三年行动计划（2018-2020年）（工信部科〔2017〕315号）（工信部/2017年12月31日）++nan++其他政策++2017-12++nan
zh_context: 人工智能具有显著的溢出效应，将进一步带动其他技术的进步，推动战略性新兴产业总体突破，正在成为推进供给侧结构性改革的新动能、振兴实体经济的新机遇、建设制造强国和网络强国的新引擎。为落实《新一代人工智能发展规划》，抓住历史机遇，突破重点领域，促进人工智能产业发展，提升制造业智能化水平，推动人工智能和实体经济深度融合，制订本行动计划。

context: Plastic film manufacturing mainly includes phenolic resin nanoplastic film, polyimide nanoplastic film, and other nanoplastic films.

context: Support various types of enterprises and entrepreneurs to utilize cloud computing platforms as a foundation, and actively cultivate new formats and models such as platform economy and sharing economy by leveraging new technologies such as big data, Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, and blockchain.

zh_context: 支持各类企业和创业者以云计算平台为基础，利用大数据、物联网、人工智能、区块链等新技术，积极培育平台经济、分享经济等新业态、新模式。

context: Accelerate the transformation and application of key artificial intelligence technologies, promote technology integration and business model innovation, drive innovation in intelligent products in key areas, actively cultivate emerging formats of artificial intelligence, layout high-end industrial chains, and build internationally competitive artificial intelligence industry clusters. Intelligent software and hardware. Develop key foundational software for artificial intelligence, such as operating systems, databases, middleware, and development tools, break through core hardware such as graphics processors, research intelligent system solutions such as image recognition, speech recognition, machine translation, intelligent interaction, knowledge processing, and control decision-making, and cultivate and strengthen the foundational software and hardware industry for artificial intelligence applications. Intelligent robots. Overcome core components and specialized sensors for intelligent robots, improve hardware interface standards, software interface protocol standards, and safety usage standards for intelligent robots. Develop intelligent industrial robots, intelligent service robots, achieve large-scale applications, and enter the international market. Develop and promote special intelligent robots such as space robots, marine robots, and polar robots. Establish intelligent robot standards and safety regulations. Intelligent transportation vehicles. Develop autonomous driving cars and rail transit systems, strengthen technology integration and supporting technologies such as onboard perception, autonomous driving, vehicle-to-vehicle communication, and Internet of Things, develop intelligent transportation perception systems, form an independent autonomous driving platform technology system and product assembly capability, and explore shared modes for autonomous driving cars. Develop consumer and commercial drones, unmanned ships, establish specialized service systems for testing, identification, testing, and competition, and improve airspace and water management measures. Virtual reality and augmented reality. Breakthrough key technologies such as high-performance software modeling, content capture and generation, augmented reality and human-computer interaction, integrated environments and tools, develop virtual display devices, optical devices, high-performance true 3D displays, development engines, etc., establish technical, product, service standards, and evaluation systems for virtual reality and augmented reality, and promote integration applications in key industries. Intelligent terminals. Accelerate the research and development of core technologies and products for intelligent terminals, develop next-generation intelligent smartphones, in-vehicle intelligent terminals, and other mobile intelligent terminal products and devices, encourage the development of wearable terminal products such as smartwatches, smart headphones, smart glasses, expand product forms and application services. Internet of Things basic devices. Develop high-sensitivity, high-reliability intelligent sensors and chips that support the next generation of the Internet of Things, overcome core technologies such as radio frequency identification, short-range machine communication, and key devices such as low-power processors.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++战略态势,培育高端高效的智能经济,大力发展人工智能新兴产业
zh_context: 加快人工智能关键技术转化应用，促进技术集成与商业模式创新，推动重点领域智能产品创新，积极培育人工智能新兴业态，布局产业链高端，打造具有国际竞争力的人工智能产业集群。智能软硬件。开发面向人工智能的操作系统、数据库、中间件、开发工具等关键基础软件，突破图形处理器等核心硬件，研究图像识别、语音识别、机器翻译、智能交互、知识处理、控制决策等智能系统解决方案，培育壮大面向人工智能应用的基础软硬件产业。智能机器人。攻克智能机器人核心零部件、专用传感器，完善智能机器人硬件接口标准、软件接口协议标准以及安全使用标准。研制智能工业机器人、智能服务机器人，实现大规模应用并进入国际市场。研制和推广空间机器人、海洋机器人、极地机器人等特种智能机器人。建立智能机器人标准体系和安全规则。智能运载工具。发展自动驾驶汽车和轨道交通系统，加强车载感知、自动驾驶、车联网、物联网等技术集成和配套，开发交通智能感知系统，形成我国自主的自动驾驶平台技术体系和产品总成能力，探索自动驾驶汽车共享模式。发展消费类和商用类无人机、无人船，建立试验鉴定、测试、竞技等专业化服务体系，完善空域、水域管理措施。虚拟现实与增强现实。突破高性能软件建模、内容拍摄生成、增强现实与人机交互、集成环境与工具等关键技术，研制虚拟显示器件、光学器件、高性能真三维显示器、开发引擎等产品，建立虚拟现实与增强现实的技术、产品、服务标准和评价体系，推动重点行业融合应用。智能终端。加快智能终端核心技术和产品研发，发展新一代智能手机、车载智能终端等移动智能终端产品和设备，鼓励开发智能手表、智能耳机、智能眼镜等可穿戴终端产品，拓展产品形态和应用服务。物联网基础器件。发展支撑新一代物联网的高灵敏度、高可靠性智能传感器件和芯片，攻克射频识别、近距离机器通信等物联网核心技术和低功耗处理器等关键器件。

context: Promote mature and replicable agricultural Internet of Things application models. In areas and regions with a good foundation, popularize networked agricultural environmental monitoring systems based on environmental perception, real-time monitoring, and automatic control. In large-scale agricultural production areas, establish an integrated agricultural Internet of Things measurement and control system, implement precision operations such as intelligent water-saving irrigation, soil testing and formula fertilization, and precision farming with agricultural machinery positioning. In standardized large-scale livestock and poultry farming bases and healthy aquaculture demonstration bases, promote the application and interconnection of intelligent devices such as precise feed delivery, automatic disease diagnosis, and automatic waste recycling.

zh_context: 推广成熟可复制的农业物联网应用模式。在基础较好的领域和地区，普及基于环境感知、实时监测、自动控制的网络化农业环境监测系统。在大宗农产品规模生产区域，构建天地一体的农业物联网测控体系，实施智能节水灌溉、测土配方施肥、农机定位耕种等精准化作业。在畜禽标准化规模养殖基地和水产健康养殖示范基地，推动饲料精准投放、疾病自动诊断、废弃物自动回收等智能设备的应用普及和互联互通。

context: Other intelligent device manufacturing mainly includes metal surface treatment and heat treatment processing, manufacturing of other unspecified metal products, manufacturing of specialized lifting equipment, manufacturing of specialized vehicles, manufacturing of continuous handling equipment, manufacturing of other material handling equipment, manufacturing of other unspecified general equipment manufacturing industries, manufacturing of specialized equipment for food, alcohol, beverages, and tea production, manufacturing of specialized equipment for agricultural and sideline food processing, manufacturing of mechanized agricultural and horticultural tools, manufacturing of other agricultural, forestry, animal husbandry, and fishery machinery, etc. Metal surface treatment and heat treatment processing mainly include intelligent welding systems and intelligent heat treatment production lines. Manufacturing of other unspecified metal products mainly includes automatic unlocking devices. Manufacturing of specialized lifting equipment mainly includes remote control systems for port container cranes. Manufacturing of specialized vehicles mainly includes automatic guided vehicles (AGV), laser guided vehicles (LGV), and container automatic guided vehicles.

zh_context: 其他智能设备制造，主要包括金属表面处理及热处理加工、其他未列明金属制品制造、生产专用起重机制造、生产专用车辆制造、连续搬运设备制造、其他物料搬运设备制造、其他未列明通用设备制造业、食品、酒、饮料及茶生产专用设备制造、农副食品加工专用设备制造、机械化农业及园艺机具制造、其他农、林、牧、渔业机械制造等。金属表面处理及热处理加工，主要包括智能焊接系统、智能热处理生产线。其他未列明金属制品制造，主要包括自动摘锁装置。生产专用起重机制造，主要包括港口集装箱起重机远程操控系统。生产专用车辆制造，主要包括自动导引车（AGV）、激光导引车（LGV）、集装箱自动导引车。

context: With the goal of high efficiency, product safety, resource conservation, and environmental friendliness, we aim to create new varieties of biotechnology agriculture, develop new products for animal and plant nutrition and green plant protection, construct a new system for modern agriculture, and establish a group of internationally competitive biotechnology breeding enterprises. This will provide new approaches and support for accelerating the transformation of agricultural development methods. We will also establish an independent innovation system for biotechnology seed industry. Key core technology innovations and breeding applications such as gene editing, molecular design, and cell mutation will be carried out to develop and promote a batch of high-quality, high-yield, nutritious, safe, resource-efficient, and standardized agricultural animal and plant varieties. We will actively promote the industrialization of new varieties bred through biotechnology and establish a group of biotechnology breeding innovation platforms led by enterprises. We will create integrated modern biotechnology seed industry enterprises with core competitiveness, and accelerate the industrialization and market promotion of new agricultural animal and plant varieties. We will develop new technologies for animal and plant quarantine and strengthen the construction of platforms for introducing and quarantining high-quality animal and plant varieties from abroad. We will also develop a batch of new agricultural biological preparations and major products. We will vigorously develop new technologies and products for the prevention and control of animal and plant diseases and pests, establish a green pesticide and veterinary drug creation technology system based on disease and pest genomics information, and create a batch of new animal vaccines, biological veterinary drugs, and new plant pesticides. This will achieve large-scale production and application and promote the green transformation of agricultural production. We will create new green biotechnology feed and efficient biological fertilizer products that can replace antibiotics. We will explore marine biological resources in depth, develop new green, safe, and efficient marine biological functional products, and explore new ways of comprehensive utilization. We will promote key technological innovations such as food synthetic biotechnology, efficient conversion of food biotechnology, and gut microbiome genomics, as well as the creation of precision nutrition food.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕67号）（国务院/2016年11月29日）++nan++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划++2016-11++加快生物产业创新发展步伐，培育生物经济新动力,加速生物农业产业化发展
zh_context: 以产出高效、产品安全、资源节约、环境友好为目标，创制生物农业新品种，开发动植物营养和绿色植保新产品，构建现代农业新体系，形成一批具有国际竞争力的生物育种企业，为加快农业发展方式转变提供新途径、新支撑。构建生物种业自主创新体系。开展基因编辑、分子设计、细胞诱变等关键核心技术创新与育种应用，研制推广一批优质、高产、营养、安全、资源高效利用、适应标准化生产的农业动植物新品种，积极推进生物技术培育新品种产业化，形成一批以企业为主体的生物育种创新平台，打造具有核心竞争力的育繁推一体化现代生物种业企业，加快农业动植物新品种产业化和市场推广。发展动植物检疫新技术，加强国外优质动植物品种资源引进检疫平台建设。开发一批新型农业生物制剂与重大产品。大力发展动植物病虫害防控新技术、新产品，建立基于病虫基因组信息的绿色农药、兽药创制技术体系，创制一批新型动物疫苗、生物兽药、植物新农药等重大产品，实现规模生产与应用，推动农业生产绿色转型。创制可替代抗生素的新型绿色生物饲料和高效生物肥料产品。深度挖掘海洋生物资源，开发绿色、安全、高效的新型海洋生物功能制品，开辟综合利用新途径。推动食品合成生物工程技术、食品生物高效转化技术、肠道微生物宏基因组学等关键技术创新与精准营养食品创制。

context: Biological pesticides mainly include biological pesticides and key products. Biological pesticides include live microorganisms such as bacteria, fungi, and viruses, processed formulations of microbial metabolites, and plant-based pesticides. They are supported by modern microbiological technology, recombinant DNA technology, and fermentation engineering. This includes large-scale isolation and identification of microorganisms and their resource utilization technology, isolation, cloning, expression, and recombinant technology of functional genes in animals, plants, and microorganisms, gene transfer and biocapsule technology, antibiotic combination biosynthesis technology, large-scale production technology of plant-based pesticides, structural chemical modification and transformation technology of oligosaccharide molecules, and processing technology and production technology of new broad-spectrum long-acting biological pesticide formulations. Key products include safe, efficient, and new types of microbial insecticides such as Bacillus thuringiensis (BT), Beauveria bassiana, Metarhizium anisopliae, and insect viruses, microbial metabolite formulations such as agricultural antibiotics, Bacillus subtilis formulations for antibacterial and disease prevention, microbial ecology and oligosaccharide formulations, insect pheromones and other biochemical formulations, and plant-based insecticides and antibacterial fungicides.

zh_context: 生物农药，主要包括生物农药、重点产品等。生物农药，包括细菌、真菌和病毒活体微生物、微生物代谢产物加工制剂、植物源农药等，以现代微生物技术、重组DNA技术、发酵工程等为技术支撑，包括微生物大规模分离鉴定与资源化利用技术，动植物及微生物功能基因分离、克隆、表达与重组技术，基因转移与生物微囊技术，抗生素组合生物合成技术，植物源农药规模化生产技术，寡糖分子结构化学修饰与改造技术，新型广谱长效生物农药剂型加工工艺与生产技术等。重点产品，包括安全、高效、新型苏云金芽孢杆菌（BT）、白僵菌、绿僵菌、昆虫病毒等微生物杀虫剂，农用抗生素等微生物代谢产物制剂，抑菌防病芽孢杆菌制剂，微生态与寡糖制剂，昆虫信息素等生物化学制剂，植物源杀虫与抑菌杀菌剂等。

context: With the overall goal of intelligent, efficient, collaborative, green, and safe development, we aim to build a networked collaborative manufacturing platform, develop intelligent robots, high-end complete sets of equipment, 3D printing equipment, and solidify the basic guarantee capabilities of manufacturing.

zh_context: 以智能、高效、协同、绿色、安全发展为总目标，构建网络协同制造平台，研发智能机器人、高端成套装备、三维（3D）打印等装备，夯实制造基础保障能力。

context: The equipment for water pollution prevention and control mainly includes equipment for urban sewage treatment and reuse, equipment for rural sewage treatment and reuse, technology and equipment for difficult-to-treat industrial wastewater treatment and reuse, equipment for surface water pollution control, equipment for groundwater pollution prevention and remediation, and equipment for drinking water safety assurance. The equipment for surface water pollution control includes anaerobic production of biogas and ethanol from algae and aquatic plants, equipment for algae removal technology, technology for oil spill elimination and water body restoration, technology for immobilization of heavy metal pollution and water body restoration, comprehensive treatment of polluted water bodies and water body ecological restoration technology and equipment, including key technologies and equipment for water pollution control and treatment such as reducing pollution load system, low-impact development of urban pollution control, river ecological restoration, and eutrophication control of lakes. The equipment for groundwater pollution prevention and remediation includes technology and equipment for groundwater pollution prevention and control, layout and installation of monitoring wells for typical sites such as industrial waste storage, horizontal and vertical barrier technologies for high-risk groundwater pollution sources such as tank farms and waste disposal areas, equipment for leakage detection and rapid repair of sewage pipe networks, technology and standards for the remediation of characteristic groundwater pollutants based on three-dimensional zoning of groundwater use functions, and equipment for in-situ remediation of groundwater pollution.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++7.2.1++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++2017-01++节能环保产业,先进环保产业,水污染防治装备
zh_context: 水污染防治装备，主要包括城镇污水处理与回用装备、农村污水处理与回用装备、难处理工业废水处理及回用技术和装备、地表水水体污染治理装备、地下水污染防控与修复装备、饮用水安全保障装备等。地表水水体污染治理装备，包括藻类及水生植物的厌氧产沼气制取乙醇、藻类清除技术装备、溢油污染消除与水体修复技术、重金属污染水下固定化与水体修复技术，污染水体综合治理与水体生态修复技术和装备，包括（污染负荷系统削减、低影响开发的城市污染控制、河流生态修复、湖泊富营养化控制等水污染控制与治理关键技术装备）。。地下水污染防控与修复装备，包括地下水污染防治技术设备、工业废物堆存等典型场地地下水污染监测井网布设、优化与安装、储罐区和废物堆存填埋区等高风险地下水污染源的水平阻隔和垂直阻隔技术装置、排污管网泄漏检测及快速修复技术装备、基于地下水使用功能立体分区的地下水特征污染物修复技术及标准、地下水污染原位修复技术装备。

context: Major complete equipment manufacturing includes mining machinery manufacturing, petroleum drilling and mining equipment manufacturing, deep-sea petroleum drilling equipment manufacturing, specialized machinery manufacturing for building materials production, metallurgical specialized equipment manufacturing, specialized equipment manufacturing for oil refining and chemical production, specialized equipment manufacturing for rubber processing, specialized equipment manufacturing for plastic processing, wood and bamboo processing machinery manufacturing, specialized equipment manufacturing for food, alcohol, beverage, and tea production, specialized equipment manufacturing for printing, specialized equipment manufacturing for textiles, other specialized electronic equipment manufacturing, tractor manufacturing, and other specialized equipment manufacturing. Other specialized electronic equipment manufacturing mainly includes multi-point digital forming equipment, sheet metal gradual forming equipment, high-power lasers and their crystals, and high-power fiber lasers. Tractor manufacturing mainly includes high-horsepower tractors. Other specialized equipment manufacturing mainly includes specialized machinery components with independent functions.

zh_context: 重大成套设备制造，主要包括矿山机械制造、石油钻采专用设备制造、深海石油钻探设备制造、建筑材料生产专用机械制造、冶金专用设备制造、炼油、化工生产专用设备制造、橡胶加工专用设备制造、塑料加工专用设备制造、木竹材加工机械制造、食品、酒、饮料及茶生产专用设备制造、印刷专用设备制造、纺织专用设备制造、其他电子专用设备制造、拖拉机制造、其他专用设备制造等。其他电子专用设备制造，主要包括多点数字化成形装备、板材逐渐成形装备、大功率激光器及其晶体、大功率光纤激光器。拖拉机制造，主要包括大马力拖拉机。其他专用设备制造，主要包括具有独立功能专用机械零部件。

context: The international development trend of deep integration of new generation information technologies, combining robots with artificial intelligence as representatives, involves conducting research on major cutting-edge technologies such as innovative technologies in institutions/materials/drives/sensors/controls and bionics, intelligent robot perception and cognition technologies, intelligent robot learning and intelligent augmentation technologies, as well as human-machine natural interaction and collaborative fusion technologies. It also involves building a robot technology verification platform system, conducting experimental verification, achieving original innovative results, and providing technical support for China's new generation of intelligent robots.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”先进制造技术领域科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科发高[2017]89号）（科技部/2017年4月14日）++nan++其他政策++2017-4++重点任务,智能机器人,智能机器人基础前沿技术
zh_context: 结合机器人与以人工智能为代表的新一代信息技术深度融合的国际发展趋势，开展机构/材料/驱动/传感/控制与仿生的创新技术、智能机器人感知与认知技术、智能机器人学习与智能增殖技术、人机自然交互与协作共融技术等重大基础前沿技术研究，搭建机器人技术验证平台系统，开展试验验证，取得原创性创新成果，为我国新一代智能机器人提供技术支撑。

context: Coordinate urban geographic spatial information and construction (structure) building database resources to accelerate the construction of smart city public information platforms and application systems. Establish a cross-department coordination mechanism to promote information sharing, improve information updating mechanisms, and further strengthen the sharing and updating management of government information. Each government department should authorize other departments in need to use the information resources managed by their own department free of charge according to their functional division of labor. Shared departments should use information resources reasonably within the authorized scope. Based on a unified urban geographic spatial framework and information resources such as population and legal entities, overlay relevant business information from various departments and industries to accelerate cross-departmental collaborative applications. Integrate existing government information systems, coordinate the construction of new systems, build information resource sharing facilities, and achieve intensive collection, networked aggregation, and unified management of basic information resources and business information resources.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++切实加大信息资源开发共享力度,加快推进信息资源共享与更新
zh_context: 统筹城市地理空间信息及建（构）筑物数据库等资源，加快智慧城市公共信息平台和应用体系建设。建立促进信息共享的跨部门协调机制，完善信息更新机制，进一步加强政务部门信息共享和信息更新管理。各政务部门应根据职能分工，将本部门建设管理的信息资源授权有需要的部门无偿使用，共享部门应按授权范围合理使用信息资源。以城市统一的地理空间框架和人口、法人等信息资源为基础，叠加各部门、各行业相关业务信息，加快促进跨部门协同应用。整合已建政务信息系统，统筹新建系统，建设信息资源共享设施，实现基础信息资源和业务信息资源的集约化采集、网络化汇聚和统一化管理。

context: Support the development of surgical robot operating systems and promote the application of surgical robots in clinical medicine. By 2020, breakthroughs will be made in key technologies such as intelligent service robot environment perception, natural interaction, autonomous learning, and human-machine collaboration. Prototype production of robots for medical rehabilitation, elderly and disabled assistance, fire rescue, and other purposes will be completed, with technology and functionality verification achieved, and more than 20 application demonstrations realized.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++促进新一代人工智能产业发展三年行动计划（2018-2020年）（节选）（工信部科〔2017〕315号）（工信部/2017年12月13日）++nan++其他政策++2017-12++培育智能产品,智能服务机器人
zh_context: 支持手术机器人操作系统研发，推动手术机器人在临床医疗中的应用。到2020年，智能服务机器人环境感知、自然交互、自主学习、人机协作等关键技术取得突破，医疗康复、助老助残、消防救灾等机器人实现样机生产，完成技术与功能验证，实现20家以上应用示范。

context: Intelligent manufacturing technology is based on the comprehensive integration of information technology, automation technology, and advanced manufacturing technology. However, the level of integration of two transformations in China's manufacturing industry is relatively low. Low-end CAD software and enterprise management software have been widely popularized, but high-end intelligent software products for complex product design and enterprise management are lacking. Most domestic enterprises have to some extent applied automation technology in the production process, but there is a serious lack of intelligent technology for improving product quality, achieving energy conservation and emission reduction, and increasing labor productivity. At the same time, the integration of information technology and related software products with manufacturing process technology is insufficient.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++智能制造科技发展“十二五”专项规划（节选）（国科发计[2012]193号）（科技部/2012年3月27日）++nan++其他政策++2012-3++形势与需求,现状与形势,“工业化与信息化”融合程度低
zh_context: 智能制造技术是以信息技术、自动化技术与先进制造技术全面结合为基础的。而我国制造业的“两化”融合程度相对较低，低端CAD软件和企业管理软件得到很好普及，但应用于各类复杂产品设计和企业管理的智能化高端软件产品缺失。国内大多数企业在生产制造过程中一定程度地应用了自动化技术，但应用于提高产品质量、实现节能减排、提高劳动生产率的智能化技术严重缺乏。同时，信息技术和相关软件产品与制造工艺技术融合不够。

context: Engineering and technological research and experimental development mainly include medical device research.
zh_context: 工程和技术研究和试验发展，主要包括医疗器械研究。

context: Agricultural modernization, with seeds as the foundation. Strengthen the protection, development, and utilization of agricultural germplasm resources, accelerate the investigation and collection of germplasm resources for the third time in crops, livestock, and poultry, and strengthen the construction of national crop, livestock, and marine fishery genetic resources banks. Provide long-term and stable support for fundamental breeding research and key breeding projects. Accelerate the implementation of major scientific and technological projects in agricultural biotechnology. Thoroughly implement joint research on high-quality crop and livestock breeds. Implement a new round of genetic improvement plans for livestock and poultry and modern seed industry enhancement projects. Respect science, strengthen supervision, and promote the industrial application of biological breeding in an orderly manner. Strengthen intellectual property protection in the breeding field. Support leading seed companies in establishing a sound commercial breeding system, accelerate the construction of a silicon valley for seed breeding, strengthen the construction of seed production bases and high-quality breeding systems, research and develop major varieties, and promote the integrated development of breeding and propagation.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物农业++中共中央国务院关于全面推进乡村振兴加快农业农村现代化的意见（节选）（中共中央、国务院/2021年1月4日）++nan++其他政策++2021-1++加快推进农业现代化,打好种业翻身仗
zh_context: 农业现代化，种子是基础。加强农业种质资源保护开发利用，加快第三次农作物种质资源、畜禽种质资源调查收集，加强国家作物、畜禽和海洋渔业生物种质资源库建设。对育种基础性研究以及重点育种项目给予长期稳定支持。加快实施农业生物育种重大科技项目。深入实施农作物和畜禽良种联合攻关。实施新一轮畜禽遗传改良计划和现代种业提升工程。尊重科学、严格监管，有序推进生物育种产业化应用。加强育种领域知识产权保护。支持种业龙头企业建立健全商业化育种体系，加快建设南繁硅谷，加强制种基地和良种繁育体系建设，研究重大品种研发与推广后补助政策，促进育繁推一体化发展。

context: Promote the system integration and application of robotics in typical industries/key areas of manufacturing, healthcare/rehabilitation, elderly care/disability assistance, smart homes/social services, safety and rescue/scientific engineering, etc. in China. Achieve high-end applications and expansion in key industries/areas, enhance the international competitiveness of domestic robotics technology and products, lay the foundation for the industrialization of domestic robotics, and accelerate the rapid development of intelligent robotics technology and industry in China.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”先进制造技术领域科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科发高[2017]89号）（科技部/2017年4月14日）++nan++其他政策++2017-4++重点任务,智能机器人,系统集成与应用
zh_context: 推进我国机器人面向制造业典型行业/重点领域、医疗/康复、助老助残/智慧家庭/社会服务、安全与救援/科学工程等行业/领域的系统集成与应用，实现我国机器人技术与产品在国家重点行业/领域高端应用和典型领域拓展应用，提高国产机器人国际竞争力，为国产机器人产业化奠定基础，加速推进我国智能机器人技术与产业的快速发展。

context: The scale of the solar energy industry is growing rapidly, driving the development of related industries and significantly enhancing its ability to create employment opportunities. The capacity for job creation continues to increase, and the poverty alleviation effect is remarkable. It is estimated that by 2020, the solar energy industry can provide approximately 7 million job positions.

context: The manufacturing of rare earth magnetic materials mainly includes the manufacturing of electronic specialty materials. The manufacturing of electronic specialty materials mainly includes the production of sintered neodymium iron boron magnets, bonded neodymium iron boron magnetic powder, bonded neodymium iron boron magnets, samarium cobalt magnets, samarium iron nitride magnetic powder, samarium iron nitride magnets, new cerium magnets, rare earth permanent magnets, hot-pressed permanent magnets (rings), and rare earth magnetostrictive materials (with rare earth-Fe as the main element and a coefficient of expansion of 500ppm or above). It also includes the manufacturing of rare earth magnetic refrigeration materials.

context: Following the trend of international medical technology development, we are conducting research and development of new drugs for major diseases, with a focus on the development of innovative drugs for malignant tumors, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, diabetes, mental disorders, neurodegenerative diseases, autoimmune diseases, drug-resistant bacterial infections, viral infections, and other diseases, especially those that target new targets and new mechanisms of action. According to the trend of disease segmentation and precision medicine, we are developing new drugs, new compound formulations, and diagnostic companion products for specific disease subgroups in our country.

context: To meet the huge market demand in the broad semiconductor industry, including wide bandgap semiconductor devices, optical communication devices, MEMS (Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems) devices, power electronic devices, new displays, semiconductor lighting, and high-efficiency photovoltaics, research on key equipment and processes is being conducted. The focus is on addressing issues such as the lack of key technologies, low reliability, and insufficient process development in high-end equipment for electronic device key materials and device manufacturing. This aims to promote the coordinated development of new technology research and key equipment development, and to establish an independent innovation system for high-end electronic manufacturing equipment.

zh_context: 面向宽禁带半导体器件、光通讯器件、MEMS（微机电系统）器件、功率电子器件、新型显示、半导体照明、高效光伏等泛半导体产业领域的巨大市场需求，开展关键装备与工艺的研究，重点解决电子器件关键材料装备、器件制造装备等高端装备缺乏关键技术、可靠性低、工艺开发不足等问题，推动新技术研发与关键装备研发的协同发展，构建高端电子制造装备自主创新体系。

context: (1) Independently master the design technology of 30MW-class driving gas turbines. Digest and absorb introduced technologies, independently master the design technology of 30MW-class driving gas turbines, and improve the design system. Focus on key technologies such as high-efficiency multi-stage axial flow compressor design, advanced aerodynamic layout and flow design of high-efficiency turbines, efficient stable low-emission combustion, wide adaptability multi-fuel combustion, and advanced efficient cooling.(2) Develop manufacturing capabilities for medium and small-sized driving gas turbines. Construct and improve the research and development, manufacturing, process system, and after-sales service platform for medium and small-sized driving gas turbines. Enhance the capabilities of material design and development, component manufacturing, and overall assembly and testing of driving gas turbines, and achieve mass production of medium and small-sized driving gas turbines.(3) Improve testing and verification capabilities. According to the testing requirements of subsequent new gas turbine products, further enhance the testing and verification capabilities of key components and complete machines for industrial driving gas turbines. Establish and improve testing methods, testing procedures, and testing standards for the assessment of driving gas turbine applications. Focus on improving low-emission combustion testing, multi-fuel combustion testing, combustion monitoring and diagnostics, adjustment technology development testing, thermal process development testing, overall machine testing, application assessment testing, and demonstration platforms.(4) Accelerate demonstration and promotion. Relying on demonstration projects such as natural gas long-distance pipeline engineering and shale gas fracturing vehicle power drive, accelerate the completion of industrial testing, assessment, and demonstration of independently manufactured driving gas turbines. Relying on the construction of natural gas long-distance pipeline engineering, promote the application of independently developed driving gas turbines.
extended_context: 高端装备++航空航天++依托能源工程推进燃气轮机创新发展的若干意见（发改能源〔2017〕920号）（国家发展改革委、国家能源局/2017年5月12日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,发展中小系列燃气轮机,完善驱动用燃机产业体系
zh_context: （1）自主掌握30MW级驱动燃机设计技术。消化吸收引进技术，自主掌握30MW等级驱动用燃机设计技术并完善设计体系。针对30MW等级驱动用燃机关键部件和总体设计等，重点突破以下关键技术：高效多级轴流压气机设计、高效透平先进气动布局与通流设计、高效稳定低污染燃烧、宽适应性多燃料燃烧、先进高效冷却等技术。（2）形成中小型驱动燃机制造能力。建设完善中小型驱动用燃机研发制造、工艺体系和售后服务平台。提升驱动用燃机材料设计研发、零部件制造、整机总装试验能力，实现中小型驱动燃机的批量制造。（3）完善试验验证能力。根据后续燃机新产品的试验需求，进一步提升工业驱动燃机关键部件和整机试验验证能力。建立完善驱动燃机应用考核的试验测试方法、试验流程和试验规范。重点完善低排放燃烧试验、多燃料燃烧试验、燃烧监测和诊断、调整技术研发试验、热表工艺研发试验、整机试验和应用考核试验和示范平台。（4）加快示范和推广应用。依托天然气长输管线工程和页岩气开采压裂车动力驱动等示范项目，加快完成自主制造驱动燃机的工业试验、考核和示范。依托天然气长输管线工程建设，推广应用自主驱动燃机。

context: Establish a sound hierarchical and dynamically adjustable network infrastructure security protection system. Strengthen the network security management of Internet companies and enhance network security protection in emerging key areas such as cloud computing and the Internet of Things. Implement the national network security review system and prudently organize industry network security review work. Continuously carry out network security pilot demonstration work for basic telecommunications companies, Internet companies, security companies, etc. Relying on the security enhancement project, guide and promote enterprises to strengthen their network security situational awareness capabilities, strengthen the sharing and linkage of government, enterprises, and industry forces in security monitoring data, utilize big data technology to enhance correlation analysis, and improve overall and holistic situational awareness capabilities. Improve the Internet security monitoring and disposal mechanism, strengthen the disposal notification of daily network security incidents, establish a sound monitoring and disposal mechanism for phishing websites, strengthen the construction of Trojan virus sample libraries, mobile malicious program sample libraries, vulnerability libraries, etc., and enhance the ability to timely detect and effectively identify security threats. Build a security threat information sharing mechanism among the government, enterprises, and users. Deepen the special activities for the governance of network threats such as mobile malicious programs and build a trusted network environment. Column 10: Security Enhancement Project objectives: Promote the construction of network and information security technology guarantee capabilities and enhance network security guarantee levels. Project content: Build a network security threat monitoring and disposal platform based on the backbone network to achieve capabilities such as network security threat monitoring, situational awareness, emergency disposal, and traceability. Implement the domain name system security guarantee project to enhance the security protection and data backup capabilities of public recursive domain name resolution systems. Build an Internet network security emergency management platform to improve the analysis, judgment, and industry emergency command and dispatch capabilities for Internet network security threat information and monitoring data.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++指导思想、基本原则和发展目标,强化安全保障,加强网络基础设施安全防护
zh_context: 建立健全分级保护、动态调整的网络基础设施安全保护体系。强化互联网企业的网络安全管理，加强针对云计算、物联网等新兴重点领域的网络安全防护。落实国家网络安全审查制度，稳妥组织开展行业网络安全审查工作。持续面向基础电信企业、互联网企业、安全企业等开展网络安全试点示范工作。依托安全保障能力提升工程，指导推动企业加强网络安全态势感知能力建设，强化政府、企业和行业力量安全监测数据共享联动，利用大数据技术加强关联分析，提升全局性、整体化态势感知能力。完善互联网安全监测与处置机制，加强日常网络安全事件的处置通报，建立健全钓鱼网站监测与处置机制，加强木马病毒样本库、移动恶意程序样本库、漏洞库等建设，提高及时发现和有效识别安全威胁的能力。构建政府、企业、用户等之间的安全威胁信息共享机制。深入推进移动恶意程序治理等网络威胁治理专项活动，构建可信网络环境。专栏10：安全保障能力提升工程工程目标：推动网络与信息安全技术保障能力建设，提升网络安全保障水平。工程内容：建设基于骨干网的网络安全威胁监测处置平台，实现网络安全威胁监测、。态势感知、应急处置、追踪溯源等能力。实施域名系统安全保障工程，提升公共递归域名解析系统的安全防护和数据备份能力。建设互联网网络安全应急管理平台，提高对互联网网络安全威胁信息和监测数据的分析、研判和行业内应急指挥调度能力。

context: Focus on the research and development of key equipment and supporting core components for etching, thin film, chemical mechanical polishing, doping, and testing in the field of advanced processes for integrated circuits at the 14-10 nanometer scale. context: The resource recycling industry mainly includes comprehensive utilization of mineral resources, comprehensive utilization of solid waste, harmless utilization of construction waste and road asphalt resources, harmless utilization of catering waste, remanufacturing of automotive parts and electromechanical products, resource regeneration and utilization, unconventional water source utilization, harmless utilization of agricultural and forestry waste, resource recycling services, etc. Resource regeneration and utilization mainly include harmless regeneration and utilization of recycled metals, waste rubber, waste plastics, waste electromechanical products, dismantling and recycling of scrapped cars, recycling and utilization of waste power batteries for new energy vehicles, regeneration and utilization of waste solar equipment, harmless regeneration and utilization of waste textiles, regeneration and utilization of waste mineral oil, regeneration and utilization of waste biomass, etc. Unconventional water source utilization mainly includes wastewater treatment and recycled water reuse devices for high-water-consuming industries such as power, steel, non-ferrous metals, petroleum and petrochemicals, chemicals, papermaking, textile printing and dyeing, food processing, machinery, electronics, etc. Harmless utilization of agricultural and forestry waste mainly includes returning crop straw to the field, utilization of residual materials in forest areas, wood and plastic substitutes, production of biological culture media, carbonized biomass fuels, polyurethane foam materials, etc.

context: The manufacturing of powders, foams, and porous materials mainly includes steel rolling processing, non-ferrous metal alloy manufacturing, copper rolling processing, aluminum rolling processing, and other non-ferrous metal rolling processing. Steel rolling processing mainly includes metal fiber porous materials (iron-chromium-aluminum, stainless steel, and other metal fiber porous materials/shielding materials). Non-ferrous metal alloy manufacturing mainly includes non-ferrous metal powder materials, porous titanium, and titanium alloys. Copper rolling processing mainly includes copper foam.

context: Network operation services mainly include next-generation mobile communication network operation services, next-generation internet operation services, fiber broadband network operation services, next-generation broadcasting and television network operation services, satellite communication operation services, and industrial internet operation services. Next-generation mobile communication network operation services include the construction and networking of next-generation mobile communication core networks, the construction and networking of next-generation mobile communication access networks, optimization and maintenance of next-generation mobile communication networks, and next-generation mobile communication services. Next-generation internet operation services refer to the operation of backbone networks, metropolitan area networks, access networks, content delivery networks, data centers, and business platforms based on IPv6 technology and IPv4/IPv6 transition technology.

context: Develop remote sensing target recognition technology for special geological and complex meteorological environments, to achieve high efficiency, high precision, and high adaptability in railway survey methods. Research on technologies such as Beidou satellite navigation, airborne radar, low-altitude remote sensing with unmanned aerial vehicles, aerial geophysics, and simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM), to promote the application of integrated aerial, space, and ground survey technologies and satellite positioning measurement methods. Develop intelligent route selection technology supported by geographic information system big data (GIS) and cloud computing technology, to achieve automatic generation of multiple solutions and multidimensional intelligent evaluation. Research key technologies for geological survey in complex environments, to improve the anti-interference and refinement levels of engineering survey technology. Increase the research and development efforts for fundamental software for railway survey and design, and accelerate testing, verification, and application promotion. Promote railway information modeling technology, to achieve standardization and digitization of information model creation and delivery throughout the lifecycle, and promote integrated design.

context: Promote the construction of smart logistics information platforms that span regions and industries, and encourage the development of new logistics distribution models such as joint delivery within the scope of the law. (Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Commerce, State Post Bureau) Encourage schools, express delivery companies, and third-party entities to strengthen cooperation according to local conditions, promote express delivery on campuses through the establishment of intelligent parcel lockers or delivery rooms, entrusting campus post offices for delivery, and establishing shared delivery sites, etc. (Local governments at all levels, State Post Bureau, Ministry of Commerce, Ministry of Education) Study and promote e-commerce and smart delivery of daily necessities for regulated individuals according to law enforcement needs. (Ministry of Justice) Cities with conditions should include the construction of supporting logistics (express) delivery stations and intelligent terminal facilities in urban community development plans, and encourage e-commerce and logistics (express) companies to recycle and reuse packaging materials for online shopping products. (Relevant departments are responsible according to their respective duties).

zh_context: 推动跨地区跨行业的智慧物流信息平台建设，鼓励在法律规定范围内发展共同配送等物流配送组织新模式。（交通运输部、商务部、邮政局、发展改革委）支持物流（快递）配送站、智能快件箱等物流设施建设，鼓励社区物业、村级信息服务站（点）、便利店等提供快件派送服务。支持快递服务网络向农村地区延伸。（地方各级人民政府，商务部、邮政局、农业部按职责分工分别负责）推进电子商务与物流快递协同发展。（财政部、商务部、邮政局）鼓励学校、快递企业、第三方主体因地制宜加强合作，通过设置智能快件箱或快件收发室、委托校园邮政局所代为投递、建立共同配送站点等方式，促进快递进校园。（地方各级人民政府，邮政局、商务部、教育部）根据执法需求，研究推动被监管人员生活物资电子商务和智能配送。（司法部）有条件的城市应将配套建设物流（快递）配送站、智能终端设施纳入城市社区发展规划，鼓励电子商务企业和物流（快递）企业对网络购物商品包装物进行回收和循环利用。（有关部门按职责分工分别负责）。

zh_context: 轨道交通专用设备、关键系统及部件，主要包括铁路专用牵引供电系统等。铁路专用牵引供电系统，城市轨道交通牵引供电系统、能馈式牵引供电系统，动车组、机车、车辆网络控制系统，列车网络控制系统，牵引控制系统。轨道交通交流牵引传动功率变流装置，中低速磁浮列车控制系统，混合动力机车控制及电能管理系统，储能式城轨车辆动力系统，上述系统的关键零部件。高速、城际、城市轨道交通车辆制动系统，客货运机车制动系统，重载、快速货物列车制动系统，磁轨制动装置，涡流制动装置，制动系统用高可靠性气动元件。轨道交通专用齿轮箱、驱动装置，高速动车组车轴、车轮、轴承等关键基础材料和零部件，减震降噪弹性车轮。轻量化车体。大功率中速柴油机，中等功率高速柴油机，双燃料发动机。动车组、机车、城轨车辆用异步牵引电机，永磁牵引电机，轻量化新型变压器。车载安全防护系统，牵引供电遥控、遥监、遥测系统，自然灾害防灾及预警系统。

context: High-energy storage and key electronic materials manufacturing mainly include the manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins, manufacturing of other specialty chemical products, manufacturing of plastic films, manufacturing of special glass, manufacturing of technical glass products, manufacturing of special ceramic products, manufacturing of graphite and carbon products, manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries, manufacturing of nickel-hydrogen batteries, manufacturing of other batteries, manufacturing of electronic specialty materials, etc. The manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes polyolefin materials, soft materials, and silicon-based composite materials. The manufacturing of other specialty chemical products mainly includes lithium hexafluorophosphate carbonate ester solutions. The manufacturing of plastic films mainly includes aluminum-plastic films, transparent conductive film materials, and electronic component-specific thin film materials. The manufacturing of special glass mainly includes glass substrates of 6th generation and above. The manufacturing of technical glass products mainly includes glass ceramics (microcrystalline glass) and quartz-based optical fiber cable materials. The manufacturing of special ceramic products mainly includes high-performance ceramic substrates, gas-sensitive ceramic materials, moisture-sensitive ceramic materials, photosensitive ceramic materials, and thermosensitive ceramic materials. The manufacturing of graphite and carbon products mainly includes graphite materials (such as artificial graphite and natural graphite) and hard carbon materials.
