zh_context: 环境保护及污染治理服务，主要包括畜禽粪污处理活动、污水处理及其再生利用、海洋环境服务、其他海洋服务、标准化服务、自然生态系统保护管理、其他自然保护、水污染治理、大气污染治理、固体废物治理、危险废物治理、放射性废物治理、土壤污染治理与修复服务、噪声与振动控制服务、其他污染治理、市政设施管理等。畜禽粪污处理活动，主要包括支撑畜禽养殖污染控制与资源化技术工程化活动。其他海洋服务，主要包括海域使用论证服务、海域价格评估服务、海域使用后评估服务、海洋资源管理服务、大洋和极地考察服务、海底工程、作业服务、海洋工程咨询服务、无居民海岛开发利用评审服务、无居民海岛使用金评估服务、海洋信息服务、其他海洋服务（海洋调查服务等）。标准化服务，主要包括地下水特征污染物修复技术标准。市政设施管理，主要包括城市污水排放管理服务、城市雨水排放管理服务、城市生活垃圾及污泥处置、给水管网模型系统、给水管网渗漏监控系统。

context: Conquer key core technologies. Implement actions to enhance high-end products, focusing on key products such as circuit components, break through industry development barriers such as patents and technological barriers, fill in the gaps in the development of electronic components, and ensure the security and stability of the industrial supply chain. Column 1: Actions to enhance high-end products. Circuit components: Focus on the development of miniaturized and chip-type resistive, capacitive, and inductive components, high-frequency and high-precision frequency components, high-temperature and high-voltage resistant, low-loss, and high-reliability semiconductor discrete components and modules, miniaturized, high-reliability, and high-sensitivity electronic protection devices, high-performance, multifunctional, and high-density hybrid integrated circuits. Connection components: Focus on the development of high-frequency, high-speed, low-loss, and miniaturized optoelectronic connectors, ultra-high-speed, ultra-low-loss, and low-cost optical fiber cables, high-voltage, high-temperature resistant, and high tensile strength electrical equipment cables, high-frequency, high-speed, high-layer, high-density printed circuit boards, integrated circuit packaging substrates, and special printed circuit boards. Electromechanical components: Focus on the development of high-voltage, high-current, miniaturized, and low-power control relays, miniaturized and high-reliability switches, miniaturized, integrated, high-precision, and energy-efficient micro-special motors. Sensing components: Focus on the development of miniaturized, low-power, integrated, and high-sensitivity sensitive components, high-end sensors in categories such as temperature, gas, displacement, speed, optoelectronics, and biochemistry, new MEMS sensors and smart sensors, and miniaturized and intelligent electroacoustic devices. Functional material components: Focus on the development of high-energy product, high coercivity permanent magnetic components, high magnetic permeability, low magnetic loss soft magnetic components, high thermal conductivity, electrical insulation, low loss, and lead-free environmentally friendly electronic ceramic components. Optical communication components: Focus on the development of high-speed optical communication chips, high-speed and high-precision optics. Build a multi-level collaborative innovation system. Support enterprises, higher education institutions, and research institutes to strengthen cooperation, explore the establishment of manufacturing innovation centers in the field of electronic components, increase research and development efforts in key common technologies, cutting-edge leading technologies, modern engineering technologies, and disruptive technologies, and build a collaborative innovation and achievement transformation platform that integrates industry, academia, research, and application. Encourage regions to carry out key technology research and development and industrialization in distinctive or segmented fields to achieve differentiated development. Improve intellectual property layout. Encourage enterprises, higher education institutions, and research institutes to enhance awareness of intellectual property protection, improve intellectual property management systems, and carry out domestic and international intellectual property layout. Explore the establishment of patent pools and conduct patent analysis and early warning related to electronic components. Carry out pilot projects to cultivate enterprises in the field of intellectual property.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++重点工作,提升产业创新能力
zh_context: 攻克关键核心技术。实施重点产品高端提升行动，面向电路类元器件等重点产品，突破制约行业发展的专利、技术壁垒，补足电子元器件发展短板，保障产业链供应链安全稳定。专栏1重点产品高端提升行动。电路类元器件。重点发展微型化、片式化阻容感元件，高频率、高精度频率元器件，耐高温、耐高压、低损耗、高可靠半导体分立器件及模块，小型化、高可靠、高灵敏度电子防护器件，高性能、多功能、高密度混合集成电路。连接类元器件。重点发展高频高速、低损耗、小型化的光电连接器，超高速、超低损耗、低成本的光纤光缆，耐高压、耐高温、高抗拉强度电气装备线缆，高频高速、高层高密度印制电路板、集成电路封装基板、特种印制电路板。机电类元器件。重点发展高压、大电流、小型化、低功耗控制继电器，小型化、高可靠开关按钮，小型化、集成化、高精密、高效节能微特电机。传感类元器件。重点发展小型化、低功耗、集成化、高灵敏度的敏感元件，温度、气体、位移、速度、光电、生化等类别的高端传感器，新型MEMS传感器和智能传感器，微型化、智能化的电声器件。功能材料类元件。重点发展高磁能积、高矫顽力永磁元件，高磁导率、低磁损耗软磁元件，高导热、电绝缘、低损耗、无铅环保的电子陶瓷元件。光通信器件。重点发展高速光通信芯片、高速高精度光。构建多层次联合创新体系。支持企业、高等院校及科研院所加强合作，在电子元器件领域探索成立制造业创新中心，加大关键共性技术、前沿引领技术、现代工程技术、颠覆性技术研发力度，搭建产学研用紧密结合的协同创新和成果转化平台。鼓励各地围绕特色或细分领域，开展关键技术研发与产业化，形成差异化发展。完善知识产权布局。鼓励企业、高等院校及科研院所提升知识产权保护意识，完善知识产权管理制度并开展国内外知识产权布局。探索建立专利池，围绕电子元器件开展专利分析和预警。开展知识产权试点企业培育工作。

context: Friction braking materials are used for high-speed trains, corrosion-resistant self-lubricating composite materials are used for major marine and aerospace equipment, piezoelectric materials and fluorine-containing sealing materials resistant to corrosion and extreme temperatures are used for aviation and aerospace, efficient thermal management materials and electromagnetic shielding materials are used for supercomputers, temperature-sensitive high coercivity magnetic materials and components are used for non-active intelligent protection in nuclear power plants, and new electromagnetic damping materials are used for electromagnetic catapult safety systems.

context: By 2023, the competitive advantage of our products will be further enhanced, the level of secure supply in the industrial chain will be significantly improved, and breakthroughs will be achieved in basic electronic components for important industries such as smart terminals, 5G, and industrial internet. The supply chain capabilities of key materials, equipment, and instruments will be strengthened, and the modernization level of the industrial chain and supply chain will be enhanced. - The industry scale will continue to grow. The total sales of electronic components will reach 2.1 trillion yuan, further consolidating China's position as a global producer of electronic components and fully meeting the market demand for information technology. - Technological innovation will make breakthroughs. Key technologies of a batch of electronic components will be achieved, and overall innovation investment in the industry will be further increased. The patent layout of key products such as RF filters, high-speed connectors, chip multilayer ceramic capacitors, and optoelectronic communication devices will be more comprehensive. - The development of enterprises will be remarkable. A group of electronic component enterprises with international competitive advantages will be formed, striving for 15 enterprises to achieve a revenue scale of over 10 billion yuan. The leading enterprises will effectively enhance their revenue scale and comprehensive strength, and their ability to resist risks and reinvest will be significantly enhanced.

zh_context: 到2023年，优势产品竞争力进一步增强，产业链安全供应水平显著提升，面向智能终端、5G、工业互联网等重要行业，推动基础电子元器件实现突破，增强关键材料、设备仪器等供应链保障能力，提升产业链供应链现代化水平。——产业规模不断壮大。电子元器件销售总额达到21000亿元，进一步巩固我国作为全球电子元器件生产大国的地位，充分满足信息技术市场规模需求。——技术创新取得突破。突破一批电子元器件关键技术，行业总体创新投入进一步提升，射频滤波器、高速连接器、片式多层陶瓷电容器、光通信器件等重点产品专利布局更加完善。——企业发展成效明显。形成一批具有国际竞争优势的电子元器件企业，力争15家企业营收规模突破100亿元，龙头企业营收规模和综合实力有效提升，抗风险和再投入能力明显增强。

context: In addition to meeting the corresponding conditions specified in Articles 4 and 5 of this notice, the project should also meet one of the following corresponding conditions: (1) For major chip manufacturing projects, the following conditions must be met: 1. Compliance with national layout plans and industrial policies; 2. For chip manufacturing projects of different process types, the following conditions must be met separately: (a) For logic circuits and memory projects with a process linewidth of less than or equal to 65 nanometers, the total fixed asset investment should exceed 8 billion yuan, and the planned monthly production capacity should exceed 10,000 wafers (equivalent to 12 inches); (b) For specialty chip manufacturing projects with process linewidths less than or equal to 0.25 micrometers, including analog, mixed-signal, high-voltage, radio frequency, power, optoelectronic integration, image sensing, microelectromechanical systems, and silicon-on-insulator processes, the total fixed asset investment should exceed 1 billion yuan, and the planned monthly production capacity should exceed 10,000 wafers (equivalent to 8 inches); (c) For compound integrated circuit manufacturing projects with process linewidths less than or equal to 0.5 micrometers, the total fixed asset investment should exceed 1 billion yuan, and the planned monthly production capacity should exceed 10,000 wafers (equivalent to 6 inches).

zh_context: 策条件，除承建企业应符合本通知第四、五条的相对应规定条件外，项目还应符。合下列对应条件中的一项：（一）芯片制造类重大项目，需同时满足以下条件：1.符合国家布局规划和产业政策；2.对于不同工艺类型芯片制造项目，需分别满足以下条件：（1）对于工艺线宽小于65纳米（含）的逻辑电路、存储器项目，固定资。产总投资额需超过80亿元，规划月产能超过1万片（折合12英寸）；。（2）对于工艺线宽小于0.25微米（含）的模拟、数模混合、高压、射频、功率、光电集成、图像传感、微机电系统、绝缘体上硅工艺等特色芯片制造项目，固定资产总投资额超过10亿元，规划月产能超过1万片（折合8英寸）；。（3）对于工艺线宽小于0.5微米（含）的基于化合物集成电路制造项目，。固定资产总投资额超过10亿元，规划月产能超过1万片（折合6英寸）。

zh_context: 产、学、研相结合，发挥企业的主体作用，突破瓶颈技术，掌握核心技术，实现关键技术与装备的自主化，形成具有自主品牌和自主知识产权的产品与技术，提高企业核心竞争力。

context: By 2025, the integration and development of informatization and industrialization will be achieved in a wider range, deeper level, and higher level. The new generation of information technology will accelerate its penetration into various fields of manufacturing, significantly expanding its scope, deepening its level, and greatly improving its quality. The pace of digital transformation in the manufacturing industry will accelerate, and the national index of integration and development of the two industries will reach 105. New models and new formats will be widely popularized. The digitalization rate of enterprise management will reach 80%, and the form of enterprises will accelerate the transformation towards flatness, platformization, and ecologicalization. The popularity rate of digital R&D design tools will reach 85%, and platform-based design will be widely promoted. The rate of key process digitization will reach 68%, and networked, intelligent, and personalized production methods will be deeply applied in key areas. The effectiveness of digital transformation in key industries such as raw materials, equipment manufacturing, consumer goods, electronic information, green manufacturing, and safety production will be significantly improved. The integration support system will continue to be improved. The construction of new information infrastructure will be upgraded, digital technology will progress rapidly, the industrial big data industry will flourish, the application of industrial Internet will further demonstrate its effectiveness, the standard system for the integration of the two industries will continue to be improved, and the industrial foundation will move towards advanced development. The vitality of enterprise integration and development will be fully stimulated. The popularity rate of industrial Internet platforms will reach 45%, the service capability of system solutions will be significantly enhanced, and a new pattern of platform enterprises empowering large, medium, and small enterprises will be formed. The prosperous development of the integration ecosystem will continue. The double innovation system in the manufacturing industry will continue to be improved, the digitalization level of the industrial chain and supply chain will continue to improve, driving the accelerated integration of the industrial chain, innovation chain, talent chain, and value chain, and a number of industrial clusters with a higher level of digitalization will emerge, forming a rapidly developing integrated development ecosystem.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十四五”信息化和工业化深度融合发展规划（工信部规〔2021〕182号）（工信部/2021年11月17日）++nan++“十四五”信息化和工业化深度融合发展规划++2021-11++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 到2025年，信息化和工业化在更广范围、更深程度、更高水平上实现融合发展，新一代信息技术向制造业各领域加速渗透，范围显著扩展、程度持续深化、质量大幅提升，制造业数字化转型步伐明显加快，全国两化融合发展指数达到105。——新模式新业态广泛普及。企业经营管理数字化普及率达80%，企业形态加速向扁平化、平台化、生态化转变。数字化研发设计工具普及率达85%，平台化设计得到规模化推广。关键工序数控化率达68%，网络化、智能化、个性化生产方式在重点领域得到深度应用。——产业数字化转型成效显著。原材料、装备制造、消费品、电子信息、绿色制造、安全生产等重点行业领域数字化转型步伐加快，数字化、网络化、智能化整体水平持续提高。——融合支撑体系持续完善。新型信息基础设施建设提档升级，数字化技术快速进步，工业大数据产业蓬勃发展，工业互联网应用成效进一步显现，两化融合标准体系持续完善，产业基础迈向高级化。——企业融合发展活力全面激发。工业互联网平台普及率达45%，系统解决方案服务能力明显增强，形成平台企业赋能、大中小企业融通发展新格局。——融合生态体系繁荣发展。制造业“双创”体系持续完善，产业链供应链数字化水平持续提升，带动产业链、创新链、人才链、价值链加速融合，涌现出一批数字化水平较高的产业集群，融合发展生态快速形成。

context: The manufacturing of polymer nanocomposites mainly includes the production of coatings, primary form plastics and synthetic resins, synthetic fiber monomers (polymers) manufacturing, other synthetic materials manufacturing, other specialty chemical products manufacturing, other synthetic fiber manufacturing, plastic film manufacturing, glass fiber and product manufacturing, etc. The production of coatings mainly includes polyester resin nanocoatings, phenolic resin nanocoatings, epoxy resin nanocoatings, and other nanocoatings. The manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes synthetic resin nanomaterials, polyimide nanomaterials, unsaturated polyester resin nanomaterials, and other primary form plastic nanomaterials.

zh_context: 高分子纳米复合材料制造，主要包括涂料制造、初级形态塑料及合成树脂制造国民经、合成纤维单（聚合）体制造、其他合成材料制造、其他专用化学产品制造、其他合成纤维制造、塑料薄膜制造、玻璃纤维及制品制造等。涂料制造，主要包括聚酯树脂纳米涂料、酚醛树脂纳米涂料、环氧树脂纳米涂料、其他纳米涂料。初级形态塑料及合成树脂制造国民经，主要包括合成树脂纳米材料、聚酰亚胺纳米材料、不饱和聚酯树脂纳米材料、其他初级形态塑料纳米材料。

context: Highlighting the problem of heavy reliance on imported high-end medical equipment and low localization of core components in China, the focus is on strengthening the development of major products such as digital diagnostic equipment, in vitro diagnostic products, and high-value consumables. This includes promoting the improvement of testing and measurement technology, the construction of a standard system, and the promotion of demonstration applications, in order to break the import monopoly, reduce medical expenses, improve industrial competitiveness, promote the leapfrog development of China's high-end medical equipment industry, and drive the overall transformation of the industry towards innovation-driven development. Column 2: High-end medical equipment. Digital diagnostic equipment. With early, precise, and minimally invasive diagnosis and treatment as the direction, the main focus is on cutting-edge products in medical imaging diagnosis and advanced treatment that heavily rely on imports. This includes breakthroughs in disruptive technologies such as new imaging, advanced treatment, and integrated diagnosis and treatment. Key areas of development include multi-modal molecular imaging, new magnetic resonance imaging systems, new X-ray computed tomography imaging, new generation ultrasound imaging, low-dose X-ray imaging, composite endoscopy imaging, new microscopy imaging, large-scale radiotherapy equipment, surgical robots, and active implantable medical devices. Relevant standards and testing will be improved, and efforts will be made to accelerate the localization, high-end development, and branding of digital diagnostic equipment, as well as the improvement of innovation, industrial, and service chains. In vitro diagnostic products. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as microfluidic chips, single molecule detection, and automated nucleic acid testing are targeted. Major products to be developed include fully automated nucleic acid testing systems, high-throughput liquid phase suspension chips, medical biomass spectrometers, rapid pathological diagnosis systems, and a batch of early diagnosis and precise treatment diagnostic reagents for major diseases, as well as high-precision diagnostic products suitable for primary healthcare institutions. This aims to enhance the competitiveness of China's in vitro diagnostic industry. Organ repair and replacement materials and implantable medical devices. The focus is on tissue replacement, functional repair, and intelligent regulation. Breakthroughs in new technologies such as 3D printing and artificial intelligence are targeted. The development of next-generation biomedical materials and devices includes tissue engineering products, implantable medical devices and supporting surgical instruments, oral implantation and maxillofacial repair materials, blood purification materials and equipment, etc. The goal is to improve product quality and achieve import substitution. Portable and miniaturized mobile medical equipment. The key is to break through the integration of remote, mobile, and intelligent technologies. This includes the development of vital sign monitoring, disease diagnosis, and treatment support equipment and diagnostic software suitable for mobile medical applications. Research will be conducted on specialized medical equipment for various mobile environments, emergency treatment equipment, and supporting standard specifications and quality evaluation systems. Additionally, mobile medical solutions and comprehensive solutions for home-based and personalized medical health continuous services will be formulated.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”健康产业科技创新专项规划（国科发社〔2017〕149号）（科技部、国家发改委、工信部、原国家卫计委、体育总局、原食品药品监管总局/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,重点发展三类产品,高端医疗器械
zh_context: 突出解决我国高端医疗器械严重依赖进口、核心部件国产化程度低的问题，重点加强数字诊疗装备、体外诊断产品、高值耗材等重大产品攻关，协同推进检测与计量技术提升、标准体系建设、示范应用推广等工作，打破进口垄断，降低医疗费用，提高产业竞争力，促进我国高端医疗器械行业的跨越发展，推动产业整体向创新驱动发展转型。专栏2：高端医疗器械。数字诊疗装备。以早期、精准、微创诊疗为方向，以严重依赖进口的医学影像诊断和先进治疗的前沿产品为主攻方向，突破新型成像、先进治疗和一体化诊疗等颠覆性技术，重点推进多模态分子成像、新型磁共振成像系统、新型X射线计算机断层成像、新一代超声成像、低剂量X射线成像、复合窥镜成像、新型显微成像、大型放射治疗装备、手术机器人、医用有源植入式装置等产品研发，完善相关标准与检测，加快推进数字诊疗装备国产化、高端化、品牌化，完善创新链、产业链和服务链。体外诊断产品。突破微流控芯片、单分子检测、自动化核酸检测等关键技术，开发全自动核酸检测系统、高通量液相悬浮芯片、医用生物质谱仪、快速病理诊断系统等重大产品，研发一批重大疾病早期诊断和精确治疗诊断试剂以及适合基层医疗机构的高精度诊断产品，提升我国体外诊断产业的竞争力。组织器官修复和替代材料及植介入器械。以组织替代、功能修复、智能调控为方向，突破3D打印、人工智能等新技术应用，研发组织工程化产品、植介入医疗器械及配套手术器械、口腔植入及颌面修复材料、血液净化材料及设备等新一代生物医用材料器械，提升产品品质，实现进口替代。便携式、小型化的移动医疗装备。重点突破远程、移动、智能一体化融合关键技术，开发适用于移动医疗的体征监测、疾病诊断、支持治疗相关设备与诊断软件，研发多种移动环境下的专用医疗设备、应急救治设备和配套的标准规范与质量评价体系，制定移动医疗解决方案和家庭化、个体化医疗健康连续服务综合解决方案。

context: The manufacture of wind power generation equipment and related materials mainly includes the manufacturing of coatings, synthetic rubber, cement, glass fiber reinforced plastic products, specialized metallurgical equipment, metal shipbuilding, marine engineering equipment, underwater salvage equipment, power electronic components, wire and cable manufacturing, navigation, surveying, meteorological and marine specialized instrument manufacturing, electronic measuring instrument manufacturing, etc. The operation and maintenance of wind power generation mainly includes wind power generation. context: Deepen the research on network security monitoring and early warning, vulnerability discovery, malicious code analysis, detection evaluation, and traceability and evidence collection techniques. Strengthen the research on advanced sustainable attack response technologies. Establish and improve network security protection techniques such as intrusion detection and defense, antivirus, anti-denial of service attacks, abnormal traffic monitoring, webpage tampering prevention, domain name security, vulnerability scanning, centralized account management, data encryption, and security auditing. Improve monitoring and disposal methods for network-side Trojan viruses, mobile malicious programs, and other threats. Actively research and utilize new technologies such as cloud computing and big data to enhance network security monitoring and early warning capabilities. Promote the integration of enterprise technologies with those of the telecommunications regulatory authorities, establish interface standards and specifications, and achieve data sharing in monitoring. Strengthen cooperation with network security service companies to prevent risks during the service process. When relying on security service units to carry out network security integration construction and risk assessment, units that have been assessed for their network security service capabilities by relevant industry organizations should be selected. zh_context: 深入开展网络安全监测预警、漏洞挖掘、恶意代码分析、检测评估和溯源取证技术研究，加强高级可持续攻击应对技术研究。建立和完善入侵检测与防御、防病毒、防拒绝服务攻击、异常流量监测、网页防篡改、域名安全、漏洞扫描、集中账号管理、数据加密、安全审计等网络安全防护技术手段。健全基于网络侧的木马病毒、移动恶意程序等监测与处置手段。积极研究利用云计算、大数据等新技术提高网络安全监测预警能力。促进企业技术手段与通信主管部门技术手段对接，制定接口标准规范，实现监测数据共享。加强与网络安全服务企业的合作，防范服务过程中的风险，在依托安全服务单位开展网络安全集成建设和风险评估等工作时，应当选用通过有关行业组织网络安全服务能力评定的单位。三、保障措施。

context: With the goal of overcoming the common key technologies that restrict the development of robotics technology and industry in our country, research is being conducted on common key technologies such as high-performance robot core components (RV reducers, harmonic reducers, servo motors and drivers, robot controllers), specialized sensors, software systems and multitasking operating systems, functional software, measurement testing/safety and reliability, application processes and system integration. The aim is to establish a technology system for robot safety and reliability, achieve international standards in robot performance, address the hollowing-out issue in our country's robot industry, and enhance the international competitiveness of domestically produced robots.

zh_context: 以攻克制约我国机器人技术与产业发展的共性关键技术为目标，开展高性能机器人核心零部件（RV减速器、谐波减速器、伺服电机与驱动器、机器人控制器）、专用传感器、软件体系及多任务操作系统、功能软件、计量测试/安全与可靠性、应用工艺及系统集成等共性关键技术研究，建立机器人安全性与可靠性技术体系，机器人性能达到国际同类产品水平，解决我国机器人产业空心化问题，提升国产机器人的国际竞争力。

context: With the clinical demand for medication as the guide, relying on advanced technologies such as high-throughput sequencing, genome editing, and microfluidic chips, promote the development of translational medicine, and achieve original drug innovation in the fields of tumors, major infectious diseases, neurological and psychiatric disorders, chronic diseases, and rare diseases. Accelerate the development of new biologics such as antibodies, proteins, and peptides. Develop therapeutic vaccines, ribonucleic acid (RNA) interference drugs, aptamer drugs, as well as biologic therapies such as stem cells and chimeric antigen receptor T-cell immunotherapy (CAR-T). Promote scalable technologies such as antibody/peptide-small molecule conjugation, purification of biologics, controlled-release formulations, targeted formulations, etc., improve quality control and safety evaluation technologies, and accelerate the industrialization of high-end drugs. Promote the standardized development of traditional Chinese medicine extracts and traditional Chinese medicine formula granules, improve the construction of a whole-process quality traceability system based on the source of medicinal materials, and create a batch of clinically valuable and scientifically valuable new varieties of traditional Chinese medicine. Support marine innovative drugs with independent intellectual property rights and broad market prospects, and build a high-end industrial chain for marine biomedicine.

zh_context: 以临床用药需求为导向，依托高通量测序、基因组编辑、微流控芯片等先进技术，促进转化医学发展，在肿瘤、重大传染性疾病、神经精神疾病、慢性病及罕见病等领域实现药物原始创新。加快创制新型抗体、蛋白及多肽等生物药。发展治疗性疫苗，核糖核酸（RNA）干扰药物，适配子药物，以及干细胞、嵌合抗原受体T细胞免疫疗法（CAR-T）等生物治疗产品。推动抗体/多肽-小分子偶联、生物大分子纯化、缓控释制剂、靶向制剂等可规模化技术，完善质量控制和安全性评价技术，加快高端药物产业化速度。推动中药提取物、中药配方颗粒的规范化发展，完善基于药材源头的全过程质量可溯源体系建设，创制一批临床价值大、科学价值强的中药新品种。支持具有自主知识产权、市场前景广阔的海洋创新药物，构建海洋生物医药中高端产业链。

context: In response to the characteristics of the building materials industry, focusing on key processes such as mining, raw material preparation, crushing and grinding, kiln control, logistics and warehousing, online testing, etc., we have refined and developed several sets of intelligent, digital, and integrated system solutions with functions such as intelligent perception, automatic execution, deep learning, intelligent decision-making, and password protection. These solutions promote the automation, intelligence, and unmanned transformation of production methods in industries such as cement, glass, ceramics, etc. Column 1: System solutions for key segments of the building materials industry. Cement industry: Key solutions include digital planning and design, intelligent factory construction, automatic ore selection and blending, kiln optimization control, one-click start-stop for grinding machines, equipment diagnosis and maintenance, remote production monitoring, intelligent quality control, energy and water consumption management, clean packaging and shipping, safety and environmental management, and coordinated disposal of solid waste. Glass industry: Key solutions include raw material selection and blending, intelligent thermal control for melting furnaces, tin baths, and annealing kilns, digital simulation of melting and forming, optimization control for the cold end, online defect detection, automatic stacking and paper laying, automatic cutting and slicing, and intelligent coding and warehousing. Ceramics industry: Key solutions include standard data for raw materials, press control and management, intelligent high-pressure slurry injection, control of body drying, unmanned loading and unloading of materials, kiln optimization control, glazing and polishing of products, automatic detection and sorting, and intelligent warehousing and logistics. Stone industry: Key solutions include automatic mining, intelligent sawing and cutting, grinding and polishing, automatic cutting, special-shaped processing, as well as inspection, repair, packaging, and disposal of waste materials. Refractory materials industry: Key solutions include raw material preparation, press control, kiln optimization, online monitoring, and fully automated three-dimensional warehouses. Wall materials industry: Key solutions include precise preparation of raw materials, cutting and shaping of blanks, drying (steam pressing) and curing, kiln optimization control, automatic quality inspection, intelligent packaging and logistics, automatic unloading and stacking, and pollution emission control. Insulation materials industry: Key solutions include homogenization of raw material blending, automatic feeding and charging, kiln optimization control, online quality monitoring, equipment failure warning, intelligent cutting (sorting) and packaging, digital warehousing and logistics. Concrete and cement products industry: Key solutions include integrated systems for the entire concrete industry chain, including manufacturing execution management, intelligent logistics and distribution, and online quality monitoring. For cement products, key solutions include centralized mixing and delivery, automatic molding control, skeleton welding and transportation, and intelligent maintenance. Waterproof materials industry: Key solutions include automatic feeding and metering, process quality control, manufacturing execution management, and packaging and warehousing logistics. Non-metallic mineral industry: Key solutions include data management for geological exploration, fine raw material mining, material weighing and homogenization, intelligent control of material selection, mineral processing optimization, online quality monitoring, and finished product packaging and logistics. High-performance fiber and composite materials industry: Key solutions include control of tank and kiln drawing, online quality monitoring, automatic material transportation, injection molding, extrusion winding, equipment control, and equipment failure warning. Mechanism sand and stone industry: Key solutions include crushing and shaping, grading adjustment, quality monitoring, dust collection, wastewater treatment, and material storage and transportation. Wood building materials industry: Key solutions include raw material sorting, automatic processing, production control, online monitoring, and logistics and warehousing. Inorganic non-metallic new materials: Key solutions include integrated systems for material research and development and design, which combine calculation, experimentation, and data, as well as intelligent grading, purification, modification, growth, processing, and application.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++发展形势,建材工业智能制造技术创新行动,形成一批系统解决方案
zh_context: 针对建材细分行业特点，以矿山开采、原料制备、破碎粉磨、窑炉控制、物流仓储、在线检测等关键环节为重点，提炼形成若干套具有智能感知、自动执行、深度学习、智能决策、密码防护等功能的智能化、数字化、集成化系统解决方案，促进水泥、玻璃、陶瓷等行业生产方式的自动化、智能化、无人化变革。专栏一建材重点细分行业系统解决方案。水泥行业：重点形成数字规划设计、智能工厂建设、自动采选配矿、窑炉优化控制、磨机一键启停、设备诊断运维、生产远程监控、智能质量控制、能耗水耗管理、清洁包装发运、安全环保管理、固废协同处置等集成系统解决方案。玻璃行业：重点形成原料选矿和配料，熔窑、锡槽、退火窑三大热工智能化控制，熔化成形数字仿真，冷端优化控制、在线缺陷检测、自动堆垛铺纸、自动切割分片、智能打码仓储等集成系统解决方案。陶瓷行业：重点形成原料标准数据、压机控制管理、智能高压注浆、坯体干燥控制、物料无人装卸、窑炉优化控制、产品施釉磨抛、自动检测分选、智能仓储物流等集成系统解决方案。石材行业：重点形成自动开采、智能锯解、研磨抛光、自动裁切、异型加工，以及检验、修补、包装、废弃料资源化处理等集成系统解决方案。耐火材料行业：重点形成原料制备、压机控制、窑炉优化、在线监测、全自动立体仓库。等集成系统解决方案。墙体材料行业：重点形成原料精准制备、坯体成型切割、干燥（蒸压）养护、窑炉优化控制、质量自动检测、智能包装物流、自动卸车码垛、污染排放控制等集成系。统解决方案。保温材料行业：重点形成原料配料均化、自动输料投料、窑炉优化控制、质量在线监测、设备故障预警、智能切割（分拣）包装、数字仓储物流等集成系统解决方案。混凝土及水泥制品行业：重点形成制造执行管理、智能物流配送、在线质量监测的混凝土全产业链集成系统解决方案，以及集中搅拌分送、自动成型控制、骨架焊接运送、制品智能养护的水泥制品集成系统解决方案。防水材料行业：重点形成自动上料计量、过程质量控制、制造执行管理、封装仓储物流等集成系统解决方案。非金属矿行业：重点形成地勘数据管理、原料精细开釆、物料称量均化、选线智能控制、矿物加工优化、质量在线监测、成品包装物流等集成系统解决方案。高性能纤维及复合材料行业：重点形成池窑拉丝控制、质量在线监测、物流自动输送、注塑拉挤缠绕、压制设备控制、设备故障预警等集成系统解决方案。机制砂石行业：重点形成破碎整形、级配调整、质量监测、粉尘收集、废水处理、物料储运等集成系统解决方案。木质建材行业：重点形成原料分选、自动加工、生产控制、在线监测、物流仓储等集成系统解决方案。无机非金属新材料：重点形成集计算、实验、数据为一体的材料研发设计以及智能分级、提纯、改性、生长、加工、应用等集成系统解决方案。

context: Solar energy materials manufacturing mainly includes the selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores, manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials, coating manufacturing, special glass manufacturing, graphite and carbon product manufacturing, forging and powder metallurgy product manufacturing, semiconductor device specialized equipment manufacturing, electronic specialized material manufacturing, etc. The selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores mainly includes ilmenite. Manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials mainly includes silane. Coating manufacturing mainly includes high light utilization coating materials, heat-absorbing coating materials. Special glass manufacturing mainly includes photovoltaic conductive glass (TCO glass, etc.) and glass tubing for metal sealing. Manufacturing of graphite and carbon products mainly includes graphite materials for solar energy. Forging and powder metallurgy product manufacturing mainly includes desiccants.

zh_context: 太阳能材料制造，主要包括其他常用有色金属矿采选、有机化学原料制造、涂料制造、特种玻璃制造、石墨及碳素制品制造、锻件及粉末冶金制品制造、半导体器件专用设备制造、电子专用材料制造等。其他常用有色金属矿采选，主要包括钙钛矿。有机化学原料制造，主要包括硅烷。涂料制造，主要包括高光利用率涂层材料、吸热体涂层材料。特种玻璃制造，主要包括光伏导电玻璃（TCO玻璃等）、与金属封接用玻璃管材。石墨及碳素制品制造，主要包括太阳能用石墨材料。锻件及粉末冶金制品制造，主要包括吸气剂。

context: The manufacturing of high-performance thermosetting resin-based composite materials mainly includes the manufacturing of other synthetic materials, glass fiber reinforced plastic products, graphite and carbon products, etc. The manufacturing of other synthetic materials mainly includes phenolic resin-based composite materials (used in the aerospace, automotive, and rail transportation fields), cyanate ester resin-based composite materials, epoxy resin-based composite materials (used in wind power, power, electronic information, aerospace, marine engineering, high-tech ships, rail transportation equipment, etc.), bismaleimide resin-based composite materials (used in aerospace), polyimide resin-based composite materials (used in engines), and vinyl resin composite materials (used in large-scale petrochemical equipment, environmental engineering, etc.).

zh_context: 高性能热固性树脂基复合材料制造，主要包括其他合成材料制造、玻璃纤维增强塑料制品制造、石墨及碳素制品制造等。其他合成材料制造，主要包括酚醛树脂基复合材料（用于航空航天、汽车、轨道交通领域）、氰酸酯树脂基复合材料、环氧树脂基复合材料（用于风电、电力、电子信息、航空航天、海洋工程及高技术船舶、轨道交通装备等）、双马来酰亚胺树脂基复合材料（用于航空航天）、聚酰亚胺树脂基复合材料（用于发动机）、乙烯基树脂复合材料（用于大型石化装备、环境工程等领域）。

context: Action goals: By 2018, the convenience of medical and health services facilitated by information technology will be greatly improved, and a basic remote medical service system will be formed. By 2020, new health information services based on sensing technology and products will gradually become popular, and information technology will play a significant role in achieving universal access to basic medical and health services. Build efficient and convenient smart health and medical services for the convenience and benefit of the people. Implement the National Electronic Health Information Service Plan, improve internet health consultation, appointment triage, in-clinic settlement, mobile payment, and access to test results and follow-up tracking services based on new information technology. Prioritize appointments for scheduled patients and referred patients, and fully implement appointment scheduling in different time slots. Promote a comprehensive population health information service system. Build a unified and authoritative population health information platform that is interconnected, strengthen the integration, sharing, and coordination of application information systems for public health, family planning, medical services, medical insurance, drug supply, and comprehensive management, and basically achieve standardized electronic health records and fully functional health cards for urban and rural residents. Implement the Healthy China Cloud Service Plan, build an integrated platform for health and medical services, provide remote consultations, remote imaging, pathology results, and electrocardiogram diagnostic services, and improve the mechanism for mutual recognition and sharing of examination and test results. Use the internet to enhance emergency response capabilities for major diseases and public health emergencies, and establish a health communication and remote education video system that covers medical and health institutions nationwide. Improve the global public health risk monitoring and early warning decision-making system, establish an international travel health network, and provide travel health and safety services for inbound and outbound personnel. Promote and regulate the application of health and medical big data. Promote the application of health and medical clinical and research big data, strengthen research in key areas such as rare diseases, promote the application of gene chips and sequencing technology in the diagnosis of genetic diseases, early diagnosis of cancer, and disease prevention and detection, and promote the development of precision medical technology. Promote the application of public health big data and comprehensively enhance the monitoring, evaluation, and decision-making management capabilities of public health. Promote the application of artificial intelligence, 3D bioprinting, medical robots, wearable devices, and related microsensors in disease prevention, health emergencies, health care, and daily nursing, and promote the transformation from medical treatment to health services.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++优先行动,健康中国信息服务行动
zh_context: 行动目标：到2018年，信息技术促进医疗健康服务便捷化程度大幅提升，远程医疗服务体系基本形成；到2020年，基于感知技术和产品的新型健康信息服务逐渐普及，信息化对实现人人享有基本医疗卫生服务发挥显著作用。打造高效便捷的智慧健康医疗便民惠民服务。实施国民电子健康信息服务计划，完善基于新型信息技术的互联网健康咨询、预约分诊、诊间结算、移动支付和检验检查结果查询、随访跟踪等服务，为预约患者和预约转诊患者优先安排就诊，全面推行分时段预约。全面推进人口健康信息服务体系。全面建成统一权威、互联互通的人口健康信息平台，强化公共卫生、计划生育、医疗服务、医疗保障、药品供应、综合管理等应用信息系统数据集成、集成共享和业务协同，基本实现城乡居民拥有规范化的电子健康档案和功能完备的健康卡。实施健康中国云服务计划，构建健康医疗服务集成平台，提供远程会诊、远程影像、病理结果、心电诊断服务，健全检查检验结果互认共享机制。运用互联网手段，提高重大疾病和突发公共卫生事件应急能力，建立覆盖全国医疗卫生机构的健康传播和远程教育视频系统。完善全球公共卫生风险监测预警决策系统，建立国际旅行健康网络，为出入境人员提供旅行健康安全保障服务。促进和规范健康医疗大数据应用。推进健康医疗临床和科研大数据应用，加强疑难疾病等重点方面的研究，推进基因芯片和测序技术在遗传性疾病诊断、癌症早期诊断和疾病预防检测中的应用，推动精准医疗技术发展。推进公共卫生大数据应用，全面提升公共卫生监测评估和决策管理能力。推动健康医疗相关的人工智能、生物三维打印、医用机器人、可穿戴设备以及相关微型传感器等技术和产品在疾病预防、卫生应急、健康保健、日常护理中的应用，推动由医疗救治向健康服务转变。

context: Strengthen the cooperation between industry, academia, research, and application, support the construction of national engineering laboratories, national engineering (technology) research centers, and other innovation platforms, establish national-level innovation centers, and jointly promote research on the basic theory, common technologies, and application technologies of artificial intelligence. Promote the research and development of deep learning technologies based on perceptual data, multimedia, natural language, and other big data, and conduct cutting-edge theoretical and technological research in the field of brain-like intelligence, such as brain-like neural computing systems and brain-like information processing. Support the development of basic software and hardware technologies in the field of artificial intelligence, including chips, sensors, operating systems, storage systems, high-end servers, key network devices, network security technology devices, middleware, etc., and support the development of open-source software and hardware platforms and ecosystems. Accelerate the research and industrialization of application technologies based on artificial intelligence, such as computer vision and audiovisual perception, biometric recognition, complex environment recognition, novel human-computer interaction, natural language understanding, machine translation, intelligent decision-making and control, network security, etc. Strengthen the layout of cutting-edge technologies and construct the foundation for future integrated innovation technologies.

zh_context: 加强产学研用合作，支持国家工程实验室、国家工程（技术）研究中心等创新平台建设，布局国家级创新中心，共同推动人工智能基础理论、共性技术、应用技术研究。推动基于感知数据、多媒体、自然语言等大数据的深度学习技术研发，开展类脑神经计算系统、类脑信息处理等类脑智能领域的前沿理论和技术研究。支持人工智能领域的芯片、传感器、操作系统、存储系统、高端服务器、关键网络设备、网络安全技术设备、中间件等基础软硬件技术开发，支持开源软硬件平台及生态建设。加快基于人工智能的计算机视听觉、生物特征识别、复杂环境识别、新型人机交互、自然语言理解、机器翻译、智能决策控制、网络安全等应用技术研发和产业化。加强前沿技术布局，构造未来融合创新技术基础。

context: Manufacturing of electronic specialty materials mainly includes high-performance hybrid liquid crystals, driver ICs, high-purity targets, organic luminescent materials, quantum dot materials, 5.5th generation and above fine metal mask plates, flexible substrate materials, layered materials (such as nickel cobalt aluminum and nickel cobalt manganese), silicon materials (referring to silicon single crystal polishing wafers, epitaxial wafers, insulating silicon germanium silicon), silicon compound semiconductor materials, silicon carbide substrate materials, sapphire substrate materials, spinel lithium manganese oxide materials, lithium titanate materials, lithium-rich materials (such as lithium iron phosphate), metal organic source materials for epitaxy, ultra-high purity gas materials for epitaxy, high-end LED packaging materials, non-oxide fiber optic materials, semiconductor luminescent materials, optoelectronic detection materials, high-end specialty magnetic materials, high-end specialty ceramic materials, high-end specialty piezoelectric crystal materials, fuel cell-related materials (such as catalyst bipolar plates, proton exchange membranes, carbon paper hydrogen storage materials, etc.).
zh_context: 电子专用材料制造，主要包括高性能混合液晶、驱动IC、高纯度靶材、有机发光材料、量子点材料、5.5代及以上精细金属掩膜板、柔性基板材料、层状材料（如镍钴铝和镍钴锰等）、硅材料（指硅单晶抛光片外延片绝缘硅锗硅）、硅化合物半导体材料、碳化硅衬底材料、蓝宝石衬底材料、尖晶石型锰酸锂材料、钛酸锂材料、富锂材料（如磷酸铁锂等）、金属有机源外延用原料、超高纯度气体外延用原料、高端LED封装材料、非氧化物光纤材料、半导体发光材料、光电探测材料、高端专用磁性材料、高端专用陶瓷材料、高端专用压电晶体材料、燃料电池相关材料（如催化剂双极板质子交换膜碳纸储氢材料等）。

context: Accelerate the development of medium-power turbo-shaft engines, complete the engine assembly production line in 2015, and achieve mass production and delivery. Concentrate efforts on developing large aircraft engines and complete the research and development in approximately 10 years.

zh_context: 加大基带芯片、射频芯片、关键射频前端器件等投入力度，加速突破技术和产业化瓶颈，带动设计工具、制造工艺、关键材料、核心IP等产业整体水平提升。加快轻量化5G芯片模组和毫米波器件的研发及产业化，进一步提升终端模组性价比，满足行业应用个性化需求，提升产业基础支撑能力。支持高精度、高灵敏度、大动态范围的5G射频、协议、性能等仪器仪表研发，带动仪表用高端芯片、核心器件等尽快突破。

context: We will vigorously develop new chip components based on Surface Mount Technology (SMT), actively support the research and industrialization of new components based on Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS) technology, and passive integrated components based on Low-Temperature Co-Fired Ceramics (LTCC) technology. We will strive to develop key electronic components such as relays, connectors, micro motors, and supercapacitors required for automotive electronic systems. We will accelerate the research and industrialization of nickel-hydrogen batteries, power-type and energy storage-type lithium-ion batteries, battery management systems, and battery grouping technologies for new energy vehicles. We will promote the development of low-cost fiber optic cables, optical devices, frequency devices, digital audio devices, and mixed integrated circuits industries around the development of next-generation communication technologies. We will actively develop high-performance and high-reliability sensors, power electronic components, ultra-thin lithium-ion batteries, and specialized vacuum electronic devices required for the development of strategic emerging industries such as the Internet of Things, new energy, and high-end equipment. We will accelerate the development of high-density interconnect boards, special printed circuit boards, printed circuit boards for light-emitting diodes (LEDs), and key core devices such as infrared focal plane detectors, ultraviolet detectors, and low-light image intensifiers required for modern optics. While focusing on the development of mature technologies, we will closely follow future technological trends, accurately grasp innovative technological directions, prioritize the support of innovative and common technologies, provide technological reserves for sustainable industrial development, and lay an important technological and industrial foundation for the structural adjustment, industrial upgrading, and transformation of the development mode of the electronic information manufacturing industry.

zh_context: 大力发展基于表面贴装技术（SMT）的新型片式元件，积极支持基于微电子机械系统（MEMS）技术的新型元器件和基于低温共烧陶瓷（LTCC）技术的无源集成元件的研发和产业化。努力发展汽车电子系统所需的继电器、连接器、微电机、超级电容器等关键电子元件；加快为新能源汽车配套的镍氢电池，动力型、储能型锂离子电池及电池管理系统、电池成组技术的研发和产业化。围绕新一代通信技术发展，推动低成本光纤光缆、光器件、频率器件、数字音频声器件和混合集成电路等产业的发展。积极开发物联网、新能源、高端装备等战略性新兴产业发展所需的高性能高可靠传感器、电力电子功率元件、超薄锂离子电池、专用真空电子器件等产品。加快发展高密度互连板、特种印制板、发光二极管（LED）用印制板及现代光学所需的红外焦平面探测器、紫外探测器、微光像增强器等关键核心器件。在着眼于当前成熟技术发展的同时，密切关注未来技术发展趋势，准确把握创新性技术方向，优先支持创新性、共性技术研发，为产业可持续发展提供技术储备，为电子信息制造业的结构调整、产业升级、发展方式转变奠定重要的技术和产业基础。

context: Strengthen new technologies such as 5G, intelligent sensing, and edge computing to drive the improvement of industrial equipment, industrial control systems, and industrial software. Build intelligent networked equipment, enhance the real-time optimization capability of industrial control systems, and strengthen the industrial software's simulation, simulation, and data analysis capabilities. Column 8: Industrial Internet technology product innovation project. Strengthen the research and development of industrial Internet basic support technologies. Support the research and development breakthroughs of basic hardware and software such as industrial 5G chip modules, edge computing dedicated chips and operating systems, industrial artificial intelligence chips, industrial vision sensors, and industry mechanism models. Implement technology product innovation breakthrough plans. Overcome key common technologies of industrial Internet such as 5G and TSN networks, new identification and trusted resolution, platform data model management and application development, and AI-based security protection, and accelerate the development of new products. Strengthen the integration and promotion of industrial Internet and traditional technologies. Encourage equipment companies to comprehensively use new technologies such as 5G and artificial intelligence to create intelligent equipment for autonomous operations and cloud-based collaborative operations. Encourage industrial software companies to build software products based on platforms that flexibly organize and reuse functional components and data models, and promote the enhancement of functions such as design simulation and process optimization. Support information technology and automation companies to build edge controllers, edge clouds, and intelligent gateways, promote the integration of edge computing with programmable logic controllers (PLCs) and process control systems, and build edge industrial control systems with intelligent computing and real-time optimization capabilities. Strengthen support for intellectual property information services. Accelerate the construction of a national intellectual property big data center and public service platform to provide intellectual property information support for technological innovation. Timeframe: By 2023, the core competitiveness of key industrial Internet technologies will be further enhanced. Basic hardware and software products such as industrial 5G chips/modules/gateways and edge computing chips will be basically mature. Responsible departments: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, Ministry of Science and Technology, State Intellectual Property Office.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++强化绿色理念，发展绿色生态链,技术能力提升行动,以新技术带动工业短板提升突破
zh_context: 加强5G、智能传感、边缘计算等新技术对工业装备、工业控制系统、工业软件的带动提升，打造智能网联装备，提升工业控制系统实时优化能力，加强工业软件模拟仿真与数据分析能力。专栏8：工业互联网技术产品创新工程。加强工业互联网基础支撑技术攻关。支持工业5G芯片模组、边缘计算专用芯片与操作系统、工业人工智能芯片、工业视觉传感器及行业机理模型等基础软硬件的研发突破。实施技术产品创新突破计划。攻克5G与TSN等新型网络、。新型标识与可信解析、平台数据模型管理与应用开发、基于人工智能的安全防护等工业互联网关键共性技术，加快研发新产品。加强对工业互联网与传统技术的融合与带动提升。鼓励装备企业综合运用5G、人工智能等新技术，打造自主作业、云端协同作业等智能化装备。鼓励工业软件企业基于平台打造功能组件和数据模型灵活组织复用的软件产品，带动设计仿真、工艺优化等功能强化。支持信息技术与自动化企业打造边缘控制器、边缘云与智能网关，推动边缘计算与可编程逻辑控制器（PLC）、过程控制系统的融合，构建具备智能计算与实时优化能力的边缘工业控制系统。加强知识产权信息服务支撑。加快建设国家知识产权大数据中心和公共服务平台，为技术创新提供知识产权信息支撑。时间节点：到2023年，工业互联网关键核心技术竞争力进一步提升。工业5G芯片／模组／网关、边缘计算芯片等基础软硬件产品基本成熟。责任部门：工业和信息化部、科技部、知识产权局。

context: The global crisis of conventional energy supply shortage is becoming increasingly severe. The extensive development and utilization of fossil energy has become one of the main causes of environmental pollution and deterioration of the human living environment. The search for emerging energy sources has become a hot topic worldwide. Among various new energy sources, solar photovoltaic power generation has the advantages of being pollution-free, sustainable, abundant, widely distributed, and versatile in application. It has received high attention from countries around the world. China's photovoltaic industry has a good development foundation in terms of manufacturing level, industrial system, and technological research and development. The domestic and international market prospects are generally optimistic. As long as we seize the development opportunities, accelerate transformation and upgrading, we will surely usher in a broader development space in the future.
extended_context: 新能源++大型风电++太阳能光伏产业“十二五”发展规划（工业和信息化部/2012年02月24日）++nan++其他政策++2012-02++“十二五”面临形势,我国光伏产业面临广阔发展空间
zh_context: 世界常规能源供应短缺危机日益严重，化石能源的大量开发利用已成为造成自然环境污染和人类生存环境恶化的主要原因之一，寻找新兴能源已成为世界热点问题。在各种新能源中，太阳能光伏发电具有无污染、可持续、总量大、分布广、应用形式多样等优点，受到世界各国的高度重视。我国光伏产业在制造水平、产业体系、技术研发等方面具有良好的发展基础，国内外市场前景总体看好，只要抓住发展机遇，加快转型升级，后期必将迎来更加广阔的发展空间。

context: By combining cross-series, cross-constellation satellites and data resources, and through multi-center collaborative services, we provide comprehensive space information services that are diverse, high-quality, stable, reliable, and scalable, supporting the integrated applications of various industries.

zh_context: 通过跨系列、跨星座卫星和数据资源组合应用、多中心协同服务的方式，提供多类型、高质量、稳定可靠、规模化的空间信息综合服务能力，支撑各行业的综合应用。

context: Build a digital platform with high technical level, strong integration capability, and wide industry application. Apply emerging technologies such as Internet of Things, big data, edge computing, 5G, artificial intelligence, augmented reality/virtual reality, etc. Integrate general-purpose operating systems, software, and toolkits for engineering design, electronic design, modeling, simulation, product lifecycle management, manufacturing operations management, and automation control. Flexibly deploy industrial apps with strong generality, security, reliability, and easy secondary development. Promote the digitization of production factors, the flexibility of production processes, and the integration of system services for small and medium-sized enterprises. Build an industrial app testing and evaluation platform and a trusted blockchain innovation collaboration platform to provide testing and certification services for small service providers and small and medium-sized enterprises.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++行动目标,夯实数字化平台功能
zh_context: 搭建技术水平高、集成能力强、行业应用广的数字化平台，应用物联网、大数据、边缘计算、5G、人工智能、增强现实/虚拟现实等新兴技术，集成工程设计、电子设计、建模、仿真、产品生命周期管理、制造运营管理、自动化控制等通用操作系统、软件和工具包，灵活部署通用性强、安全可靠、易二次开发的工业APP，促进中小企业生产要素数字化、生产过程柔性化及系统服务集成化。打造工业APP测试评估平台和可信区块链创新协同平台，为中小服务商和中小企业提供测试认证服务。

context: Breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, low-power lightweight systems, intelligent perception, and new human-machine interaction technologies are key. The focus is on developing intelligent wearable devices, smart homes, intelligent car terminals, smart healthcare, intelligent robots, intelligent unmanned systems, and other products for the next generation of mobile internet and information consumption. Customized terminal products for specific needs and specialized mobile intelligent terminal products for specific industries and special network applications are also being developed. Develop high-level Internet+ artificial intelligence platforms to enhance the supply capacity of consumer-grade and industrial-grade intelligent hardware products and services. Accelerate innovation in intelligent perception technology, with a focus on promoting the application of millimeter wave and terahertz, cellular narrowband Internet of Things (NB-IoT), intelligent voice, and other technologies in key areas such as public safety and the Internet of Things. Support the development and industrialization of virtual reality products and explore applications in fields such as design and manufacturing, healthcare, and entertainment. Enrich the supply of smart home products, with a focus on increasing the supply of new consumer electronics products such as smart TVs, smart speakers, and smart service robots, and promote the improvement of the smart home industry chain, guiding the industry towards a product + service transformation and upgrade. Develop smart health and elderly care services, support the development of wearable devices for health monitoring and management, and home care. Promote innovation and application demonstrations in smart transportation, and promote the construction of smart car and smart transportation demonstration areas based on broadband mobile internet. Actively promote the research and application of industrial electronics, medical electronics, automotive electronics, energy electronics, financial electronics, and other products. Develop emerging intelligent hardware. Develop intelligent wearable, in-car, home, healthcare, service robots, and drones, strengthen low-power lightweight underlying software and hardware systems, high-precision intelligent sensors, high-performance motion and posture control, new human-machine interaction, virtual reality, fast charging, and lightweight energy storage core technologies, and develop Internet+ artificial intelligence platforms. Promote application demonstrations in key areas. Develop innovation demonstration zones and advanced innovation platforms, and strengthen the construction of standard systems. Intelligent perception. Strongly support breakthroughs in core technologies such as millimeter wave and terahertz, and carry out application demonstrations in key areas such as public safety to develop security inspection and security equipment and solutions that meet user needs, and establish and improve relevant technical standards, application specifications, and testing systems. Actively develop low-power wide-area Internet of Things technologies such as NB-IoT, support cooperation with local and backbone enterprises to promote the application demonstrations of NB-IoT technology in smart cities, environmental monitoring, industrial logistics, and other fields, and build an open and collaborative low-power wide-area Internet of Things innovation chain. Build an intelligent voice promotion and demonstration platform, promote the cloud application and service development of intelligent voice recognition in key industries. Virtual reality. Support the development of core devices such as core chips, display devices, optical devices, and sensors, accelerate the development of core technologies such as virtual reality modeling and simulation, augmented reality and human-machine interaction, integrated environments and tools, support the development and industrialization of virtual reality display terminals, interaction devices, and content acquisition and processing devices. Establish a public service platform for the development of the virtual reality industry, build a standard system for virtual reality products, systems, and services, and conduct product service quality evaluation and verification. Smart transportation. Breakthroughs in fast image processing, multi-source information fusion, and other core technologies, develop in-vehicle terminal devices that support 5G communication, dedicated network communication, Beidou navigation positioning, and dedicated radar, as well as intelligent in-vehicle operating system platforms. Establish policy coordination, technology integration, and industry-finance docking platforms, develop smart cars and smart transportation applications based on broadband mobile internet, and create integrated emerging industry clusters. Cultivate a diversified application ecosystem for in-vehicle terminals, promote the standardization of underlying operating systems and human-vehicle interaction (HMI) systems for intelligent connected vehicles, break through a batch of core key technologies for automotive electronics, and accelerate the industrial application of autonomous driving assistance systems, in-vehicle information systems, intelligent navigation systems, and active collision avoidance systems. Promote the construction of key application demonstration areas, carry out demonstrations of intelligent driving, intelligent road networks, intelligent charging, and convenient parking, and form replicable models. Smart health and elderly care services. Develop intelligent wearable devices for health management, daily health monitoring devices, home rehabilitation treatment products, monitoring devices, and self-service medical service terminals for home/community use. Support the demonstration of smart health and elderly care applications and work with relevant departments to promote supportive policies. Support enterprises in the research and development of medical and health electronic products and systems, promote the improvement of intelligent terminals and systems for health care and home-based elderly care. Promote the research and industrialization of digital universal medical diagnosis and treatment equipment, promote the research and application of key components, and enhance the industrialization capability and technological level of universal medical equipment. Digital television. Promote the transformation and upgrade of the digital television industry towards networking, intelligence, and service-oriented development, enrich the supply of smart home products, improve the industry standard system for smart TVs and smart homes, promote the research and application of smart TV chips and systems, accelerate the development of new display terminals, and improve the management services of internet TV reception terminals. Promote research and application of next-generation audio and video standards.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++信息产业发展指南（节选）（工信部联规〔2016〕453号）（工信部、发改委/2017年1月17日）++nan++其他政策++2017-1++发展重点,智能硬件和应用电子
zh_context: 突破人工智能、低功耗轻量级系统、智能感知、新型人机交互等关键核心技术，重点发展面向下一代移动互联网和信息消费的智能可穿戴、智慧家庭、智能车载终端、智慧医疗健康、智能机器人、智能无人系统等产品，面向特定需求的定制化终端产品，以及面向特殊行业和特殊网络应用的专用移动智能终端产品。发展高水平“互联网+”人工智能平台，提升消费级和工业级智能硬件产品及服务供给能力。加快智能感知技术创新，重点推动毫米波与太赫兹、蜂窝窄带物联网（NB-IOT）、智能语音等技术在公共安全、物联网等重点领域开展示范应用。支持虚拟现实产品研发及产业化，探索开展在设计制造、健康医疗、文体娱乐等领域的应用示范。丰富智慧家庭产品供给，重点加大智能电视、智能音响、智能服务机器人等新型消费类电子产品供给力度，推动完善智慧家庭产业链，引导产业向“产品+服务”转型升级。开展智慧健康养老服务应用，支持健康监测和管理、家庭养老看护等可穿戴设备发展。推广智慧交通创新与应用示范，推动基于宽带移动互联网的智能汽车与智慧交通示范区建设。积极推进工业电子、医疗电子、汽车电子、能源电子、金融电子等产品研发应用。专栏6智能产品+服务价值提升工程。新兴智能硬件。发展智能可穿戴、车载、家居、医疗健康、服务机器人和无人机等智能硬件产品，加强低功耗轻量级底层软硬件系统、高精度智能传感、高性能运动和姿态控制、新型人机交互、虚拟现实、快速充电与轻便储能等核心技术及“互联网+”人工智能平台开发。推动重点领域应用示范。发展创新示范区及先进创新平台，加强标准体系建设。智能感知。大力支持毫米波与太赫兹产业核心技术突破，从公共安全等重点领域切入开展应用示范，开发符合用户需求的安检安防设备和解决方案，建设和完善相关技术标准、应用规范和检测体系。积极发展NB-IOT等低功耗广域物联技术，支持符合条件的地方与骨干企业合作推动NB-IOT技术在智慧城市、环境监测、工业物流等领域的应用示范，打造开放、协同的低功耗广域物联创新链条。搭建智能语音推广示范平台，推动智能语音识别在重点行业的云应用和服务发展。虚拟现实。支持开发核心芯片、显示器件、光学器件、传感器等核心器件，加快发展虚拟现实建模仿真、增强现实与人机交互、集成环境与工具等核心技术，支持虚拟现实显示终端、交互设备、内容采集处理设备的开发及产业化。建立虚拟现实产业发展公共服务平台，建设虚拟现实产品、系统、服务标准体系，开展产品服务质量评测验证。智慧交通。突破快速图像处理、多源信息融合等核心技术，开发支持5G通信、专网通信、北斗导航定位、专用雷达等的车载终端设备，以及智能车载操作系统平台。建设政策协同、技术融合及产融对接平台，发展基于宽带移动互联网的智能汽车和智慧交通应用示范，打造融合型新兴产业集聚区。培育车载终端多元化应用生态，促进智能网联汽车操作系统底层标准化和人车交互（HMI）系统研发产业化，突破一批汽车电子核心关键技术，加快推进自动驾驶辅助系统、车载信息系统、智能导航系统、主动碰撞避免系统的产业化应用。推进重点应用示范区建设，开展智能驾驶、智能路网、智能充电、便捷停车等典型应用场景示范，形成可推广模式。智慧健康养老服务。开发健康管理类智能可穿戴设备、日常健康监测设备、家庭康复治疗产品、监护设备、家庭/社区用自助式医疗服务终端。支持开展智慧健康养老应用示范，联合相关部门推动出台支持政策。支持企业开展医疗健康电子产品和系统的研发，促进健康保健、居家养老等智能终端与系统的完善。推进数字化普及型医疗诊疗设备的研发及产业化，推动关键部件研发与应用，提升普适性医疗设备产业化能力和技术水平。数字电视。推动数字电视产业网络化、智能化、服务化转型升级，丰富智慧家庭产品供给，完善智能电视及智慧家庭产业标准体系，推进智能电视芯片及系统研发及应用，加快新型显示终端发展，完善互联网电视接收终端管理服务。推动新一代音视频标准研究和应用。

context: The text translates to:The services related to biomedicine mainly include engineering and technical research and experimental development, medical research and experimental development, testing services, national economic activities, engineering design activities, veterinary services, other technical promotion services, hospitals, and clinical laboratory services. Veterinary services mainly include animal biological resource collection, preservation, and utilization services (collection, preservation, and exploration and utilization services of biological resources including human, animal and microbial resources, as well as other special sample libraries such as compound libraries, cell libraries, antibody libraries, and other biological component libraries). Other technical promotion services mainly include the promotion of pharmaceutical information and other technologies.

zh_context: 生物医药相关服务，主要包括工程和技术研究和试验发展、医学研究和试验发展、检测服务国民经、工程设计活动、兽医服务、其他技术推广服务、医院、临床检验服务等。兽医服务，主要包括动物生物资源收集、保存和利用服务（生物资源（包括人类、动植物及微生物资源）及其他特殊样本库（化合物库、细胞库、抗体库和其他生物元件库）的收集、保存和发掘利用服务）。其他技术推广服务，主要包括药物信息等技术推广。

context: Gateway security mainly includes general security of IoT gateways, gateway communication and interface security, gateway physical environment security, gateway component security, gateway testing and evaluation, etc. (see Figure 4). Figure 4: Gateway security. (1) General security of gateways: standardize the functional architecture, security protocols, security protection, as well as security technical requirements for data transmission, processing, and storage related to IoT gateways. This mainly includes gateway security models, security architecture, security functions, security performance, data security, edge computing security, security protocols, etc. (2) Gateway communication and interface security: standardize the security communication protocols, blacklists, whitelists, authentication, etc. for communication interfaces and management interfaces when gateways are interconnected with other devices. This mainly includes the security procedures for southbound and northbound interfaces of gateways, security protocol processes, port protection, etc. (3) Gateway physical environment security: standardize the technical requirements for electromagnetic radiation, electromagnetic interference prevention, resistance to physical damage, adaptability to temperature, humidity, and salt spray environments under storage, transportation, and usage conditions of gateways. This mainly includes gateway equipment electromagnetic compatibility, mechanical environmental adaptability, climate environmental adaptability, etc. (4) Gateway component security: standardize the security design, security functions, etc. of software and hardware components related to gateway functional services, data collection, data transmission, and processing. This mainly includes gateway equipment component security architecture, open-source component security, application startup security, etc. (5) Gateway testing and evaluation: standardize the testing methods for gateway security evaluation, mainly including device security testing, component security testing, interface security testing, security management and maintenance testing, data transmission and processing security testing, environmental adaptability testing, hierarchical classification evaluation testing, etc.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++物联网++关于印发物联网基础安全标准体系建设指南（2021版）的通知（工信厅科〔2021〕34号）（工信部办公厅/2021年9月23日）++nan++其他政策++2021-9++建设内容,重点领域,网关安全
zh_context: 网关安全主要包括物联网网关通用安全、网关通信与接口安全、网关物理环境安全、网关组件安全、网关测试评估等（见图4）。图4网关安全。（1）网关通用安全：规范物联网网关相关的功能架构、安全协议、安全防护，以及数据传输、处理和存储等方面的安全技术要求，主要包括网关安全模型、安全架构、安全功能、安全性能、数据安全、边缘计算安全、安全协议等。（2）网关通信与接口安全：规范网关与其他设备互联时通信接口和管理接口的安全通信协议、黑白名单、鉴权认证等方面技术要求，主要包括网关南向和北向接口安。全规程、安全协议流程、端口防护等。（3）网关物理环境安全：规范网关贮存、运输和使用环境条件下电磁辐射、防电磁干扰、抗硬力破坏、温湿盐雾环境适应能力等方面技术要求，主要包括网关设备电磁兼容、机械环境适应性、气候环境适应性等。（4）网关组件安全：规范网关功能服务、数据采集、数据传输处理等软硬件组件的安全设计、安全功能等方面技术要求，主要包括网关设备组件安全架构、开源组件安全、应用启动安全等。（5）网关测试评估：规范网关安全评估测试方法，主要包括设备安全测试、组件安全测试、接口安全测试、安全管理维护测试、数据传输处理安全测试、环境适应性测试、分级分类评估测试等。

context: By 2017, the application of cloud computing in key areas has deepened, the industrial chain has become basically sound, and a preliminary pattern of cloud computing development has been formed, with strong security guarantees and coordinated promotion of service innovation, technological innovation, and management innovation, driving the rapid development of related industries. The service capabilities have been greatly improved. Several backbone service enterprises with strong innovation capabilities in public cloud computing have been formed. Cloud computing services for small and medium-sized enterprises and individuals are diverse, achieving large-scale operations. The integration capability of cloud computing systems has significantly improved. The innovation capability has noticeably increased. The original innovation and basic innovation capabilities have been enhanced, breaking through a batch of key technologies and products such as cloud computing platform software, exabyte-level cloud storage systems, and big data mining and analysis. Cloud computing technology is approaching international advanced levels, and the cloud computing standard system has been basically established. The driving effect of service innovation on technological innovation has significantly increased, and the level of collaborative development between industry, academia, and research has greatly improved. The demonstration effects of applications are significant. In several key areas with obvious social benefits, strong industrial driving force, and prominent demonstration effects, public data openness, integration of information technology resources, and government procurement service reforms are promoted. A hundred cloud computing and big data application demonstration projects are carried out, achieving positive results in reducing the threshold for entrepreneurship, serving the people's livelihood, cultivating new business models, and exploring new models for e-government construction. The number of government-owned data centers has decreased by more than 5%. The infrastructure continues to be optimized. The regional layout of cloud computing data centers has been initially optimized, and the energy utilization efficiency (PUE) of newly built large-scale cloud computing data centers is better than 1.5. The policy environment for broadband development is gradually improving, and the broadband network infrastructure that meets the needs of cloud computing development has been initially established. The security guarantees are basically sound. A regulatory system and standard specification system that adapt to the development needs of cloud computing have been initially established. The industrialization level of key technologies and products for cloud computing security and network security protection capabilities have significantly improved, making the cloud computing development environment more secure and reliable. By 2020, cloud computing applications will be widely popularized, and the service capabilities of cloud computing will reach international advanced levels. Key technologies of cloud computing will be mastered, and several backbone enterprises with strong international competitiveness in cloud computing will be formed. The information security regulatory system and legal system for cloud computing will be sound. The capability of big data mining and analysis will significantly improve. Cloud computing will become an important form of informatization in China and an important support for building a network powerhouse, promoting a significant improvement in the level of informatization in various economic and social fields.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++云计算++关于促进云计算创新发展培育信息产业新业态的意见（国发〔2015〕5号）（国务院/2015年1月6日）++nan++其他政策++2015-1++指导思想、基本原则和发展目标,发展目标
zh_context: 到2017年，云计算在重点领域的应用得到深化，产业链条基本健全，初步形成安全保障有力，服务创新、技术创新和管理创新协同推进的云计算发展格局，带动相关产业快速发展。服务能力大幅提升。形成若干具有较强创新能力的公共云计算骨干服务企业。面向中小微企业和个人的云计算服务种类丰富，实现规模化运营。云计算系统集成能力显著提升。创新能力明显增强。增强原始创新和基础创新能力，突破云计算平台软件、艾字节（EB，约为260字节）级云存储系统、大数据挖掘分析等一批关键技术与产品，云计算技术接近国际先进水平，云计算标准体系基本建立。服务创新对技术创新的带动作用显著增强，产学研用协同发展水平大幅提高。应用示范成效显著。在社会效益明显、产业带动性强、示范作用突出的若干重点领域推动公共数据开放、信息技术资源整合和政府采购服务改革，充分利用公共云计算服务资源开展百项云计算和大数据应用示范工程，在降低创业门槛、服务民生、培育新业态、探索电子政务建设新模式等方面取得积极成效，政府自建数据中心数量减少5%以上。基础设施不断优化。云计算数据中心区域布局初步优化，新建大型云计算数据中心能源利用效率（PUE）值优于1.5。宽带发展政策环境逐步完善，初步建成满足云计算发展需求的宽带网络基础设施。安全保障基本健全。初步建立适应云计算发展需求的信息安全监管制度和标准规范体系，云计算安全关键技术产品的产业化水平和网络安全防护能力明显提升，云计算发展环境更加安全可靠。到2020年，云计算应用基本普及，云计算服务能力达到国际先进水平，掌握云计算关键技术，形成若干具有较强国际竞争力的云计算骨干企业。云计算信息安全监管体系和法规体系健全。大数据挖掘分析能力显著提升。云计算成为我国信息化重要形态和建设网络强国的重要支撑，推动经济社会各领域信息化水平大幅提高。

context: Actively develop cloud services such as Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), Software as a Service (SaaS), etc., enhance the capabilities of public cloud services, expand the scope of private cloud applications, focus on industrial, financial, telecommunications, employment, social security, transportation, education, environmental protection, safety supervision, and other key areas of application needs, support the construction of national or regional hybrid cloud service platforms. Vigorously develop cloud service applications, promote the migration of various information systems to cloud computing service platforms. Actively develop cloud-based personal information storage, online tools, learning, entertainment, and other services. Encourage large enterprises to open platform resources and strengthen the construction of industry cloud service platforms. Establish cloud computing platforms that provide basic management services such as office, production, finance, marketing, and human resources for small and medium-sized enterprises. Vigorously develop services such as cloud computing information system planning consulting, solution design, system integration, and testing and evaluation. Support third-party organizations in conducting evaluations and assessments of cloud computing service quality, reliability, and network security. Optimize the layout of cloud computing infrastructure and build a comprehensive cloud computing standard system. Improve the network information security management system in the cloud computing environment, strengthen the construction of technical management systems, enhance the evaluation of new technologies and new businesses, and prevent network information security risks.

zh_context: 积极发展基础设施即服务（IaaS）、平台即服务（PaaS）、软件即服务（SaaS）等云服务，提升公有云服务能力，扩展专有云应用范畴，围绕工业、金融、电信、就业、社保、交通、教育、环保、安监等重点领域应用需求，支持建设全国或区域混合云服务平台。大力发展云服务应用软件，促进各类信息系统向云计算服务平台迁移。积极发展基于云计算的个人信息存储、在线工具、学习娱乐等服务。鼓励大企业开放平台资源，加强行业云服务平台建设。建立为中小企业提供办公、生产、财务、营销、人力资源等基本管理服务的云计算平台。大力发展面向云计算的信息系统规划咨询、方案设计、系统集成和测试评估等服务。支持第三方机构开展云计算服务质量、可信度和网络安全等评估评测。优化云计算基础设施布局，建设完善云计算综合标准体系。完善云计算环境下网络信息安全管理体系，加强技术管理系统建设，强化新技术新业务评估，防范网络信息安全风险。

context: Strengthen the basic theoretical research on the intelligence of coal mines, promote the construction of national key laboratories and engineering (research) centers, support the construction of innovation and research platforms for the intelligence of coal mines, and strengthen the research and development of common key technologies such as core basic components, advanced basic processes, and key basic materials. Key breakthroughs include precise geological detection, precise positioning and efficient continuous data transmission, intelligent rapid excavation, intelligent comprehensive mining under complex conditions, continuous auxiliary transportation, unmanned continuous operation in open-pit mining, intelligent perception and early warning of major hazards, coal mine robots, and underground digital electronic detonators. Accelerate the construction of intelligent factories and digital workshops, promote the research and development and industrial application of large-scale coal mining equipment and coal mine robots, implement special actions for mechanization and automation to reduce human labor, and improve the standardization and localization level of intelligent equipment.

zh_context: 加强煤矿智能化基础理论研究，推进建设国家级重点实验室和工程（研究）中心，支持建设煤矿智能化技术创新研发平台，加强对核心基础零部件、先进基础工艺、关键基础材料等共性关键技术的研发；重点突破精准地质探测、精确定位与数据高效连续传输、智能快速掘进、复杂条件智能综采、连续化辅助运输、露天开采无人化连续作业、重大危险源智能感知与预警、煤矿机器人及井下数码电子雷管等技术与装备。加快智能工厂和数字化车间建设，推进大型煤机装备、煤矿机器人研发及产业化应用，实施机械化换人、自动化减人专项行动，提高智能装备的成套化和国产化水平。

context: Carry out research on heat-resistant alloys and key components for 700℃ ultra-supercritical power plant turbines, establish a standard system for the design, organization characterization, performance testing, and comprehensive evaluation of heat-resistant alloys for ultra-supercritical power plants, support the leap to international leading level in thermal power plant materials and engineering technology in China, and lead the development of efficient coal-fired power generation technology. Carry out research on corrosion-resistant alloys, titanium alloys, and other special alloys and key components for deep-sea oil and gas drilling and transportation systems, establish corresponding material technical standards and usage specifications, guide the independent development of special alloys for deep-sea oil and gas resource exploitation equipment in China, achieve complete self-sufficiency in key components, and establish international market competitiveness. Develop standards for pre-stretched thick plates and large-sized profiles of 7000 series aluminum alloys with ultra-high strength and toughness for aerospace applications, as well as 2000 series aluminum alloys and aluminum-lithium alloy sheets. Improve the material system standards for high-strength and high-formability 6000 series and 5000 series sheet materials for lightweight automotive applications, as well as 7000 series sheet materials for vehicle body main load-bearing structures, and lead the selection and application of materials in structural design. Establish a standard system for the design, manufacturing, and application of high-temperature resistant, fatigue-resistant, high-strength, tough, and long-life bearing steels, gear steels, mold steels, and other materials and components for high-end equipment such as CNC machine tools, large passenger aircraft, and high-speed trains with speeds exceeding 400 kilometers per hour, realize stable production of bearing steels, gear steels, mold steels, and other materials for high-end equipment basic components, and improve China's supporting capabilities for high-end equipment basic components.
extended_context: 通用++综合++关于印发《新材料标准领航行动计划（2018—2020年）》的通知（国质检标联〔2018〕77号）（国家质量监督检验检疫总局、工业和信息化部、国家发展和改革委员会、科学技术部、国家国防科技工业局、中国科学院、中国工程院、国家认证认可监督管理委员会、国家标准化管理委员会/2018年3月13日）++nan++其他政策++2018-3++主要行动,研制新材料“领航”标准,高端装备用特种合金
zh_context: 开展700℃超超临界电站汽轮机用耐热合金及关键部件标准研究，建立超超临界电站用耐热合金材料设计、组织表征、性能检测和综合评价标准体系，支撑我国电站耐热材料及工程技术跃升国际领先，引领高效燃煤发电技术发展。开展深海油气钻采、集输系统用耐蚀合金、钛合金等特种合金及关键部件标准研究，形成相应材料技术标准和使用规范，指导我国深海油气资源开采装备用特种合金实现自主研制，关键零部件实现完全自给，并形成国际市场竞争力。研制航空航天用超高强高韧7000系铝合金预拉伸厚板及大规格型材、2000系铝合金及铝锂合金板材等标准。完善汽车轻量化用高强高成形性6000系、5000系板材和车身主承力结构件用7000系板材的材料体系标准，引领结构设计选材应用。建立数控机床、大型客机、时速400公里以上高速列车等高端装备关键基础件用耐高温、抗疲劳、高强韧、超常寿命轴承钢、齿轮钢、模具钢等材料及部件的设计、制造及应用标准体系，实现高端装备基础件用轴承钢、齿轮钢、模具钢等的稳定化生产，提高我国高端装备基础件配套能力。

context: Improve the ability to use big data and enhance the effectiveness of government services and supervision. Efficiently collect, effectively integrate, and fully utilize government data and social data, improve the working mechanism of government's use of big data, and regard the use of big data as an important means to enhance government governance capabilities, continuously improve the targeted and effectiveness of government services and supervision. Promote streamlining administration and delegating power and the transformation of government functions, promote law-abiding and honest operation of market entities. Use big data to improve the government's public service capabilities, strengthen in-process and post-process supervision of market entities, and provide basic support for promoting streamlining administration and delegating power and the transformation of government functions. Based on a nationally unified credit information sharing and exchange platform, use big data to promote the construction of a social credit system, establish a cross-regional and multi-department credit linkage reward and punishment mechanism, and create a fair and honest market environment. Improve the level of government services and the efficiency of supervision, and reduce the costs of services and supervision. Fully utilize the concepts, technologies, and resources of big data, improve all-round services for market entities, and strengthen the full life-cycle supervision of market entities. According to the needs of services and supervision, orderly promote government purchasing services and continuously reduce government operating costs. Combine government supervision with social supervision to build a comprehensive market supervision system. Improve the transparency of market entities' production and operation activities through government information disclosure, data openness, and sharing of social information resources. Effectively mobilize social forces to supervise the enthusiasm of market entities and form a wide-ranging market supervision pattern with the participation of the whole society.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++大数据++关于运用大数据加强对市场主体服务和监管的若干意见（国办发〔2015〕51号）（国务院办公厅/2015年7月1日）++nan++其他政策++2015-7++总体要求,主要目标
zh_context: 提高大数据运用能力，增强政府服务和监管的有效性。高效采集、有效整合、充分运用政府数据和社会数据，健全政府运用大数据的工作机制，将运用大数据作为提高政府治理能力的重要手段，不断提高政府服务和监管的针对性、有效性。推动简政放权和政府职能转变，促进市场主体依法诚信经营。运用大数据提高政府公共服务能力，加强对市场主体的事中事后监管，为推进简政放权和政府职能转变提供基础支撑。以国家统一的信用信息共享交换平台为基础，运用大数据推动社会信用体系建设，建立跨地区、多部门的信用联动奖惩机制，构建公平诚信的市场环境。提高政府服务水平和监管效率，降低服务和监管成本。充分运用大数据的理念、技术和资源，完善对市场主体的全方位服务，加强对市场主体的全生命周期监管。根据服务和监管需要，有序推进政府购买服务，不断降低政府运行成本。政府监管和社会监督有机结合，构建全方位的市场监管体系。通过政府信息公开和数据开放、社会信息资源开放共享，提高市场主体生产经营活动的透明度。有效调动社会力量监督市场主体的积极性，形成全社会广泛参与的市场监管格局。

context: Establish a sound hierarchical and dynamically adjustable network infrastructure security protection system. Strengthen the network security management of Internet companies and enhance network security protection in emerging key areas such as cloud computing and the Internet of Things. Implement the national network security review system and prudently organize industry network security review work. Continuously carry out network security pilot demonstration work for basic telecommunications companies, Internet companies, security companies, etc. Relying on the security enhancement project, guide and promote enterprises to strengthen their network security situational awareness capabilities, strengthen the sharing and linkage of government, enterprises, and industry forces in security monitoring data, utilize big data technology to enhance correlation analysis, and improve overall and holistic situational awareness capabilities. Improve the Internet security monitoring and disposal mechanism, strengthen the disposal notification of daily network security incidents, establish a sound monitoring and disposal mechanism for phishing websites, strengthen the construction of Trojan virus sample libraries, mobile malicious program sample libraries, vulnerability libraries, etc., and enhance the ability to timely detect and effectively identify security threats. Build a security threat information sharing mechanism among the government, enterprises, and users. Deepen the special activities for the governance of network threats such as mobile malicious programs and build a trusted network environment. Column 10: Security Enhancement Project objectives: Promote the construction of network and information security technology guarantee capabilities and enhance network security guarantee levels. Project content: Build a network security threat monitoring and disposal platform based on the backbone network to achieve capabilities such as network security threat monitoring, situational awareness, emergency disposal, and traceability. Implement the domain name system security guarantee project to enhance the security protection and data backup capabilities of public recursive domain name resolution systems. Build an Internet network security emergency management platform to improve the analysis, judgment, and industry emergency command and dispatch capabilities for Internet network security threat information and monitoring data.

zh_context: 建立健全分级保护、动态调整的网络基础设施安全保护体系。强化互联网企业的网络安全管理，加强针对云计算、物联网等新兴重点领域的网络安全防护。落实国家网络安全审查制度，稳妥组织开展行业网络安全审查工作。持续面向基础电信企业、互联网企业、安全企业等开展网络安全试点示范工作。依托安全保障能力提升工程，指导推动企业加强网络安全态势感知能力建设，强化政府、企业和行业力量安全监测数据共享联动，利用大数据技术加强关联分析，提升全局性、整体化态势感知能力。完善互联网安全监测与处置机制，加强日常网络安全事件的处置通报，建立健全钓鱼网站监测与处置机制，加强木马病毒样本库、移动恶意程序样本库、漏洞库等建设，提高及时发现和有效识别安全威胁的能力。构建政府、企业、用户等之间的安全威胁信息共享机制。深入推进移动恶意程序治理等网络威胁治理专项活动，构建可信网络环境。专栏10：安全保障能力提升工程工程目标：推动网络与信息安全技术保障能力建设，提升网络安全保障水平。工程内容：建设基于骨干网的网络安全威胁监测处置平台，实现网络安全威胁监测、。态势感知、应急处置、追踪溯源等能力。实施域名系统安全保障工程，提升公共递归域名解析系统的安全防护和数据备份能力。建设互联网网络安全应急管理平台，提高对互联网网络安全威胁信息和监测数据的分析、研判和行业内应急指挥调度能力。

context: Adhere to open development and win-win cooperation, actively respond to the new situation of reshaping the global pharmaceutical innovation chain, industrial chain, and supply chain, deepen international cooperation in the industry, accelerate the cultivation of new competitive advantages, and integrate into the global innovation network and industrial system at a higher level.

context: Persist in host traction, consolidate the foundation, break through the core, and verify the technology. Focus on the two key service areas of aviation and automotive, and focus on overcoming bottlenecks such as high-end numerical control systems and functional components. Complete the development and demonstration application of more than 150 intelligent, precision, high-speed, and composite high-end manufacturing equipment.
