zh_context: 坚持主机牵引、夯实基础、突破核心、工艺验证，聚焦航空航天和汽车两个重点服务领域，重点攻克高档数控系统和功能部件等瓶颈，完成150种以上智能、精密、高速、复合型高端制造业装备的研制和示范应用，大幅提升国家重点工程、国民经济重点领域关键制造装备国产化率，在强化高端数控装备单机智能化水平提升的基础上，逐步实现由单机示范应用向智能化制造成组成套整体解决方案的提升，扩大专项装备成果的应用成效。

context: The boundaries of various industries in the information industry are gradually becoming blurred. Information and communication technology is increasingly being applied in various terminal products. Emerging fields such as cloud computing, the Internet of Things, and mobile internet are flourishing. There is a shift in the key links of the value chain, with the value-added of assembly and manufacturing processes decreasing. International leading companies are focusing on content and service links to accelerate the integration of the industry chain and compete for dominance in the industry chain. Manufacturing, software, operations, and content service industries are rapidly merging. New technologies, products, and models continue to emerge, bringing fierce impact to traditional industrial systems and driving significant changes in the industry landscape. This not only brings new opportunities and space for development to our country but also poses severe challenges of new rounds of technological and market monopolies.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划（工信部/2012年2月24日）（工信部/2012年2月24日）++nan++其他政策++2012-2++“十二五”面临的形势,融合创新推动产业格局发生重大变革
zh_context: 信息产业各行业边界逐渐模糊，信息通信技术在各类终端产品中应用日益广泛，云计算、物联网、移动互联网等新兴领域蓬勃发展。价值链重点环节发生转移，组装制造环节附加值日趋减少，国际领先企业纷纷立足内容及服务环节加快产业链整合，以争夺产业链主导权。制造业、软件业、运营业与内容服务业加速融合，新技术、新产品、新模式不断涌现，对传统产业体系带来猛烈冲击，推动产业格局发生重大变革，既为我国带来发展的新机遇、新空间，也使我国面临着新一轮技术及市场垄断的严峻挑战。

context: Encourage enterprises to innovate in the design of secure products and solutions, select 10 or more exemplary products or best practices. Guide the network security public service platform to provide high-quality and efficient security services for small and medium-sized enterprises.

zh_context: 鼓励企业创新安全产品和方案设计，遴选10个以上典型产品或最佳实践。加大网络安全产品研发和技术攻关支持力度，加强产业协同创新。指导网络安全公共服务平台为中小企业提供优质高效的安全服务。

context: Solar energy products mainly include photovoltaic cells and modules, photovoltaic cell raw materials and auxiliary materials, photovoltaic system supporting products, thermal utilization products, and thermal power generation products. Photovoltaic cells and modules include crystalline silicon photovoltaic cells and modules, flexible gallium arsenide, silicon-based thin film, cadmium telluride, copper indium gallium selenide, perovskite, concentration and other new types of photovoltaic cells and modules. Photovoltaic cell raw materials and auxiliary materials include monocrystalline silicon ingots/wafers, photovoltaic cell encapsulation materials, organic polymer electrodes, photovoltaic conductive glass (TCO glass, etc.), silane, special silver paste, high-efficiency, low-cost, new solar photovoltaic cell materials, long-life graphite materials, high light utilization coating materials. Photovoltaic system supporting products include grid-connected photovoltaic inverters, off-grid photovoltaic inverters, battery charge and discharge controllers, solar tracking devices, portable control and inverter integrated equipment, photovoltaic intelligent combiner boxes, photovoltaic power plant monitoring equipment. Thermal utilization products include medium-high temperature solar collectors, high-efficiency flat plate collectors, absorber coating materials, high-efficiency solar heat collection products, energy storage materials and products.

zh_context: 太阳能产品，主要包括光伏电池及组件、光伏电池原材料及辅助材料、光伏系统配套产品、热利用产品、热发电产品等。光伏电池及组件，包括晶体硅光伏电池及组件，柔性砷化镓、硅基薄膜、碲化镉、铜铟镓硒、钙钛矿、聚光等新型光伏电池和组件。光伏电池原材料及辅助材料，包括单晶硅锭/硅片，光伏电池封装材料，有机聚合物电极，光伏导电玻璃(TCO玻璃等)，硅烷，专用银浆，高效率、低成本、新型太阳能光伏电池材料，长寿命石墨材料，高光利用率涂层材料。光伏系统配套产品，包括并网光伏逆变器、离网光伏逆变器、蓄电池充放电控制器、太阳能跟踪装置、便携式控制逆变一体设备、光伏智能汇流箱、光伏电站监控设备。热利用产品，包括中高温太阳能集热管，高效平板集热器，吸热体涂层材料，高效太阳能集热产品，储能材料及产品。

context: Establish a firm understanding of the correct concept of network security and dynamic, comprehensive protection, adhere to the principle of ensuring security while promoting development, comprehensively and continuously perceive the security situation of the mobile internet, continuously strengthen the security guarantee capability of the mobile internet basic information network, vigorously promote the application of network space security technologies and standards with independent intellectual property rights. Enhance network security defense capabilities, implement network security responsibility system, formulate and improve network security standards for critical information infrastructure security, big data security, etc., clarify protection objects, protection levels, and protection measures. Strengthen network security inspections comprehensively, understand the situation, recognize risks, identify vulnerabilities, supervise rectification, establish a unified and efficient network security risk reporting mechanism, intelligence sharing mechanism, and judgment and disposal mechanism.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++互联网++关于促进移动互联网健康有序发展的意见（中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅/2017年1月15日）++nan++其他政策++2017-1++防范移动互联网安全风险,提升网络安全保障水平
zh_context: 牢固树立正确的网络安全观和动态、综合防护理念，坚持以安全保发展、以发展促安全，全方位、全天候感知移动互联网安全态势，不断强化移动互联网基础信息网络安全保障能力，大力推广具有自主知识产权的网络空间安全技术和标准应用。增强网络安全防御能力，落实网络安全责任制，制定完善关键信息基础设施安全、大数据安全等网络安全标准，明确保护对象、保护层级、保护措施。全面加强网络安全检查，摸清家底、认清风险、找出漏洞、督促整改，建立统一高效的网络安全风险报告机制、情报共享机制、研判处置机制。

context: Comprehensive utilization of mineral resources mainly includes onshore oil extraction, onshore natural gas extraction, iron ore selection, magnesite selection, rare earth metal ore selection, other rare metal ore selection, clay and other sand and stone extraction, chemical mineral extraction, other mining industries, and other electricity production. Onshore oil extraction mainly includes comprehensive utilization of oil shale, comprehensive utilization of oil sands, comprehensive utilization of associated natural gas, development and utilization of coal-based oil shale resources, and comprehensive utilization of oil sands. Onshore natural gas extraction mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of coalbed methane, application of microbial coalbed methane extraction technology, and comprehensive utilization of shale gas. Iron ore selection mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of medium and low-grade iron ore and associated minerals. Magnesite selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of magnesite tailings. Rare earth metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of rare earth metal ore tailings. Other rare metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of other rare metal ore tailings. Clay and other sand and stone extraction mainly includes re-development and utilization of sand and stone mine tailings, comprehensive utilization and deep processing of associated non-metallic mineral resources such as kaolin and alumina, and development and utilization of resources such as kaolin.

context: Network equipment mainly includes next-generation mobile communication devices, next-generation internet devices, optical communication equipment, network equipment and terminal testing/measurement equipment, cloud computing equipment, Internet of Things devices, next-generation broadcasting and television network equipment, digital home products, digital video surveillance systems, etc. Next-generation broadcasting and television network equipment includes next-generation broadcasting and television network broadband access equipment, receiving equipment, backbone network switching and transmission equipment, and converged media distribution network equipment. Broadband access equipment supports transmission media such as optical fiber and coaxial cable, providing gigabit-per-second high-speed data access and digital TV program reception; backbone network switching and transmission equipment supports high-speed transmission, switching, and service quality requirements for both broadcast programs and broadband data, supporting protocols such as IPv6 and multicast VPN; wired and wireless converged transmission and distribution equipment supports the coordinated transmission and coverage of broadcast television segments through wired and wireless means, realizing the coordinated distribution of converged media; converged media distribution network supports cross-domain distribution of converged media services, ensuring user experience. Ground digital TV and mobile multimedia broadcasting transmission and receiving equipment, live satellite ground receiving equipment, etc.

zh_context: 网络设备，主要包括新一代移动通信设备、下一代互联网设备、光通信设备、网络设备和终端测试/计量设备、云计算设备、物联网设备、下一代广播电视网设备、数字家庭产品、数字视频监控系统等。下一代广播电视网设备，包括下一代广播电视网宽带接入设备、接收设备、骨干网交换和传输设备、融合媒体分发网设备。宽带接入设备支持光纤、同轴电缆等传输介质，可提供吉比特每秒的高速数据接入和数字电视节目接收；骨干网交换和传输设备，支持广播节目和宽带数据的两个平面数据流量的高速传输、交换和服务质量要求，支持IPv6、多播VPN等协议；有线无线融合传输和分发设备，支持广播电视频段的有线无线协同传输与覆盖，实现融合媒体协同分发；融合媒体分发网支持融合媒体业务的跨域分发，确保业务的用户体验。地面数字电视及移动多媒体广播发射、接收设备、直播卫星地面接收设备等。。

Engineering and technical research and experimental development mainly include supporting the research and development of technology for the prevention and control of soil pollution in farmland, supporting the research and development of technology for the remediation of organic pollution sites, supporting the research and development of technology for the remediation of heavy metal pollution sites, supporting the research and development of technology for the prevention and control of non-point source pollution in farmland, supporting the research and development of technology for the remediation of heavy metal pollution in farmland, product and equipment research and development, supporting the safe utilization and alternative planting technology for heavy metal polluted farmland, product research and development, supporting the research and development of technology and equipment for the harmless utilization of agricultural organic waste, supporting the research and development of technology for village sewage treatment, supporting the research and development of technology for the control and resource utilization of pollution from livestock and poultry farming, simulation instrument technology research and development, supporting the research and development of technology for atmospheric environmental pollution monitoring, supporting the research and development of technology for advanced water environmental pollution monitoring, supporting the research and development of technology and equipment for soil (groundwater) environmental monitoring and assessment, and research and development of microbial coalbed methane extraction technology.

zh_context: 环保研发与技术服务，主要包括其他数字内容服务、资源与产权交易服务、其他法律服务、环保咨询、其他专业咨询与调查、自然科学研究和试验发展、工程和技术研究和试验发展、标准化服务、认证认可服务、其他质检技术服务、农林牧渔技术推广服务、环保技术推广服务、其他技术推广服务等。工程和技术研究和试验发展，主要包括支撑农田土壤污染防控与修复技术研发、支撑有机污染场地修复技术研发、支撑重金属污染场地修复技术研发、支撑农田面源污染防治技术研发、支撑重金属污染农田修复技术、产品与装备研发、支撑重金属污染耕地安全利用与替代种植技术、产品研发、支撑农业有机废弃物无害化消纳利用技术与装备研发、支撑村镇生活污水处理技术研发、支撑畜禽养殖污染控制与资源化技术研发、仿真仪表技术研发、支撑大气环境污染监测技术研发、支撑先进水环境污染监测研发、支撑土壤（地下水）环境监测评估技术与装备研发、微生物开采煤层气技术研发。

context: 1. Internet Applications. (1) Upgrade of Internet applications (rolling). Continue to encourage and support mainstream Internet portals, social media, video, e-commerce, search, gaming, and other applications, as well as mainstream mobile app stores, internet browsers, email, file downloads, and other application software for IPv6 upgrade and deployment. Encourage and support the top 100 domestic commercial websites and applications to support IPv6 access. In the case of IPv4/IPv6 dual-stack connection, the above applications must prioritize IPv6 access. (2) IPv6 transformation of city-level government websites. Continue to promote the upgrade and transformation of existing e-government systems, complete the upgrade of the e-government external network, complete the upgrade and transformation of city-level government portal websites, and complete the transformation of public management and public welfare service platforms in areas such as public security, finance, and healthcare. (3) IPv6 transformation of city-level news and broadcasting websites. Complete the upgrade and transformation of city-level news and broadcasting websites, and fully support IPv6 for new businesses and applications. (4) IPv6 application in the industrial internet (rolling). Continuously carry out network transformation in factories and enterprises, promote the large-scale deployment of innovative applications in the industrial internet, and continuously improve the relevant standards for IPv6 application, management, and security in the industrial internet.2. Network Infrastructure. (1) IPv6 interconnection of backbone networks (rolling). Add and expand IPv6 backbone network interconnection nodes in China, with interconnection bandwidth reaching 5Tbps. (2) Expansion of IPv6 network international gateways (rolling). Continuously expand IPv6 network international gateways to further enhance the interconnection capability with the international next-generation internet. (3) Construction of IPv6 capabilities in broadcasting and television networks (rolling). Improve the IPv6 backbone network of broadcasting and television, implement IPv6 upgrade and transformation of cable TV access networks in western regions, and basically achieve IPv6 deployment throughout the process of broadcasting and television content, platforms, networks, and terminals. (4) Upgrade of mobile and fixed terminals (rolling). Fully deploy IPv6-supported mobile terminals, fixed network terminals, and broadcasting and television integrated terminals, and accelerate the replacement of existing terminals.3. Application Infrastructure. (1) IPv6 upgrade of large-scale data centers (rolling). Carry out the transformation of large-scale data centers, complete the relevant system upgrades, and achieve coordinated development with network infrastructure. (2) IPv6 upgrade of content delivery networks and cloud service platforms (rolling). Complete the transformation of the top 10 content delivery networks and the top 10 cloud service platforms, and form the optimized scheduling capability for IPv6 traffic. (3) Construction of IPv6 development monitoring platform (rolling). Increase monitoring indicators and objects, continuously improve the functionality and performance of the monitoring platform, and regularly evaluate the development of IPv6 in enterprises, industries, and regions.4. Network Security. IPv6 network security enhancement plan (rolling). Continuously upgrade and transform relevant network security assurance systems. Thoroughly implement the network security level protection system, network real-name system, and IPv6 address record management measures, continue to carry out research on relevant network security technologies, management, and mechanisms, strengthen network data security management and personal information protection capabilities, and ensure network security.5. Key Frontier Technologies. Next-generation internet technology innovation projects (rolling). Continuously carry out technological breakthroughs and industrialization of IPv6-supported chips, operating systems, terminals, network devices, and security systems. Further accelerate the innovation of internet new architecture, as well as frontier basic technologies such as new addressing and routing, intrinsic network security, and network virtualization. Strengthen the experimental verification and application demonstration of new network technologies and applications, continuously improve the productivity transformation level of innovation achievements, significantly enhance the independent innovation capability of network information technology, and form a leading advantage in future network technologies.V. Guarantee Measures. (1) Strengthen organizational leadership. Establish a collaborative mechanism among departments such as cyberspace, development and reform, industry and information technology, education, science and technology, public security, security, news publishing, and broadcasting, strengthen overall coordination, clarify division of responsibilities, enhance cooperation among departments, industries, and regions, solidly implement action plans, and study key tasks for promoting large-scale deployment of IPv6. Improve the expert consultation system, give full play to the role of investigation, research, and decision-making consultation, and provide high-quality consulting opinions. Encourage industry organizations and third-party institutions to participate extensively and improve communication and coordination mechanisms between government and enterprises. (2) Optimize development environment. Coordinate funds, increase support, guide social capital investment, give full play to the role of enterprises as the main body, and promote the development of IPv6 technology innovation, infrastructure transformation, application deployment, and security assurance. Promote the establishment of IPv6 network interconnection and settlement systems, study and introduce preferential measures for IPv6 terminals and traffic, and guide users to migrate to IPv6. Accelerate the construction of disciplines related to the next-generation internet, increase efforts in cultivating talents in next-generation internet technology, management, and international governance, and establish an international talent pool.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++实施步骤,2019年－2020年重点工作
zh_context: 1．互联网应用。（1）互联网应用升级（滚动）。继续鼓励和支持主流互联网门户、社交、视频、电商、搜索、游戏等应用，以及主流移动应用商店、互联网浏览器、电子邮件、文件下载等应用软件的IPv6升级和应用部署。鼓励和支持国内用户量排名前100位的商业网站及应用支持IPv6接入。在IPv4/IPv6双栈连接的情况下，上述应用均需优先支持IPv6访问。（2）市地级以上政府网站IPv6改造。继续推进既有电子政务系统升级改造，全。面完成电子政务外网升级。完成市地级以上政府门户网站升级改造。完成综治、金融、医疗等领域公共管理、民生公益等服务平台改造。（3）市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站IPv6改造。完成市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站升级改造，新上业务及应用全面支持IPv6。（4）工业互联网IPv6应用（滚动）。持续开展工厂企业网络改造，推动工业互联网创新应用的规模部署，不断完善工业互联网IPv6应用、管理、安全等相关标准。2．网络基础设施。（1）骨干网IPv6互联互通（滚动）。新增和扩容我国IPv6骨干网互联节点，互联带宽达到5Tbps。（2）IPv6网络国际出入口扩容（滚动）。持续扩容IPv6网络国际出入口，进一步提升与国际下一代互联网的互联互通能力。（3）广播电视网络IPv6能力建设（滚动）。完善广电IPv6骨干网，实施西部地区有线电视接入网IPv6升级改造，基本实现广播电视内容、平台、网络、终端全流程IPv6部署。（4）移动和固定终端升级（滚动）。全面部署支持IPv6的移动终端、固定网络终端以及广播电视融合终端，加快存量终端的淘汰替换。3．应用基础设施。（1）大型以上数据中心IPv6升级（滚动）。开展大型以上数据中心改造，完成相关系统升级，实现与网络基础设施的协同发展。（2）内容分发网络和云服务平台的IPv6升级（滚动）。完成排名前10位的内容分发网络和排名前10位的云服务平台全部云产品改造，形成IPv6流量的优化调度能力。（3）IPv6发展监测平台建设（滚动）。增加监测指标和对象，不断完善监测平台功能和性能。定期开展企业、行业、区域IPv6发展情况评测。4．网络安全。IPv6网络安全提升计划（滚动）。持续升级改造相关网络安全保障系统。深入落实网络安全等级保护制度、网络实名制和IPv6地址备案管理办法，继续开展相关网络安全技术、管理及机制研究工作，强化网络数据安全管理及个人信息保护能力，确保网络安全。5．关键前沿技术。下一代互联网技术创新项目（滚动）。持续开展支持IPv6的芯片、操作系统、终端及网络设备、安全系统的技术攻关和产业化。进一步加快互联网新型体系结构，以及新型编址与路由、内生网络安全、网络虚拟化等前沿基础技术创新，加强网络新技术、新应用的试验验证和应用示范，不断提升创新成果的生产力转化水平，显著增强网络信息技术自主创新能力，形成未来网络技术先发优势。五、保障措施。（一）加强组织领导。建立网信、发展改革、工业和信息化、教育、科技、公安、安全、新闻出版广电等部门协同推进机制，强化统筹协调，明确责任分工，加强部门、行业、区域间合作，扎实推进行动计划落地实施，研究推进IPv6规模部署工作的重点任务。健全专家咨询制度，充分发挥调查研究和决策咨询作用，提供高质量咨询意见。鼓励行业组织和第三方机构广泛参与，完善政企间沟通协调机制。（二）优化发展环境。统筹资金，加大支持力度，引导社会资金投入，充分发挥企业主体作用，推动IPv6技术创新、基础设施改造、应用部署、安全保障等领域发展。推动建立IPv6网络网间互联与结算体系，研究出台IPv6终端和流量优惠措施，引导用户向IPv6迁移。加快下一代互联网相关学科建设，加大下一代互联网技术、管理、国际治理人才培养力度，建立国际化人才梯队。

context: Breakthrough in cutting-edge technology. Leading international cutting-edge technology, accelerating disruptive technological innovation, breaking through 1-3 original innovative technologies, 10-20 cutting-edge key technologies, forming more than 300 core patents, leading the development of new generation medical device products. Innovative product research and development. Mainstream high-end products fully localized, significant breakthroughs in independently developed original products, research and development of 10-20 cutting-edge innovative products, leading the development of new medical products and health service technologies such as screening and early warning, early diagnosis, minimally/non-invasive treatment, personalized diagnosis and treatment, artificial intelligence diagnosis, intraoperative precision imaging, smart healthcare, and traditional Chinese medicine preventive treatment. Enhancement of competitiveness. Focus on cultivating 8-10 large-scale medical device enterprise groups with strong competitiveness in the domestic and international markets, establishing 8-10 medical device technology industrial clusters, 80-100 innovative high-tech enterprises with independent core intellectual property rights and a certain scale, establishing a sound national medical device standard, testing and evaluation system, constructing a demonstration and promotion system for innovative medical products in China, carrying out demonstration applications and equipment upgrades in thousands of primary healthcare institutions, and achieving a market share of 30%-40% for some key products, overall enhancing the international competitiveness of China's medical device technology industry.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十三五”医疗器械科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科办社〔2017〕44号）（科技部办公厅/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++发展目标,具体目标
zh_context: 前沿技术突破。引领国际前沿技术，加快颠覆性技术创新，突破1-3项原始创新技术，10-20项前沿关键技术，形成核心专利300项以上，引领新一代医疗器械产品发展。创新产品研发。主流高端产品全面实现国产化，自主原创产品取得重要突破，研发10-20项前沿创新产品，引领筛查预警、早期诊断、微/无创治疗、个体化诊疗、人工智能诊断、术中精准成像、智慧医疗、中医治未病等新型医疗产品与健康服务技术发展。竞争能力提升。重点培育8-10家在国内、国际市场具备较强竞争力的大型医疗器械企业集团，建立8-10个医疗器械科技产业集聚区，80-100家具有自主核心知识产权且具备一定规模的创新型高技术企业，建立完善的国家医疗器械标准、测试和评价体系，构建我国创新医疗产品示范推广体系，开展万家基层医疗机构的示范应用和装备升级，部分重点产品市场占有率达到30%-40%，整体提升我国医疗器械科技产业的国际竞争力。

context: Solar energy materials manufacturing mainly includes the selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores, manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials, coating manufacturing, specialty glass manufacturing, graphite and carbon product manufacturing, forging and powder metallurgy product manufacturing, semiconductor device specialized equipment manufacturing, electronic specialized material manufacturing, etc. The selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores mainly includes ilmenite. Manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials mainly includes silane. Coating manufacturing mainly includes high light utilization coating materials, heat-absorbing coating materials. Specialty glass manufacturing mainly includes photovoltaic conductive glass (TCO glass, etc.) and glass tubing for metal sealing. Manufacturing of graphite and carbon products mainly includes graphite materials for solar energy.

zh_context: 太阳能材料制造，主要包括其他常用有色金属矿采选、有机化学原料制造、涂料制造、特种玻璃制造、石墨及碳素制品制造、锻件及粉末冶金制品制造、半导体器件专用设备制造、电子专用材料制造等。其他常用有色金属矿采选，主要包括钙钛矿。有机化学原料制造，主要包括硅烷。涂料制造，主要包括高光利用率涂层材料、吸热体涂层材料。特种玻璃制造，主要包括光伏导电玻璃（TCO玻璃等）、与金属封接用玻璃管材。石墨及碳素制品制造，主要包括太阳能用石墨材料。

context: Basic software development mainly includes desktop operating systems, server operating systems, smart terminal operating systems, search engines, database management systems, basic middleware software products, business middleware software products, domain middleware software products, requirement analysis software, software modeling software, integrated development environments (software development environment applications), testing software, virtualization systems, cloud management systems, database software, basic software supporting critical information infrastructure, general basic software, new network-based basic software, and Internet of Things middleware.
zh_context: 基础软件开发，主要包括桌面操作系统、服务器操作系统、智能终端操作系统、搜索引擎、数据库管理系统、基础中间件软件产品、业务中间件软件产品、领域中间件软件产品、需求分析软件、软件建模软件、集成开发环境（软件开发环境应用程序）、测试软件、虚拟化系统、云管理系统、数据库软件、关键信息基础设施配套的基础软件、通用基础软件、新型网络化基础软件、物联网中间件。

context: Focus on the development of new products for diseases such as diabetes, viral infections, and tumors, with low immunogenicity, good stability, strong targeting, long-lasting effects, and high bioavailability. According to the treatment needs of diabetes in our country, enhance the industrialization level of long-acting insulin and premixed insulin, and accelerate the development of new varieties such as glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1) analogs. Promote the industrialization of products with significant demand, such as recombinant human albumin and gene recombinant coagulation factors. Establish a quality control system that aligns with international standards and actively explore the international market.

zh_context: 重点针对糖尿病、病毒感染、肿瘤等疾病，开发免疫原性低、稳定性好、靶向性强、长效、生物利用度高的新产品。根据我国糖尿病治疗需求，提升长效胰岛素、预混胰岛素产业化水平，加快开发胰高血糖素样肽-1（GLP-1）类似物等新品种。推动具有重大需求的重组人白蛋白、基因重组凝血因子等产品的产业化。建立与国际接轨的质量控制体系，积极开拓国际市场。

context: Focus on the research and development of anaerobic ammonia oxidation technology equipment, electrolytic catalytic oxidation, supercritical oxidation equipment, and advanced membrane treatment technology and components that are bio-enhanced and low-energy and high-efficiency. Conduct basic research on the treatment technology equipment for trace toxic pollutants in drinking water. Emphasize the promotion of low-cost, high-standard, low-energy, and high-efficiency sewage treatment equipment, zero-emission treatment and comprehensive utilization technology for high-salinity wastewater in coal-fired power plants, coal chemical industry, and other industries, as well as deep denitrification, phosphorus removal, and safe and efficient disinfection technology equipment. Promote the restoration of black and odorous water bodies, rural sewage treatment, upgrading of urban and industrial park sewage plants, and application demonstrations of high-concentration and difficult-to-degrade sewage treatment in industrial and livestock farming, leachate treatment from garbage, and other fields.

zh_context: 重点攻关厌氧氨氧化技术装备和电解催化氧化、超临界氧化装等氧化技术装备，研发生物强化和低能耗高效率的先进膜处理技术与组件，开展饮用水微量有毒污染物处理技术装备等基础研究。重点推广低成本高标准、低能耗高效率污水处理装备，燃煤电厂、煤化工等行业高盐废水的零排放治理和综合利用技术，深度脱氮除磷与安全高效消毒技术装备。推进黑臭水体修复、农村污水治理、城镇及工业园区污水厂提标改造，以及工业及畜禽养殖、垃圾渗滤液处理等领域高浓度难降解污水治理应用示范。

context: For building materials industry enterprises in the application of industrial Internet, develop guidelines for network security classification and grading protection, and network security grading protection specifications, promote the implementation of classified and graded security protection by enterprises. Carry out standardized protection capability, guide enterprises to strengthen the construction of network security protection capability. context: Remote sensing monitoring and early warning technology for water and atmospheric environment. In response to the need for timely monitoring of water and atmospheric environmental quality, research is conducted on identification and extraction techniques for water pollution based on hyperspectral imaging. Automation technology and equipment for ecological monitoring of dam projects are developed, and remote sensing monitoring and early warning technology for urban black and odorous water bodies, water ecology in river basins, non-point source pollution, and water safety in drinking water sources are studied. Quantitative remote sensing inversion technology for atmospheric aerosols and trace gases based on hyperspectral imaging is developed, and research is conducted on remote sensing monitoring and early warning technology for regional haze, pollution gases, greenhouse gases, and other atmospheric environmental factors. Integrated monitoring technology for environmental emergency and risk management. In response to the technological needs of environmental emergency and risk monitoring, breakthroughs are made in new red tide monitoring and early warning technology, and research is conducted on remote sensing application technology for environmental regulation, such as emergency response to natural disasters and sudden environmental events, environmental impact assessment of construction projects, and environmental assessment of planning. Data preprocessing and environmental index inversion technology for multi-source data collaboration are developed, and unmanned aerial vehicle environmental regulation and sky-ground collaborative environmental monitoring are carried out. Key technology research for early warning. Development of environmental risk source management technology and equipment for enterprise environmental risk sources, integrating Internet of Things, Internet, big data, cloud computing, and mobile terminals for connection management between government departments, enterprises, and the public.

context: Column 1 focuses on the key areas of innovation and development in intelligent manufacturing equipment. It emphasizes the innovation of collaborative models between industry, academia, research, and application, as well as the research and development of high-end CNC machine tools, industrial robots, additive manufacturing equipment, intelligent sensing and control equipment, intelligent detection and assembly equipment, and intelligent logistics and warehousing equipment. The key breakthroughs include high-performance fiber optic sensors, microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) sensors, vision sensors, distributed control systems (DCS), programmable logic controllers (PLC), data acquisition systems (SCADA), high-performance and highly reliable embedded control systems, and other core products. These products will be integrated and applied in fields such as machine tools, robots, petrochemicals, and rail transportation. By relying on advantageous enterprises, integrated innovation and application demonstrations of intelligent manufacturing equipment will be carried out to accelerate industrialization. The development and industrialization of intelligent connected vehicles, intelligent engineering machinery, intelligent ships, intelligent lighting appliances, service robots, and other areas will be promoted. Intelligent services such as remote unmanned operation, operation status monitoring, work environment warning, and fault diagnosis and maintenance will also be conducted. By 2020, more than 60 types of key intelligent manufacturing equipment will be developed, reaching the international level of similar products, with a domestic market penetration rate exceeding 50%.

context: Focusing closely on the strategic needs of people's health and the cultivation of emerging industries, the future development of medicine is represented by the research and development of major products such as innovative drugs and medical devices, as well as precision, individualized, substitutable, or renewable medicine. The key breakthroughs are in new vaccines, antibody preparation, immunotherapy, and other key technologies, aiming to seize the strategic high ground in the biopharmaceutical industry and strive to transform China's biopharmaceutical industry from catching up to keeping pace and leading in some areas by 2020. Column 4: Biopharmaceuticals. Modern biological treatment technologies such as immunotherapy and gene therapy. Strengthen original research related to biological treatment, such as immune checkpoint inhibitors, gene therapy, and immunocellular therapy, and break through key technologies such as immune cell acquisition and storage, immune cell genetic engineering modification, biopharmaceutical target screening, and the development of new gene therapy vectors, to enhance the industrial development and international competitiveness of biological treatment in China. Stem cells, biomedical materials, and regenerative medicine. Focus on strengthening the basic and translational research of stem cells, enhancing the cross-fusion of stem cells, biomedical materials, and tissue engineering, guiding the technological upgrading of China's biomedical materials industry and the standardized clinical application of new treatment methods such as cell therapy; develop new generation vascular stents, nerve repair conduits, artificial bone tissue repair materials, and other products to promote the application and transformation of tissue engineering products and bioprinting products; explore the artificial construction of tissues and organs such as valves, liver, and kidneys to promote the leapfrog development of related industries. Molecular typing and precision medicine for major diseases. Focus on the development of next-generation life omics technologies such as gene sequencing, clinical application technologies, bio big data cloud computing technologies, and biomedical analysis technologies; systematically identify and optimize candidate biomarkers, establish disease typing standards and technical methods, build large-scale national health cohorts and specific disease cohorts, establish a biomedical big data sharing platform; develop precise prevention, diagnosis, and treatment plans and clinical decision-making systems for major diseases, and improve the level of prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of major diseases. Development of new vaccines, antibodies, and other major biological products. Focus on breakthroughs in key technologies and bottlenecks such as vaccine molecular design, multi-valent design, engineered cell construction, antibody engineering optimization, new drug delivery systems and formulations, large-scale separation and preparation, and efficacy evaluation, to accelerate the research and development of new vaccines, antibodies, blood products, and other major biological products. Drug design and new drug development. Based on potential drug targets discovered in modern life sciences, combined with next-generation computer and artificial intelligence technologies, as well as structural biology research achievements, carry out research on computer-aided drug molecular design technology, develop innovative drugs based on new structures and targets, and strengthen the research and development of classical prescriptions of traditional Chinese medicine, advantageous compound formulas of traditional Chinese medicine, and active ingredients. Biomedical engineering and medical devices. Focus on breakthroughs in new imaging technologies, new sensing technologies, microfluidics, optoelectronics, imaging navigation and robotics, single-cell sequencing, and molecular diagnostics, break through the development of core components of high-end large-scale medical devices and equipment, improve the product evaluation system and capability support platform, and accelerate the development of medical imaging equipment, medical robots, new implantable devices, new biomedical materials, in vitro diagnostic technologies and products, home medical monitoring and health equipment, wearable devices, primary care-appropriate diagnostic and treatment equipment, mobile medical products, and so on.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物制造++“十三五”生物技术创新专项规划（节选）（国科发社〔2017〕103号）（科技部/2017年4月24日）++nan++其他政策++2017-4++重点任务,支撑重点领域发展,生物医药
zh_context: 紧紧围绕民生健康和新兴产业培育的战略需求，突出创新药物、医疗器械等重大产品研制和精准化、个体化、可替代或可再生为代表的未来医学发展，重点突破新型疫苗、抗体制备、免疫治疗等关键技术，抢占生物医药产业战略制高点，力争到2020年实现我国生物医药整体由“跟跑”到“并跑”、部分领域“领跑”的转变。专栏4：生物医药。免疫治疗、基因治疗等现代生物治疗技术。加强免疫检查点抑制剂、基因治疗、免疫细胞治疗等生物治疗相关的原创性研究，突破免疫细胞获取与存储、免疫细胞基因工程修饰技术、生物治疗靶标筛选、新型基因治疗载体研发等产品研发及临床转化的关键技术，提升我国生物治疗的产业发展和国际竞争力。干细胞、生物医用材料与再生医学。重点加强干细胞的应用基础研究和转化研究，强化干细胞、生物医用材料与组织工程的交叉融合，引导我国生物医用材料产业的技术升级和细胞治疗等新治疗手段的规范化临床应用；研发新一代血管支架、神经修复导管、骨组织人工修复材料等产品，促进组织工程产品和生物3D打印产品的应用转化；探索瓣膜、肝、肾等组织和类器官的人工构建，促进相关产业的跨越式发展。重大疾病的分子分型与精准医疗。重点发展基因测序技术等新一代生命组学。临床应用技术、生物大数据云计算技术和生物医学分析技术；系统鉴定和优化候选标志谱物，建立疾病分型标准及技术方法，构建国家大型健康队列和特定疾病队列，建立生物医学大数据共享平台；形成重大疾病的精准防诊治方案和临床决策系统，提升重大疾病的防诊治水平。新型疫苗、抗体等重大生物制品研制。重点突破疫苗分子设计、多联多价设计、工程细胞构建、抗体工程优化、新释药系统及新制剂、规模化分离制备、效果评价等关键技术和瓶颈技术，加快新型疫苗、抗体、血液制品等重大生物制品的研发。药物设计及新药研发。基于现代生命科学发现的潜在药物作用靶标，结合新一代计算机与人工智能技术以及结构生物学研究成果，开展药物分子计算机辅助设计技术研究，开发基于新结构、新靶点的创新药物，加强中药的经典名方、优势中药复方与活性成分的研究和开发。生物医学工程与医疗器械。重点突破新型成像技术、新型传感技术、微流光机电技术、影像导航和机器人、单细胞测序和分子诊断等技术，突破一批高端大型医疗器械与仪器设备核心零部件开发技术，健全产品评估体系及能力支撑平台，加快发展医学影像设备、医用机器人、新型植入装置、新型生物医用材料、体外诊断技术与产品、家庭医疗监测和健康装备、可穿戴设备、基层适宜的诊疗设备、移动医疗等产品。

context: Modern financial services mainly include financial leasing services, online lending services, other non-monetary banking services, publicly offered securities investment funds, venture capital funds, angel investments, other privately offered securities investment funds, other capital market services, property insurance, other financial trust and management services, non-financial institution payment services, and financial information services. Financial leasing services mainly include financing leasing services for aircraft, robots, etc. Other non-monetary banking services mainly include internet consumer finance and factoring services.

context: Biological chemical products mainly include bulk and fine chemicals and their derivatives produced by biological methods or biomass raw material preparation, as well as non-food raw material conversion technologies. Bulk and fine chemicals and their derivatives produced by biological methods or biomass raw material preparation include bioethylene, isoprene, acrylic acid, ethanol, ethylene glycol, propylene glycol, isopropanol, 3-hydroxypropionic acid, acrylic acid, butanol, isobutanol, butanediol, butanetriol, polyols, acetic acid, lactic acid, propionic acid, butyric acid, succinic acid, long-chain dicarboxylic acids, long-chain fatty acids, malic acid, itaconic acid, citric acid, citric acid esters, isosorbide, chiral compounds, steroidal compounds, chemical intermediates, additives, straw sugars, oligosaccharides, rare sugars, non-natural amino acids, etc. Non-food raw material conversion technologies include biorefining technology, biomass gasification technology, chemical product fermentation technology, biocatalysis technology, whole-cell catalytic conversion technology, biodegradation technology, enzymatic hydrolysis technology, biochemo-combination synthesis technology, and bioprocess control technology.

zh_context: 生物化工产品，主要包括生物法制备或生物质原料制备的大宗与精细化学品及其衍生物、非粮原料转化技术等。生物法制备或生物质原料制备的大宗与精细化学品及其衍生物，包括生物乙烯、异戊二烯、丙烯酸、乙醇、乙二醇，丙二醇、异丙醇、3-羟基丙酸、丙烯酸、丁醇、异丁醇、丁二醇、丁三醇、多元醇、乙酸、乳酸、丙酸、丁酸，丁二酸、乙醛酸、富马酸、长链二元酸、长链脂肪酸、苹果酸、衣康酸、柠檬酸、柠檬酸酯、异山梨醇，手性化合物，甾体化合物，化工中间体，添加剂，秸秆糖，寡糖、稀少糖、非天然氨基酸等。非粮原料转化技术，生物炼制技术，生物质气化技术，化工产品发酵技术，生物催化技术，全细胞催化转化技术，生物拆分技术，生物酶解技术，生物化学组合合成技术，生物合成过程控制技术等。

context: With early-stage, precise, minimally invasive diagnosis and treatment as the direction, the focus is on promoting the research and development of products such as multimodal molecular imaging, new magnetic resonance imaging systems, new X-ray computed tomography imaging, next-generation ultrasound imaging, low-dose X-ray imaging, composite endoscopic imaging, new microscopy imaging, large-scale radiotherapy equipment, surgical robots, and medical active implantable devices. The aim is to accelerate the localization, high-end development, and branding of digital diagnostic equipment.

zh_context: 以早期、精准、微创诊疗为方向，重点推进多模态分子成像、新型磁共振成像系统、新型X射线计算机断层成像、新一代超声成像、低剂量X射线成像、复合窥镜成像、新型显微成像、大型放射治疗装备、手术机器人、医用有源植入式装置等产品研发，加快推进数字诊疗装备国产化、高端化、品牌化。

context: The key development of semiconductor materials includes silicon materials, compound semiconductor materials, substrate materials such as gallium nitride and silicon carbide, raw materials for epitaxy, and high-performance ceramic substrates. It also includes high-end LED packaging materials, high-brightness and high-power LED chip materials, key materials for new power electronic devices, and graphite and carbon series insulation materials. The key development of optoelectronic materials includes glass substrates for high-generation LCD displays, polarizers, color filters, liquid crystals, large-size targets, high-purity electronic gases and reagents. It also includes high-purity organic materials, conductive glass substrates, packaging materials, high-precision mask templates for organic light-emitting displays (OLEDs), glass substrates and electrode pastes for plasma display panels (PDPs), wet chemicals, glass powders, phosphors, and other supporting materials. Additionally, it includes microcapsules, inks, dielectric materials for electronic paper, large-size germanium-based materials, infrared materials such as zinc sulfide (ZnS), zinc selenide (ZnSe), silicon carbide (SiC), to meet the demand for manufacturing high-end optoelectronic products. For electronic components, it includes copper-clad laminates, electronic copper foils, piezoelectric and system information processing materials, high thermal conductivity ceramic materials and metal composite materials, small lithium batteries and power lithium battery materials, chip-type ultra-thin high-capacity electronic ceramic materials and capacitor materials, high-performance capacitor films, high-end electronic pastes, LTCC multilayer substrates, high-performance magnetic materials, etc. The focus is on breaking through the high-end supporting application market, improving product added value and technological content, enhancing the quality and efficiency of the development of the electronic materials industry, and supporting the leapfrog development of downstream industries.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++主要任务与发展重点,发展重点,电子材料
zh_context: 半导体材料重点发展硅材料、化合物半导体材料、氮化镓和碳化硅等衬底材料、外延用原料、高性能陶瓷基板；高端LED封装材料，高亮度、大功率LED芯片材料；新型电力电子器件用关键材料；石墨和碳素系列保温材料。光电子材料重点发展高世代液晶显示屏（LCD）用玻璃基板，偏光片、彩色滤光片、液晶等相关材料，大尺寸靶材，高纯电子气体和试剂；有机发光显示器（OLED）用高纯有机材料、导电玻璃基板、封装材料、高精度掩模板等；PDP用玻璃基板及电极浆料、湿化学品、玻璃粉、荧光粉等配套材料；电子纸用微胶囊、油墨、介电材料；发展大尺寸锗系材料、硫化锌（ZnS）、硒化锌（ZnSe）、碳化硅（SiC）红外材料，满足制造高端光电子产品需求。电子元器件用覆铜板、电子铜箔、压电与系统信息处理材料、高热导率陶瓷材料和金属复合材料、小型锂电池和动力锂电池材料、片式超薄介质高容电子陶瓷材料及电容器材料、高性能电容器薄膜、高端电子浆料、LTCC多层基板、高性能磁性材料等。重点突破高端配套应用市场，提高产品附加值和技术含量，增强电子材料行业发展的质量和效益，支撑下游产业跨越式发展。

context: Intelligent on-site rapid detection system. Key development of integrated drying chemical analyzer, automated immune rapid detection instrument, handheld sequencer, portable nucleic acid detection instrument, and supporting testing reagents and quality control products; research on high-sensitivity on-site rapid detection technology for non-invasive sample collection and supporting reagents. Conduct research on non-invasive blood glucose detection instrument, wearable extracorporeal detection technology and equipment. New molecular diagnostic system. Key development of on-site rapid extraction/detection integrated platform for nucleic acids, new gene sequencer, fully automated nucleic acid detection system with on-site testing, quantitative digital PCR systems, etc. Medical multimodal flow cytometer. Development of multi-color fluorescence, flow cytometer for quantitative flow microspheres, flow cytometer for intracellular component detection, flow cytometer for flow molecular phenotyping analysis and immune phenotyping analysis, and supporting reagents. New medical mass spectrometer. Development of matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization and other soft ionization methods-based time-of-flight, quadrupole or tandem high-precision mass spectrometers. Development of commonly used internal reference standards for isotopes and establishment of commonly used mass spectrometry data analysis libraries. Fully automated microbial analysis system. Key development of non-cultured microbial automated analysis system, automated blood culture system, microbial automated identification and drug sensitivity analysis system, microbial clinical sample automated pretreatment system, and other fully automated microbial analysis equipment. Rapid pathological diagnosis system. Key development of intelligent rapid pathological diagnosis system, pathology micro-CT based on phase-contrast energy spectrum. Key breakthroughs in automated technology for routine staining, immunohistochemistry, and in situ FISH of pathological sections, intelligent image analysis technology for pathological slides, and nanoscale rapid histological X-ray stereoscopic imaging technology.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十三五”医疗器械科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科办社〔2017〕44号）（科技部办公厅/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,推进重大产品研发，突破核心部件瓶颈,体外诊断类
zh_context: 智能化现场快速检测系统。重点开发集成式干化学分析仪、自动化免疫快速检测仪、掌上测序仪、便携式核酸检测仪及配套检测试剂与质控品；研制无创采集样本的高灵敏度现场快速检测技术以及配套试剂。开展无创血糖检测仪、可穿戴式体外检测技术和设备的研究。新型分子诊断系统。重点开发现场快速提取/检测核酸一体化平台、新型基因测序仪、随检全自动核酸检测系统、定量数字PCR等系统。医用多模态流式细胞仪。研制多色荧光、流式微球定量流式细胞仪、胞内成分检测流式细胞仪、流式分子表型分析与免疫表型分析仪等多模流式细胞仪及配套试剂。新型医用质谱仪。研制基于基质辅助激光解吸附等软电离方式的飞行时间、四极杆或串联高精度质谱仪。研制常用的同位素内部参考品，并建立常用的质谱数据分析库。全自动微生物分析系统。重点开发非培养微生物自动化分析系统、自动化血培养系统、微生物自动鉴定与药敏分析系统、微生物临床样本自动预处理系统等微生物全自动分析装备。快速病理诊断系统。重点开发智能化的快速病理诊断系统、基于相衬能谱的病理显微CT。重点突破病理切片常规染色、免疫组化和原位FISH的自动化技术、病理片的智能图像分析技术、纳米级别快速组织学X-射线立体成像技术。

context: (1) Internet application upgrade (rolling). Continue to encourage and support mainstream Internet portals, social media, video, e-commerce, search, gaming, and other applications, as well as mainstream mobile app stores, internet browsers, email, file downloads, and other application software to upgrade and deploy IPv6. Encourage and support the top 100 domestic commercial websites and applications to support IPv6 access. In the case of IPv4/IPv6 dual-stack connection, the above applications must prioritize IPv6 access.(2) IPv6 transformation of municipal government websites. Continue to promote the upgrade and transformation of existing e-government systems and complete the upgrade of the e-government external network. Complete the upgrade and transformation of municipal government portal websites. Complete the transformation of public management and public welfare service platforms in areas such as public security, finance, healthcare, etc.(3) IPv6 transformation of news and radio and television media websites at the municipal level and above. Complete the upgrade and transformation of news and radio and television media websites at the municipal level and above, and fully support IPv6 for new businesses and applications.(4) Industrial Internet IPv6 application (rolling). Continuously carry out network transformation in factories and enterprises, promote the large-scale deployment of innovative applications in the industrial Internet, and continuously improve the relevant standards for industrial Internet IPv6 applications, management, security, etc.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++实施步骤,2017年－2018年重点工作,互联网应用
zh_context: （1）互联网应用升级（滚动）。继续鼓励和支持主流互联网门户、社交、视频、电商、搜索、游戏等应用，以及主流移动应用商店、互联网浏览器、电子邮件、文件下载等应用软件的IPv6升级和应用部署。鼓励和支持国内用户量排名前100位的商业网站及应用支持IPv6接入。在IPv4/IPv6双栈连接的情况下，上述应用均需优先支持IPv6访问。（2）市地级以上政府网站IPv6改造。继续推进既有电子政务系统升级改造，全。面完成电子政务外网升级。完成市地级以上政府门户网站升级改造。完成综治、金融、医疗等领域公共管理、民生公益等服务平台改造。（3）市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站IPv6改造。完成市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站升级改造，新上业务及应用全面支持IPv6。（4）工业互联网IPv6应用（滚动）。持续开展工厂企业网络改造，推动工业互联网创新应用的规模部署，不断完善工业互联网IPv6应用、管理、安全等相关标准。

context: Electronic vacuum device manufacturing mainly includes special-purpose vacuum devices.

context: Key research and development of emergency technical equipment for hazardous chemical accidents, leakage prevention and emergency management of hazardous chemicals (cyanides) in shipping. context: Information terminal equipment mainly includes next-generation mobile terminal devices, wearable terminal devices, satellite mobile communication, navigation terminals, next-generation broadcast and television network terminal equipment, and other communication terminal devices. Satellite mobile communication and navigation terminals include mobile satellite communication terminals that use geostationary orbit satellites or medium and low orbit satellites as relay stations to achieve regional and even global mobile communication. This includes vehicle-mounted, ship-mounted, airborne terminals, and handheld devices. Satellite navigation receivers receive broadcast navigation signals from satellite navigation systems such as Beidou for navigation and positioning functions. Next-generation broadcast and television network terminal equipment includes smart home multimedia gateways that support media convergence services, support external wired and wireless broadband interconnection, and have the networking capability of home media devices; smart set-top boxes that support decoding capabilities for 4K and 8K videos, support gesture and voice control functions, support the integration of broadcast networks and broadband data networks, and can support various presentation terminals. Other communication terminal equipment includes smart home gateways, smart routers, smart terminals that support hot-swappable data cards, and smart terminals that support hot-swappable other communication cards.

context: Basic mastery of the construction technology of deep-sea oil and gas resource development equipment, comprehensive improvement in equipment economy, safety and reliability, environmental friendliness, and intelligence level, forming advantages in certain areas. Breakthroughs have been made in mining equipment for marine mineral resources, natural gas hydrates, etc., as well as in the development of series of detection equipment such as manned/unmanned submersibles capable of reaching depths of 10,000 meters. Integrated information systems for island/anchorage floating platforms, comprehensive experimental ships for offshore operations, and other integrated information basic equipment for ocean sensing and communication have been developed. Key core technologies for the development of equipment for the exploitation of marine renewable resources such as wave energy/tidal energy, temperature difference energy, as well as for the development of equipment for the exploitation of marine chemical resources such as seawater desalination and lithium extraction from seawater have been achieved. The research and development capabilities and technological reserves for polar marine engineering equipment have been significantly enhanced.

context: By 2025, the medical equipment industry will have significantly improved its advanced foundation and modernization level of the industrial chain. Mainstream medical equipment will have achieved effective supply, and the performance and quality of high-end medical equipment products will have significantly improved. Preliminary comprehensive support capabilities for public health and medical health needs will have been formed. - Optimization and upgrading of the entire industry chain. Medical equipment urgently needs to fill the gaps in basic components and parts, basic software, basic materials, basic processes, and industrial technological foundations. A supply chain with strong innovation capabilities, high added value, and safety and reliability will have been initially established. - Continuous improvement in technological level. Medical equipment will have achieved large-scale application in areas such as prevention, diagnosis, treatment, rehabilitation, health promotion, and public health. A batch of high-end products such as extracorporeal membrane oxygenation machines (ECMO), laparoscopic surgical robots, 7T whole-body magnetic resonance imaging systems, and proton and heavy ion integrated treatment systems will have been realized. - Significant enhancement of enterprise vitality. The ecological dominance and core competitiveness of leading medical equipment companies will have greatly improved. A number of globally leading champion enterprises in segmented fields, as well as specialized and innovative little giant enterprises with core technologies and unique processes, will have emerged, promoting the integrated development of large, medium, small, and micro enterprises. - Gradual improvement of the industrial ecosystem. Multidimensional medical-engineering collaboration and innovation models such as medicine + industry, hospital + factory, and doctor + engineer will have been initially established. Health medical services will have developed rapidly, and new formats such as telemedicine, mobile healthcare, smart healthcare, precision medicine, and traditional Chinese medicine specialty healthcare will have comprehensively innovated and developed. - Significant increase in brand influence. The recognition, brand reputation, and international influence of medical equipment products will have rapidly increased, significantly improving their position in the global division of labor and value chain. 6-8 companies will have entered the top 50 in the global medical device industry. By 2035, the research and development, manufacturing, and application of medical equipment will have reached world advanced levels. China will be at the forefront of innovative medical equipment countries, providing strong support for comprehensive and lifelong health services for the people.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十四五”医疗装备产业发展规划（工信部联规〔2021〕208号）（工信部、国家卫健委、国家发改委、科技部、财政部、国务院国资委、国家市场监督管理总局、国家医疗保障局、国家中医药管理局、国家药监局/2021年12月21日）++nan++其他政策++2021-12++总体部署,发展愿景
zh_context: 到2025年，医疗装备产业基础高级化、产业链现代化水平明显提升，主流医疗装备基本实现有效供给，高端医疗装备产品性能和质量水平明显提升，初步形成对公共卫生和医疗健康需求的全面支撑能力。——全产业链优化升级。医疗装备亟需基础零部件及元器件、基础软件、基础材料、基础工艺和产业技术基础等瓶颈短板基本补齐，初步建成创新力强、附加值高、安全可靠的产业链供应链。——技术水平不断提升。医疗装备在预防、诊断、治疗、康复、健康促进、公共卫生等领域实现规模化应用。体外膜肺氧合机（ECMO）、腔镜手术机器人、。7T人体全身磁共振成像系统、质子重离子一体治疗系统等一批高端产品实现应。——企业活力显著增强。医疗装备龙头企业的生态主导力和核心竞争力大幅提升，涌现一批细分领域全球领先的单项冠军企业，以及一批掌握核心技术和独特工艺的专精特新“小巨人”企业，大中小微企业融通发展。——产业生态逐步完善。医学+工业、医院+工厂、医生+工程师等多维度医工协同创新模式初步建立，健康医学服务快速发展，远程医疗、移动医疗、智慧医疗、精准医疗、中医特色医疗等新业态全面创新发展。——品牌影响力明显提升。医疗装备产品认可度、品牌美誉度及国际影响力快速提升，在全球产业分工和价值链中的地位大幅提高，6-8家企业跻身全球医疗器械行业50强。到2035年，医疗装备的研发、制造、应用提升至世界先进水平。我国进入医疗装备创新型国家前列，为保障人民全方位、全生命期健康服务提供有力支撑。

zh_context: 围绕重点基础产业、战略性新兴产业和国防建设对新材料的重大需求，加快新材料技术突破和应用。发展先进结构材料技术，重点是高温合金、高品质特殊钢、先进轻合金、特种工程塑料、高性能纤维及复合材料、特种玻璃与陶瓷等技术及应用。发展先进功能材料技术，重点是第三代半导体材料、纳米材料、新能源材料、印刷显示与激光显示材料、智能/仿生/超材料、高温超导材料、稀土新材料、膜分离材料、新型生物医用材料、生态环境材料等技术及应用。发展变革性的材料研发与绿色制造新技术，重点是材料基因工程关键技术与支撑平台，短流程、近终形、高能效、低排放为特征的材料绿色制造技术及工程应用。专栏7新材料技术。

context: Action goals: By 2023, the digital transformation of the financial industry will have significant effects, the financial service model will be more improved, the product supply will be more abundant, and the business reach will be broader. By 2025, an advanced, reliable, and flexible infrastructure service system will be basically formed, the financial industry will achieve preliminary digitization and intelligence, the inclusiveness of finance and the ability to serve the real economy will be significantly enhanced, and a regulatory system adapted to financial technology will be established to provide comprehensive financial support for the new development pattern. Improve digital financial infrastructure. Optimize the layout of infrastructure, promote moderate competition in digital financial services. Promote infrastructure interconnection and facilitate the free flow of factors. Further improve the credit system, accelerate the improvement of credit processes and credit evaluation models in key areas. Upgrade and transform the payment and settlement system, enhance risk prevention and control, and operational support capabilities. Further improve comprehensive financial statistics and accelerate the construction of a national financial basic database. Accelerate the healthy development of China's financial information service industry. Improve the level of financial services for the people. Utilize technologies such as blockchain, 5G, and edge computing to create a multi-level and widely covered new financial service model, promote the maturity and improvement of digital financing, digital letters of credit, and enhance the reach of financial services. Effectively protect the legitimate rights and interests of financial consumers in the use of intelligent financial products and services, and focus on solving the digital divide faced by elderly people and other groups. Strengthen innovation in agricultural financial products, and accelerate the application and promotion of excellent financial technology practices in rural areas. Expand the radius of financial services, improve service efficiency, build a digital inclusive financial service system with safety as the premise, people as the center, and demand-oriented, and achieve the healthy and sustainable development of inclusive finance. Enhance the ability of the financial sector to effectively support the real economy. Support market entities in using digital technology to reconstruct financial service processes, deepen the development and utilization of cross-industry financial data resources while ensuring data security and personal privacy. Improve the comprehensive credit service infrastructure for national small and medium-sized enterprise financing, strengthen the collection and sharing of credit information for enterprises in water, electricity, coal, gas, and other industries, and improve the accessibility of financing for small and medium-sized enterprises. Establish and improve the transaction reporting system and transaction reporting database to enhance the transparency of the financial market. Optimize the supply of financial services for industrial chain and supply chain finance, allocate financial resources to key areas and weak links in economic and social development, and increase the quantity, coverage, quality, and efficiency of financial services for all types of enterprises, especially private and micro-enterprises. Strengthen soft connectivity with international and regional financial markets, rules, and standards, and promote institutional openness in rules, regulations, management, and standards. Improve the regulatory system for financial technology innovation. Increase efforts in formulating basic regulatory rules, monitoring and analysis, and evaluation work, explore management mechanisms for financial technology innovation, enhance the ability of penetrative supervision, and prevent the occurrence of systemic financial risks. Strengthen the regulation of financial technology, comprehensively promote the implementation of regulatory tools for financial technology innovation, strengthen the full life cycle management of financial technology innovation activities, and build a firewall for financial and technological risks. Promote financial technology. Global governance of cross-border financial services.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十四五”国家信息化规划（中央网络安全和信息化委员会/2021年12月）++nan++“十四五”国家信息化规划++2021-12++优先行动,数字普惠金融服务行动
zh_context: 行动目标：到2023年，金融业数字化转型成效明显，金融服务模式更加完善，产品供给更加丰富、业务触达范围更加广阔；到2025年，先进可靠、富有弹性的基础设施服务体系基本形成，金融业初步实现数字化、智能化，金融普惠性和服务实体经济能力显著增强，形成与金融科技相适应的监管体系，为新发展格局提供全方位金融支持。完善数字金融基础设施。优化基础设施布局，促进数字金融服务适度竞争。推动基础设施互联互通，促进要素自由流动。进一步完善征信体系，加快完善重点领域信贷流程和信用评价模型。升级改造支付清算体系，提升风险防控和运维保障能力。进一步完善金融业综合统计，加快国家金融基础数据库建设。加快我国金融信息服务业健康发展。提升金融服务百姓民生水平。综合运用区块链、5G、边缘计算等技术打造多层次、广覆盖的金融服务新模式，推动数字融资、数字函证等不断成熟完善，提高金融服务的触达能力。切实保障金融消费者在使用智能化金融产品和服务过程中的合法权益，着力解决老年人等群体面临的数字鸿沟等问题。加强涉农金融产品创新，加快城市地区优秀金融科技实践成果在乡村应用推广。扩大金融服务半径，提升服务效率，构建以安全为前提、以百姓为中心、以需求为导向的数字普惠金融服务体系，实现普惠金融健康可持续发展。增强金融有效支持实体经济能力。支持市场主体运用数字技术重构金融服务流程，在保障数据安全和个人隐私前提下，深化跨行业金融数据资源开发利用。完善全国中小企业融资综合信用服务基础设施，加强水、电、煤、气等企业信用信息归集共享，提高中小企业融资可获得性。建立健全交易报告制度与交易报告库，增强金融市场透明度。优化产业链供应链金融供给，将金融资源配臵到经济社会发展的关键领域和薄弱环节，实现各类企业特别是民营、小微企业金融服务的增量、扩面、提质、增效。加强与国际、区域金融市场、规则、标准的软联通，推动规则、规制、管理、标准等制度性开放。完善金融科技创新监管体系。加大监管基本规则拟订、监测分析和评估工作力度，探索金融科技创新管理机制，提升穿透式监管能力，防范发生系统性金融风险。强化金融科技监管，全面推广实施金融科技创新监管工具，加强金融科技创新活动的全生命周期管理，筑牢金融与科技风险的“防火墙”。推进金融科技。跨境金融服务的全球治理。

context: Promote the integration of technologies such as the Internet of Things and big data with modern medical management services, and carry out application demonstrations of the Internet of Things in drug circulation and use, patient care, electronic medical record management, remote diagnosis, remote medical education, remote surgical guidance, and electronic health records. Actively promote the medical model of community healthcare combined with tertiary hospitals. Utilize Internet of Things technology to achieve traceability of medical waste, rapid tracking and positioning of problematic drugs, and reduce regulatory costs. Establish a clinical data application center and carry out precise medical applications based on Internet of Things intelligent sensing and big data analysis. zh_context: 推动物联网、大数据等技术与现代医疗管理服务结合，开展物联网在药品流通和使用、病患看护、电子病历管理、远程诊断、远程医学教育、远程手术指导、电子健康档案等环节的应用示范。积极推广社区医疗+三甲医院的医疗模式。利用物联网技术，实现对医疗废物追溯，对问题药品快速跟踪和定位，降低监管成本。建立临床数据应用中心，开展基于物联网智能感知和大数据分析的精准医疗应用。开展智能可穿戴设备远程健康管理、老人看护等健康服务应用，推动健康大数据创新应用和服务发展。

context: Carry out key technology research on non-traditional manufacturing processes, reliability of major equipment, and the level of intelligence, develop a batch of representative intelligent processing equipment, advanced process equipment, and major intelligent complete sets of equipment, leading the intelligent upgrade of equipment.

context: Adhere to the integration of military and civilian, combine the distant and the near, establish and improve the independent development industrial system of aviation engines, enhance independent innovation capabilities, and reverse the passive situation of backwardness in aviation engines.

context: Supply of instrument and meter manufacturing, mainly including smart electric meters, smart water meters, smart gas meters, and smart heat meters.

context: Focus on promoting the development of heat treatment processes for the refinement and stabilization of steel grades for nuclear power pressure vessel forgings. Break through the bottleneck of industrialization of high-performance titanium welding tubes for nuclear power units. Accelerate the assessment and verification of silver alloy control rods, zirconium alloy tubes inside and outside the reactor, and achieve complete material support for nuclear power. Conduct research on materials, manufacturing processes, and long-life protective coating technologies for anti-thermal corrosion single crystal high-temperature alloy large hollow blades to meet the urgent needs of heavy-duty gas turbines. Develop high-capacity rare earth hydrogen storage materials for smart grids. Improve the automation level of heat transfer oil and molten salt high-temperature vacuum heat pipe production. Break through the preparation process of 5MW-level large wind turbine blades. In the field of intelligent power transmission and transformation equipment, break through the technology of large-size silicon carbide single crystals, substrates, epitaxial preparation, and module packaging materials. Carry out application design of high-voltage high-power insulated gate bipolar transistor (IGBT) modules, develop high-performance insulation ceramics, and ensure the construction of ultra-high voltage direct current grids.

zh_context: 重点推进核电压力容器大锻件系列钢种组织细化与稳定化热处理工艺开发，突破核电机组用高性能钛焊管产业化瓶颈，加快银合金控制棒、锆合金管堆外及堆内考核验证，实现核电用材成套保障。开展抗热腐蚀单晶高温合金大型空心叶片用材料、制造工艺及长寿命防护涂层技术研究，满足重型燃气轮机急需。开发智能电网用高容量稀土储氢材料。提升导热油及熔盐高温真空集热管自动化生产水平。突破5MW级大型风电叶片制备工艺。面向智能输变电装备领域，突破大尺寸碳化硅单晶及衬底、外延制备及模块封装材料技术，开展高压大功率绝缘栅双极型晶体管（IGBT）模块应用设计，发展高性能绝缘陶瓷，保障特高压直流电网建设。

context: Establish a secure and reliable basic software product system, support open source and open development models, and focus on promoting the research and development and application of basic software products such as cloud operating systems, cloud middleware, new database management systems, mobile and cloud office suites. Strengthen the synergy between technical products and terminal applications, improve the maturity of basic software, and accelerate integration, adaptation, and optimization. Promote the research and development and application of core technologies and products for industrial software and industrial control systems, with a focus on breakthroughs in core key technologies for industrial application software in key industries such as military, energy, and chemical industry, and build an advanced product system and establish evaluation standards and specifications. Breakthroughs in key technologies for industrial control systems such as high-end numerical control systems, field buses, communication protocols, high-precision high-speed control, and servo drives, and promote the research and development of high-end numerical control systems, servo systems, and control systems. Build a national industrial software security testing platform. Accelerate the layout of industrial big data software and platforms, promote the deep application of customized solutions in important industrial fields, and create an industrial cloud application service system. Column 5: Software Industry Enhancement and Development Engineering Operating System. Strengthen the research and development and industrialization of high-trust server operating systems, secure and user-friendly desktop operating systems, and trusted cloud operating systems, and develop secure and controllable operating system products. Targeting digital products and intelligent complete equipment requirements, develop high-security and high-trust real-time industrial operating systems, and achieve compatibility with mainstream control devices, CPUs, and bus protocols. Develop high-end equipment embedded systems. Industrial big data platform. Build an industrial big data platform that covers the entire product lifecycle and all manufacturing business activities, develop device-side embedded data management platforms and real-time data intelligent processing systems, and develop industrial data processing platforms for industrial data collection, storage, querying, analysis, mining, and application in the cloud. Industrial cloud and core software for manufacturing. Research and develop the Internet+ industrial cloud system architecture and standard system, and build knowledge, data, service, and other resource repositories. Build industry-oriented industrial cloud service platforms and provide data-driven enterprise management, business collaboration, energy management, and other services. Accelerate the development of core software for manufacturing such as product lifecycle management, enterprise resource planning, supply chain management, and customer relationship management, and improve the level of industrialization. Industrial application software. Targeting key areas such as aerospace equipment, high-end numerical control machine tools and robots, advanced rail transit equipment, offshore engineering equipment and high-tech ships, power equipment, and agricultural machinery equipment, develop industry application software and solutions that cover the entire lifecycle, with a focus on breakthroughs in key technologies such as product innovation and development, intelligent control and analysis optimization, and equipment intelligent services, and develop an industrial application software system.

zh_context: 建立安全可靠的基础软件产品体系，支持开源、开放的开发模式，重点推进云操作系统、云中间件、新型数据库管理系统、移动端和云端办公套件等基础软件产品的研发和应用。强化技术产品和终端应用协同互动，提升基础软件成熟度，加快集成适配优化。推动工业软件和工业控制系统核心技术和产品的研发及应用，重点突破军工、能源、化工等安全关键行业工业应用软件核心关键技术，构建先进产品体系，形成评测标准与规范；突破高档数控系统、现场总线、通信协议、高精度高速控制和伺服驱动等工业控制系统关键技术，推动中高端数控系统、伺服系统和控制系统研发。构建国家工业软件安全测试平台。加快工业大数据软件与平台布局，促进重要工业领域系统解决方案定制化深度应用，打造工业云应用服务体系。专栏5软件产业提升发展工程操作系统。加强高可信服务器操作系统、安全易用桌面操作系统、新型智能终端操作。系统、可信云操作系统的研发和产业化，开发安全可控的操作系统产品。面向数字化产品。与智能成套装备需求，研制高安全、高可信的实时工业操作系统，实现与主流控制设备、CPU与总线协议的适配。研制高端装备嵌入式系统。工业大数据平台。构建覆盖产品全生命周期和制造全业务活动的工业大数据平台，研制设备端嵌入式数据管理平台与实时数据智能处理系统，开发云端工业数据采集、存储、查询、分析、挖掘与应用的工业数据处理平台。工业云与制造业核心软件。研发“互联网+”工业云体系架构与标准体系，构建知识、数据、服务等资源库。构建面向行业的工业云服务平台，提供数据驱动的企业管理、业务协同、能源管控等服务。加快发展产品生命周期管理、企业资源规划、供应链管理和客户关系管理等制造业核心软件，提高产业化水平。工业应用软件。面向航空航天装备、高档数控机床与机器人、先进轨道交通装备、海工装备与高技术船舶、电力装备、农机装备等重点领域，研制涵盖全生命周期的行业应用软件及解决方案，重点突破产品创新开发、智能控制与分析优化、装备智能服务等关键技术，发展工业应用软件体系。

context: The equipment for prevention and control of air pollution mainly includes dust removal technology equipment, coal-fired flue gas desulfurization and denitrification technology and equipment, and other gas treatment equipment. Dust removal technology equipment includes dust electrostatic precipitation technology equipment, flue gas conditioning technology equipment, high-frequency high-voltage rectification equipment for electrostatic precipitators, photocatalytic components, fine particulate matter removal technology equipment, bundle-type dust removal technology equipment, high-temperature long-bag pulse bag dust removal equipment, mobile plate electrostatic dust removal equipment, wet electrostatic precipitators, low-temperature electrostatic precipitators, electric bag composite dust collectors, electric bag hybrid dust collectors (embedded electric bag composite dust collectors), ultra-clean emission technology equipment for power plants and industrial coal-fired furnaces and kilns, mobile pollution source pollutant reduction technology equipment, and dust suppression technology for heavily polluted dust sites and industries.

zh_context: 大气污染防治装备，主要包括除尘技术装备、燃煤烟气脱硫脱硝技术及装备、其他气体处理装备等。除尘技术装备，包括粉尘电凝并技术设备、烟气调质技术设备、电除尘高频高压整流设备、光触媒组件、细颗粒物去除技术设备、管束式除尘技术装备、高温长袋脉冲袋式除尘设备、移动极板静电除尘设备、湿式静电除尘器、低低温静电除尘器、电袋复合式除尘器、电袋混合式除尘器（嵌入式电袋复合式除尘器）、电厂及工业燃煤炉窑超净排放技术装备、移动污染源污染物减排技术设备、粉尘重污染场所和行业抑尘技术。

context: Focus on improving the performance and quality of core equipment and components for intelligent manufacturing, building an intelligent manufacturing system, strengthening basic support, actively carrying out demonstration applications, forming several internationally renowned brands, and promoting intelligent manufacturing equipment to a new level. Vigorously develop intelligent manufacturing systems. Accelerate the deep integration of new generation information technology and manufacturing technology, carry out top-level design of information-physical systems (CPS) that integrate computation, communication, and control, explore the construction of intelligent manufacturing systems that have the characteristics of self-perception, intelligent optimization, and precise control throughout the entire production process and product lifecycle, promote the construction of robot automation production lines, digital workshops, and intelligent factories with independent intellectual property rights, provide overall solutions for key industries, and promote the intelligent transformation of traditional manufacturing industries. Build testing and verification platforms, improve the intelligent manufacturing standard system. Promote key technologies and equipment for intelligent manufacturing to a new level. Build an industrial robot industry system, comprehensively break through key technologies and core components such as high-precision reducers, high-performance controllers, and precision measurement, and focus on the development of high-precision, high-reliability mid-to-high-end industrial robots. Accelerate the research and industrialization of high-end CNC machine tools and intelligent machining centers, break through major functional components such as multi-axis, multi-channel, high-precision CNC systems, and servo motors, and develop and promote high-end CNC machine tools, basic manufacturing equipment, and integrated manufacturing systems that are precise, high-speed, efficient, flexible, and have network communication capabilities. Breakthroughs in intelligent sensing and control equipment, intelligent detection and assembly equipment, intelligent logistics and warehousing equipment, and intelligent agricultural machinery equipment, carry out research and development and promote the application of the first set of equipment, and improve quality and reliability. Build an additive manufacturing industry chain. Breakthroughs in special materials for additive manufacturing such as titanium alloys, high-strength alloy steels, high-temperature alloys, and high-temperature and high-strength engineering plastics. Build an additive manufacturing process technology research and development platform to improve process technology level. Develop and promote mainstream additive manufacturing process equipment driven by lasers, electron beams, ion beams, and other energy sources. Accelerate the development of supporting core devices and embedded software systems such as high-power fiber lasers, scanning mirrors, dynamic focusing mirrors, and high-performance electron guns, enhance the ability of software and hardware collaborative innovation, and establish an additive manufacturing standard system. Promote the application of additive manufacturing technology in aerospace, medical equipment, transportation equipment, cultural creativity, personalized manufacturing, and other fields, and accelerate the development of the additive manufacturing service industry. Column 6 focuses on the application demonstration project of intelligent factories. In the discrete manufacturing fields such as machinery, aviation, aerospace, automobiles, ships, light industry, clothing, and electronic information, carry out integrated innovation and application demonstrations of intelligent workshops/factories, promote pilot applications such as digital design, equipment intelligence upgrading, process optimization, lean production, visual management, quality control and traceability, and intelligent logistics, and promote the intelligent integration of the entire business process. In the process manufacturing fields such as petrochemicals, steel, non-ferrous metals, building materials, textiles, food, and pharmaceuticals, carry out integrated innovation and application demonstrations of intelligent factories, and improve the intelligence level of enterprises in resource allocation, process optimization, process control, industrial chain management, quality control and traceability, energy saving and emission reduction, and safety production.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕67号）（国务院/2016年11月29日）++nan++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划++2016-11++促进高端装备与新材料产业突破发展，引领中国制造新跨越,打造智能制造高端品牌
zh_context: 着力提高智能制造核心装备与部件的性能和质量，打造智能制造体系，强化基础支撑，积极开展示范应用，形成若干国际知名品牌，推动智能制造装备迈上新台阶。大力发展智能制造系统。加快推动新一代信息技术与制造技术的深度融合，开展集计算、通信与控制于一体的信息物理系统（CPS）顶层设计，探索构建贯穿生产制造全过程和产品全生命周期，具有信息深度自感知、智慧优化自决策、精准控制自执行等特征的智能制造系统，推动具有自主知识产权的机器人自动化生产线、数字化车间、智能工厂建设，提供重点行业整体解决方案，推进传统制造业智能化改造。建设测试验证平台，完善智能制造标准体系。推动智能制造关键技术装备迈上新台阶。构建工业机器人产业体系，全面突破高精度减速器、高性能控制器、精密测量等关键技术与核心零部件，重点发展高精度、高可靠性中高端工业机器人。加快高档数控机床与智能加工中心研发与产业化，突破多轴、多通道、高精度高档数控系统、伺服电机等主要功能部件及关键应用软件，开发和推广应用精密、高速、高效、柔性并具有网络通信等功能的高档数控机床、基础制造装备及集成制造系统。突破智能传感与控制装备、智能检测与装配装备、智能物流与仓储装备、智能农业机械装备，开展首台套装备研究开发和推广应用，提高质量与可靠性。打造增材制造产业链。突破钛合金、高强合金钢、高温合金、耐高温高强度工程塑料等增材制造专用材料。搭建增材制造工艺技术研发平台，提升工艺技术水平。研制推广使用激光、电子束、离子束及其他能源驱动的主流增材制造工艺装备。加快研制高功率光纤激光器、扫描振镜、动态聚焦镜及高性能电子枪等配套核心器件和嵌入式软件系统，提升软硬件协同创新能力，建立增材制造标准体系。在航空航天、医疗器械、交通设备、文化创意、个性化制造等领域大力推动增材制造技术应用，加快发展增材制造服务业。专栏6重点领域智能工厂应用示范工程。在机械、航空、航天、汽车、船舶、轻工、服装、电子信息等离散制造领域，开展智能车间/工厂的集成创新与应用示范，推进数字化设计、装备智能化升级、工艺流程优化、精益生产、可视化管理、质量控制与溯源、智能物流等试点应用，推动全业务流程智能化整合。在石化化工、钢铁、有色金属、建材、纺织、食品、医药等流程制造领域，开展智能工厂的集成创新与应用示范，提升企业在资源配置、工艺优化、过程控制、产业链管理、质量控制与溯源、节能减排及安全生产等方面的智能化水平。

context: Wind power generation and related equipment and materials manufacturing mainly include the manufacturing of coatings, synthetic rubber, cement, glass fiber reinforced plastic products, specialized metallurgical equipment, metal shipbuilding, marine engineering equipment, underwater salvage equipment, power electronic components, wire and cable manufacturing, navigation, surveying, meteorological and marine specialized instrument manufacturing, electronic measuring instrument manufacturing, etc. Coating manufacturing mainly includes heavy-duty anti-corrosion coatings. Synthetic rubber manufacturing mainly includes offshore construction anti-corrosion rubber materials. Cement manufacturing mainly includes high-strength grouting materials for maritime construction. Glass fiber reinforced plastic product manufacturing mainly includes offshore construction anti-corrosion fiberglass materials. Specialized metallurgical equipment manufacturing mainly includes large-scale flange forging equipment.

context: Biobased materials mainly include bioplastics, biofibers, biorubbers, and other high molecular weight materials derived from biomass, as well as biobased material polymerization technologies. Bioplastics, biofibers, biorubbers, and other high molecular weight materials derived from biomass include polylactic acid (PLA), polyhydroxyalkanoates (PHA), polytrimethylene terephthalate (PTT), polybutylene succinate (PBS), polyamino acids, polytetrahydrofuran, polyorganic acid composites and products, polyol fibers, starch-based plastics, biobased polyesters, biobased polyurethanes, biomass fibers, new carbon adsorbents, chitosan fibers, seaweed fibers, pectin materials, protein fibers, non-staple food modified starch-based biodegradable materials, microbial polysaccharide materials, and biobased material additives. Biobased material polymerization technologies include high-density, high-viscosity microbial fermentation process technologies, water phase separation technologies for biopolymers, efficient separation and extraction technologies for biopolymers, biocomposite materials and their shaping, processing, and modification technologies, biomass fiber delignification technologies, and clean production technologies for biobased materials.

context: In terms of solar-grade silicon materials, the focus is on researching the industrialization technology of high-efficiency and energy-saving polycrystalline silicon materials. context: Support key little giant enterprises to promote the following work: First, increase innovation investment, accelerate the industrial application of technological achievements, promote the filling of short boards and strengthening of long boards in the ten major industrial sectors with clear strategies for the development of the four bases or manufacturing power. Among them, point-to-point services should be provided for key little giant enterprises.

zh_context: 支持重点“小巨人”企业推进以下工作：一是加大创新投入，加快技术成果产业化应用，推进工业“四基”领域或制造强国战略明确的十大重点产业领域“补短板”和“锻长板”；二是与行业龙头企业协同创新、产业链上下游协作配套，支撑产业链补链延链固链、提升产业链供应链稳定性和竞争力；三是促进数字化网络化智能化改造，业务系统向云端迁移，并通过工业设计促进提品质和创品牌。另外，支持企业加快上市步伐，加强国际合作等，进一步增强发展潜力和国际竞争能力。支持公共服务示范平台为国家级专精特新“小巨人”企业提供技术创新、上市辅导、创新成果转化与应用、数字化智能化改造、知识产权应用、上云用云及工业设计等服务。其中，对于重点“小巨人”企业，应提供“点对点”服务。

context: Key development of antibody drugs targeting tumors, immune system diseases, cardiovascular diseases, and infectious diseases, such as PCSK9 inhibitors for treating hypercholesterolemia, PD-1/PD-L1 immunotherapy drugs for tumors, and RANKL for treating osteoporosis, which have outstanding clinical value. Accelerate the research and development of novel antibodies such as antibody-drug conjugates, bispecific antibodies, and antibody fusion proteins. Support the development and application of large amphibious aircraft, new energy aircraft, light business jets, civil helicopters, multi-purpose fixed-wing aircraft, professional-grade drones, as well as supporting engines, onboard systems, etc. Promote the application of new technologies such as Beidou navigation and broadcast automatic surveillance, research and develop core equipment suitable for China's low-altitude airspace communication, navigation, surveillance, meteorology, and air traffic service needs, carry out major airworthiness certification laboratory construction, and improve the industry's operation, service, safety management, and technical level.

zh_context: 构建国家通用航空业研发创新体系，鼓励建立通用航空业创新平台，提高关键技术和部件的自主研发生产能力，加快提升国产化水平，发展具有自主知识产权、质优价廉的通用航空产品。支持大型水陆两栖飞机、新能源飞机、轻型公务机、民用直升机、多用途固定翼飞机、专业级无人机以及配套发动机、机载系统等研制应用。推广应用北斗导航、广播式自动监视等新技术，研发适用我国低空空域通信、导航、监视、气象与空中交通服务需求的核心装备，开展重大适航审定实验室等建设，提升行业运行、服务、安全的管理和技术水平。
