context: Seize the opportunities of the construction of the new generation communication network and the rapid development of the mobile internet. Increase the research and development efforts of TD-SCDMA terminals, promote the research and industrialization of long-term evolution technology and enhanced long-term evolution technology (LTE/LTE-Advanced). Study the key technologies of wireless and network organization, network evolution, and multi-technology coordination in the application process of LTE/LTE-Advanced, promote the research and development of key technologies and products such as new green base stations, wireless network organization, and wireless network energy-saving and emission reduction, and promote the application demonstration of TD-SCDMA/LTE/LTE-Advanced in key areas such as digital cities and rural informatization. Accelerate the research and development and industrialization process of mobile internet-related technology products and business applications, focus on supporting key technologies and products such as new mobile internet terminals, terminal core chips, operating systems, middleware, as well as IP bearer networks, access perception and control, mobile internet platforms and resource key technology research and industrialization. Support multi-mode, multi-frequency terminal chips and efficient, low-cost terminals, IPv6/v4 dual-stack network equipment and terminals, network testing special instruments, antennas, and other key supporting industrial systems. Promote the development of intelligent optical networks and high-capacity, high-speed, long-distance optical transmission, fiber-to-the-x (FTTx) and other technologies and products. Focus on supporting N×100Gbit/s wavelength division multiplexing (WDM) high-speed optical transmission equipment, N×Tbit/s cross-capacity optical transport network/packet transport network (OTN/PTN) large-capacity network scheduling optical transmission equipment, support the research and development and industrialization of intelligent control plane optical switching equipment, optical transmission equipment; support the research and development and industrialization of 10G passive optical network (PON) line-side equipment and optical network units, PON interoperability testing systems; support high-end modules such as high-speed coherent optical receivers, high-power low-noise optical amplifiers, wavelength-selective optical switches, high-speed laser chips, optoelectronic integrated components, optoelectronic integrated chips, high-speed analog-to-digital chips, etc. Promote the development of broadband wireless access, multimedia digital cluster, and digital intercom technology and industry. Support the research and development and industrialization of low-cost broadband access for wide-area coverage, ultra-high-speed wireless local area network, digital cluster communication and digital intercom technology and products for dedicated network applications, and accelerate the maturity and wider application of wireless local area network authentication and confidentiality infrastructure (WAPI) technology. Promote the application demonstration in key areas and industries such as government affairs, public safety, energy, logistics, transportation, and modern agriculture, enhance the capabilities of relevant technology products in resource dynamic allocation, management and scheduling, coordinated interference reduction, load balancing, adaptive and self-organizing networks, network security, and information confidentiality, and build a complete industrial chain of dedicated communication systems for industry sectors. Actively promote the research and development, industrialization, and application promotion of products based on the Beidou satellite communication navigation system.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划（工信部/2012年2月24日）（工信部/2012年2月24日）++nan++其他政策++2012-2++主要任务与发展重点,发展重点,通信设备
zh_context: 紧抓新一代通信网络建设和移动互联网快速发展机遇，加大TD-SCDMA终端研发力度，推进长期演进技术及增强型长期演进技术（LTE/LTE-Advanced）研发和产业化。研究LTE/LTE-Advanced在应用过程中无线及网络组织的关键技术、网络演进、多技术协调等技术解决方案，推动新型绿色基站、无线网络组网、无线网络节能减排等关键技术与产品研发，推进TD-SCDMA/LTE/LTE-Advanced在数字城市、农村信息化等重点领域的应用示范。加速推动移动互联网相关技术产品和业务应用的研发与产业化进程，重点支持新型移动互联网终端、终端核心芯片、操作系统和中间件等关键技术和产品，以及IP承载网、接入感知与控制、移动互联网平台与资源关键技术研发与产业化。支持多模、多频终端芯片及高效能、低成本终端，IPv6/v4双栈网络设备和终端、网络测试专用仪器、天线等关键配套产业体系。推进智能光网络和大容量、高速率、长距离光传输、光纤接入（FTTx）等技术和产品的发展。重点支持N×100G比特/秒波分多路复用（WDM）高速光传输设备，N×T比特/秒交叉容量的光传送网/分组传送网（OTN/PTN）大容量组网调度光传输设备，支持智能控制平面的光交换设备、光传输设备的研发与产业化；支持10G无源光网络（PON）局侧设备和光网络单元、PON互通性测试系统的研发与产业化；支持高速相干光接收、超大功率低噪声光放大、波长选择性光交换等高端模块，高速激光芯片、光多片集成组件、光电集成芯片、高速数模芯片等高端芯片的研发。推进宽带无线接入、多媒体数字集群及数字对讲技术和产业的发展。支持广域覆盖低成本宽带接入、超高速无线局域、面向专网应用的数字集群通信和数字对讲技术和产品的研发及产业化，加快推动无线局域网鉴别和保密基础结构（WAPI）技术的产业链成熟和更广泛应用。推广在政府事务、公共安全、能源、物流、交通运输、现代农业等重点领域和行业的应用示范，提升相关技术产品在资源动态分配、管理和调度，协同干扰降噪，负载均衡，自适应和自组网，网络安全和信息保密等方面的能力，建设面向行业领域的专用通信系统完整产业链。积极推进基于北斗卫星通信导航系统的相关产品研发及产业化和推广应用。

context: Vigorously promote the merger and reorganization of domestic packaging and testing enterprises to improve industry concentration. zh_context: 大力推动国内封装测试企业兼并重组，提高产业集中度。适应集成电路设计与制造工艺节点的演进升级需求，开展芯片级封装（CSP）、圆片级封装（WLP）、硅通孔（TSV）、三维封装等先进封装和测试技术的开发及产业化。

context: Improve the management system for network and information security. Accelerate the formulation of departmental regulations and normative documents in the areas of protecting critical information infrastructure, data security, and industrial internet security. Enhance the network and information security standard system and promote the establishment of security standards in emerging fields such as 5G, Internet of Things, cloud computing, big data, and intelligent manufacturing. Strengthen the promotion of secure and reliable electronic signature applications and push for the legal recognition of electronic signatures. Establish and improve the management system for identity service providers. Clarify the responsibility for protecting critical information infrastructure and improve the supervision mechanism for the design, construction, and operation of information systems related to national security. Further strengthen the network security supervision of important network infrastructure and business systems owned or operated by internet companies. Establish a cross-industry and cross-department emergency coordination mechanism to enhance the ability to predict, monitor, and respond to network and information security incidents. Strengthen the sharing of security threat information between the government and enterprises. Accelerate the implementation of the network security review system. Enhance network data protection in the context of big data. Explore the establishment of a network data protection system in the era of big data, promote the hierarchical classification regulation of network data, strengthen the protection of network data throughout its lifecycle, and formulate policies for network data protection management. Urge companies to continuously improve the system for publicly announcing user information leaks and establish a sound big data security credit system. Accelerate the research, development, and application of specialized technologies such as data encryption, leakage prevention, and information confidentiality, and promote the establishment of a secure and trustworthy big data technology system. Promote the development of information security technology and industry. Focus on breakthroughs in key basic software and hardware and core information security technologies, enhance capabilities in vulnerability discovery and patching, attack monitoring and tracing, and strengthen security risk response in new technologies and formats such as Internet Plus, 5G, and SDN. Implement special national information security projects, carry out pilot demonstrations for the protection of critical information infrastructure and key information system network security. Promote the research, development, and industrial application of information security products and services. Give full play to the guiding role of the government, accelerate the cultivation of backbone enterprises, develop enterprises with distinctive advantages, and create a well-structured, clear, and competitive industrial pattern. Enhance industrial information security assurance capabilities. Establish and improve industrial information security policies and standards, develop security management policies, as well as management guidelines, evaluation capability requirements, and other security standards for key industries. Establish an industrial information security management system, improve inspection and evaluation, and information sharing mechanisms for industrial information security, promote security inspections, vulnerability disclosures, information notifications, and create a secure industrial internet environment. Build industrial information security simulation, testing, and verification platforms, conduct technical research and development on testing and evaluation, security verification, and promote pilot applications of new security technologies and products, enhance industrial information security technology assurance capabilities. Column 2: Enhancing security assurance capabilities. Information security technology products. Carry out research on chip security reinforcement technology and promote the standardization and industrialization of cryptographic technology in China. Strengthen research and development and application of information security technologies for the integration of the three networks, Internet of Things, mobile internet, industrial internet, cloud computing, and next-generation information networks. Strengthen the development of secure chips, secure core information devices, secure operating systems, secure databases, and secure middleware. Develop products using new technologies such as content awareness, intelligent sandboxing, anomaly detection, and virtualization, support innovation and application of network and boundary security products such as firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention, accelerate the prevention of advanced persistent threats (APTs) and product development, strengthen the research and development and application of security management platform products based on massive data and intelligent analysis. Strengthen the research and development and application of information security support tools such as information security evaluation, web vulnerability scanning, and software source code security checks. Information security assurance. Build a network security threat monitoring and disposal platform based on the backbone network, develop capabilities in network security threat monitoring, situational awareness, emergency response, and traceability. Implement domain name system security protection projects, enhance the access bandwidth and security protection capabilities of the national top-level domain name system, strengthen the security protection and data backup capabilities of public recursive domain name resolution systems. Construct an internet network security emergency management platform, improve the analysis, judgment, and industry-specific emergency command and dispatch capabilities for internet network security threat information and monitoring data. Build a service platform for testing, evaluation, vulnerability disclosure, and information notification of industrial control system information security, and improve the information security assurance system.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++主要任务,强化信息产业安全保障能力
zh_context: 完善网络与信息安全管理制度。加紧制定实施关键信息基础设施保护、数据安全、工业互联网安全等领域的部门规章和规范性文件。健全网络与信息安全标准体系，推动出台5G、物联网、云计算、大数据、智能制造等新兴领域安全标准。加强安全可靠电子签名应用推广，推动电子签名法律效力认定。建立健全身份服务提供商管理制度。明确关键信息基础设施安全保护责任，完善涉及国家安全重要信息系统的设计、建设和运行监督机制，进一步加强对互联网企业所有或运营的重要网络基础设施和业务系统的网络安全监管。健全跨行业、跨部门的应急协调机制，切实提升网络与信息安全事件的预警通报、监测发现和快速处置能力。加强政府和企业之间的安全威胁信息共享。加快推动实施网络安全审查制度。加强大数据场景下的网络数据保护。探索建立大数据时代的网络数据保护体系，推动对网络数据的分级分类监管，强化网络数据全生命周期保护，制定网络数据保护管理政策。督促企业不断完善用户信息泄露社会公告制度，建立健全大数据安全信用体系。加快推动数据加密、防泄露、信息保密等专用技术的研发与应用，推动建立安全可信的大数据技术体系。推动信息安全技术和产业发展。着力突破关键基础软硬件和信息安全核心技术，增强漏洞挖掘修补、攻击监测溯源等能力，强化“互联网+”、5G、SDN等新技术、新业态的安全风险应对。实施国家信息安全专项，开展关键信息基础设施运行安全保护和要害信息系统网络安全试点示范。推动信息安全产品和服务的研发和产业化应用。充分发挥政府引导作用，加快培育骨干企业，发展特色优势企业，打造结构完整、层次清晰、竞争有力的产业格局。提升工业信息安全保障能力。建立健全工业信息安全政策和标准体系，针对重点行业制定安全管理政策以及管理指南、测评能力要求等安全标准。建立工业信息安全管理体系，完善工业信息安全检查评测和信息共享机制，推动开展安全检查、漏洞发布、信息通报等工作，营造安全的工业互联网环境。建设工业信息安全仿真、测试和验证平台，开展测试评估、安全验证等技术研发，推动安全新技术、新产品试点应用，提升工业信息安全技术保障能力。专栏2安全保障能力提升工程。信息安全技术产品。开展芯片安全加固技术攻关，推动我国密码技术的规范化和产业化。加强面向三网融合、物联网、移动互联网、工业互联网、云计算和新一代信息网络的信息安全技术研发应用。加强安全芯片、安全核心信息设备、安全操作系统、安全数据库、安全中间件的研发。研发采用内容感知、智能沙箱、异常检测、虚拟化等新技术的产品，支持防火墙、入侵检测/防御等网络与边界安全类产品的创新和应用，加快高级持续性威胁（APT）防范和产品研发，加强基于海量数据和智能分析的安全管理平台产品的研发和应用。加强信息安全测评、WEB漏洞扫描、软件源代码安全检查等信息安全支撑工具的研发和应用。信息安全保障。建设基于骨干网的网络安全威胁监测处置平台，形成网络安全威胁监测、态势感知、应急处置、追踪溯源等能力。实施域名系统安全保障工程，提升国家顶级域名系统的接入带宽和安全防护能力，加强公共递归域名解析系统的安全防护和数据备份能力。建设互联网网络安全应急管理平台，提高对互联网网络安全威胁信息和监测数据的分析、研判和行业内应急指挥调度能力。构建工业控制系统信息安全测试、评估、漏洞发布、信息通报等服务平台，完善信息安全保障体系。

context: Promote the flattening of the energy system through the Internet, advance the revolution of energy production and consumption patterns, improve energy efficiency, and promote energy conservation and emission reduction. Strengthen the construction of distributed energy networks, increase the proportion of renewable energy, and promote the optimization of energy utilization structure. Accelerate the intelligent transformation of power generation facilities, power consumption facilities, and power grids, and improve the safety, stability, and reliability of the power system. (Responsibilities include the Energy Bureau, Development and Reform Commission, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, etc.).

context: To meet the needs of intelligent agricultural production and refined management of agricultural product circulation, extensive demonstrations of agricultural Internet of Things applications are being carried out. This includes implementing demonstration projects for facility agriculture and precision cultivation of field crops based on Internet of Things technology, intelligent horticultural planting, efficient livestock and poultry farming, quality and safety traceability of agricultural by-products, regulation of grain and economic crop storage and transportation, and agricultural input services. These applications aim to promote the development of modern agricultural management methods and organizational forms, and enhance the level of agricultural modernization in China.

zh_context: 面向农业生产智能化和农产品流通管理精细化需求，广泛开展农业物联网应用示范。实施基于物联网技术的设施农业和大田作物耕种精准化、园艺种植智能化、畜禽养殖高效化、农副产品质量安全追溯、粮食与经济作物储运监管、农资服务等应用示范工程，促进形成现代农业经营方式和组织形态，提升我国农业现代化水平。

context: Carry out basic theoretical research on the architecture of the Internet of Things system, information physical system perception and control, etc., overcome key technologies such as intelligent hardware (hardware embedded intelligence), low-power and trustworthy ubiquitous access of the Internet of Things, build a common technology innovation foundation support platform for the Internet of Things, and achieve productization of intelligent sensing chips, software, and terminals.

context: Encourage the development of enterprises that comprehensively utilize renewable resources. context: To meet the needs of digitalization, networking, and intelligent transformation in the manufacturing industry, we aim to cultivate system solution providers who can offer services such as planning and design, development and implementation, integrated application, diagnostic consultation, and operation and maintenance. We focus on the application of new technologies, optimization of specific scenarios, and overall improvement of enterprises, and cultivate system solution providers with technical expertise, specialization, and comprehensiveness. We encourage the establishment of solution resource pools at the local level, and accelerate the application and promotion of high-quality solutions through service vouchers and other means, in order to lower the threshold for digital transformation of enterprises.

zh_context: 面向制造业数字化、网络化、智能化转型需求，培育系统解决方案提供商，提供规划设计、开发实施、集成应用、诊断咨询、运行维护等服务。聚焦新技术应用、特定场景优化、企业整体提升等需求，培育技术型、专业型、综合型等系统解决方案提供商。鼓励地方建设解决方案资源池，通过服务券等方式加速优质解决方案的应用推广，降低企业数字化转型门槛。

context: Comprehensive utilization of mineral resources mainly includes onshore oil extraction, onshore natural gas extraction, iron ore selection, magnesite selection, rare earth metal ore selection, other rare metal ore selection, clay and other sand and stone extraction, chemical mineral extraction, other mining industries, and other electricity production. Onshore oil extraction mainly includes comprehensive utilization of oil shale extraction, comprehensive utilization of oil sand extraction, comprehensive utilization of associated natural gas, development and utilization of coal-based oil shale resources, and comprehensive utilization of oil sand. Onshore natural gas extraction mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of coalbed methane, application of microbial coalbed methane extraction technology, and comprehensive utilization of shale gas. Iron ore selection mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of medium and low-grade iron ore and associated minerals. Magnesite selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of magnesite tailings. Rare earth metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of rare earth metal ore tailings. Other rare metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of other rare metal ore tailings. Clay and other sand and stone extraction mainly includes re-development and utilization of sand and stone mine tailings, comprehensive utilization and deep processing of associated non-metallic mineral resources such as kaolin and alumina, and development and utilization of resources such as kaolin. Chemical mineral extraction mainly includes re-development and utilization of chemical mineral tailings.

zh_context: 矿产资源综合利用，主要包括陆地石油开采、陆地天然气开采、铁矿采选、镁矿采选、稀土金属矿采选、其他稀有金属矿采选、粘土及其他土砂石开采、化学矿开采、其他采矿业、其他电力生产等。陆地石油开采，主要包括油母页岩开采综合利用、油砂开采综合利用、伴生天然气综合利用、煤系油母页岩资源开发利用、油砂综合利用。陆地天然气开采，主要包括煤层气综合开发利用、微生物开采煤层气技术应用、页岩气综合利用。铁矿采选，主要包括中低品位铁矿、伴生矿综合开发利用。镁矿采选，主要包括镁伴矿尾矿再开发利用。稀土金属矿采选，主要包括稀土金属矿尾矿再开发利用。其他稀有金属矿采选，主要包括其他稀有金属矿尾矿再开发利用。粘土及其他土砂石开采，主要包括土砂石矿尾矿再开发利用、高岭土、铝矶土等共伴生非金属矿产资源的综合利用和深加工、高岭土等资源开发利用。化学矿开采，主要包括化学矿尾矿再开发利用。

zh_context: 基于5G网络高速率、低时延特性和边缘计算等技术，实现设备运行数据实时获取、实时分析、实时判别，支撑智能巡检、远程消缺、AR辅助检修及远程专家支持等作业。

context: Support the direct connection of energy storage systems to the power grid. Research the technical requirements for the capacity range, voltage level, grid compatibility, operation control, network protection, information exchange, and security of energy storage system integration into the grid. Encourage power grid companies and other enterprises to integrate energy storage systems into the grid, whether centralized or distributed, in accordance with relevant national or industry standards, and conduct research and application demonstrations of operation optimization technologies. Support various entities to invest, construct, and operate energy storage systems that connect to the grid based on market principles. Encourage the use of retired or decommissioned power plant infrastructure to build energy storage systems. Establish and improve mechanisms for energy storage participation in ancillary service markets. Referencing relevant policies and mechanisms for thermal power plants providing ancillary services, allow energy storage systems to participate in ancillary service transactions either in conjunction with generating units or as independent entities. Gradually optimize the electricity market development and form a market mechanism based on voluntary transactions, where payment is based on performance and those who benefit pay. Explore the establishment of rules and mechanisms for energy storage capacity charges and participation in capacity markets. In conjunction with power system reforms, refer to policies related to pumped storage and explore the establishment of rules for energy storage capacity charges and participation in capacity markets, providing capacity compensation for large-scale energy storage systems that meet the requirements.
extended_context: 新能源++先进核电++关于促进储能技术与产业发展的指导意见（发改能源〔2017〕1701号）（国家发展改革委、财政部、科学技术部、工业和信息化部、国家能源局/2017年9月22日）++nan++其他政策++2017-9++重点任务,推进储能提升电力系统灵活性稳定性应用示范
zh_context: 支持储能系统直接接入电网。研究储能接入电网的容量范围、电压等级、并网适应性、运行控制、涉网保护、信息交互及安全防护等技术要求。鼓励电网等企业根据相关国家或行业标准要求结合需求集中或分布式接入储能系统，并开展运行优化技术研究和应用示范。支持各类主体按照市场化原则投资建设运营接入电网的储能系统。鼓励利用淘汰或退役发电厂既有线路和设施建设储能系统。建立健全储能参与辅助服务市场机制。参照火电厂提供辅助服务等相关政策和机制，允许储能系统与机组联合或作为独立主体参与辅助服务交易。根据电力市场发展逐步优化，在遵循自愿的交易原则基础上，形成“按效果付费、谁受益谁付费”的市场机制。探索建立储能容量电费和储能参与容量市场的规则机制。结合电力体制改革，。参考抽水蓄能相关政策，探索建立储能容量电费和储能参与容量市场的规则，对。满足条件的各类大规模储能系统给予容量补偿。

context: Manufacturing of radar and supporting equipment, mainly including high-frequency ground wave radar and S/C/X band wave measurement radar.

context: The text translates to English as follows:Biological veterinary drugs, animal biological products, and vaccines mainly include key products and technical services. Key products and technical services include gene engineering bacteria optimization and downstream purification technology, new vaccines for major animal diseases such as avian influenza, foot-and-mouth disease, porcine blue ear disease, as well as zoonotic diseases such as rabies and brucellosis. These gene engineering vaccines include subunit vaccines, marker vaccines, gene-deleted vaccines, live vector vaccines, and transgenic plant vaccines. Other vaccines include mucosal immune vaccines, novel adjuvant vaccines, dry powder vaccines, and multivalent vaccines. There are also new biological veterinary drugs, traditional Chinese veterinary medicine, and related medical equipment for common and prevalent animal diseases. Additionally, there are technologies for monitoring and early warning of marine aquaculture diseases, as well as vaccines for the prevention of major aquatic animal diseases. Molecular diagnostics and test kits for major animal diseases and prevalent animal diseases are also included.

zh_context: 加快人工智能关键技术转化应用，促进技术集成与商业模式创新，推动重点领域智能产品创新，积极培育人工智能新兴业态，布局产业链高端，打造具有国际竞争力的人工智能产业集群。智能软硬件。开发面向人工智能的操作系统、数据库、中间件、开发工具等关键基础软件，突破图形处理器等核心硬件，研究图像识别、语音识别、机器翻译、智能交互、知识处理、控制决策等智能系统解决方案，培育壮大面向人工智能应用的基础软硬件产业。智能机器人。攻克智能机器人核心零部件、专用传感器，完善智能机器人硬件接口标准、软件接口协议标准以及安全使用标准。研制智能工业机器人、智能服务机器人，实现大规模应用并进入国际市场。研制和推广空间机器人、海洋机器人、极地机器人等特种智能机器人。建立智能机器人标准体系和安全规则。智能运载工具。发展自动驾驶汽车和轨道交通系统，加强车载感知、自动驾驶、车联网、物联网等技术集成和配套，开发交通智能感知系统，形成我国自主的自动驾驶平台技术体系和产品总成能力，探索自动驾驶汽车共享模式。发展消费类和商用类无人机、无人船，建立试验鉴定、测试、竞技等专业化服务体系，完善空域、水域管理措施。虚拟现实与增强现实。突破高性能软件建模、内容拍摄生成、增强现实与人机交互、集成环境与工具等关键技术，研制虚拟显示器件、光学器件、高性能真三维显示器、开发引擎等产品，建立虚拟现实与增强现实的技术、产品、服务标准和评价体系，推动重点行业融合应用。智能终端。加快智能终端核心技术和产品研发，发展新一代智能手机、车载智能终端等移动智能终端产品和设备，鼓励开发智能手表、智能耳机、智能眼镜等可穿戴终端产品，拓展产品形态和应用服务。物联网基础器件。发展支撑新一代物联网的高灵敏度、高可靠性智能传感器件和芯片，攻克射频识别、近距离机器通信等物联网核心技术和低功耗处理器等关键器件。

zh_context: 到2020年，二级以上医院普遍提供分时段预约诊疗、智能导医分诊、候诊提醒、检验检查结果查询、诊间结算、移动支付等线上服务。有条件的医疗卫生机构可以开展移动护理、生命体征在线监测、智能医学影像识别、家庭监测等服务。（国家卫生健康委员会、国家中医药局负责）。

context: The comprehensive utilization of mineral resources mainly includes onshore oil extraction, onshore natural gas extraction, iron ore selection, magnesite selection, rare earth metal ore selection, other rare metal ore selection, clay and other sand and stone extraction, chemical mineral extraction, other mining industries, and other electricity production. Onshore oil extraction mainly includes the comprehensive utilization of oil shale, comprehensive utilization of oil sands, comprehensive utilization of associated natural gas, development and utilization of coal-based oil shale resources, and comprehensive utilization of oil sands. Onshore natural gas extraction mainly includes the comprehensive development and utilization of coalbed methane, application of microbial coalbed methane extraction technology, and comprehensive utilization of shale gas. Iron ore selection mainly includes the comprehensive development and utilization of medium and low-grade iron ore and associated minerals.

zh_context: 矿产资源综合利用，主要包括陆地石油开采、陆地天然气开采、铁矿采选、镁矿采选、稀土金属矿采选、其他稀有金属矿采选、粘土及其他土砂石开采、化学矿开采、其他采矿业、其他电力生产等。陆地石油开采，主要包括油母页岩开采综合利用、油砂开采综合利用、伴生天然气综合利用、煤系油母页岩资源开发利用、油砂综合利用。陆地天然气开采，主要包括煤层气综合开发利用、微生物开采煤层气技术应用、页岩气综合利用。铁矿采选，主要包括中低品位铁矿、伴生矿综合开发利用。

context: Internet data services mainly include big data resource services (using technologies such as distributed parallel computing and artificial intelligence to compute, analyze, and mine massive heterogeneous data to generate new forms and models in various fields such as data mining, data chemistry, data materials, and data pharmaceuticals), database and cloud database services, cloud computing services, cloud storage services, software as a service (SaaS), platform as a service (PaaS), infrastructure as a service (IaaS), mobile computing software platforms, mobile service operation support and development platforms, blockchain technology-related software and services, and cloud platform systems (referring to integrated platform systems used to support cloud services).
zh_context: 互联网数据服务，主要包括大数据资源服务（利用分布式并行计算人工智能等技术对海量异构数据进行计算分析和挖掘产生活中。包括数据探矿数据化学数据材料数据制药等新业态新模式）、数据库和云数据库服务、云计算服务、云存储服务、软件即服务（SaaS）、平台即服务（PaaS）、设施即服务（IaaS）、移动计算软件平台、移动服务运营支撑与开发平台、区块链技术相关软件和服务、云平台系统（指用于支撑云服务的施集成的平台系统等）。

context: The deep-level interaction and collaboration of the industrial chain from research and development to application, expanding the scope of information services, and improving the level and quality of information services. Strengthen the planning and layout of infrastructure such as communication networks and data centers, and enhance the support capabilities of the Internet in information gathering, analysis, and processing. Give full play to the leading role and dominant position of Internet companies, use technological innovation as a breakthrough, and promote the research and industrialization of core technologies in areas such as mobile Internet, 5G, cloud computing, big data, the Internet of Things, virtual reality, artificial intelligence, 3D printing, and quantum communication. Actively promote industrial collaboration, fully tap into the potential of the Internet in supporting intelligent manufacturing, promoting industrial upgrading, and serving society, and gradually realize the independent development, innovative development, and balanced development of the Internet industry. Cultivate industrial clusters with enterprises as the main body and prominent industry characteristics, and strengthen a group of enterprises with international influence and industrial leadership. Further improve the management level of the Internet, continuously optimize the market competition structure, regulate the competition order, and actively create an innovative, standardized, efficient, and well-guaranteed market development environment.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++指导思想、基本原则和发展目标,创新服务应用,发展现代互联网产业体系构建基于互联网能力开放的研发、应用聚合中心，整合上下游产业要素，推
zh_context: 动从研发到应用的产业链深层次互动和协作，拓展信息服务范围，提升信息服务。层次和水平。加强通信网络、数据中心等基础设施规划与布局，提升互联网在信息汇聚、信息分析和处理等方面的支撑能力。发挥互联网企业创新主体地位和主导作用，以技术创新为突破，带动移动互联网、5G、云计算、大数据、物联网、虚拟现实、人工智能、3D打印、量子通信等领域核心技术的研发和产业化。积极推动产业协作，充分挖掘互联网在支撑智能制造、推动产业升级、服务社会民生等方面的潜力，推动互联网产业逐步实现自主发展、创新发展和均衡发展。培育以企业为主体、行业特色突出的产业集群，壮大一批具有国际影响力和产业引领能力的企业。进一步提升互联网管理水平，持续优化市场竞争结构，规范竞争秩序，积极营造创新活跃、规范高效、保障有力的市场发展环境。

context: Intelligent key basic components manufacturing mainly includes hydraulic power machinery and component manufacturing, hydrodynamic power machinery and component manufacturing, pneumatic power machinery and component manufacturing, rolling bearing manufacturing, gear and gear reducer manufacturing, gearbox manufacturing, mechanical parts processing, other general parts manufacturing, other unspecified general equipment manufacturing, micro special motor and component manufacturing, transformer, rectifier and inductor manufacturing, etc. Hydraulic power machinery and component manufacturing mainly includes high-pressure high-flow hydraulic components and hydraulic systems, high-frequency response electro-hydraulic servo valves and proportional valves, high-performance sealing devices, and intelligent valve islands. Hydrodynamic power machinery and component manufacturing mainly includes high-speed high-power hydraulic coupler speed control devices.

context: Accelerate the development of implantable cardiac pacemakers, interventional treatment for heart failure, and neurostimulation devices. Develop bioactive composite materials, artificial nerves, biomimetic skin tissue, in vitro cultivation of human tissues, organ repair and compensation, etc. Promote the application of advanced materials, 3D printing, and other technologies to improve the biocompatibility and performance level of implantable devices.

context: The equipment for water pollution prevention and control mainly includes urban sewage treatment and reuse equipment, rural sewage treatment and reuse equipment, difficult-to-treat industrial wastewater treatment and reuse technology and equipment, surface water pollution control equipment, groundwater pollution prevention and remediation equipment, and drinking water safety guarantee equipment. Difficult-to-treat industrial wastewater treatment and reuse technology and equipment include high ammonia nitrogen, high salt, high concentration difficult-to-degrade organic wastewater treatment technology and equipment, heavy metal and mercury-containing wastewater treatment technology and equipment, electrocoagulation and electrocatalytic oxidation equipment, electrodialysis technology equipment, distillation-biochemical coupling treatment technology and complete equipment, acid-free metal surface cleaning technology and complete equipment, hydrophobic membrane distillation coupling treatment technology and complete equipment, gas-assisted oil film dispersion extraction device, buried vertical flow anaerobic sewage treatment reactor, super rotating magnetic oxygenation sewage treatment device, high turbidity sewage magnetic separation treatment technology and equipment, oil-containing wastewater vacuum separation purification machine, microwave treatment technology and complete equipment, heavy metal characteristic adsorption-desorption and resource recovery complete technology and equipment, heavy metal wastewater treatment and resource recovery microbial reactor, gel method heavy metal detection adsorption integration equipment, pressure-resistant ultrafiltration membrane equipment, stacked vibrating membrane filtration equipment, water reuse technology equipment, wet oxidation technology equipment, ship oily wastewater, chemical tank cleaning water, ship domestic wastewater reception and treatment technology equipment.

zh_context: 水污染防治装备，主要包括城镇污水处理与回用装备、农村污水处理与回用装备、难处理工业废水处理及回用技术和装备、地表水水体污染治理装备、地下水污染防控与修复装备、饮用水安全保障装备等。难处理工业废水处理及回用技术和装备，包括高氨氮、高盐、高浓度难降解有机废水处理技术设备及重金属、含汞废水处理技术设备、电絮凝和电解催化氧化设备、电脱盐技术设备、精馏-生化法耦合处理技术与成套装备、无酸金属材料表面清洗技术与成套设备、疏水膜蒸馏耦合处理技术及其成套设备、气助油膜分散大相比萃取装置、地埋式竖向流厌氧污水处理反应器、超旋磁氧曝气污水处理装置、高浊度污水磁分离处理技术和设备、含油污水真空分离净化机、微波处理技术与成套装备、重金属特征吸附-解吸及资源回收成套技术装备、重金属废水处理及资源回收微生物反应器、凝胶法重金属检测吸附一体化装备、耐压型超滤膜设备、叠式振动膜过滤装备、回用水技术设备、湿式氧化技术装备、船舶含油污水、化学品洗舱水、船舶生活污水接收处理技术装备。。

context: Strengthen the deployment and management of core network infrastructure such as domain name servers, digital certificate servers, and key application servers; enhance the planning and management of network addresses and domain name systems; promote work on security level protection, personal information protection, risk assessment, disaster backup and recovery, and effectively implement various security requirements in network planning, construction, operation, management, maintenance, and disposal; accelerate the development of the information security industry, cultivate leading enterprises, increase efforts in talent training and recruitment, and improve information security technology support and capabilities.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++发展路线图和时间表,网络与信息安全保障加强网络与信息安全保障工作，全面提升下一代互联网安全性和可信性
zh_context: 加强域名服务器、数字证书服务器、关键应用服务器等网络核心基础设施的部署及管理；加强网络地址及域名系统的规划和管理；推进安全等级保护、个人信息保护、风险评估、灾难备份及恢复等工作，在网络规划、建设、运营、管理、维护、废弃等环节切实落实各项安全要求；加快发展信息安全产业，培育龙头骨干企业，加大人才培养和引进力度，提高信息安全技术保障和支撑能力。

context: Build a standard system for rare earth permanent magnet materials around high-end applications such as new energy vehicles, wind power generation, industrial robots, and military equipment. Carry out research on rare earth permanent magnet materials, including methods for reducing heavy rare earth content and standardizing content detection, to accelerate the development of standards for corrosion resistance, temperature resistance, and mechanical properties of rare earth permanent magnet materials. Develop relevant standards for high-density rare earth permanent magnet materials such as cerium magnets to expand the application areas of rare earth permanent magnet materials. Accelerate the development of new rare earth hydrogen storage alloy standards and detection standards with high hydrogen storage density and good safety, to meet the needs of domestic hydrogen energy vehicle innovation and lead the industry to a higher level. Conduct standard research on the performance and detection methods of rare earth catalytic materials to meet the national strategic needs in the field of energy and environment, and build a standard system for rare earth catalytic materials. Based on the new breakthroughs in the industrial research and application of rare earth steel, improve the composition, process, and quality standards of rare earth steel varieties, and develop standards for high-purity rare earth metals and rare earth alloys for special steel, expand the application of rare earth in the steel industry, and create an international rare earth steel brand. Strengthen the standardization research on lightweight rare earth materials such as rare earth-magnesium and rare earth-aluminum, promote the development of standards for high-purity rare earth metals and rare earth compounds, and promote the transformation and upgrading of China's rare earth industry.
extended_context: 通用++综合++关于印发《新材料标准领航行动计划（2018—2020年）》的通知（国质检标联〔2018〕77号）（国家质量监督检验检疫总局、工业和信息化部、国家发展和改革委员会、科学技术部、国家国防科技工业局、中国科学院、中国工程院、国家认证认可监督管理委员会、国家标准化管理委员会/2018年3月13日）++nan++其他政策++2018-3++主要行动,研制新材料“领航”标准,稀土新材料
zh_context: 围绕新能源汽车、风力发电、工业机器人、军工装备等高端应用，构建稀土永磁材料标准体系。开展稀土永磁材料重稀土减量制备方法及含量检测标准化研究，加快制定稀土永磁材料耐蚀性、耐温性、力。学特性等服役性能检测标准。制定铈磁体等高丰度稀土永磁材料相关标准，。拓展稀土永磁材料的应用领域。加快研制贮氢密度高、安全性好的新型稀土贮氢合金标准及检测标准，满足国产化氢能源车换代自主创新需求，引领产业水平提升。针对能源环境等领域国家战略需求，开展稀土催化材料性能与检测方法的标准研究，构建稀土催化材料标准体系。基于稀土钢工业化研究与应用的新突破，完善稀土品种钢成分、工艺与质量标准，制定优特钢用高纯稀土金属与稀土合金标准，扩大稀土在钢铁行业的应用，打造国际化的稀土钢品牌。加强稀土-镁、稀土-铝等轻量化稀土材料标准化研究，推进高纯稀土金属和稀土化合物材料标准研制，促进我国稀土产业改造升级。

context: By 2025, the integration and development of informatization and industrialization will be achieved in a wider range, deeper level, and higher level. The new generation of information technology will accelerate its penetration into various fields of manufacturing, significantly expanding its scope, deepening its level, and greatly improving its quality. The pace of digital transformation in the manufacturing industry will accelerate significantly, and the national index of integration and development of the two industries will reach 105. New models and new formats will be widely popularized. The digitalization rate of enterprise management will reach 80%, and the form of enterprises will accelerate the transformation towards flatness, platformization, and ecologicalization. The popularization rate of digital R&D design tools will reach 85%. Platform-based design will be widely promoted. The rate of key process digitization will reach 68%, and networked, intelligent, and personalized production methods will be deeply applied in key areas. The effectiveness of digital transformation in key industries such as raw materials, equipment manufacturing, consumer goods, electronic information, green manufacturing, and safety production will be significantly improved. The continuous improvement of the integrated support system. The construction of new information infrastructure will be upgraded, digital technology will progress rapidly, the industrial big data industry will flourish, the application effectiveness of the industrial Internet will further emerge, the standard system for the integration of the two industries will continue to improve, and the industrial foundation will move towards advanced levels. The vitality of enterprise integration and development will be fully stimulated. The popularization rate of industrial Internet platforms will reach 45%, the service capabilities of system solutions will be significantly enhanced, and a new pattern of platform enterprises empowering large, medium, and small enterprises will be formed. The prosperous development of the integrated ecological system. The double innovation system in the manufacturing industry will continue to improve, the digitalization level of the industrial chain and supply chain will continue to improve, driving the accelerated integration of the industrial chain, innovation chain, talent chain, and value chain, and a number of industrial clusters with a higher level of digitalization will emerge, forming a rapidly developing integrated development ecosystem.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++物联网++“十四五”信息化和工业化深度融合发展规划（工信部规〔2021〕182号）（工信部/2021年11月17日）++nan++“十四五”信息化和工业化深度融合发展规划++2021-11++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 到2025年，信息化和工业化在更广范围、更深程度、更高水平上实现融合发展，新一代信息技术向制造业各领域加速渗透，范围显著扩展、程度持续深化、质量大幅提升，制造业数字化转型步伐明显加快，全国两化融合发展指数达到105。——新模式新业态广泛普及。企业经营管理数字化普及率达80%，企业形态加速向扁平化、平台化、生态化转变。数字化研发设计工具普及率达85%，。平台化设计得到规模化推广。关键工序数控化率达68%，网络化、智能化、个性化生产方式在重点领域得到深度应用。——产业数字化转型成效显著。原材料、装备制造、消费品、电子信息、绿色制造、安全生产等重点行业领域数字化转型步伐加快，数字化、网络化、智能化整体水平持续提高。——融合支撑体系持续完善。新型信息基础设施建设提档升级，数字化技术快速进步，工业大数据产业蓬勃发展，工业互联网应用成效进一步显现，两化融合标准体系持续完善，产业基础迈向高级化。——企业融合发展活力全面激发。工业互联网平台普及率达45%，系统解决方案服务能力明显增强，形成平台企业赋能、大中小企业融通发展新格局。——融合生态体系繁荣发展。制造业“双创”体系持续完善，产业链供应链数字化水平持续提升，带动产业链、创新链、人才链、价值链加速融合，涌现出一批数字化水平较高的产业集群，融合发展生态快速形成。

context: Vigorously develop public cloud computing services, implement cloud computing projects, and support information technology companies in accelerating their transformation into cloud computing product and service providers. Vigorously develop computing and storage resource leasing and application software development and deployment platform services, as well as online application services for enterprise management, research and development, and design, to reduce the threshold and innovation cost of enterprise informatization, and support the development and entrepreneurial activities of small and medium-sized enterprises. Actively develop cloud-based personal information storage, online tools, learning, entertainment, and other services to cultivate information consumption. Develop secure and trustworthy cloud computing outsourcing services and promote government business outsourcing. Support the integration, development, and innovative application of cloud computing with technologies and services such as the Internet of Things, mobile internet, internet finance, and e-commerce, and actively cultivate new formats and models. Encourage large enterprises to open platform resources and create a collaborative and win-win cloud computing service ecosystem. Guide the orderly development of private clouds, encourage enterprises to innovate their information construction ideas, based on fully utilizing public cloud computing service resources, rely on their own needs, use secure and reliable private cloud solutions, integrate information resources, optimize business processes, and improve management levels. Vigorously develop services such as information system planning consulting, solution design, system integration, and testing and evaluation for cloud computing.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++云计算,增强云计算服务能力
zh_context: 大力发展公共云计算服务，实施云计算工程，支持信息技术企业加快向云计。算产品和服务提供商转型。大力发展计算、存储资源租用和应用软件开发部署平台服务，以及企业经营管理、研发设计等在线应用服务，降低企业信息化门槛和创新成本，支持中小微企业发展和创业活动。积极发展基于云计算的个人信息存储、在线工具、学习娱乐等服务，培育信息消费。发展安全可信的云计算外包服务，推动政府业务外包。支持云计算与物联网、移动互联网、互联网金融、电子商务等技术和服务的融合发展与创新应用，积极培育新业态、新模式。鼓励大企业开放平台资源，打造协作共赢的云计算服务生态环境。引导专有云有序发展，鼓励企业创新信息化建设思路，在充分利用公共云计算服务资源的基础上，立足自身需求，利用安全可靠的专有云解决方案，整合信息资源，优化业务流程，提升经营管理水平。大力发展面向云计算的信息系统规划咨询、方案设计、系统集成和测试评估等服务。

context: Surrounding the new model of Internet-based collaborative manufacturing services, focusing on innovative design, enterprise operation and resource management, manufacturing services for the entire product lifecycle, as well as the construction of industrial cloud, industrial big data, industrial Internet platforms, etc., research and develop platform systems and software for optimizing and simulating complex product digitization, product lifecycle/service lifecycle management, resource management and intelligent supply chain collaboration, OT-based intelligent services, industrial big data analysis, etc., forming an Internet+ collaborative manufacturing industrial software system to support the innovative development of networked collaborative manufacturing.

context: The open innovation platform is mainly led by leading enterprises in the artificial intelligence industry, encouraging joint participation from research institutes and universities to provide intellectual and technical support. The open innovation platform should focus on the construction of specific areas with significant application needs as outlined in the Next Generation Artificial Intelligence Development Plan. In principle, each specific area should have a national open innovation platform for the next generation of artificial intelligence. context: In terms of liquid crystal display devices, the focus is on improving the performance of thin-film transistors (TFT), increasing carrier mobility and the transmittance of the liquid crystal panel, and reducing production costs. In terms of plasma display devices, research and development is focused on high-efficiency technology, high-definition technology, and ultra-thin technology, as well as studying new materials and processes to improve the performance of PDP products. In the field of organic light-emitting display devices, efforts are being made to promote the technological development and industrial application of small and medium-sized OLEDs, as well as research on large-sized OLEDs and their technological integration. In the field of electronic paper, active development and industrialization of active driving electronic paper display technology is being promoted, with a focus on developing large-sized, touch screen, color, and flexible active driving electronic paper displays. Active research and development of new technologies and products such as touch screens and 3D displays are being carried out to promote their industrialization. Specialized display technologies such as laser display are being developed. The development of OLED lighting technology and product development is being promoted. Great efforts are being made to develop flat panel display device production equipment and testing instruments, forming a good trend of coordinated development with complete machine demand as the driving force, the panel industry as the leader, materials and equipment instruments as the foundation, and the coordinated development of various links in the industry chain. Efforts are being made to achieve international advanced level in China's new display industry by the end of the 12th Five-Year Plan period, fully supporting the transformation and upgrading of China's color TV industry.

zh_context: 液晶显示器件方面，重点提升薄膜晶体管（TFT）性能，提高载流子迁移率和液晶面板的透过率，降低生产成本。等离子显示器件方面，围绕高光效技术、高清晰度技术以及超薄技术进行相关技术研发，研究新材料、新工艺来提高PDP产品性能。有机发光显示器件方面，推进中小尺寸OLED的技术开发和产业化应用，研究大尺寸OLED相关技术和工艺集成。电子纸方面，推动有源驱动电子纸显示技术开发与产业化，重点发展大尺寸、触屏式、彩色、柔性有源驱动电子纸显示屏。积极研发触摸屏、三维显示等新技术新产品，促进其产业化。发展激光显示等特色显示技术。推动OLED照明技术和产品开发。大力发展平板显示器件生产设备和测试仪器，形成整机需求为牵引、面板产业为龙头、材料及设备仪器为基础、产业链各环节协调发展的良好态势。力争到“十二五”末，我国新型显示产业达到国际先进水平，全面支撑我国彩电产业转型升级。

context: The scale of the industry continues to grow. The annual production of domestic brand industrial robots has reached 100,000 units, and the annual production of six-axis and above industrial robots has exceeded 50,000 units. The annual sales revenue of service robots exceeds 30 billion yuan, achieving small-scale production and application in areas such as elderly care, disability assistance, and medical rehabilitation. Cultivate more than three leading enterprises with international competitiveness and build more than five robot supporting industry clusters. The technological level has significantly improved. The main technical indicators of industrial robots, such as speed, payload, accuracy, and self-weight ratio, have reached the level of similar foreign products, and the average mean time between failures (MTBF) has reached 80,000 hours. The technological level of service robots in fields such as medical health, home services, anti-terrorism and riot control, disaster relief, and scientific research is close to international standards. Breakthroughs have been made in the new generation of robot technology, and intelligent robots have achieved innovative applications. Significant breakthroughs have been made in key components. The performance, accuracy, and reliability of precision reducers, servo motors and drivers, and controllers for robots have reached the level of similar foreign products. Batch applications have been achieved in six-axis and above industrial robots, with a market share of over 50%. Significant achievements have been made in integrated applications. More than 30 comprehensive application solutions for robots in typical fields have been completed, and corresponding standards and specifications have been formed. The scale application of robots in key industries has been realized, and the robot density has reached 150 or more.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++智能硬件++关于印发《机器人产业发展规划（2016-2020年）》的通知（工信部联规〔2016〕109号）（工信部等部门/2016年3月21日）++nan++其他政策++2016-3++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 产业规模持续增长。自主品牌工业机器人年产量达到10万台，六轴及以上工业机器人年产量达到5万台以上。服务机器人年销售收入超过300亿元，在助老助残、医疗康复等领域实现小批量生产及应用。培育3家以上具有国际竞争力的龙头企业，打造5个以上机器人配套产业集群。技术水平显著提升。工业机器人速度、载荷、精度、自重比等主要技术指标达到国外同类产品水平，平均无故障时间（MTBF）达到8万小时；医疗健康、家庭服务、反恐防暴、救灾救援、科学研究等领域的服务机器人技术水平接近国际水平。新一代机器人技术取得突破，智能机器人实现创新应用。关键零部件取得重大突破。机器人用精密减速器、伺服电机及驱动器、控制器的性能、精度、可靠性达到国外同类产品水平，在六轴及以上工业机器人中实现批量应用，市场占有率达到50%以上。集成应用取得显著成效。完成30个以上典型领域机器人综合应用解决方案，并形成相应的标准和规范，实现机器人在重点行业的规模化应用，机器人密度达到150以上。

context: Strengthen the collaboration between industry, academia, research, and medicine. Support leading pharmaceutical innovation companies in strengthening cooperation with national laboratories, national research institutions, and high-level research universities to jointly build the national strategic scientific and technological strength in the field of biomedicine. Lead the integration and aggregation of innovative resources by enterprises to form cross-disciplinary, large-scale collaboration, and high-intensity innovation bases. Establish national manufacturing innovation centers in key sub-sectors, support the construction of provincial-level pharmaceutical manufacturing innovation centers, and enhance industry's key common technology research and development. Improve specialized research and development service capabilities. In the field of new drug development, support the development of high-level third-party institutions that can provide services such as drug discovery, pharmaceutical research, pharmacology and toxicology research, clinical research, and inspection and testing. Support the establishment of specialized service institutions that can engage in product design, technology development, tooling development, contract customization, and quality testing in the medical device research and development chain, and improve the level of division of labor and collaboration in the medical device industry. Support the establishment of high-level clinical research centers with standardized management, efficient operation, and strong innovation and transformation capabilities, develop research-oriented wards, and improve clinical research design and service capabilities. Create a favorable environment for incentivizing innovation. Establish an effective system for the transformation of scientific and technological achievements and incentive mechanisms, activate the innovation resources of universities, research institutes, and medical institutions, and improve the level of scientific and technological achievement transformation. Improve the early resolution mechanism for drug patent disputes, formulate relevant supporting measures, and safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of rights holders. Strengthen intellectual property protection, determine compensation amounts in accordance with the law, impose punitive compensation for serious intentional infringement, and increase the cost of infringement and illegal activities.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物医药++“十四五”医药工业发展规划（工信部联规〔2021〕217号）（工信部、国家发改委、科技部、商务部、国家卫健委、应急管理部、国家医疗保障局、国家药监局、国家中医药管理局/2021年12月22日）++nan++其他政策++2021-12++加快产品创新和产业化技术突破,健全医药创新支撑体系
zh_context: 加强产学研医技术协作。支持医药创新领军企业加强与国家实验室、国家科研机构、高水平研究型大学等机构的合作，共同打造生物医药领域国家战略科技力量。以企业牵头整合集聚创新资源，形成跨领域、大协作、高强度的创新基地，在重点细分领域布局建设国家制造业创新中心，支持建设省级医药制造业创新中心，加强行业关键共性技术攻关。提高专业化的研发服务能力。在新药研发领域，支持发展可提供药物发现、药学研究、药理毒理研究、临床研究、检验检测等服务的高水平第三方机构。围绕医疗器械研发链条，支持建立可从事产品设计、技术开发、工装开发、合同定制、质量检测的专业化服务机构，提高医疗器械分工协作水平。支持建设管理规范、运营高效、创新转化能力强的高水平临床研究中心，发展研究型病房，提高临床研究设计能力和研究服务能力。营造激励创新的良好环境。建立有效的科技成果转化体系和激励机制，激活高校、科研院所、医疗机构的创新资源，提高科技成果转化水平。健全药品专利纠纷早期解决机制，制定相关配套措施，保障权利人合法权益。加大知识产权保护力度，依法裁判赔偿数额，对严重故意侵权行为实施惩罚性赔偿，提高侵权违法成本。

context: Based on the domestic circulation, we will promote the construction of a strong domestic market and a strong trading nation, form a powerful gravitational field for global resource elements, promote the coordinated development of domestic and foreign demand, imports and exports, and foreign investment and overseas investment, and accelerate the cultivation of new advantages in international cooperation and competition. The first section promotes the coordinated development of imports and exports. Improve the integrated regulation system of domestic and foreign trade, promote the connection of laws and regulations, regulatory systems, business qualifications, quality standards, inspection and quarantine, certification and accreditation, etc., and promote the same line, same standard, and same quality. Reduce import tariffs and institutional costs, expand imports of high-quality consumer goods, advanced technology, important equipment, energy resources, etc., and promote diversified import sources. Improve export policies, optimize the quality and structure of export commodities, and steadily increase the added value of exports. Optimize the layout of international markets, guide enterprises to deepen traditional export markets, expand emerging markets, expand trade with neighboring countries, and stabilize international market share. Promote the transformation and upgrading of processing trade, deepen the construction of foreign trade transformation and upgrading bases, customs special supervision areas, trade promotion platforms, and international marketing service networks, accelerate the development of new models such as cross-border e-commerce and market procurement trade, encourage the construction of overseas warehouses, and ensure the smooth operation of the foreign trade industry chain and supply chain. Innovate and develop trade in services, promote the construction of pilot open platforms for innovative development of trade in services, and improve the level of trade digitalization. Implement the integration of trade and investment. Hold exhibitions such as the China International Import Expo, China Import and Export Fair, and China International Trade in Services Fair. The second section aims to improve the level of international two-way investment. Adhere to the principle of both attracting foreign investment and encouraging domestic companies to invest overseas, make efficient use of global resource elements and market space through high-level two-way investment, improve the guarantee mechanism for industrial chain and supply chain, and promote the improvement of industrial competitiveness. Attract and utilize foreign investment to a greater extent, orderly promote the opening of telecommunications, the Internet, education, culture, medical care, and other related fields. Fully optimize foreign investment services, strengthen the promotion and protection of foreign investment, give full play to the demonstration effect of major foreign investment projects, support foreign investment in high-end manufacturing, high-tech, traditional manufacturing transformation and upgrading, modern services, and investment in central and western regions, support foreign-funded enterprises in establishing research and development centers and participating in national science and technology programs. Encourage reinvestment of profits by foreign-funded enterprises. Adhere to the main role of enterprises, innovate overseas investment methods, optimize overseas investment structure and layout, and enhance risk prevention capabilities and returns. Improve overseas production service networks and distribution systems, accelerate the international development of productive service industries such as finance, consulting, accounting, and law, and promote the internationalization of Chinese products, services, technology, brands, and standards. Support enterprises in integrating into the global industrial chain and supply chain, and improve their ability and level of multinational operation. Guide enterprises to strengthen compliance management and prevent and resolve various risks such as overseas political, economic, and security risks. Promote the construction of multilateral and bilateral investment cooperation mechanisms, improve policies and service systems to promote and guarantee overseas investment, and promote legislation on overseas investment.
extended_context: 通用++综合++中华人民共和国国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和二〇三五年远景目标纲要（2021年3月）++nan++中华人民共和国国民经济和社会发展第十四个五年规划和二〇三五年远景目标纲要++2021-3++形成强大国内市场构建新发展格局,促进国内国际双循环
zh_context: 立足国内大循环，协同推进强大国内市场和贸易强国建设，形成全球资源要素强大引力场，促进内需和外需、进口和出口、引进外资和对外投资协调发展，加快培育参与国际合作和竞争新优势。第一节推动进出口协同发展。完善内外贸一体化调控体系，促进内外贸法律法规、监管体制、经营资质、质量标准、检验检疫、认证认可等相衔接，推进同线同标同质。降低进口关税和制度性成本，扩大优质消费品、先进技术、重要设备、能源资源等进口，促进进口来源多元化。完善出口政策，优化出口商品质量和结构，稳步提高出口附加值。优化国际市场布局，引导企业深耕传统出口市场、拓展新兴市场，扩大与周边国家贸易规模，稳定国际市场份额。推动加工贸易转型升级，深化外贸转型升级基地、海关特殊监管区域、贸易促进平台、国际营销服务网络建设，加快发展跨境电商、市场采购贸易等新模式，鼓励建设海外仓，保障外贸产业链供应链畅通运转。创新发展服务贸易，推进服务贸易创新发展试点开放平台建设，提升贸易数字化水平。实施贸易投资融合工程。办好中国国际进口博览会、中国进出口商品交易会、中国国际服务贸易交易会等展会。第二节提高国际双向投资水平。坚持引进来和走出去并重，以高水平双向投资高效利用全球资源要素和市场空间，完善产业链供应链保障机制，推动产业竞争力提升。更大力度吸引和利用外资，有序推进电信、互联网、教育、文化、医疗等领域相关业务开放。全面优化外商投资服务，加强外商投资促进和保护，发挥重大外资项目示范效应，支持外资加大中高端制造、高新技术、传统制造转型升级、现代服务等领域和中西部地区投资，支持外资企业设立研发中心和参与承担国家科技计划项目。鼓励外资企业利润再投资。坚持企业主体，创新境外投资方式，优化境外投资结构和布局，提升风险防范能力和收益水平。完善境外生产服务网络和流通体系，加快金融、咨询、会计、法律等生产性服务业国际化发展，推动中国产品、服务、技术、品牌、标准走出去。支持企业融入全球产业链供应链，提高跨国经营能力和水平。引导企业加强合规管理，防范化解境外政治、经济、安全等各类风险。推进多双边投资合作机制建设，健全促进和保障境外投资政策和服务体系，推动境外投资立法。

context: Promote the intelligent application of traffic management and services, carry out application demonstrations of intelligent maritime services, urban intelligent transportation, automotive electronic identification, intelligent management of electric bicycles, passenger transportation and intelligent public transportation systems, etc., to enhance command and dispatch, traffic control, and information service capabilities. Carry out demonstrations of new technologies in the field of connected vehicles, including autonomous driving, safety and energy conservation, emergency rescue, collision prevention, illegal vehicle inspection and seizure, and crackdown on vehicle-related crimes.

zh_context: 光伏用膜制造，主要包括塑料薄膜制造。塑料薄膜制造，主要包括EVA封装胶膜、PET基膜、PVF/PVDF背板保护膜、导电薄膜。

context: Manufacturing of sanitary materials and medical supplies, mainly including sanitary materials and dressings, dental adhesives, dental fillings, dental impression materials and similar products, patient medical reagents, non-patient diagnostic tests, laboratory reagents, various in vitro diagnostic reagents, test papers, other supporting equipment and consumables, bio-ceramic bone repair materials (collagen-based, polylactic acid-based, tantalum-based, etc.), active calcium silicate phosphate composite bone cement, artificial bone metal fixation materials, artificial intervertebral discs and other bone implant materials, implant-guided collagen membrane for dental use, dental collagen hemostatic sponge for periodontal tissue guidance, insect and animal-derived biocompatible skin repair materials, controlled-release cosmetic drug biofilm materials, cerebral vascular embolic agents, α-cyanoacrylate n-octyl ester liquid vascular embolic agents, embolic agents such as polyvinyl alcohol, gene recombinant hemoglobin oxygen carrier, liposome-encapsulated hemoglobin oxygen carrier, polymerized hemoglobin oxygen carrier, bovine Achilles tendon type I collagen membrane, porcine pericardium membrane, bovine pericardium membrane, expanded polytetrafluoroethylene and other hard meningeal repair materials, central nervous system repair materials, hyaluronic acid and collagen and other soft tissue filling materials, cell and tissue inductive biomaterials, hemostatic bioactive dressings (chitosan-based/sodium alginate-based).
zh_context: 卫生材料及医药用品制造，主要包括卫生材料及敷料、牙科粘固剂、牙科填料、牙科用造型膏及类似制品、病人医用试剂、非病人用诊断检验、实验用试剂、各类体外诊断用试剂、试纸、其他配套设备与耗材、生物陶瓷类骨修复材料（胶原基聚乳酸基钽基等）、活性硅酸钙磷酸钙复合骨水泥、人工骨金属骨固定材料、人工椎间盘等骨植入材料、种植牙引导胶原膜齿科专用胶原止血海绵、牙周组织引导胶原膜齿科专用胶原止血海绵、昆虫动物源的生物可容性皮肤修复材料、美容控缓释药用生物膜材料、脑血管栓塞剂、α-氰基丙烯酸正辛酯液态血管栓塞剂、聚乙烯醇等栓塞剂、基因重组血红蛋白携氧治疗剂、脂质体包囊血红蛋白携氧治疗剂、聚合血红蛋白携氧治疗剂、牛跟腱I型胶原膜、猪源心包膜、牛心包膜、膨体聚四氟乙烯等硬脑膜修补材料、中枢神经修复材料、透明质酸及胶原蛋白等软组织填充材料、细胞组织诱导性生物材料、止血生物活性敷料（壳聚糖基/海藻酸钠基）。

context: Advanced environmental protection industries mainly include the manufacturing of specialized environmental protection equipment, manufacturing of environmental monitoring instruments and electronic devices, manufacturing of environmental pollution treatment agents and materials, environmental assessment and monitoring services, environmental protection and pollution control services, environmental engineering construction, and environmental research and technical services, etc. The manufacturing of specialized environmental protection equipment mainly includes the manufacturing of specialized environmental protection equipment, manufacturing of water resource machinery, manufacturing of household air conditioners, and manufacturing of other electronic devices. The manufacturing of environmental monitoring instruments and electronic devices mainly includes the manufacturing of laboratory analytical instruments, manufacturing of specialized instruments and meters for environmental monitoring, manufacturing of nuclear and nuclear radiation measurement instruments, etc. The manufacturing of environmental pollution treatment agents and materials mainly includes the manufacturing of forest chemical products, manufacturing of specialized agents and materials for environmental pollution treatment, etc. Environmental assessment and monitoring services mainly include environmental protection monitoring, ecological resource monitoring, national economic management of water resources, etc.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++7.2++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++节能环保产业,先进环保产业
zh_context: 先进环保产业，主要包括环境保护专用设备制造、环境保护监测仪器及电子设备制造、环境污染处理药剂材料制造、环境评估与监测服务、环境保护及污染治理服务、环保工程施工、环保研发与技术服务等。环境保护专用设备制造，主要包括环境保护专用设备制造、水资源专用机械制造、家用空气调节器制造、其他电子设备制造等。环境保护监测仪器及电子设备制造，主要包括实验分析仪器制造、环境监测专用仪器仪表制造、核子及核辐射测量仪器制造等。环境污染处理药剂材料制造，主要包括林产化学产品制造、环境污染处理专用药剂材料制造等。环境评估与监测服务，主要包括环境保护监测、生态资源监测、水资源管理国民经等。

context: By 2025, the transformation of new energy storage from the initial stage of commercialization to large-scale development will be achieved. The innovative capacity of new energy storage technologies will significantly improve, with a substantial increase in the level of independent and controllable core technology equipment. Significant progress will be made in terms of high safety, low cost, high reliability, and long lifespan. The standard system will be basically improved, the industrial system will become increasingly complete, and the market environment and business models will be basically mature. The installed capacity will reach over 30 million kilowatts. New energy storage will play a significant role in promoting the carbon peak and carbon neutrality process in the energy field. By 2030, comprehensive market-oriented development of new energy storage will be achieved. The core technology equipment of new energy storage will be independently controllable, and technological innovation and industrial level will rank among the top in the world. The standard system, market mechanisms, and business models will be mature and sound. Deep integration and development with various links of the power system will be achieved, and the installed capacity will basically meet the corresponding needs of the new power system. New energy storage will become one of the key supports for carbon peak and carbon neutrality in the energy field.
extended_context: 新能源++先进核电++关于加快推动新型储能发展的指导意见（发改能源规〔2021〕1051号）（国家发展改革委、国家能源局/2021年7月15日）++nan++其他政策++2021-7++总体要求,主要目标
zh_context: 到2025年，实现新型储能从商业化初期向规模化发展转变。新型储能技术创新能力显著提高，核心技术装备自主可控水平大幅提升，在高安全、低成本、高可靠、长寿命等方面取得长足进步，标准体系基本完善，产业体系日趋完备，市场环境和商业模式基本成熟，装机规模达3000万千瓦以上。新型储能在推动能源领域碳达峰碳中和过程中发挥显著作用。到2030年，实现新型储能全面市场化发展。新型储能核心技术装备自主可控，技术创新和产业水平稳居全球前列，标准体系、市场机制、商业模式成熟健全，与电力系统各环节深度融合发展，装机规模基本满足新型电力系统相应需求。新型储能成为能源领域碳达峰碳中和的关键支撑之一。

context: Communication system equipment manufacturing mainly includes packet-enhanced OTN (POTN) equipment, intelligent optical network equipment (ASON), software-defined optical transport equipment (SDTN), multi-service transmission and access equipment (MSTP/MSTP), 10G rate single-wavelength PON equipment, 40G and above rate multi-wavelength PON equipment based on wavelength-tunable lasers, wavelength routing-based dense wavelength division multiplexing PON equipment, indoor visible light access equipment using lighting LED, short-range wireless communication node equipment, short-range wireless communication equipment, Internet of Things gateway, M2M gateway, vehicle networking gateway, IP relay media gateway, RTLS positioning system, broadband access equipment (supporting fiber coaxial cable and other transmission media).

context: Solar energy equipment and production equipment manufacturing mainly includes special glass manufacturing, steam turbine and auxiliary machinery manufacturing, other prime mover equipment manufacturing, foundry machinery manufacturing, metal cutting and welding equipment manufacturing, pump and vacuum equipment manufacturing, gas and liquid separation and purification equipment manufacturing, construction materials production special machinery manufacturing, refining and chemical production special equipment manufacturing, electrical machinery special equipment manufacturing, semiconductor device special equipment manufacturing, other electronic special equipment manufacturing, generator and generator set manufacturing, power electronic component manufacturing, photovoltaic equipment and component manufacturing, lead-acid battery manufacturing, other battery manufacturing, household air conditioner manufacturing, solar appliance manufacturing, other non-electric household appliance manufacturing, testing machine manufacturing, other special instrument manufacturing, optical instrument manufacturing, etc. Household air conditioner manufacturing mainly includes solar air conditioning refrigeration systems and equipment, solar thermal pump air conditioning units, solar low and medium temperature systems and equipment for industrial and agricultural applications. Solar appliance manufacturing mainly includes solar heating systems and equipment, solar high and medium temperature collection systems and equipment, solar and air source heat pump hot water systems, solar and building integrated collection systems, solar absorptive coating and film coating equipment, flat plate solar collector production equipment.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++6.3.1++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新能源产业,太阳能产业,太阳能设备和生产装备制造
zh_context: 太阳能设备和生产装备制造，主要包括特种玻璃制造、汽轮机及辅机制造、其他原动设备制造、铸造机械制造、金属切割及焊接设备制造、泵及真空设备制造、气体、液体分离及纯净设备制造、建筑材料生产专用机械制造、炼油、化工生产专用设备制造、电工机械专用设备制造、半导体器件专用设备制造、其他电子专用设备制造、发电机及发电机组制造、电力电子元器件制造、光伏设备及元器件制造、铅蓄电池制造、其他电池制造、家用空气调节器制造、太阳能器具制造、其他非电力家用器具制造、试验机制造、其他专用仪器制造、光学仪器制造等。家用空气调节器制造，主要包括太阳能空调制冷系统与设备、太阳能热泵空调机组、太阳能在工农业应用的中低温系统与设备。太阳能器具制造，主要包括太阳能采暖系统与设备、太阳能中高温集热系统与设备、太阳能与空气源热泵热水系统、太阳能与建筑结合集热系统、太阳能吸热涂层镀膜设备、平板太阳能集热器生产设备。

context: (1) Comprehensive safety assessment and coordinated security protection technology for rail transit systems. Breakthroughs in the intelligent perception, rapid identification, risk assessment, early warning, and disposal technologies of the holistic operation status of rail transit systems; research on the analysis and evaluation of mechanical, physical, and environmental performance impacts based on materials and structures, and functional design theory, to enhance the intrinsic safety performance of rail transit equipment in terms of collision resistance, fire prevention, and anti-icing design; construction of a comprehensive assessment and security technology system for the entire lifecycle of rail transit systems (RAMSI).(2) Holistic perception and ubiquitous integration intelligent technology for rail transit systems. Based on Internet+ system design, intelligent manufacturing, cloud integration and interaction, etc., research on integrated application technologies such as rail transit system integration networks, big data-driven, humanoid intelligence, cloud computing, and real-time high-capacity reliable mobile communication, to comprehensively enhance the intelligent level of rail transit equipment manufacturing and operation and maintenance.(3) Key technologies for global efficiency assessment and comprehensive efficiency improvement of rail transit systems. Addressing issues such as energy consumption, lightweighting, and reliability of onboard energy storage systems in rail transit traction drive systems, research on traction inverter and permanent magnet direct drive traction drive systems based on Internet+, new topology transformation, new energy, new materials, and new structures; mastering efficient energy management and security protection technologies for rail transit power systems.(4) Decoupling and adaptation technology for rail transit systems. Conduct research on the interaction, interoperability mechanisms, and collaborative operation theories of various components of rail transit systems, break through the layered and hierarchical interoperability mechanisms and multi-modal coupling mechanisms of key subsystems, and evaluate the global impact of subsystem failures; research on adaptive matching technology based on global optimization between rail transit systems and other transportation modes; establish a comprehensive and coordinated transportation integration technology system platform in China, with railways as the backbone, integrating aviation, highways, and ports.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”交通领域科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科发高〔2017〕121号）（科技部交通运输部/2017年06月07日）++nan++其他政策++2017-06++发展重点,轨道交通,系统集成及共性技术
zh_context: （1）轨道交通系统综合安全评估与协同安全保障技术。突破轨道交通系统运营状态全息化智能感知、快速辨识、风险评估、预警和处置技术；基于材料与结构的力学、理化、服役环境影响性能分析评估和功能设计理论研究，提升轨道交通装备耐碰撞、防火、防冰雪设计等本构安全性能；构建轨道交通系统全寿命周期RAMSI综合评估与保障技术体系。（2）轨道交通系统全息感知与泛在融合智能化技术。基于“互联网+”的系统设计、智能制造、云端融合交互等技术，开展轨道交通系统融合网络、大数据驱动、类人智能、云计算、超大容量实时高可靠移动通信等一体化应用技术研究，全面提升轨道交通装备制造及运维智能化水平。（3）轨道交通系统全局效能评估及综合效能提升关键技术。针对轨道交通牵引传动系统能耗、轻量化、车载储能系统可靠性等问题，开展基于“互联网+”、新型拓扑变换、新能源、新材料和新结构等技术的牵引变流、永磁直驱牵引传动系统研究；系统掌握轨道交通动力系统的高效能量管理及安全保障技术。（4）轨道交通系统解耦与适配技术。开展轨道交通系统各组分相互作用、互操作机制与协同运作理论研究，突破各关键子系统的分层递阶互操作机制与多模态耦合机理、子系统失效全局影响评估；研究基于全局最优的轨道交通系统与其他交通运输方式的自适应匹配技术；搭建我国以铁路为骨干，综合协同航空、公路、港口的交通运输一体化技术体系平台。

context: Strengthen technological innovation, improve the industrial chain, optimize supporting environment, implement and improve support policies, enhance the industrialization level of pure electric vehicles and plug-in hybrid electric vehicles, and promote the industrialization of fuel cell vehicles. By 2020, achieve an annual production and sales of over 2 million vehicles, with a cumulative production and sales of over 5 million vehicles, maintaining overall technological level in sync with international standards, and forming a group of new energy vehicle manufacturers and key component enterprises with international competitiveness. Enhance the overall quality and performance of electric vehicles. Accelerate the innovation and application of electric vehicle system integration technology, focusing on research on vehicle safety and reliability, and lightweight design. Improve the technological level, supporting capacity, and overall performance of key components. Accelerate the formulation and application of electric vehicle safety standards. Speed up the innovation and application of intelligent technology for electric vehicles, and develop intelligent autonomous driving vehicles. Conduct research and development on energy storage application technology for electric vehicle power systems, implement distributed new energy and electric vehicle joint application demonstrations, and promote the integration development of electric vehicles with smart grids, new energy, energy storage, and intelligent driving. Establish joint innovation platforms for electric vehicles and cross-industry, cross-domain technology innovation strategic alliances, and promote collaborative innovation of major key technologies for electric vehicles. Improve the production access policies for electric vehicles and study the implementation of a new energy vehicle credit management system. By 2020, electric vehicles strive to have market competitiveness for commercial promotion. Build a globally competitive power battery industry chain. Vigorously promote power battery technology research and development, focus on breakthroughs in battery grouping and system integration technology, proactively develop next-generation power batteries and new system power batteries, and achieve breakthroughs in battery material technology. Accelerate the innovation of production, control, and testing equipment for high-performance and high-reliability power batteries, and enhance the engineering and industrialization capabilities of power batteries. Cultivate and develop a group of power battery enterprises and key material leading enterprises with sustainable innovation capabilities. Promote the hierarchical utilization of power batteries and establish a power battery recycling and utilization system with upstream and downstream enterprises. By 2020, the technological level of power batteries will be synchronized with international standards, and the production capacity will remain globally leading. Innovate production, control, and testing equipment, and promote the engineering and technical capabilities of the entire industry chain. Conduct research and development on new technologies in the fields of fuel cells, solid-state lithium-ion batteries, metal-air batteries, lithium-sulfur batteries, etc. Column 14: Power battery enhancement project for new energy vehicles. Improve the power battery research and development system, accelerate the construction of power battery innovation centers, and break through technical bottlenecks such as high safety, long life, and high energy density lithium-ion batteries. Build several technology innovation centers in key battery materials, key production equipment, and other fields, and make breakthroughs in high-capacity positive and negative electrode materials, high safety separators, and functional electrolyte technologies. Increase efforts to promote the research and development and industrialization of fuel cell vehicles. Strengthen the research on fuel cell basic materials and process mechanisms, promote the development of high-performance and low-cost fuel cell materials and key components of the system. Accelerate the improvement of fuel cell stack system reliability and engineering level, and improve relevant technical standards. Promote the development of on-board hydrogen storage systems, hydrogen production, storage, transportation, and refueling technologies, and advance the construction of hydrogen refueling stations. By 2020, achieve mass production and large-scale demonstration applications of fuel cell vehicles. Accelerate the construction of standardized and convenient infrastructure systems. According to the principle of suitable and moderately advanced according to local conditions, prioritize the construction of public service area charging infrastructure in urban development, actively promote the construction of charging piles in residential areas and parking spaces of units. Improve charging facility standards and promote interconnection of charging infrastructure. Accelerate the development of new types of charging and swapping technologies and equipment, such as high-power density, high conversion efficiency, high applicability, wireless charging, and mobile charging. Strengthen research on key technologies such as testing and certification, safety protection, and bidirectional interaction with the power grid. Promote the Internet + charging infrastructure and improve the intelligence level of charging services. Encourage innovation in business models for charging service companies and enhance their capacity for sustainable development. By 2020, establish a charging infrastructure system that meets the needs of electric vehicles.
extended_context: 新能源++高效光电光热++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕67号）（国务院/2016年11月）++nan++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划++2016-11++推动新能源汽车、新能源和节能环保产业快速壮大，构建可持续发展新模式,实现新能源汽车规模应用
zh_context: 强化技术创新，完善产业链，优化配套环境，落实和完善扶持政策，提升纯电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车产业化水平，推进燃料电池汽车产业化。到2020年，实现当年产销200万辆以上，累计产销超过500万辆，整体技术水平保持与国际同步，形成一批具有国际竞争力的新能源汽车整车和关键零部件企业。全面提升电动汽车整车品质与性能。加快推进电动汽车系统集成技术创新与应用，重点开展整车安全性、可靠性研究和结构轻量化设计。提升关键零部件技术水平、配套能力与整车性能。加快电动汽车安全标准制定和应用。加速电动汽车智能化技术应用创新，发展智能自动驾驶汽车。开展电动汽车电力系统储能应用技术研发，实施分布式新能源与电动汽车联合应用示范，推动电动汽车与智能电网、新能源、储能、智能驾驶等融合发展。建设电动汽车联合创新平台和跨行业、跨领域的技术创新战略联盟，促进电动汽车重大关键技术协同创新。完善电动汽车生产准入政策，研究实施新能源汽车积分管理制度。到2020年，电动汽车力争具备商业化推广的市场竞争力。建设具有全球竞争力的动力电池产业链。大力推进动力电池技术研发，着力突破电池成组和系统集成技术，超前布局研发下一代动力电池和新体系动力电池，实现电池材料技术突破性发展。加快推进高性能、高可靠性动力电池生产、控制和检测设备创新，提升动力电池工程化和产业化能力。培育发展一批具有持续创新能力的动力电池企业和关键材料龙头企业。推进动力电池梯次利用，建立上下游企业联动的动力电池回收利用体系。到2020年，动力电池技术水平与国际水平同步，产能规模保持全球领先。产、控制和检测设备创新，推进全产业链工程技术能力建设。开展燃料电池、全固态锂离子电池、金属空气电池、锂硫电池等领域新技术研究开发。专栏14新能源汽车动力电池提升工程。完善动力电池研发体系，加快动力电池创新中心建设，突破高安全性、长寿命、高能量密度锂离子电池等技术瓶颈。在关键电池材料、关键生产设备等领域构建若干技术创新中心，突破高容量正负极材料、高安全性隔膜和功能性电解液技术。加大生。系统推进燃料电池汽车研发与产业化。加强燃料电池基础材料与过程机理研究，推动高性能低成本燃料电池材料和系统关键部件研发。加快提升燃料电池堆系统可靠性和工程化水平，完善相关技术标准。推动车载储氢系统以及氢制备、储运和加注技术发展，推进加氢站建设。到2020年，实现燃料电池汽车批量生产和规模化示范应用。加速构建规范便捷的基础设施体系。按照“因地适宜、适度超前”原则，在城市发展中优先建设公共服务区域充电基础设施，积极推进居民区与单位停车位配建充电桩。完善充电设施标准规范，推进充电基础设施互联互通。加快推动高功率密度、高转换效率、高适用性、无线充电、移动充电等新型充换电技术及装备研发。加强检测认证、安全防护、与电网双向互动等关键技术研究。大力推动“互联网+充电基础设施”，提高充电服务智能化水平。鼓励充电服务企业创新商业模式，提升持续发展能力。到2020年，形成满足电动汽车需求的充电基础设施体系。

context: Strengthen research on network security technologies, management, and mechanisms in the fields of industrial internet, internet of things, connected vehicles, cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, and other emerging areas under the IPv6 environment, and enhance the capability to ensure network security in these emerging fields.

Accelerate the migration of high-risk, high-energy-consuming, high-value equipment, as well as ERP, MES, SCM, and safety production-related systems to cloud platforms. Develop and deploy real-time analysis software, toolkits, and semantic models for safety production data. Carry out 5G+ intelligent inspection to achieve cloud-based aggregation and online monitoring of key safety production data.

zh_context: 制定工业设备、工业视频和业务系统上云实施指南，加快高风险、高能耗、高价值设备和ERP、MES、SCM及安全生产相关系统上云上平台，开发和部署安全生产数据实时分析软件、工具集和语义模型，开展“5G＋智能巡检”，实现安全生产关键数据的云端汇聚和在线监测。

context: Other intelligent device manufacturing mainly includes metal surface treatment and heat treatment processing, manufacturing of other unspecified metal products, manufacturing of specialized lifting equipment, manufacturing of specialized vehicles, manufacturing of continuous handling equipment, manufacturing of other material handling equipment, manufacturing of other unspecified general equipment, manufacturing of specialized equipment for food, alcohol, beverages, and tea production, manufacturing of specialized equipment for agricultural and sideline food processing, manufacturing of mechanized agricultural and horticultural tools, manufacturing of other agricultural, forestry, animal husbandry, and fishery machinery, etc. Other unspecified general equipment manufacturing mainly includes laser strengthening equipment, laser composite processing equipment, laser processing basic devices and systems. Manufacturing of specialized equipment for food, alcohol, beverages, and tea production mainly includes industrialized processing and intelligent manufacturing equipment for the food industry. Manufacturing of specialized equipment for agricultural and sideline food processing mainly includes intelligent monitoring and warning warehouses for agricultural products. Manufacturing of mechanized agricultural and horticultural tools mainly includes specialized equipment for intelligent transportation of agricultural products, intelligent agricultural power machinery, intelligent equipment for agricultural irrigation, efficient and precise environmentally friendly multifunctional equipment for agricultural field operations, efficient and intelligent harvesting equipment for grain crops, efficient intelligent harvesting and control equipment for cash crops, and facility intelligent fine production equipment.

zh_context: 其他智能设备制造，主要包括金属表面处理及热处理加工、其他未列明金属制品制造、生产专用起重机制造、生产专用车辆制造、连续搬运设备制造、其他物料搬运设备制造、其他未列明通用设备制造业、食品、酒、饮料及茶生产专用设备制造、农副食品加工专用设备制造、机械化农业及园艺机具制造、其他农、林、牧、渔业机械制造等。其他未列明通用设备制造业，主要包括激光强化装备、激光复合加工装备、激光加工基础装置和系统。食品、酒、饮料及茶生产专用设备制造，主要包括食品工业化加工与智能制造装备。农副食品加工专用设备制造，主要包括农产品智能监控及预警仓库。机械化农业及园艺机具制造，主要包括农产品智能运输专用装备、智能农业动力机械、农业灌溉智能装备、高效精准环保多功能农田作业装备、粮食作物高效智能收获装备、经济作物高效智能收获与智能控制装备、设施智能化精细生产装备。
