context: Improve infrastructure. Fully deploy the next-generation communication network infrastructure and increase efforts in the construction of 5G networks and gigabit optical networks. Combine with the digital transformation of industries and the development of smart cities to accelerate the layout of industrial internet, connected vehicles, smart pipelines, smart grids, and other areas, promoting efficient data collection and transmission across all domains. Accelerate the construction of a national integrated big data center system, promote the construction of national industrial internet big data centers, strengthen intelligent scheduling of computing power, and build several national hub nodes and big data center clusters. Construct high-performance computing clusters and deploy supercomputing centers reasonably. Strengthen technological innovation. Focus on improving the general technology level of data generation, collection, storage, processing, analysis, security, and privacy protection. Fill in the gaps in key technologies, particularly enhancing the underlying support capabilities of independent basic software and hardware, promoting the development of independent open-source frameworks, components, and tools, developing open-source communities for big data, nurturing open-source ecosystems, and comprehensively enhancing technological breakthroughs and market cultivation capabilities. Promote the integration of cutting-edge technologies, driving the integration and innovation of big data with artificial intelligence, blockchain, edge computing, and other new-generation information technologies. Strengthen standard leadership. Collaboratively promote national standards, industry standards, and group standards, accelerate the formulation and revision of key standards in technology research and development, product services, data governance, transaction circulation, industry applications, etc. Establish national standard verification and testing points in the field of big data, select key industries, sectors, and regions to carry out standard trial verification and pilot demonstrations, improve the evaluation system for compliance with big data standards, and accelerate the application and promotion of standards. Strengthen communication and cooperation between domestic and international big data standardization organizations, encourage enterprises, universities, research institutes, industry organizations, etc. to actively participate in the formulation of international big data standards. Column 2 focuses on the formulation and application promotion of key standards. Accelerate the formulation of key standards. Based on the development needs of the big data industry, accelerate the formulation of basic general standards such as data open interfaces and interoperability, data resource planning, data governance, data asset evaluation, data services, digital transformation, data security, as well as key application areas such as industrial big data, national standards, and industry standards. Strengthen the construction of the standard compliance evaluation system. Increase the promotion and dissemination of key national standards for big data systems, data management, and data open sharing. Promote the cultivation of a standard compliance evaluation system covering data product evaluation, data resource planning, data governance implementation, data asset evaluation, data service capabilities, etc. Accelerate the international standardization process. Encourage domestic experts to actively participate in the work of international standardization organizations such as ISO, IEC, ITU, and accelerate the promotion of international standards proposals. Strengthen the analysis of the applicability of international standards, encourage the adoption of excellent international standards. Support relevant units to participate in international standardization work and undertake related positions, host international standardization activities, and increase international contribution rates.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++主要任务,夯实产业发展基础
zh_context: 完善基础设施。全面部署新一代通信网络基础设施，加大5G网络和千兆光网建设力度。结合行业数字化转型和城市智能化发展，加快工业互联网、车联网、智能管网、智能电网等布局，促进全域数据高效采集和传输。加快构建全国一体化大数据中心体系，推进国家工业互联网大数据中心建设，强化算力统筹智能调度，建设若干国家枢纽节点和大数据中心集群。建设高性能计算集群，合理部署超级计算中心。加强技术创新。重点提升数据生成、采集、存储、加工、分析、安全与隐私保护等通用技术水平。补齐关键技术短板，重点强化自主基础软硬件的底层支撑能力，推动自主开源框架、组件和工具的研发，发展大数据开源社区，培育开源生态，全面提升技术攻关和市场培育能力。促进前沿领域技术融合，推动大数据与人工智能、区块链、边缘计算等新一代信息技术集成创新。强化标准引领。协同推进国家标准、行业标准和团体标准，加快技术研发、产品服务、数据治理、交易流通、行业应用等关键标准的制修订。建立大数据领域国家级标准验证检验检测点，选择重点行业、领域、地区开展标准试验验证和试点示范，健全大数据标准符合性评测体系，加快标准应用推广。加强国内外大数据标准化组织间的交流合作，鼓励企业、高校、科研院所、行业组织等积极参与大数据国际标准制定。专栏2重点标准研制及应用推广行动。加快重点标准研制。围绕大数据产业发展需求，加快数据开放接口与互操作、数据资源规划、数据治理、数据资产评估、数据服务、数字化转型、数据安全等基础通用标准以及工业大数据等重点应用领域相关国家标准、行业标准研制。加强标准符合性评测体系建设。加大对大数据系统、数据管理、数据开放共享等重点国家标准的推广宣贯。推动培育涵盖数据产品评测、数据资源规划、数据治理实施、数据资产评估、数据服务能力等的标准符合性评测体系。加速国际标准化进程。鼓励国内专家积极参与ISO、IEC、ITU等国际标准化组织工作，加快推进国际标准提案。加强国际标准适用性分析，鼓励开展优秀国际标准采标。支持相关单位参与国际标准化工作并承担相关职务，承办国际标准化活动，提升国际贡献率。

context: Strengthen the cooperation between industry, academia, research, and application, support the construction of national engineering laboratories, national engineering (technology) research centers, and other innovation platforms, establish national-level innovation centers, and jointly promote research on the basic theory, common technologies, and application technologies of artificial intelligence. Promote the research and development of deep learning technologies based on perceptual data, multimedia, natural language, and other big data, and conduct cutting-edge theoretical and technological research in the field of brain-like intelligence, such as brain-like neural computing systems and brain-like information processing. Support the development of basic software and hardware technologies in the field of artificial intelligence, including chips, sensors, operating systems, storage systems, high-end servers, key network devices, network security technology devices, middleware, etc., and support the development of open-source software and hardware platforms and ecosystems. Accelerate the research and industrialization of application technologies based on artificial intelligence, such as computer vision and audiovisual perception, biometric recognition, complex environment recognition, novel human-computer interaction, natural language understanding, machine translation, intelligent decision-making and control, network security, etc. Strengthen the layout of cutting-edge technologies and construct the foundation for future integrated innovation technologies.

zh_context: 加强产学研用合作，支持国家工程实验室、国家工程（技术）研究中心等创新平台建设，布局国家级创新中心，共同推动人工智能基础理论、共性技术、应用技术研究。推动基于感知数据、多媒体、自然语言等大数据的深度学习技术研发，开展类脑神经计算系统、类脑信息处理等类脑智能领域的前沿理论和技术研究。支持人工智能领域的芯片、传感器、操作系统、存储系统、高端服务器、关键网络设备、网络安全技术设备、中间件等基础软硬件技术开发，支持开源软硬件平台及生态建设。加快基于人工智能的计算机视听觉、生物特征识别、复杂环境识别、新型人机交互、自然语言理解、机器翻译、智能决策控制、网络安全等应用技术研发和产业化。加强前沿技术布局，构造未来融合创新技术基础。

context: Develop high-end membrane materials and components such as nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, reverse osmosis, etc. High-performance sensors such as online carbon dioxide, glucose, ammonia nitrogen, cyanide ion probes. New types of filtration consumables such as diatomaceous earth filter cartridges, activated carbon filter cartridges, precious metal removal filter cartridges, etc. as well as new chromatographic packing materials and resins.

zh_context: 开发纳滤、超滤、微滤、反渗透等高端膜材料及组件，在线二氧化碳、葡萄糖、氨氮、氰根探头等高性能传感器，硅藻土滤芯、活性炭滤芯、贵金属清除滤芯等新型过滤耗材，以及新型色谱填料和树脂等。

context: Resource recycling mainly includes the recycling of scrap metals, waste rubber, harmless recycling of waste plastics, harmless recycling of waste electrical and electronic products, dismantling and recycling of scrapped cars, recycling of waste new energy vehicle power batteries, recycling of waste solar equipment, harmless recycling of waste textiles, recycling of waste mineral oil, and recycling of waste biomass. The harmless recycling of waste electrical and electronic products includes the sorting, dismantling, and harmless treatment equipment for high value-added utilization, the complete set of equipment for the recovery and purification of copper, heavy metal waste electronic products, and sludge, efficient separation of waste household appliances and waste printed circuit boards into multiple materials, and direct comprehensive utilization device for mixed plastics with different melting points and poor compatibility.

zh_context: 资源再生利用，主要包括再生金属、废橡胶、废塑料无害化再生利用、废旧机电产品无害化再生利用、报废汽车拆解和再生利用、废旧新能源汽车动力蓄电池回收利用、废旧太阳能设备再生利用、废旧纺织品无害化再生利用、废矿物油再生利用、废弃生物质再生利用等。废旧机电产品无害化再生利用，包括废旧机电产品分拣、拆解、高附加值利用的无害化处理装备，含铜、重金属废弃电子产品及污泥（渣）的回收提纯成套装备、废旧家电和废印刷电路板高效率分离多种物料，熔点不同、相容性差的多种塑料混杂物直接综合利用装置。。

context: Strengthen support for the industrialization of key enterprises, innovative enterprises, and core component enterprises, improve product reliability, promote industrial upgrading, and perfect the industrial chain; support domestic and cross-border mergers and acquisitions, support the growth and strengthening of medical device enterprises, and participate in international competition; relax market access for medical services, encourage medical device enterprises to extend into the health and wellness services industry, promote the development of new formats, new business models, and third-party service networks; guide local governments to strengthen the cultivation of the medical device industry; strengthen production quality supervision and environmental protection inspections, and regulate market competition order.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十三五”医疗器械科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科办社〔2017〕44号）（科技部办公厅/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++政策措施,加快产业培育拓展
zh_context: 加强对骨干企业、创新型企业、核心部件企业产业化工作的支持，提高产品可靠性、促进产业升级和完善产业链条；支持国内和跨国企业兼并重组，扶持医疗器械企业做大做强，参与国际竞争；放宽医疗服务市场准入，鼓励医疗器械企业向卫生与健康服务业延伸，促进新业态、新商业模式和第三方服务网络发展；引导地方政府加强医疗器械产业培育；加强生产质量监管和环保监督检查力度，规范市场竞争秩序。

context: Establish a secure and reliable basic software product system, support open source and open development models, and focus on promoting the research and development and application of basic software products such as cloud operating systems, cloud middleware, new database management systems, mobile and cloud office suites. Strengthen the synergy between technical products and terminal applications, improve the maturity of basic software, and accelerate integration, adaptation, and optimization. Promote the research and development and application of core technologies and products for industrial software and industrial control systems, with a focus on breakthroughs in core key technologies for industrial application software in key industries such as military, energy, and chemical industry, and build an advanced product system and establish evaluation standards and specifications. Breakthroughs in key technologies for industrial control systems such as high-end numerical control systems, field buses, communication protocols, high-precision high-speed control, and servo drives, and promote the research and development of high-end numerical control systems, servo systems, and control systems. Build a national industrial software security testing platform. Accelerate the layout of industrial big data software and platforms, promote the deep application of customized solutions in important industrial fields, and create an industrial cloud application service system. Column 5: Software Industry Enhancement and Development Engineering Operating System. Strengthen the research and development and industrialization of high-trust server operating systems, secure and user-friendly desktop operating systems, and trusted cloud operating systems, and develop secure and controllable operating system products. Targeting digital products and intelligent complete equipment requirements, develop high-security and high-trust real-time industrial operating systems, and achieve compatibility with mainstream control devices, CPUs, and bus protocols. Develop high-end equipment embedded systems. Industrial big data platform. Build an industrial big data platform that covers the entire product lifecycle and all manufacturing business activities, develop device-side embedded data management platforms and real-time data intelligent processing systems, and develop industrial data processing platforms for industrial data collection, storage, querying, analysis, mining, and application in the cloud. Industrial cloud and core software for manufacturing. Research and develop the Internet+ industrial cloud system architecture and standard system, and build knowledge, data, service, and other resource repositories. Build industry-oriented industrial cloud service platforms and provide data-driven enterprise management, business collaboration, energy management, and other services. Accelerate the development of core software for manufacturing such as product lifecycle management, enterprise resource planning, supply chain management, and customer relationship management, and improve the level of industrialization. Industrial application software. Targeting key areas such as aerospace equipment, high-end numerical control machine tools and robots, advanced rail transit equipment, offshore engineering equipment and high-tech ships, power equipment, and agricultural machinery equipment, develop industry application software and solutions that cover the entire lifecycle, with a focus on breakthroughs in key technologies such as product innovation and development, intelligent control and analysis optimization, and equipment intelligent services, and develop an industrial application software system.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++信息产业发展指南（节选）（工信部联规〔2016〕453号）（工信部、发改委/2017年1月17日）++nan++其他政策++2017-1++发展重点,基础软件和工业软件
zh_context: 建立安全可靠的基础软件产品体系，支持开源、开放的开发模式，重点推进云操作系统、云中间件、新型数据库管理系统、移动端和云端办公套件等基础软件产品的研发和应用。强化技术产品和终端应用协同互动，提升基础软件成熟度，加快集成适配优化。推动工业软件和工业控制系统核心技术和产品的研发及应用，重点突破军工、能源、化工等安全关键行业工业应用软件核心关键技术，构建先进产品体系，形成评测标准与规范；突破高档数控系统、现场总线、通信协议、高精度高速控制和伺服驱动等工业控制系统关键技术，推动中高端数控系统、伺服系统和控制系统研发。构建国家工业软件安全测试平台。加快工业大数据软件与平台布局，促进重要工业领域系统解决方案定制化深度应用，打造工业云应用服务体系。专栏5软件产业提升发展工程操作系统。加强高可信服务器操作系统、安全易用桌面操作系统、新型智能终端操作。系统、可信云操作系统的研发和产业化，开发安全可控的操作系统产品。面向数字化产品。与智能成套装备需求，研制高安全、高可信的实时工业操作系统，实现与主流控制设备、CPU与总线协议的适配。研制高端装备嵌入式系统。工业大数据平台。构建覆盖产品全生命周期和制造全业务活动的工业大数据平台，研制设备端嵌入式数据管理平台与实时数据智能处理系统，开发云端工业数据采集、存储、查询、分析、挖掘与应用的工业数据处理平台。工业云与制造业核心软件。研发“互联网+”工业云体系架构与标准体系，构建知识、数据、服务等资源库。构建面向行业的工业云服务平台，提供数据驱动的企业管理、业务协同、能源管控等服务。加快发展产品生命周期管理、企业资源规划、供应链管理和客户关系管理等制造业核心软件，提高产业化水平。工业应用软件。面向航空航天装备、高档数控机床与机器人、先进轨道交通装备、海工装备与高技术船舶、电力装备、农机装备等重点领域，研制涵盖全生命周期的行业应用软件及解决方案，重点突破产品创新开发、智能控制与分析优化、装备智能服务等关键技术，发展工业应用软件体系。

context: After three years of effort, China has formulated a top-level plan for the development of intelligent ships. It has initially established a standard system for intelligent ships, made breakthroughs in core technologies such as intelligent perception of navigation situations and automatic berthing and departure, completed the development of related key intelligent equipment systems, and realized pilot demonstrations of typical scenarios such as remote control and autonomous navigation. It has also expanded the demonstration and promotion of typical intelligent ships with one platform + N intelligent applications. It has initially formed comprehensive testing and verification capabilities that combine virtual and real aspects of intelligent ships and integrate land and sea, and has kept pace with the world's advanced level in the development of intelligent ships.
extended_context: 高端装备++海洋工程装备++智能船舶发展行动计划（2019-2021年）（节选）（工信部联装〔2018〕288号）（工业和信息化部、交通运输部、国防科工局/2018年12月27日）++nan++其他政策++2018-12++总体思路,行动目标
zh_context: 经过三年努力，形成我国智能船舶发展顶层规划，初步建立智能船舶规范标准体系，突破航行态势智能感知、自动靠离泊等核心技术，完成相关重点智能设备系统研制，实现远程遥控、自主航行等功能的典型场景试点示范，扩大典型智能船舶“一个平台+N个智能应用”的示范推广，初步形成智能船舶虚实结合、岸海一体的综合测试与验证能力，保持我国智能船舶发展与世界先进水平同步。

context: The manufacturing of new computers and information terminal devices mainly includes the manufacturing of complete computers, computer components, computer peripherals, industrial control computers and systems, other computer manufacturing, communication terminal equipment manufacturing, radar and supporting equipment manufacturing, and other electronic equipment manufacturing. Communication terminal equipment manufacturing mainly includes low-power data acquisition terminals, mobile e-books, mobile TVs, satellite handheld devices, portable multimedia terminals, personal navigation information terminals, and digital integrated application (3S+C) terminals. Radar and supporting equipment manufacturing mainly includes navigation radar equipment, blind landing and traffic control equipment, radar altimeters, weather radar, air raid warning radar devices, blind bombing equipment, radar transmitters/responders, radar antennas and reflectors, and other radar equipment. Other electronic equipment manufacturing mainly includes intelligent medical systems, RFID readers/writers/tags (high frequency, ultra-high frequency, active).

zh_context: 新型计算机及信息终端设备制造，主要包括计算机整机制造、计算机零部件制造、计算机外围设备制造、工业控制计算机及系统制造、其他计算机制造、通信终端设备制造、雷达及配套设备制造、其他电子设备制造等。通信终端设备制造，主要包括低能耗数据采集终端、移动电子书、移动电视、卫星手持机、便携式多媒体终端、个人导航信息终端、数字化综合应用（3S+C）终端。雷达及配套设备制造，主要包括导航用雷达设备、盲降及交通控制设备、雷达测高设备、气象雷达、空袭警报雷达装置、盲目投弹设备、雷达发射/应答器、雷达天线及其反射器及零件、其他雷达设备。其他电子设备制造，主要包括智能医疗系统、RFID读写机具/标签（高频、超高频、有源）。

context: The data-driven software-defined is becoming a prominent feature of integrated applications. On one hand, data-driven information technology is driving industry transformation, accelerating the cross-border integration and innovative development of the new generation of information technology. Through software-defined hardware, software-defined storage, software-defined networking, software-defined systems, etc., it brings more new products, services, and innovative models, giving rise to new formats and economic growth points, and promoting data as a strategic asset. On the other hand, software-defined is accelerating the integration, innovation, and transformation of various industries. Software-defined manufacturing stimulates innovation in research and development design, simulation verification, production manufacturing, and business management, accelerating the development of new models such as personalized customization, networked collaboration, service-oriented manufacturing, and cloud manufacturing, promoting the transformation of manufacturing from production-oriented to service-oriented. Software-defined services profoundly impact the development of industries such as finance, logistics, transportation, culture, and tourism, giving birth to a new group of industry entities, business platforms, integrated formats, and new types of consumption. It triggers multidimensional and deep-level changes in areas such as resident consumption, livelihood services, and social governance, leading to the emergence of various new network economic models such as the sharing economy, platform economy, and algorithm economy, nurturing and strengthening the development of new driving forces.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++进度安排,以“软件定义”为特征的融合应用开启信息经济新图景
zh_context: 以数据驱动的“软件定义”正在成为融合应用的显著特征。一方面，数据驱动信息技术产业变革，加速新一代信息技术的跨界融合和创新发展，通过软件定义硬件、软件定义存储、软件定义网络、软件定义系统等，带来更多的新产品、服务和模式创新，催生新的业态和经济增长点，推动数据成为战略资产。另一方面，“软件定义”加速各行业领域的融合创新和转型升级。软件定义制造激发了研发设计、仿真验证、生产制造、经营管理等环节的创新活力，加快了个性化定制、网络化协同、服务型制造、云制造等新模式的发展，推动生产型制造向生产服务型。制造转变；软件定义服务深刻影响了金融、物流、交通、文化、旅游等服务业的发展，催生了一批新的产业主体、业务平台、融合性业态和新型消费，引发了居民消费、民生服务、社会治理等领域多维度、深层次的变革，涌现出分享经济、平台经济、算法经济等众多新型网络经济模式，培育壮大了发展新动能。

zh_context: 矿产资源综合利用，主要包括陆地石油开采、陆地天然气开采、铁矿采选、镁矿采选、稀土金属矿采选、其他稀有金属矿采选、粘土及其他土砂石开采、化学矿开采、其他采矿业、其他电力生产等。陆地石油开采，主要包括油母页岩开采综合利用、油砂开采综合利用、伴生天然气综合利用、煤系油母页岩资源开发利用、油砂综合利用。陆地天然气开采，主要包括煤层气综合开发利用、微生物开采煤层气技术应用、页岩气综合利用。铁矿采选，主要包括中低品位铁矿、伴生矿综合开发利用。镁矿采选，主要包括镁伴矿尾矿再开发利用。稀土金属矿采选，主要包括稀土金属矿尾矿再开发利用。

context: Using agriculture, manufacturing, construction, ecological environment, cultural tourism, and other digital transformation and intelligent upgrading as driving forces, accelerate the deployment of sensing terminal applications such as data collection terminals, meters, and controllers, support the use of new network technologies to transform enterprise intranets and industry-specific networks, and build platforms that provide services such as environmental monitoring, information tracing, status warning, and identification resolution. Create a batch of industry-adapted solutions and application benchmarks. Column 4: Industry Application Construction Guidelines. Smart agriculture. Promote the deployment of sensing terminals such as information perception and data collection in agricultural production, environmental monitoring, biological ontology recognition, plant pests and diseases prevention and control, as well as livestock and aquaculture, dynamic monitoring of fishing vessels, and quality and safety control. Build an agricultural and rural monitoring network, establish platforms for traceability of agricultural products, remote monitoring of fisheries law enforcement, and monitoring of aquatic biological resources, and promote the digital transformation of agricultural production, operation, and management services. Intelligent manufacturing. Accelerate the deployment of sensing devices such as radio frequency identification, intelligent sensors, and visual recognition, promote the transformation of dumb devices data collection and networking capabilities in industrial sites, and realize real-time monitoring of production status, production environment, and materials. Encourage industrial enterprises to use time-sensitive networks, 5G, and other new network technologies to upgrade and transform enterprise intranets and extranets. Encourage IoT companies to collaborate with industrial enterprises to build IoT platforms around typical applications such as equipment health management, integrated operation and control, and on-site assembly. Smart construction. Accelerate the application of IoT technologies such as intelligent sensors, radio frequency identification (RFID), QR codes, near-field communication, and low-power wide-area networks in the production, procurement, and transportation of building materials, BIM collaborative design, smart construction sites, smart operation and maintenance, and smart buildings. Use IoT technology to enhance the intelligent management and supervision level of construction quality, personnel safety, and green construction. Smart environmental protection. Promote the application deployment of low-power, miniaturized, and intelligent ecological environment sensing terminals in water, marine, atmospheric, soil, solid waste, nuclear and radiation safety, carbon emissions, and other aspects. Build a comprehensive management and data sharing platform for ecological environment, create typical applications such as pollution source management, ecological environment monitoring, ecological protection, and supervision and law enforcement, and enhance the ecological environment perception capability and intelligent management decision-making level. Smart cultural tourism. Promote the construction and application of intelligent gates, smart screens in scenic areas, electronic tickets, mobile tour guides, and other sensing terminals. Especially accelerate the application deployment of sensing terminals such as environmental monitoring, micro-environment regulation, and video passenger counters in cultural relic protection, and promote the construction of comprehensive tourism service platforms. Evaluate immersive experiences, virtual exhibition halls, high-definition live broadcasts, and other new cultural tourism services, and provide tourists with safer, more convenient, and comfortable quality tourism services.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++物联网++物联网新型基础设施建设三年行动计划（2021-2023年）（工信部联科〔2021〕130号）（工信部等部门/2021年9月10日）++nan++其他政策++2021-9++重点任务,融合应用发展行动,行业应用领域
zh_context: 以农业、制造业、建筑业、生态环境、文旅等数字化转型、智能化升级为驱动力，加快数据采集终端、表计、控制器等感知终端应用部署，支持运用新型网络技术改造企业内网和行业专网，建设提供环境监测、信息追溯、状态预警、标识解析等服务的平台，打造一批与行业适配度高的解决方案和应用标杆。专栏4：行业应用建设指引。智慧农业。推动信息感知、数据采集等感知终端在农业生产、环境监测、生物本体识别、植物病虫害和动物疫病防治以及畜禽水产养殖、渔船动态监控、质量安全管控等方面的应用部署，建设农业农村监测网络，搭建农产品质量追溯、渔政执法远程监控和水生生物资源监测平台，推进农业生产经营和管理服务数字化改造。智能制造。加快射频识别、智能传感器、视觉识别等感知装置应用部署，推动工业现场“哑设备”数据采集和联网能力改造，实现对生产状态、生产环境、物料的实时监测。鼓励工业企业利用时间敏感网络、5G等新型网络技术，开展企业内网和外网的升级改造。围绕设备健康管理、经营管控一体化和现场辅助装配等典型应用，鼓励物联网企业联合工业企业开展物联网平台的建设。智能建造。加快智能传感器、射频识别（RFID）、二维码、近场通信、低功耗广域网等物联网技术在建材部品生产采购运输、BIM协同设计、智慧工地、智慧运维、智慧建筑等方面的应用。利用物联网技术提升对建造质量、人员安全、绿色施工的智能管理与监管水平。智慧环保。围绕水环境、海洋环境、大气环境、土壤环境、固体废物、核与辐射安全、碳排放等方面，推动低功耗、小型化、智能化生态环境感知终端的应用部署。建设生态环境综合管理和数据共享平台，打造污染源管理、生态环境监测、生态保护、监督执法等典型应用，提升生态环境感知能力和管理决策智能化水平。智慧文旅。推动智能闸机、景区智慧屏、电子客票、移动导游等感知终端的。建设和应用，尤其加快文物保护中的环境监测、微环境调控、视频客流计数器等感知终端的应用部署，推动旅游综合服务平台建设。围绕沉浸式体验、虚拟展厅、高清直播等新型文旅服务，开展智慧导览应用系统评价，面向游客提供更加安全、便利和舒适的品质化旅游服务。

context: Implement the Cybersecurity Law and the requirements for the security protection of national key information infrastructure, establish a system for implementing certification of network infrastructure security protection capabilities and maturity evaluation, and construct an industry framework for managing network security risks and an evaluation system for effectiveness. Promote the integration of the network security guarantee system and capacity building with planning, construction, and operation, deepen mechanisms such as the management of security vulnerabilities in network products, network security risk assessment, and network security monitoring and reporting, establish a national-level network security public service system, and continuously enhance the level of basic network security protection. Accelerate the development of monitoring and defense capabilities for important network nodes and key business systems, focus on enhancing the defense capabilities against large-scale network attacks, strengthen the capacity building for public domain name service security, and prevent and control major network security incidents. Improve the industry network security review system, promote the security testing and certification of network key equipment, establish supply chain risk management systems such as supplier network security maturity certification, steadily and orderly promote the use of commercial encryption, and enhance the security protection level of network infrastructure.

zh_context: 深入落实《网络安全法》及国家关键信息基础设施安全保护要求，建立实施网络基础设施安全防护能力认证及成熟度评价制度，构建行业关键信息基础设施网络安全风险管理框架和效果评估体系。推动网络安全保障体系与能力建设同规划、同建设、同运行，深化网络产品安全漏洞管理、网络安全风险评估、网络安全监测通报等机制，建设国家级网络安全公共服务体系，持续增强基础网络安全防护水平。加快形成覆盖重要网络节点和关键业务系统安全监测防御能力，着力增强大规模网络攻击防御能力，加强公共域名服务安全保障能力建设，防范遏制重特大网络安全事件。健全行业网络安全审查体系，推进网络关键设备安全检测认证，建立供应商网络安全成熟度认证等供应链风险管理制度，稳妥有序推进商用密码应用，提升网络基础设施安全保障水平。

context: Carry out the promotion of safety regulations and standards for the production, storage, transportation, and utilization of hydrogen energy, enhance the safety awareness of enterprises, and establish a solid foundation for the safe utilization of hydrogen energy. Strengthen the popularization of hydrogen energy and promote public opinion guidance, timely respond to social concerns, and promote the formation of social consensus.
extended_context: 节能环保++新能源汽车++氢能产业发展中长期规划（2021-2035年）（发展改革委、国家能源局/2022年3月）++nan++其他政策++2022-3++组织实施,深入开展宣传引导
zh_context: 开展氢能制、储、输、用的安全法规和安全标准宣贯工作，增强企业主体安全意识，筑牢氢能安全利用基础。加强氢能科普宣传，注重舆论引导，及时回应社会关切，推动形成社会共识。

context: Network equipment manufacturing mainly includes the manufacturing of other computers, communication system equipment, etc. Communication system equipment manufacturing mainly includes advanced ground communication systems (using satellite communication new technologies (new protocols) for cost-effective ground communication systems), new generation ground receiving systems (high-speed fully switched ground receiving systems based on autonomous data sources), emergency disaster reduction satellite communication systems, broadband/high-frequency/laser satellite communication systems, transceivers for C, Ku, Ka, and L bands, service-oriented distribution systems, pattern-based application systems, microwave communication equipment, scattering communication equipment, carrier communication equipment, communication navigation orientation equipment, high-performance routers based on IPv4/IPv6, high-performance switches based on IPv4/IPv6, broadband wireless fixed access, broadband wireless LAN, mobile broadband systems, interactive broadcasting networks, short-range ultra-high frequency wireless communication, active optical network access (AON), passive optical network access (PON), power line carrier machines, very small aperture terminals (VSAT), optical transceivers, optical cable relay equipment, optical fiber amplifiers, wavelength division multiplexers, optical cross-connect equipment, optical splitter multiplexing equipment (ADM), multi-service transport platform (MSTP), electro-optical converters, ASON equipment.

zh_context: 网络设备制造，主要包括其他计算机制造、通信系统设备制造等。通信系统设备制造，主要包括先进地面通信系统（采用卫星通信新技术（新协议）的高性价比地面通信系统）、新一代地面接收系统（基于自主数据源的高速全交换式的地面接收系统）、应急减灾卫星通信系统、宽带/高频/激光卫星通信系统、C、Ku、Ka及L波段的转发器、面向服务的分发系统、模式类应用系统、微波通信设备、散射通信设备、载波通信设备、通信导航定向设备、基于IPv4/IPv6的高性能路由器、基于IPv4/IPv6的高性能交换机、宽带无线固定接入、宽带无线局域网、移动宽带系统、交互式广播网络、近距离超高频无线通信、有源光网络接入（AON）、无源光网络接入（PON）、电力线载波机、甚小型天线地球站（VSAT）、光端机、光缆中继设备、光纤放大器、波分复用器、光交叉联接设备、光分叉复用设备（ADM）、多业务传送设备（MSTP）、电光转换器、ASON设备。

context: In the field of medical imaging, with the direction of fusion, dynamic, non-invasive, high-definition, focusing on the difficult problems of medical imaging detection and monitoring such as subclinical lesions of tumors, vascular/nerve morphology and function, the basic research of biomedical image acquisition, analysis, and processing technology is strengthened. The development of new technologies such as CT, MRI, novel positron detection, high-resolution laser imaging, multimodal molecular imaging, molecular pathology microscopy imaging, and novel medical acousto-opto-electromagnetic dynamic imaging is accelerated to better meet the needs of real-time, rapid, accurate diagnosis, and precise intraoperative treatment.In the field of in vitro diagnostics, with the direction of integration, high-throughput, on-site, high-precision, focusing on the difficult problems of automated clinical examination, rapid and accurate detection, intelligent pathological diagnosis, early disease diagnosis, the basic research of biochemistry and biophysics in different levels of life activities and the development and application of new diagnostic targets are strengthened. The development of cutting-edge technologies such as microfluidic chips, single-molecule sequencing, liquid biopsy, liquid phase chips, and intelligent biosensors is accelerated to better meet the needs of early, rapid, convenient, and accurate diagnosis in different levels of medical institutions.In the field of advanced treatment, with the direction of precision, minimally invasive, fast, intelligent, focusing on the clinical treatment difficult problems of new particle beam applications, multimodal information fusion, haptic feedback, and spatial measurement based on real-time interaction of organs, lesions, nerves, and blood vessels, basic research on virtual surgical simulation and medical physics is conducted. The development of cutting-edge technologies such as virtual reality, augmented reality, and positioning navigation is accelerated to promote the development of new tumor treatment methods, precise surgical planning, and robot-assisted treatment.In the field of biomedical materials, with the direction of tissue replacement, functional repair, and biological regulation, focusing on the difficult problems of tissue and organ repair, functional replacement, degradation regulation, the basic research on the interaction mechanism between biological materials and cells and tissues, especially at the nanoscale, and the biological effects of different physical factors are conducted. The development of new technologies such as surface modification of biomedical materials, genomics of biomedical materials, personalized 3D printing of implant materials and tissue engineering scaffolds is accelerated to promote the clinical application of tissue engineering and regenerative medicine.In the field of rehabilitation nursing, with the direction of intelligence, integration, individualization, focusing on the difficult problems of flexible control, human-machine coupling, and multi-information fusion, the application research of artificial intelligence, neural engineering, and robotics in medical rehabilitation is strengthened. The development of key technologies such as human-machine interaction, brain-machine interface, human-machine-electric fusion, and intelligent control related to rehabilitation, disability assistance, and elderly care is accelerated to promote the transformation and application of specialized robot products in home care, elderly companionship, assistance, and wearable rehabilitation.In the field of health promotion, with the direction of continuous monitoring, intelligent perception, health identification, focusing on the difficult problems of continuous collection of health information, dynamic monitoring, health status identification, personal health management, the basic research of biomedical information acquisition, analysis, and processing, weak signal detection, etc. is conducted. The development of new technologies such as non-invasive blood glucose detection, non-contact electrocardiogram, psychological state measurement, cardiopulmonary function detection, and health big data analysis is accelerated to promote the development of smart healthcare and health cloud services based on human body sensor networks and medical device Internet of Things, and to meet the needs of the development of new service formats such as health self-management.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十三五”医疗器械科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科办社〔2017〕44号）（科技部办公厅/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,发展前沿关键技术，引领医疗器械创新,前沿性技术
zh_context: 在医学影像领域，以“融合、动态、无创、高清”为方向，围绕肿瘤亚临床病灶、血管/神经形态和功能等一批医学影像检测监测难题，重点加强生物医学图像的获取、分析与处理技术的基础研究，加快发展CT、MRI、新型正电子探测、高分辨激光成像、多模态分子影像、分子病理显微成像、新型医学声光电磁动态成像等新技术，更好满足实时、快速、精确诊断以及术中精准治疗等应用需求。在体外诊断领域，以“一体化、高通量、现场化、高精度”为方向，围绕临检自动化、快速精准检测、病理智能诊断、疾病早期诊断等难点问题，重点加强不同层次生命活动中生物化学和生物物理学的基础研究和新型诊断靶标的发展与应用，加快发展微流控芯片、单分子测序、液体活检、液相芯片、智能生物传感等前沿技术，更好满足不同层级医疗机构的早期、快速、便捷、精确诊断等应用需求。在先进治疗领域，以“精准、微创、快捷、智能”为方向，围绕新型粒子束应用、多模式信息融合、触觉反馈、所见即所触空间测量等临床治疗难点问题，重点开展面向脏器、病灶、神经及血管的实时交互的虚拟手术模拟仿真和医学物理等基础研究，加快发展虚拟现实、增强现实、定位导航等前沿技术，促进新型肿瘤治疗方法、精准手术规划、机器人治疗等发展。在生物医用材料领域，以“组织替代、功能修复、生物调控”为方向，围绕组织器官修复、功能替代、降解调控等难点问题，重点开展生物材料的细胞组织相互作用机制、不同尺度特别是纳米尺度与不同物理因子的生物学效应等基础研究，加快发展生物医用材料表面改性、生物医用材料基因组、植入材料及组织工程支架的个性化3D打印等新技术，促进组织工程与再生医学的临床应用。在康复护理领域，以“智能化、集成化、个体化”为方向，围绕柔性控制、人机耦合、多信息融合等难点问题，重点加强人工智能、神经工程和机器人的前沿技术在医疗康复中的应用研究，加快发展康复、助残、养老等相关的人机交互、脑-机接口、人-机-电融合与智能控制等关键技术，突破家庭护理、老年陪伴、助力助行、穿戴式康复等专业化机器人产品的转化应用。在健康促进领域，以“连续监测、智能感知、健康辨识”为方向，围绕健康信息连续采集、动态监测、健康状态辨识、个人健康管理等难点问题，重点开展生物医学信息的获取、分析与处理，微弱信号检测等技术的基础研究，加快发展无创血糖检测、非接触式心电、心理状态测量、心肺功能检测和健康大数据分析等新技术，推动基于人体传感器网络、医疗设备物联网的智慧医疗、健康云服务发展，满足健康自主管理等新型服务业态发展的需要。

context: Information system integration services mainly include integration implementation services, information system design services, information system integration implementation services, and information system operation and maintenance services.
zh_context: 信息系统集成服务，主要包括集成实施服务、信息系统设计服务、信息系统集成实施服务、信息系统运行维护服务。

context: Network equipment manufacturing mainly includes the manufacturing of other computers, communication system equipment, etc. The manufacturing of other computers mainly includes high-end routers, single-slot processing routers (with a processing capacity of ≥400Gbps), whole-machine processing routers (with a processing capacity of ≥6.4Tbps (bidirectional)), routers with multiple rate interfaces (supporting 10Gbps/40Gbps/100Gbps), large-scale cluster routers (supporting 2+x (x≥4)), servers with multiple rate interfaces (supporting 10Gbps/40Gbps/100Gbps), OpenFlow switches, smart routers, smart terminals supporting hot-swappable data cards, and smart terminals supporting hot-swappable other communication cards.

zh_context: 网络设备制造，主要包括其他计算机制造、通信系统设备制造等。其他计算机制造，主要包括高端路由器、单槽位处理路由器（单槽位处理能力≧400Gbps）、整机处理路由器（整机处理能力≧6.4Tbps（双向））、多种速率接口路由器（支持10Gbps/40Gbps/100Gbps）、大规模集群路由器（支持2+x（x≧4））、多种速率接口服务器（支持10Gbps/40Gbps/100Gbps）、OpenFlow交换机、智能路由器、支持可热插拔数据卡的智能终端、支持可热插拔其它通信卡的智能终端。

context: The biopharmaceutical industry mainly includes the manufacturing of new vaccines, biotechnology drugs, chemical drugs and raw materials, modern traditional Chinese medicine and ethnic medicine, key equipment and raw materials for biopharmaceuticals, and biopharmaceutical services. New vaccines mainly include major or newly emerging infectious disease vaccines such as hepatitis, malaria, tuberculosis, AIDS, and hand, foot, and mouth disease, as well as large-scale cultivation of vaccine antigens, vaccine antigen purification technology, and new process technologies for protein purification production. Biotechnology drugs mainly include the scale-up production technologies for the treatment of malignant tumors, autoimmune diseases, and neurological disorders, as well as antibody drugs, gene engineering drugs, nucleic acid drugs, stable expression cell line construction technologies for emergency prevention and treatment of infectious diseases, protein engineering technologies, chemical modification technologies, long-acting, sustained-release, controlled-release, and other biopharmaceutical technologies. The manufacturing of chemical drugs and raw materials mainly includes the development of new anti-infective drugs against viruses, drug-resistant bacteria, deep-seated and multiple fungi, drug-resistant tuberculosis, and other microorganisms (such as chlamydia, mycoplasma, malaria, parasites, etc.), as well as the isolation and purification of drug production, chiral synthesis and separation, biocatalytic synthesis, and crystal preparation.

zh_context: 生物医药产业，主要包括新型疫苗、生物技术药物、化学药品与原料药制造、现代中药与民族药、生物医药关键装备与原辅料、生物医药服务等。新型疫苗，主要包括肝炎、疟疾、结核、艾滋病、手足口病等重大或新发传染病疫苗、疫苗抗原大规模培养、疫苗抗原纯化技术、蛋白纯化生产新工艺技术等。生物技术药物，主要包括治疗恶性肿瘤、自身免疫性疾病、神经系统疾病等难治性疾病以及用于紧急预防和治疗感染性疾病的抗体类药物、基因工程药物、抗体药物、核酸药物、稳定表达细胞系构建技术等的规模化制备生产技术、蛋白质工程技术、化学修饰技术、长效、缓释、控释等生物制剂技术等。化学药品与原料药制造，主要包括抗病毒、抗耐药菌、抗深部和多重真菌、抗耐药结核杆菌、抗其他微生物（如衣原体、支原体、疟疾、寄生虫等）的新型抗感染药物、药物生产的分离纯化、手性合成和拆分、生物催化合成、晶型制备等。

context: Building an ecological civilization is a long-term plan that concerns the well-being of the people and the future of the nation. context: Intelligent measurement and control devices mainly include intelligent control systems, intelligent instruments and meters, etc. Intelligent control systems refer to industrial control systems used in numerical control machine tools, basic manufacturing equipment, process industrial equipment, and other manufacturing equipment to achieve control functions. This includes machine tool numerical control systems, distributed control systems, fieldbus control systems, programmable control systems, embedded dedicated control systems, safety control systems, industrial computer systems, etc. Intelligent instruments and meters refer to instruments and meters used in discrete manufacturing and process industrial equipment to continuously measure variables such as temperature, pressure, flow rate, level, or to measure physical parameters such as object position, tilt, rotation, and material composition. This includes sensors and their systems, intelligent (temperature, pressure, flow rate, level) measuring instruments and meters, intelligent actuators, special variable online measuring instruments and meters, intelligent experimental analysis instruments, online analysis instruments, online non-destructive testing instruments, online material performance testing instruments, intelligent electricity meters, intelligent water meters, intelligent gas meters, intelligent heat meters, and their monitoring devices, and other intelligent instruments and meters.

zh_context: 智能测控装置，主要包括智能控制系统、智能仪器仪表等。智能控制系统，指用于数控机床、基础制造装备、流程工业装备及其他制造装备中，实现控制功能的工业控制系统，包括机床数控系统、分散型控制系统、现场总线控制系统、可编程控制系统、嵌入式专用控制系统、安全控制系统、工业计算机系统等。智能仪器仪表，指用于离散制造和流程工业装备中，连续测量温度、压力、流量、物位等变量，或者测量物体位置、倾斜、旋转等物性参数以及物质成分的仪器和仪表，包括传感器及其系统、智能（温度、压力、流量、物位）测量仪器仪表、智能执行器、特殊变量在线测量仪器仪表、智能化实验分析仪器、在线分析仪器、在线无损探伤仪器、在线材料性能试验仪器、智能电表、智能水表、智能煤气表、智能热量表及其监测装置等其他智能仪器仪表。

context: Other electronic device manufacturing mainly includes driver circuits, electronic paper, 3.5-13.5 inch capacitive touch screens, laser displays, LED epitaxial wafers, LED chips, LED devices, LED application products, high-speed A/D and D/A devices, and wideband power amplifiers for mobile communications.

context: In 2016, in enterprises that meet the standards of the integrated management system for the integration of informatization and industrialization, more than 60 smart manufacturing pilot demonstration projects were selected in key regions and industries with conditions and foundations, especially in new industrialization demonstration bases. Through pilot demonstrations, the key technical equipment in five areas, including high-end CNC machine tools and industrial robots, additive manufacturing equipment, intelligent sensing and control equipment, intelligent detection and assembly equipment, and intelligent logistics and warehousing equipment, as well as the innovation capability of industrial Internet, will be further improved. A batch of smart manufacturing standards in key areas will be formed, and new models of smart manufacturing will be continuously developed and promoted. The pilot demonstration projects of smart workshops/factories will achieve a 20% reduction in operating costs, a 20% reduction in product development cycle, a 20% increase in production efficiency, a 10% reduction in product defect rate, and a 10% increase in energy utilization rate through continuous improvement over 2-3 years.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++工业和信息化部关于开展智能制造试点示范2016专项行动的通知（节选）（工信部装[2016]125号）（工业和信息化部/2016年3月31日）++nan++其他政策++2016-3++nan
zh_context: 2016年，在符合两化融合管理体系标准的企业中，在有条件、有基础的重点地区、行业，特别是新型工业化产业示范基地中，遴选60个以上智能制造试点示范项目。通过试点示范，进一步提升高档数控机床与工业机器人、增材制造装备、智能传感与控制装备、智能检测与装配装备、智能物流与仓储装备五大关键技术装备，以及工业互联网创新能力，形成关键领域一批智能制造标准，不断形成并推广智能制造新模式。智能车间/工厂试点示范项目通过2-3年持续提升，实现运营成本降低20%，产品研制周期缩短20%，生产效率提高20%，产品不良品率降低10%，能源利用率提高10%。

context: The manufacturing of biochemical products mainly includes the production of organic chemical raw materials, other basic chemical raw materials, chemical reagents and additives, specialized chemical products, forest chemical products, specialized materials for environmental pollution treatment, other specialized chemical products, and the manufacturing of plastic parts and other plastic products. context: Fill in the gaps in industrial development. Promote collaborative research and development between industry, academia, and research institutions to fill in the gaps in specialized materials, core components, and processing techniques, and enhance the functionality, performance, and reliability of key robot components. Develop robot control software, core algorithms, etc., to improve the functionality and intelligence level of robot control systems. Strengthen the construction of the standard system. Establish a national robot standardization organization to better play the role of the national technical standard innovation base (robot) in technical standard innovation and continue to promote robot standardization work. Improve the robot standard system, accelerate the research and formulation of urgently needed standards, carry out the revision of robot function, performance, safety, and other standards, and strengthen the transformation and application of scientific and technological achievements into standards. Actively participate in international standardization work. Enhance testing and certification capabilities. Encourage enterprises to strengthen their testing and verification capabilities, strengthen product testing, and improve quality and reliability. Enhance the testing capabilities of the Robot Testing and Evaluation Center to meet the needs of enterprise testing and certification services. Promote the construction of the Chinese robot certification system. Column 2: Key actions to enhance the foundation of robots. 01 High-performance reducers. Develop advanced manufacturing technologies and processes for RV reducers and harmonic reducers, improve the accuracy retention (life), reliability, and noise reduction of reducers, and achieve mass production. Research the basic theory of new high-performance precision gear transmission devices, break through precision/ultra-precision manufacturing technologies and assembly processes, and develop new high-performance precision reducers. 02 High-performance servo drive systems. Optimize high-performance servo drive control, servo motor structure design, manufacturing processes, self-tuning, and other technologies, develop high-precision, high-power density robot-specific servo motors and high-performance motor brakes and other core components. 03 Intelligent controllers. Develop controller hardware systems with high real-time performance, reliability, multi-processor parallel operation, or multi-core processors, and achieve standardization, modularization, and networking. Break through multi-joint high-precision motion calculation, motion control, and intelligent motion planning algorithms, improve the intelligence level, safety, reliability, and ease of use of control systems. 04 Intelligent integrated joints. Develop integrated and modular robot joints for mechanism/drive/perception/control, develop servo motor drives, high-precision harmonic drive dynamic compensation, composite sensor high-precision real-time data fusion, modular integrated sets, etc., to achieve high-speed real-time communication, joint force/torque protection, and other functions. 05 Development of new sensors. Three-dimensional vision sensors, six-dimensional force sensors, joint torque sensors, force perception sensors, large-field single-line and multi-line laser radar, intelligent auditory sensors, and high-precision encoders, etc., to meet the needs of intelligent development of robots. 06 Development of intelligent end effectors. Develop intelligent and dexterous end effectors capable of intelligent grasping, flexible assembly, rapid replacement, etc., to meet the diversified operational needs of robots.

zh_context: 补齐产业发展短板。推动用产学研联合攻关，补齐专用材料、核心元器件、加工工艺等短板，提升机器人关键零部件的功能、性能和可靠性；开发机器人控制软件、核心算法等，提高机器人控制系统的功能和智能化水平。加强标准体系建设。建立全国机器人标准化组织，更好发挥国家技术标准创新基地（机器人）的技术标准创新作用，持续推进机器人标准化工作。健全机器人标准体系，加快急需标准研究制定，开展机器人功能、性能、安全等标准制修订，加强科技成果向标准转化和标准应用推广。积极参与国际标准化工作。提升检测认证能力。鼓励企业加强试验验证能力建设，强化产品检测，提高质量与可靠性。增强机器人检测与评定中心检测能力，满足企业检测认证服务需求。推进中国机器人认证体系建设。专栏2机器人关键基础提升行动。01高性能减速器。研发RV减速器和谐波减速器的先进制造技术和工艺，提高减速器的精度保持性（寿命）、可靠性，降低噪音，实现规模生产。研究新型高性能精密齿轮传动装置的基础理论，突破精密/超精密制造技术、装配工艺，研制新型高性能精密减速器。02高性能伺服驱动系统。优化高性能伺服驱动控制、伺服电机结构设计、制造工艺、自整定等技术，研制高精度、高功率密度的机器人专用伺服电机及高性能电机制动器等核心部件。03智能控制器。研发具有高实时性、高可靠性、多处理器并行工作或多核处理器的控制器硬件系统，实现标准化、模块化、网络化。突破多关节高精度运动解算、运动控制及智能运动规划算法，提升控制系统的智能化水平及安全性、可靠性和易用性。04智能一体化关节。研制机构/驱动/感知/控制一体化、模块化机器人关节，研发伺服电机驱动、。高精度谐波传动动态补偿、复合型传感器高精度实时数据融合、模块化一体化集。成等技术，实现高速实时通信、关节力/力矩保护等功能。05新型传感器研制三维视觉传感器、六维力传感器和关节力矩传感器等力觉传感器、大视。场单线和多线激光雷达、智能听觉传感器以及高精度编码器等产品，满足机器人。智能化发展需求。06智能末端执行器研制能够实现智能抓取、柔性装配、快速更换等功能的智能灵巧作业末端执。行器，满足机器人多样化操作需求。

context: With the discovery and engineering application of biocatalysts as the core, we aim to construct an efficient industrial biocatalysis and conversion technology system, significantly improving the catalytic efficiency and industrial application properties of industrial enzymes and proteins, and significantly reducing production costs. We aim to establish biocatalytic synthesis routes for steroid hormones, non-natural amino acids, chiral compounds, special amino acids, rare sugar alcohols, glycopeptides, and other compounds, promote large-scale production and application demonstrations, achieve safe, clean, and sustainable production of chemical raw materials, food additives, pesticide intermediates, and bioemulsifiers, and break through key technologies and equipment in green bioprocesses such as biobased synthesis, biobased textiles, biobased mining, and biobased papermaking. We aim to promote the comprehensive integration and demonstration application of green bioprocesses in the fields of chemical industry, medicine, agriculture, light industry, energy, and ecological environment, significantly reduce material and energy consumption, industrial solid waste generation, and environmental pollutant emissions, and initially establish an ecological, safe, low-carbon, and circular development bioprocess system.
