context: One is database services. Utilizing cloud database systems to achieve cross-platform and cross-business collaborative management of various types of data. Two is big data analysis services. Utilizing cloud-based big data platforms to promote data resource aggregation, including data collection, storage, analysis, mining, and collaborative applications. Three is middleware platform services. Utilizing cloud-based middleware services to build distributed system architectures to meet the needs of the Internet+ transformation. Four is Internet of Things (IoT) platform services. Connecting massive IoT terminal devices to the cloud platform to achieve efficient and visualized online device management. Five is software development platform services. Through cloud-based development platforms, software lifecycle management is conducted to quickly build development, testing, and runtime environments, standardize development processes, reduce costs, and improve efficiency. Six is artificial intelligence platform services. Utilizing the computing resources of the cloud platform to develop intelligent services such as speech recognition, image recognition, and facial recognition, thereby enhancing business intelligence levels.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++按需合理选择云服务,平台系统类服务
zh_context: 一是数据库服务。利用云数据库系统，实现各类数据跨平台、跨业务的协同管理。二是大数据分析服务。利用云端大数据平台推动数据资源集聚，进行数据采集、存储、分析、挖掘和协同应用。三是中间件平台服务。利用云上中间件服务，构建分布式系统架构，满足“互联网+”转型的需要。四是物联网平台服务。将海量物联网终端设备接入云平台，实现设备高效可视化在线管理。五是软件开发平台服务。通过云上开发平台进行软件生命周期管理，快速构建开发、测试、运行环境，规范开发流程、降低成本、提高效率。六是人工智能平台服务。利用云平台的计算资源，形成语音识别、图像识别、人脸识别等智能服务能力，提升业务智能化水平。

context: Manufacturing of environmental protection monitoring instruments and electronic equipment mainly includes the production of laboratory analytical instruments, specialized instruments for environmental monitoring, and instruments for nuclear and nuclear radiation measurement. The production of laboratory analytical instruments mainly includes automatic analyzers for nutrient salts, various organic compound (polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons, etc.) measurement instruments, and instruments for measuring yellow organic compounds. The production of specialized instruments for environmental monitoring includes water pollution monitoring instruments, gas or smoke analysis and detection instruments, noise monitoring instruments, related environmental monitoring instruments, ship anti-pollution detection systems, environmental monitoring instruments and meters, specialized equipment for environmental quality monitoring networks, ecological monitoring instruments, pollution source process monitoring equipment, air quality and pollution source online monitoring systems, online PM2.5 component analyzers, mobile vehicle exhaust cloud detection system engineering equipment, high-precision coal-fired flue gas pollutant monitoring systems suitable for ultra-low emissions, toxic and heavy metal online monitoring systems, automatic online detection systems for persistent organic pollutants (PPOs), automatic online detection systems for volatile organic pollutants (VOCs), fully automatic online analyzers for organic carbon/elemental carbon (OC/EC), laser process gas analysis systems, and online biological toxicity water quality early warning monitoring technology and equipment.

context: Comprehensively enhance the functionality of the national integrated government service platform, accelerate the standardization, regularization, and facilitation of government services, continuously improve the digitization and intelligence level of government services, and achieve the 'one-stop' handling of frequently used services for the convenience of enterprises and the public. Establish and improve the coordination mechanism for government data sharing, accelerate the mutual trust and recognition of digital identity authentication, electronic licenses, electronic signatures, electronic documents, and promote the electronic invoicing reform, facilitating the sharing of government data, process optimization, and business collaboration. Promote the overall linkage of online and offline government services, achieve full-process online services, and deepen the extension to the grassroots level, enhancing the level of service convenience and sharing. Carry out deep integration and innovation of government data with business and services, enhance the predictive capability of handling requirements based on big data, and create proactive and multi-level innovative service scenarios. Focus on public health, social security, emergency management, and other fields, deepen the application of digital technology, and achieve rapid response and coordinated disposal of major public emergencies.

zh_context: 全面提升全国一体化政务服务平台功能，加快推进政务服务标准化、规范化、便利化，持续提升政务服务数字化、智能化水平，实现利企便民高频服务事项“一网通办”。建立健全政务数据共享协调机制，加快数字身份统一认证和电子证照、电子签章、电子公文等互信互认，推进发票电子化改革，促进政务数据共享、流程优化和业务协同。推动政务服务线上线下整体联动、全流程在线、向基层深度拓展，提升服务便利化、共享化水平。开展政务数据与业务、服务深度融合创新，增强基于大数据的事项办理需求预测能力，打造主动式、多层次创新服务场景。聚焦公共卫生、社会安全、应急管理等领域，深化数字技术应用，实现重大突发公共事件的快速响应和联动处置。

context: Embrace the digital era, unleash the potential of data elements, promote the construction of a strong cyber nation, accelerate the development of the digital economy, digital society, and digital government, and drive the transformation of production methods, lifestyles, and governance methods through digital transformation.

context: Extend the industrial chain downstream, promote the integrated development of rare earth magnetic materials - permanent magnet motors, rare earth luminescent materials - LED display devices, rare earth catalytic materials - industrial kiln denitrification functional devices, rare earth alloy materials - automotive and aerospace components, and other deep processing and application industries of rare earths. Guided by the demand for terminal applications such as industrial robots, energy conservation and environmental protection, and new energy vehicles, encourage downstream enterprises to participate in the research and development of new rare earth materials, strengthen the close connection between rare earths and application industries, develop rare earth functional components and parts with independent intellectual property rights, and improve the research and development and production level of rare earth functional materials and components, and realize the optimization and upgrading of the entire rare earth industry chain.

context: The period of the 12th Five-Year Plan is a crucial period for China to adhere to the path of new industrialization, accelerate the transformation of economic development, and comprehensively build a moderately prosperous society. In order to implement the Outline of the 12th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development, and in accordance with the overall deployment and requirements of the 12th Five-Year Plan for Industrial Transformation and Upgrading, the 12th Five-Year Plan for Informationization of National Economic and Social Development, and the 12th Five-Year Plan for Information Industry Development, the 12th Five-Year Plan for the Development of the Electronic Information Manufacturing Industry has been formulated as a guiding document for the development of the electronic information manufacturing industry during the 12th Five-Year Plan period.

zh_context: “十二五”时期是我国坚持走新型工业化道路、加快转变经济发展方式、全面建设小康社会的关键时期，也是电子信息制造业调结构、转方式、增强产业核心竞争力、提升发展质量效益、由大变强的攻坚时期。为贯彻落实《国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要》，按照《工业转型升级“十二五”规划》、《国民经济和社会发展信息化“十二五”规划》及《信息产业“十二五”发展规划》的总体部署和要求，编制《电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划》，作为“十二五”期间电子信息制造业发展的指导性文件。

Support leading companies in the industry to extend into upstream areas such as panels and modules, support the research and industrialization of core chips, software, key components, integrated modules, and specialized equipment for the color TV industry, promote the integration of terminal manufacturing and content service industries, and enhance the competitiveness of the entire flat-panel TV industry chain. Focus on supporting the research and industrialization of digital home smart terminals, internet gateways, multi-service systems, and application support platforms; support the research and application of intelligent and networked video surveillance equipment and application systems; vigorously promote the demonstration application of digital homes and the construction of digital home industry bases. Support backbone enterprises to strengthen quality brand building and international operations, and create globally competitive leading companies and well-known brands. Model innovation. Brand building. Support digital audiovisual, computer, and communication equipment manufacturing enterprises in building independent brands, enhance the international competitiveness of domestic equipment and terminals; guide enterprises to strengthen product quality management, improve product quality management systems, and enhance brand image; encourage enterprises to strengthen international strategic cooperation, accelerate the construction of secure and controllable market channels; formulate intellectual property strategies, and promote the industrialization and international application of independent intellectual property standards.

zh_context: 加快推动彩电业转型升级，加强新型背光技术、3D技术、激光技术、节能技术的研发及应用，提升核心技术掌控能力。加快发展3D电视、互联网电视、智能电视等新型产品，不断提升产品附加值。支持整机龙头企业向面板、模组等中、上游领域延伸，支持彩电产业配套的核心芯片、软件、关键器件、一体化模组、专用设备研发及产业化，推进终端制造业与内容服务业融合发展，提升平板电视全产业链竞争力。重点支持数字家庭智能终端、互联网关、多业务系统及应用支撑平台的研发及产业化；支持智能化、网络化视频监控设备及应用系统的研发与应用；大力推进数字家庭示范应用和数字家庭产业基地建设。加快推动地面数字电视接收机普及，支持AVS、DRA等自主音视频标准的应用，进一步推动地面数字电视标准的国内外应用。支持数字电视演播室设备、发射设备、传输设备、接收设备发展，鼓励发展高密度激光视盘机、数字音响系统、数字电影设备，推动视听产业向数字化、网络化、智能化和节能环保方向发展。支持骨干企业加强质量品牌建设和国际化经营，打造具有全球竞争力的龙头企业和知名品牌。专栏1：整机价值链提升工程。产品创新。支持基于移动互联网业务的计算机、通信设备及终端创新，以及基于云计算的产品创新、技术创新和模式创新；支持高端服务器、网络存储系统等关键产品的研发和产业化，推动绿色智能数据中心关键设备及各类终端产品的研发与产业化；支持网络化、智能化、节能型数字电视产品和3D电视研发及产业化；支持多屏融合的数字家庭智能终端研发及产业化；推进下一代地面数字电视传输体系关键技术和系统技术研究，建设多业务平台；支持整机产品深度参与配套芯片研发及产业化。模式创新。推动大型电子信息产品制造企业向服务领域延伸，加强设计、制造、服务融合互动，围绕核心价值环节促进产业链整合；抓住云计算、移动互联网等新兴应用快速发展契机，开拓增值服务，创新商业模式；健全产业公共服务体系，推进开放式运营平台、内容服务平台、网络服务平台、产品测试认证平台及知识产权服务平台建设。品牌建设。支持数字视听、计算机和通信设备制造企业建设自主品牌，提升国产设备及终端的国际竞争力；引导企业加强产品质量管理，完善产品质量管理体系，提升品牌形象；鼓励企业加强国际战略合作，加快建设安全可控的市场渠道；制定知识产权战略，推动自主知识产权标准产业化和国际化应用。

context: Carry out in-depth research on network security monitoring and early warning, vulnerability discovery, malicious code analysis, detection evaluation, and traceability and evidence collection techniques. Strengthen research on advanced sustainable attack response technologies. Establish and improve network security protection techniques such as intrusion detection and defense, antivirus, anti-denial of service attacks, abnormal traffic monitoring, webpage tampering prevention, domain name security, vulnerability scanning, centralized account management, data encryption, and security auditing. Improve monitoring and disposal methods for network-side Trojan viruses, mobile malicious programs, and other threats. Actively research and utilize new technologies such as cloud computing and big data to enhance network security monitoring and early warning capabilities. Promote the integration of enterprise technologies with those of telecommunications regulatory authorities, establish interface standards and specifications, and achieve data sharing in monitoring. Strengthen cooperation with network security service companies to prevent risks during the service process. When relying on security service units to carry out network security integration construction and risk assessment, select units that have been assessed for their network security service capabilities by relevant industry organizations.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++互联网++关于加强电信和互联网行业网络安全工作的指导意见（工信部保〔2014〕368号）（工信部/2014年8月28日）++nan++其他政策++2014-8++工作重点,强化网络安全技术能力和手段建设
zh_context: 深入开展网络安全监测预警、漏洞挖掘、恶意代码分析、检测评估和溯源取证技术研究，加强高级可持续攻击应对技术研究。建立和完善入侵检测与防御、防病毒、防拒绝服务攻击、异常流量监测、网页防篡改、域名安全、漏洞扫描、集中账号管理、数据加密、安全审计等网络安全防护技术手段。健全基于网络侧的木马病毒、移动恶意程序等监测与处置手段。积极研究利用云计算、大数据等新技术提高网络安全监测预警能力。促进企业技术手段与通信主管部门技术手段对接，制定接口标准规范，实现监测数据共享。加强与网络安全服务企业的合作，防范服务过程中的风险，在依托安全服务单位开展网络安全集成建设和风险评估等工作时，应当选用通过有关行业组织网络安全服务能力评定的单位。

context: The manufacturing of power electronic components mainly includes metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistors (MOSFET), insulated gate bipolar transistor chips (IGBT) and modules, fast recovery diodes (FRD), power Schottky diodes, medium and small power intelligent modules, high-power thyristors (GTO) with a diameter of 5 inches or more, integrated gate-commutated thyristors (IGCT), new vacuum switch tubes, new dynamic reactive power compensation and harmonic control devices, high-power high-voltage frequency conversion devices, fully digital control AC motor speed control systems, specialized power conversion devices for electrified railways, insulation forming parts for ultra-high voltage AC/DC transmission and transformation equipment, and vertical double-diffused metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistors (VDMOS).
zh_context: 电力电子元器件制造，主要包括金属氧化物半导体场效应管（MOSFET）、绝缘栅双极晶体管芯片（IGBT）及模块、快恢复二极管（FRD）、功率肖特级二极管、中小功率智能模块、5英寸以上大功率晶闸管（GTO）、集成门极换流晶闸管（IGCT）、新型真空开关管、新型动态无功补偿及谐波治理装置、大功率高压变频装置、全数字控制交流电机调速系统、电气化铁路专用电力变流装置、超特高压交直流输变电设备用绝缘成型件、垂直双扩散金属-氧化物场效应晶体管（VDMOS）。

context: The concept of system pollution reduction combining source reduction, process control, and end-of-pipe efficient treatment is strengthened. Green design is vigorously promoted to lead incremental enterprises to create cleaner production methods from a higher starting point, and to promote continuous implementation of clean production technology transformation in existing enterprises, guiding enterprises to actively improve their clean production levels. The promotion mechanism for green design is improved. The life cycle concept is strengthened, and industrial product green design is comprehensively implemented in all aspects and processes. In industries with significant ecological and environmental impacts, wide product coverage, and high industrial relevance, green design demonstration enterprises are established to explore green design paths for the industry, driving the green collaborative improvement of the industrial chain and supply chain. A green design platform based on technologies such as big data and cloud computing is constructed, and the key technology supply for green design and green manufacturing collaboration is strengthened, with increased application of green design. Focus is placed on industrial products with prominent green attributes and high consumption, and green design evaluation standards are formulated, and the standard acceptance mechanism is improved. Enterprises are guided to conduct green design evaluations through self-declaration or voluntary certification. The use of harmful substances at the source is reduced. Strict implementation of control requirements for the use of hazardous substances in electrical and electronic products, automobiles, ships, and other products, reducing the use of lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, polybrominated biphenyls, polybrominated diphenyl ethers, and other substances. Research and formulate management measures for the use of harmful substances in road motor vehicles, update the catalog of products under control for electrical and electronic products, establish and revise mandatory standards for the content of hazardous substances in electrical and electronic products and automobiles, compile a list of harmful substances in ships, and develop inspection guidelines, continuously promoting the alignment of control requirements for hazardous substances with international standards. Strengthen mandatory standards. Promote the widespread use of coatings, inks, adhesives, cleaning agents, and other products with low (or no) volatile organic compound content. Promote the establishment of a departmental collaborative regulatory mechanism, establish a database of hazardous substances covering the upstream and downstream of the industrial chain, fully leverage the role of e-commerce platforms, and innovate the implementation of big data regulation. Reduce pollution emissions from production processes. For key industries and process links with large pollutant emissions, research and promote process pollution reduction technologies and equipment, and carry out application demonstrations. Focus on key areas such as the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region and its surrounding areas, the Fenwei Plain, and the Yangtze River Delta region, increase the efforts to transform key industries with regard to nitrogen oxides, volatile organic compounds, and achieve coordinated control of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) and ozone. Focus on key river basins such as the Yangtze River and the Yellow River, as well as industrial clusters related to heavy metal industries, implement projects to improve the level of clean production, and reduce the emissions of pollutants such as chemical oxygen demand, ammonia nitrogen, and heavy metals. Strictly comply with international environmental conventions and relevant standards, promote the reduction of persistent organic pollutants, toxic and hazardous chemicals, and other new pollutants in key industries. Formulate a list of outdated production processes and equipment for industrial solid waste causing severe environmental pollution to be phased out within a specified period. Upgrade and improve end-of-pipe treatment facilities. Promote the use of advanced and applicable environmental protection governance equipment in key industries, and promote the formation of stable and efficient governance capabilities. In the field of air pollution prevention and control, focus on key industries with large flue gas emissions, complex composition, and difficult governance, and carry out application demonstrations for the coordinated control of multiple pollutants. Deepen the ultra-low emission transformation in the steel industry, and steadily implement ultra-low emission transformations in industries such as cement and coking. Accelerate the recovery and treatment of volatile organic compounds (VOCs), and encourage the selection of low-consumption and high-efficiency combined processes for governance. In the field of water pollution prevention and control, focus on difficult wastewater treatment such as heavy metals, high salinity, and high organic matter, and carry out demonstrations of deep and efficient treatment to gradually improve the level of wastewater treatment in industries such as printing and dyeing, papermaking, chemical raw materials and pharmaceuticals, coal chemical industry, and non-ferrous metals. Column 6: Key industries clean production transformation projects. Steel industry: Implement technologies and equipment upgrades such as coke oven gas desulfurization, high proportion sintering, coke negative pressure distillation, and full-process optimization by 2025, complete the ultra-low emission transformation of 530 million tons of steel production capacity and clean production transformation of 460 million tons of coking production capacity. Petrochemical industry: Implement process technology upgrades such as efficient catalysis, process intensification, and efficient distillation, as well as equipment upgrades such as waste salt incineration and refining, high-temperature decomposition of waste sulfuric acid, advanced oxidation, micro-reaction, and coal gasification. Non-ferrous metals industry: Implement technologies and equipment upgrades such as efficient alumina dissolution and red mud reduction, short-process smelting and continuous smelting in the copper smelting industry, efficient and clean electrolysis and oxygen pressure leaching in the zinc smelting industry, and vertical reduction magnesium refining in the magnesium smelting industry. By 2025, complete the clean production transformation of about 4,000 non-ferrous metal furnaces. Building materials industry: Implement technologies and complete equipment upgrades such as ultra-low emission of desulfurization, denitrification, and dust removal in the cement industry, and integrated process technologies and equipment for dust removal, desulfurization, and waste heat utilization (power generation) in the glass industry. Textile industry: Implement technologies and equipment upgrades such as low bath ratio dyeing, non-polyvinyl alcohol sizing and weaving, green pulping of regenerated cellulose fibers, supercritical carbon dioxide fluid dyeing, flat dyeing of knitted fabrics, and low-water continuous dyeing of polyester fabrics. Light industry: Implement technologies and equipment upgrades such as short-process, low-water consumption release paper for synthetic leather manufacturing, closed-loop circulation of leather ash and chrome tanning waste liquid, bio-tanning, efficient production of strains for bulk fermentation products, and green extraction and refining. Machinery industry: Continuously promote green optimization and upgrading of basic manufacturing processes, implement green process material preparation, clean casting, precision forging, green heat treatment, advanced welding, low-carbon and pollution reduction surface engineering, and efficient cutting processes and technologies.
extended_context: 新能源++高效光电光热++“十四五”工业绿色发展规划（节选）（工信部规〔2021〕178号）（工信部/2021年11月15日）++nan++其他政策++2021-11++主要任务,推动生产过程清洁化转型
zh_context: 强化源头减量、过程控制和末端高效治理相结合的系统减污理念，大力推行绿色设计，引领增量企业高起点打造更清洁的生产方式，推动存量企业持续实施清洁生产技术改造，引导企业主动提升清洁生产水平。健全绿色设计推行机制。强化全生命周期理念，全方位全过程推行工业产品绿色设计。在生态环境影响大、产品涉及面广、产业关联度高的行业，创建绿色设计示范企业，探索行业绿色设计路径，带动产业链、供应链绿色协同提升。构建基于大数据和云计算等技术的绿色设计平台，强化绿色设计与绿色制造协同关键技术供给，加大绿色设计应用。聚焦绿色属性突出、消费量大的工业产品，制定绿色设计评价标准，完善标准采信机制。引导企业采取自我声明或自愿认证的方式，开展绿色设计评价。减少有害物质源头使用。严格落实电器电子、汽车、船舶等产品有害物质限制使用管控要求，减少铅、汞、镉、六价铬、多溴联苯、多溴二苯醚等使用。研究制定道路机动车辆有害物质限制使用管理办法，更新电器电子产品管控范围的目录，制修订电器电子、汽车产品有害物质含量限值强制性标准，编制船舶有害。物质清单及检验指南，持续推进有害物质管控要求与国际接轨。强化强制性标准。约束作用，大力推广低（无）挥发性有机物含量的涂料、油墨、胶黏剂、清洗剂等产品。推动建立部门联动的监管机制，建立覆盖产业链上下游的有害物质数据库，充分发挥电商平台作用，创新开展大数据监管。削减生产过程污染排放。针对重点行业、重点污染物排放量大的工艺环节，研发推广过程减污工艺和设备，开展应用示范。聚焦京津冀及周边地区、汾渭平原、长三角地区等重点区域，加大氮氧化物、挥发性有机物排放重点行业清洁生产改造力度，实现细颗粒物（PM2.5）和臭氧协同控制。聚焦长江、黄河等重点流域以及涉重金属行业集聚区，实施清洁生产水平提升工程，削减化学需氧量、氨氮、重金属等污染物排放。严格履行国际环境公约和有关标准要求，推动重点行业减少持久性有机污染物、有毒有害化学物质等新污染物产生和排放。制定限期淘汰产生严重环境污染的工业固体废物的落后生产工艺设备名录。升级改造末端治理设施。在重点行业推广先进适用环保治理装备，推动形成稳定、高效的治理能力。在大气污染防治领域，聚焦烟气排放量大、成分复杂、治理难度大的重点行业，开展多污染物协同治理应用示范。深入推进钢铁行业超低排放改造，稳步实施水泥、焦化等行业超低排放改造。加快推进有机废气（VOCs）回收和处理，鼓励选取低耗高效组合工艺进行治理。在水污染防治重点领域，聚焦涉重金属、高盐、高有机物等高难度废水，开展深度高效治理应用示范，逐步提升印染、造纸、化学原料药、煤化工、有色金属等行业废水治理水平。专栏6重点行业清洁生产改造工程。钢铁行业。实施焦炉煤气精脱硫、高比例球团冶炼、焦化负压蒸馏、焦化全流程。优化等技术和装备改造。到2025年，完成5.3亿吨钢铁产能超低排放改造、4.6亿吨焦化产能清洁生产改造。石化化工行业。实施高效催化、过程强化、高效精馏等工艺技术改造，以及废盐焚烧精制、废硫酸高温裂解、高级氧化、微反应、煤气化等装备改造。有色金属行业。实施氧化铝行业高效溶出及降低赤泥技术，铜冶炼行业短流程冶炼、连续熔炼，锌冶炼行业高效清洁化电解、氧压浸出，镁冶炼行业竖式还原炼镁等技术和装备改造。到2025年，完成4000台左右有色金属窑炉清洁生产改造。建材行业。实施水泥行业脱硫脱硝除尘超低排放、玻璃行业熔窑烟气除尘、脱硫脱硝、余热利用（发电）“一体化”工艺技术和成套设备改造。纺织行业。实施小浴比染色、无聚乙烯醇上浆织造、再生纤维素纤维绿色制浆、超临界二氧化碳流体染色、针织物平幅染色、涤纶织物少水连续式染色等技术和装备改造。轻工行业。实施短流程低水耗离型纸节约型合成革制造、皮革浸灰与铬鞣废液封闭循环、生物制革、大宗发酵制品高效生产菌种和绿色提取精制等技术和装备改造。机械行业。持续推进基础制造工艺绿色优化升级，实施绿色工艺材料制备，清洁铸造、精密锻造、绿色热处理、先进焊接、低碳减污表面工程、高效切削加工等工艺技术和装备改造。

context: The manufacturing of components for new energy vehicles mainly includes the manufacturing of pumps and vacuum equipment, gas compression machinery, gas and liquid separation and purification equipment, spray guns and similar appliances, specialized electrical machinery and equipment, automotive parts and accessories, electric motor manufacturing, power electronic component manufacturing, transportation equipment and production counting instruments manufacturing, electronic measuring instrument manufacturing, etc. The manufacturing of automotive parts and accessories mainly includes new energy vehicle electromechanical coupling systems, new energy vehicle transmission systems, new energy vehicle electronic control automatic actuating mechanisms, new energy vehicle power distribution planetary gears, new energy vehicle high-performance automatic clutches, new energy vehicle brakes and their actuating mechanisms, new energy vehicle electromechanical distributed regenerative braking systems, new energy vehicle modules and systems, new energy vehicle back pressure valves, new energy vehicle thermostats, new energy vehicle cooling systems, new energy vehicle pressure regulators, new energy vehicle humidifiers, and key battery swapping equipment for passenger vehicle chassis. Electric motor manufacturing mainly includes new energy vehicle air compressor motors.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++5.2.3++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新能源汽车产业,新能源汽车装置、配件制造,新能源汽车零部件配件制造
zh_context: 新能源汽车零部件配件制造，主要包括泵及真空设备制造、气体压缩机械制造、气体、液体分离及纯净设备制造、喷枪及类似器具制造、电工机械专用设备制造、汽车零部件及配件制造、电动机制造、电力电子元器件制造、运输设备及生产用计数仪表制造、电子测量仪器制造等。汽车零部件及配件制造，主要包括新能源汽车机电耦合系统、新能源汽车变速传动系统、新能源汽车电控自动执行机构、新能源汽车动力分流用行星齿轮、新能源汽车高性能自动离合器、新能源汽车制动器及其执行机构、新能源汽车机电分配式回收制动系统、新能源汽车模块及系统、新能源汽车背压阀、新能源汽车节温器、新能源汽车散热、新能源汽车调压阀、新能源汽车加湿器、乘用车底盘关键换电设备。电动机制造，主要包括新能源汽车空压机电机。

context: Promote the merger and reorganization of design enterprises, increase industry concentration, and make the sales revenue of the top ten design enterprises account for nearly 40% of the entire industry. Encourage strategic cooperation between integrated circuit enterprises and complete machine enterprises, promote manufacturing enterprises and packaging and testing enterprises to participate in the shareholding and control of equipment and material enterprises, and create a virtual IDM model with capital and supply chain as the link. Guide the integration of integrated circuits, software, complete machines, systems, and applications to form a symbiotic industrial ecological chain and value chain, achieve breakthroughs and leaps for upstream and downstream enterprise groups.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于印发高性能集成电路工程实施方案的通知（发改高技〔2014〕3058号）（发改委等部门/2014年12月31日）++nan++其他政策++2014-12++重点发展方向和主要任务,加强产业链上下游整合
zh_context: 推动设计企业之间的兼并重组，提高产业集中度，使前十大设计企业的销售收入占全行业的比重接近40%。鼓励集成电路企业和整机企业加强战略合作，推动制造企业、封测企业参股、控股设备和材料企业，以资本和供应链为纽带，打造虚拟IDM模式。引导集成电路、软件、整机、系统到应用等环节形成共生的产业生态链、价值链，实现上下游企业群体突破和跃升。

context: Compile a key product and technology catalog for medical equipment, focusing on the forefront of people's health and medical health technology. Support industry organizations, research institutions, and national medical centers in developing and publishing technology innovation roadmaps. Provide support through the national key research and development program to promote continuous advancement in the research of diagnostic and therapeutic equipment, biomedical materials, reproductive health and women's and children's health, proactive health and technology for aging population, and modernization of traditional Chinese medicine. Encourage cross-sector collaboration between medical equipment and industries such as new materials, electronic information, aerospace, nuclear industry, and shipbuilding. Strengthen collaboration between materials, components, and complete machines to accelerate the development of basic components and components, basic software, basic materials, and basic processes that restrict the industry's development. Column 1: Industrial basic research action. Focus on advanced basic materials. Focus on the research of hollow fiber membranes for extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) and dialysis membranes for blood purification equipment. Research high-precision and high-surface-quality titanium, nickel-titanium, titanium-niobium, tantalum-based alloy wires, rods, and tubes, etc. Research oxygen-free copper and molybdenum-titanium-zirconium alloys for electronic computerized tomography (CT), as well as vacuum high-temperature bearings and large-capacity rotating target discs for CT tubes. Research high thermal conductivity circuit board materials for positron emission tomography (PET), scintillators for CT/PET detectors, and efficient filtering materials for protective equipment. Research absorbable and degradable materials, high-risk contrast guide wires, large arterial stents, lumen stents, coronary stents, orthopedic implant materials, heart valve materials, and lead-free piezoelectric materials, etc., to promote a batch of basic materials to reach international advanced levels. Focus on core components. Develop simulation chips for medical X-ray detectors, analog-to-digital conversion chips, system-level chips for wearable devices, and medical AI chips, etc. Develop high-precision current sensors, high-temperature and high-precision temperature sensors, high-precision high-voltage voltage sensors, high-precision magnetic field sensors, and high-speed optical components for 3D vision systems. Develop flexible electrocardiogram (ECG)/electroencephalogram (EEG)/electromyogram (EMG)/blood glucose and pressure sensors for wearable devices. Develop flexible connectors and biometric chromatographic sensors, etc. Focus on key components. Develop proportional valves for ventilators, vacuum pumps and miniature solenoid valves for dialysis equipment, and miniature proportional valves for high-flow nasal oxygen therapy devices. Develop high-power CT tubes and high-resolution X-ray photon counting detectors. Develop high-field magnetic resonance magnets, low-temperature coils, and multi-nuclear spectrometers. Develop advanced color ultrasound probes. Develop grid-controlled triode electron guns, high-power magnetrons, high-power multi-beam klystrons, and high-turn-ratio solid-state modulators for radiotherapy. Develop six-degree-of-freedom treatment beds, etc. Develop reducers, precision motors, and optical lenses for medical robots. Develop photomultiplier tubes for real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction (PCR) detection systems. Develop light-conducting endoscope fibers and high-resolution flexible fiber optic imaging bundles, etc. Focus on supporting diagnostic and testing equipment. Strengthen the development of supporting reagents for diagnostic and testing equipment, improve product sensitivity, precision, long-term stability, and batch production controllability, and ensure continuous improvement and iterative development of diagnostic and testing equipment. Focus on basic processes. Improve and optimize the manufacturing processes of advanced basic materials, key components, and complete machine products, strengthen quality and safety control, and enhance product performance, reliability, stability, and batch production capabilities.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十四五”医疗装备产业发展规划（工信部联规〔2021〕208号）（工信部、国家卫健委、国家发改委、科技部、财政部、国务院国资委、国家市场监督管理总局、国家医疗保障局、国家中医药管理局、国家药监局/2021年12月21日）++nan++其他政策++2021-12++夯实产业基础，提升技术创新能力,加强产业基础能力建设
zh_context: 面向人民生命健康、医疗健康科技前沿，编制医疗装备重点产品和技术目录，支持行业组织、科研机构、国家医学中心制定发布技术创新路线图。通过国家重点研发计划重点专项予以支持，持续推进诊疗装备与生物医用材料、生育健康及妇女儿童健康保障、主动健康和人口老龄化科技应对、中医药现代化等领域前沿基础技术研究。鼓励医疗装备与新材料、电子信息、航空航天、核工业、船舶等行业跨领域合作，加强材料、部件、整机等上下游协同攻关，加快补齐制约产业发展的基础零部件及元器件、基础软件、基础材料、基础工艺等瓶颈短板。专栏1产业基础攻关行动。攻关先进基础材料。着力攻关体外膜肺氧合机（ECMO）用中空纤维膜，血液净化设备用透析膜；高精度高表面质量钛、镍钛、钛铌、钽基合金丝、棒、管材等；电子计算机断层扫描（CT）用弥散强化无氧铜、钼钛锆合金，CT球管用真空高温轴承、大容量旋转靶盘等；正电子发射计算机断层扫描（PET）用高导热率电路基板材料、CT/PET探测器用闪烁体、防护装备用高效过滤材料；可吸收降解材料、高风险造影导丝、大动脉血管支架、腔道支架、冠脉支架、骨科植入材料、心脏瓣膜材料、无铅压电材料等，推动一批基础材料达到国际先进水平。攻关核心元器件。开发医用X射线探测器模拟芯片、模数转换芯片，可穿戴设备系统级芯片，医用AI芯片等；医用高精度电流传感器、高温高精温度传感器、高精高压电压传感器、高精度磁场传感器、3D视觉系统中高速光学元件；可穿戴设备用柔性心电图（ECG）/脑电图（EEG）/肌电图（EMG）/血糖及压力传感器；柔性连接器、生物识别色谱传感器等。攻关关键零部件。攻关呼吸机用比例阀；透析设备用真空泵、微型电磁阀，经鼻高流量氧疗仪用微型比例阀；大功率CT球管、高分辨率X射线光子计数探测器；磁共振高场强磁体、低温线圈、多核谱仪；先进彩超探头；放疗用栅控三级电子枪、高功率磁控管、高功率多注速调管、高变比固态调制器，六维治疗床等；医疗机器人用减速机、精密电机、光学镜头；实时荧光定量聚合酶链反应（PCR）检测系统用光电倍增管；导光率内窥镜光纤、高分辨率柔性光纤传像束等。攻关诊断检验装备配套件。加强诊断检验装备配套试剂研制，提高产品灵敏度、精密度、长期稳定性、批量生产可控性，确保诊断检验装备持续改进、迭代发展。攻关基础工艺。改进优化先进基础材料、关键零部件以及整机产品制造工艺，强化质量安全管控，提升产品性能、可靠性、稳定性和批量生产能力。

context: Manufacturing of specialized environmental protection equipment mainly includes photocatalytic components, fine particulate matter removal technology equipment, tube bundle dust removal technology equipment, high-temperature long-bag pulse bag dust removal equipment, mobile plate electrostatic dust removal equipment, wet electrostatic precipitator, low-temperature electrostatic precipitator, electric bag composite dust collector, electric bag hybrid dust collector (referring to embedded electric bag composite dust collector), ultra-clean emission technology equipment for power plants and industrial coal-fired furnaces, mobile pollution source pollutant reduction technology equipment, dust suppression technology equipment for heavily polluted dust places and industries, dual-alkali and strong alkali desulfurization technology equipment, ammonia desulfurization technology equipment, integrated equipment for desulfurization, denitrification, and mercury removal in coal-fired industrial boilers, CO circulation reduction desulfurization and denitrification technology and equipment, coke oven gas-steel slag combined desulfurization and denitrification technology, high-pressure fine water mist desulfurization, dust removal, and cooling complete equipment, low-nitrogen combustion technology equipment, sintering flue gas integrated pollutant removal equipment, efficient catalytic conversion technology for automobile exhaust, resource-based desulfurization technology equipment, ultra-low emission limestone-gypsum desulfurization technology equipment, full-load denitrification technology equipment for coal-fired boilers, utilization technology equipment for desulfurized gypsum resources, recovery and regeneration technology equipment for waste denitrification catalysts, complete equipment for high-flow plasma organic waste gas treatment, and new adsorption and recovery process technology equipment for volatile organic pollutants.
zh_context: 环境保护专用设备制造，主要包括光触媒组件、细颗粒物去除技术设备、管束式除尘技术装备、高温长袋脉冲袋式除尘设备、移动极板静电除尘设备、湿式静电除尘器、低低温静电除尘器、电袋复合式除尘器、电袋混合式除尘器（指嵌入式电袋复合式除尘器）、电厂及工业燃煤炉窑超净排放技术装备、移动污染源污染物减排技术设备、粉尘重污染场所和行业抑尘技术设备、双碱及强碱脱硫技术装备、氨法脱硫技术装备、燃煤工业锅炉脱硫脱硝脱汞一体化设备、CO循环还原脱硫脱硝技术和装备、焦炉烟气钢渣联合脱硫脱硝技术、高压细水雾脱硫除尘降温成套设备、低氮燃烧技术装备、烧结烟气复合污染物集成脱除设备、汽车尾气高效催化转化技术、资源化脱硫技术设备、超低排放石灰石-石膏脱硫技术装备、燃煤锅炉全负荷脱硝技术装备、脱硫石膏资源化利用技术设备、废弃脱硝催化剂回收再生技术装备、大流量等离子体有机废气治理成套装备、挥发性有机污染物新型吸附回收工艺技术装备。

context: The provincial development and reform commission should strengthen the management of investment projects for urban rail vehicles, traction, braking, and signal systems. The investment project for urban rail vehicles should include the development, testing, inspection, manufacturing of the car body, bogie, as well as the development of train network control systems. The investment project for traction systems should include the manufacturing, integration, as well as the development, testing, and inspection of key components such as traction converters, auxiliary converters, and motors. The investment project for braking systems should include the manufacturing, integration, as well as the development, testing, and inspection of subsystems such as brake control units and basic brakes. The investment project for signal systems should include the development, integration, and testing verification of subsystems such as Automatic Train Supervision (ATS), Automatic Train Protection (ATP), Automatic Train Operation (ATO), and Interlocking (CI).
extended_context: 高端装备++先进轨道交通++国家发展改革委办公厅关于加强城市轨道交通车辆投资项目监管有关事项的通知（发改办产业〔2018〕323号）（国家发展改革委办公厅/2018年3月9日）++nan++其他政策++2018-3++完善投资项目监管,提高投资项目技术要求
zh_context: 省级发展改革委要加强城轨车辆及牵引、制动、信号系统投资项目管理。城轨车辆投资项目应包含车体、转向架的研发、试验、检测、制造以及列车网络控制系统开发等建设内容。牵引系统投资项目应包含牵引变流器、辅助变流器、电机等关键总成制造、集成以及研发、试验、检测等建设内容。制动系统投资项目应包含制动控制单元、基础制动等子系统制造、集成以及研发、试验、检测等建设内容。信号系统投资项目应包含列车自动监控系统（ATS）、自动防护（ATP）、自动驾驶（ATO）和联锁（CI）等子系统研制、集成以及测试验证等建设内容。

context: Industrial Internet and supporting services mainly include Internet production services platform, Internet data services, other Internet services, information system integration services, Internet of Things technology services, operation and maintenance services, information processing and storage support services, etc. The Internet production services platform mainly includes Internet intelligent manufacturing services platform, Internet collaborative manufacturing platform, Internet production monitoring and sensing platform, Internet industrial production big data service platform, Internet industrial product ordering platform, Internet industrial production material supply platform. Internet data services mainly include industrial production big data resource services, industrial databases and industrial cloud database services, industrial cloud computing services, industrial cloud storage services, industrial software as a service (SaaS), industrial platform as a service (PaaS), industrial infrastructure as a service (IaaS), industrial mobile computing software platform, industrial blockchain technology-related products and services, industrial cloud platform system. Other Internet services mainly include industrial Internet of Things services. Information system integration services mainly include industrial Internet technology system services, industrial artificial intelligence network system services.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++1.4.1++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新一代信息技术产业,互联网与云计算、大数据服务,工业互联网及支持服务
zh_context: 工业互联网及支持服务，主要包括互联网生产服务平台、互联网数据服务、其他互联网服务、信息系统集成服务、物联网技术服务、运行维护服务、信息处理和存储支持服务等。互联网生产服务平台，主要包括互联网智能制造服务平台、互联网协同制造平台、互联网生产监测感知平台、互联网工业生产大数据服务平台、互联网工业产品订货平台、互联网工业生产资料供货平台。互联网数据服务，主要包括工业生产大数据资源服务、工业数据库和工业云数据库服务、工业云计算服务、工业云存储服务、工业软件即服务（SaaS）、工业平台即服务（PaaS）、工业设施即服务（IaaS）、工业移动计算软件平台、工业区块链技术相关产品和服务、工业云平台系统。其他互联网服务，主要包括工业物联网服务。信息系统集成服务，主要包括工业互联网技术系统服务、工业人工智能网络系统服务。

context: Other intelligent consumer devices manufacturing mainly includes virtual reality digital technology playback devices (referring to virtual reality augmented reality holographic imaging naked-eye 3D interactive entertainment engine development, cultural resource digital processing, interactive film and television, and other advanced equipment in the fields of glasses, data gloves, game controllers, motion sensing tracking positioning, and human-computer interaction devices), personal wearable virtual reality devices, virtual reality head-mounted displays, mixed reality entertainment devices, VR playback equipment, data gloves, game controllers, motion sensing devices, tracking positioning devices, other human-computer interaction devices, and augmented reality glasses.
zh_context: 其他智能消费设备制造，主要包括虚拟现实数字技术制播放设备（指虚拟现实增强现实全息成像裸眼3D交互娱乐引擎开发文化资源数字化处理互动影视等领域先进装备眼镜等数据手套游戏控制器等动作感知追踪定位和人机交互装置）、个人穿戴虚拟现实设备、虚拟现实头戴显示设备、混合现实娱乐设备、VR制播放装备、数据手套、游戏控制器、动作感知装置、追踪定位装置、其他人机交互装置、增强现实眼镜。

context: Guide automobile companies to actively collaborate with information, communication, electronics, and internet industry enterprises, fully utilize advanced technologies such as cloud computing and big data, explore diverse needs of users in work, life, and entertainment, innovate travel and service models, promote the extension of the industry chain to the backend and the value chain to the high-end, expand the networked ecosystem that includes elements such as transportation logistics, shared mobility, user interaction, and information utilization. Promote the transformation of automobile companies from production-oriented to service-oriented, achieve a shift from product-centric to customer-centric development, support companies in transitioning from providing products to providing comprehensive solutions. Encourage the development of automotive finance, used cars, maintenance and repair, car rental, and other aftermarket services, promote the synchronous development of other related service industries such as third-party logistics, e-commerce, and RV campsites.
extended_context: 节能环保++新能源汽车++汽车产业中长期发展规划（工信部联装〔2017〕53号）（工信部、发展改革委、科技部/2017年4月6日）++nan++其他政策++2017-4++重点任务,加速跨界融合，构建新型产业生态,加快发展汽车后市场及服务业
zh_context: 引导汽车企业积极协同信息、通信、电子和互联网行业企业，充分利用云计算、大数据等先进技术，挖掘用户工作、生活和娱乐等多元化的需求，创新出行和服务模式，促进产业链向后端、价值链向高端延伸，拓展包含交通物流、共享出行、用户交互、信息利用等要素的网状生态圈。推动汽车企业向生产服务型转变，实现从以产品为中心到以客户为中心发展，支持企业由提供产品向提供整体解决方案转变。鼓励发展汽车金融、二手车、维修保养、汽车租赁等后市场服务，促进第三方物流、电子商务、房车营地等其它相关服务业同步发展。

context: With the goal of improving the quality of drugs, we will accelerate the promotion of green preparation and clean production of chemical raw materials, actively promote the consistency evaluation of generic drugs, continuously improve the technical level of raw materials and formulation product quality, and promote the transformation of the industry from the export of raw materials to the export of end products. We will continue to promote the standardization of traditional Chinese medicine technology, enhance the scale and coordinated development of the quality of traditional Chinese medicine and the entire industry chain, carry out the construction of an internet-based platform for the cultivation and breeding of traditional Chinese medicinal materials, promote pollution-free cultivation and comprehensive utilization of traditional Chinese medicinal materials, quality traceability and determination of traditional Chinese medicine, advanced manufacturing technology of traditional Chinese medicine health products, and the utilization of medicinal residue, in order to improve the quality and safety of traditional Chinese medicine products. We will promote the development of high-tech biopharmaceuticals such as monoclonal antibodies, long-acting recombinant proteins, and third-generation insulin, and improve the accessibility of drugs for Chinese patients. We will develop pharmaceutical equipment such as drug crystallization equipment and sensors, advanced powder engineering equipment, new supercritical extraction and chromatographic separation equipment, new online testing equipment and control systems for solid dosage form production, high-density flow addition and continuous culture bioreactors, large-scale protein purification equipment, and cold chain storage and transportation systems. We will accelerate the upgrading and replacement of pharmaceutical equipment, improve the automation, digitization, and intelligence of equipment, effectively improve the quality of packaging materials and excipients, and strengthen the comprehensive supporting capacity of the industry.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物制造++“十三五”生物产业发展规划（节选）（发改高技〔2016〕2665号）（国家发改委/2016年12月20日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++推动重点领域新发展,构建生物医药新体系,推动医药产业转型升级
zh_context: 以提升药物品质为目标，加快推广化学原料药绿色制备和清洁生产，积极推进化学仿制药一致性评价，不断提高原料药和制剂产品质量技术水平，推动产业从原料药出口向终端产品出口的转变。持续推进中药技术标准化，提升中药质量及全产业链的规模化协调发展，开展基于互联网＋中药材种植养殖平台建设，推广中药材无公害种植和综合利用、中药质量溯源检定、中药工业先进制造技术、中药健康产品制造技术和药材废渣利用，提高中药产品质量和安全水平。促进单克隆抗体、长效重组蛋白、第三代胰岛素等高技术含量生物类似药的发展，提高我国患者的药物可及性。开发药物结晶设备和传感器、先进粉体工程设备、新型超临界萃取和色谱分离设备、新型固体制剂生产在线检测设备和自控系统、高密。度流加式和连续培养生物反应器、蛋白质大规模纯化设备以及冷链储存运输系统。等制药装备，加快制药装备的升级换代，提升装备的自动化、数字化和智能化水。平，切实提升包材和辅料的品质，加强产业综合配套能力。

context: In industries such as engineering machinery, power transmission and transformation, printing and dyeing, and household appliances, pilot demonstrations are being conducted for online monitoring, remote diagnosis, cloud services, and system solution. By applying technologies such as big data analysis and intelligent software, efforts are being made to accelerate the automatic generation and delivery of product operation and application status reports, gradually establishing an intelligent service ecosystem for enterprises.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++工业和信息化部关于开展2015年智能制造试点示范专项行动的通知（工信部装[2015]72号）（工业和信息化部/2015年3月9日）++nan++其他政策++2015-3++重点行动,以在线监测、远程诊断与云服务为代表的智能服务试点示范
zh_context: 在工程机械、输变电、印染、家用电器等行业，开展在线监测、远程诊断、云服务及系统解决方案试点示范。应用大数据分析、智能化软件等技术，加快推动产品运行与应用状态报告的自动生成与推送服务，逐步建立企业智能服务生态系统。

context: Cultivate enterprise groups with international competitiveness. context: The data-driven software-defined is becoming a prominent feature of integrated applications. On one hand, data-driven information technology is driving industry transformation, accelerating the cross-border integration and innovative development of the new generation of information technology. Through software-defined hardware, software-defined storage, software-defined networking, software-defined systems, etc., it brings more new products, services, and innovative models, giving rise to new formats and economic growth points, and promoting data as a strategic asset. On the other hand, software-defined is accelerating the integration, innovation, and transformation of various industries. Software-defined manufacturing stimulates innovation in research and development design, simulation verification, production manufacturing, and business management, accelerating the development of new models such as personalized customization, networked collaboration, service-oriented manufacturing, and cloud manufacturing, promoting the transformation of manufacturing from production-oriented to service-oriented. Software-defined services profoundly impact the development of industries such as finance, logistics, transportation, culture, and tourism, giving birth to a new group of industry entities, business platforms, integrated formats, and new types of consumption. It triggers multidimensional and deep-level changes in areas such as resident consumption, livelihood services, and social governance, leading to the emergence of various new network economic models such as the sharing economy, platform economy, and algorithm economy, nurturing and strengthening the development of new driving forces.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++软件++软件和信息技术服务业发展规划（2016-2020年）（节选）（工信部规〔2016〕425号）（工信部/2016年12月18日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++发展形势,以“软件定义”为特征的融合应用开启信息经济新图景
zh_context: 以数据驱动的“软件定义”正在成为融合应用的显著特征。一方面，数据驱动信息技术产业变革，加速新一代信息技术的跨界融合和创新发展，通过软件定义硬件、软件定义存储、软件定义网络、软件定义系统等，带来更多的新产品、服务和模式创新，催生新的业态和经济增长点，推动数据成为战略资产。另一方面，“软件定义”加速各行业领域的融合创新和转型升级。软件定义制造激发了研发设计、仿真验证、生产制造、经营管理等环节的创新活力，加快了个性化定制、网络化协同、服务型制造、云制造等新模式的发展，推动生产型制造向生产服务型。制造转变；软件定义服务深刻影响了金融、物流、交通、文化、旅游等服务业的发展，催生了一批新的产业主体、业务平台、融合性业态和新型消费，引发了居民消费、民生服务、社会治理等领域多维度、深层次的变革，涌现出分享经济、平台经济、算法经济等众多新型网络经济模式，培育壮大了发展新动能。

context: Biomedical engineering-related services mainly include hospitals, specialized hospitals, community health service centers (stations), health examination services, and clinical laboratory services. Hospitals mainly include the use of biotechnology and DNA technology for medical activities, remote imaging diagnosis services, and mobile imaging diagnosis and treatment services. Specialized hospitals mainly include third-party tumor radiotherapy center services. Community health service centers (stations) mainly include community blood purification center services, community chronic disease treatment center services, community rehabilitation therapy center services, and community rehabilitation training center services.

context: Action goals: By 2018, provide basic services to countries along the Belt and Road and neighboring countries; by 2020, establish the Beidou global satellite navigation system consisting of 35 satellites to provide services to global users. Coordinate the promotion of Beidou construction and application. Further improve the leadership and coordination mechanism of the Beidou satellite navigation industry, and continue to promote the development of Beidou system planning, construction, industry, and application at all levels. Accelerate the construction of ground augmentation systems, establish a high-precision positioning service platform for Beidou, and actively carry out application demonstrations. Strengthen breakthroughs in core Beidou technologies. Increase research and development support, integrate industrial resources, improve spectrum planning, comprehensively enhance the performance, power consumption, and cost of Beidou navigation chips, encourage integration with communication, computing, sensing, and other chips, promote the application of Beidou satellite navigation systems and compatible products in government departments, and enhance industrial competitiveness. Accelerate the industrialization process of Beidou. Carry out industry application demonstrations, promote the deployment of Beidou systems in national core business systems and key areas such as transportation, communication, radio and television, water conservancy, electricity, public security, surveying and mapping, housing and urban-rural development, and tourism. Promote the development and improvement of the Beidou navigation industry chain, and promote the comprehensive development of high-precision chip, terminal manufacturing, and location service industries. Explore the international market for satellite navigation services. Serve the construction of the Belt and Road initiative, implement the comprehensive service project for the international development of the satellite navigation industry, accelerate the construction of overseas Beidou ground augmentation systems, promote the construction of regional base stations and location service platforms for Beidou in the Asia-Pacific region, and accelerate the establishment of an international industrial technology alliance and patent pool.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++关于印发“十三五”国家信息化规划的通知（节选）（国发〔2016〕73号）（国务院/2016年12月27日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++优先行动,北斗系统建设应用行动
zh_context: 行动目标：到2018年，面向“一带一路”沿线及周边国家提供基本服务；到2020年，建成由35颗卫星组成的北斗全球卫星导航系统，为全球用户提供服务。统筹推进北斗建设应用。进一步完善北斗卫星导航产业的领导协调机制，持续推进北斗系统规划、建设、产业、应用等各层面发展。加快地基增强系统建设，搭建北斗高精度位置服务平台，积极开展应用示范。加强北斗核心技术突破。加大研发支持力度，整合产业资源，完善型谱规划，综合提升北斗导航芯片的性能、功耗、成本等指标，鼓励与通信、计算、传感等芯片的集成发展，推动北斗卫星导航系统及其兼容产品在政府部门的应用，提高产业竞争力。加快北斗产业化进程。开展行业应用示范，推动北斗系统在国家核心业务系统和交通、通信、广电、水利、电力、公安、测绘、住房城乡建设、旅游等重点领域应用部署。推动北斗导航产业链的发展和完善，促进高精度芯片、终端制造和位置服务产业综合发展。开拓卫星导航服务国际市场。服务共建“一带一路”倡议，实施卫星导航产业国际化发展综合服务工程，加快海外北斗卫星导航地基增强系统建设，推进北斗在亚太的区域性基站和位置服务平台建设，加快建立国际化的产业技术联盟和专利池。

context: Carry out the construction of an integrated urban data brain to provide big data support for urban industrial structure adjustment, economic operation monitoring, social services and governance, transportation, and ecological environment. context: Solar photovoltaic production equipment is the foundation that runs through the entire industry chain. Currently, there is an urgent need to break through the bottleneck of core equipment in certain links of the industry chain and improve the performance of key production equipment and the automation level of complete production lines. Relevant content includes: integrated technology for complete sets of equipment for crystalline silicon solar cells, with an efficiency of over 10% and an annual production capacity of 40MW; manufacturing technology for silicon-based thin-film solar cells with an efficiency of over 10% and an annual production capacity of 30MW; manufacturing technology for cadmium telluride thin-film solar cells with an efficiency of over 8% and an annual production capacity of 5MW; manufacturing technology for dye-sensitized solar cells with an efficiency of over 8% and an annual production capacity of 5MW; pilot manufacturing technology for thin-film silicon/crystalline silicon heterojunction cells; manufacturing equipment technology for high-reliability silicon-based BIPV series components, etc.

zh_context: 太阳能光伏生产设备是贯穿整个产业链的基础，目前亟需突破产业链部分环节核心设备的瓶颈，提升其关键生产设备的性能和成套生产线的自动化程度。相关内容包括：晶体硅太阳电池整线成套装备集成技术，效率10%以上年产能40MW硅基薄膜太阳电池制造技术，效率10%以上年产能30MW碲化镉薄膜太阳电池制造技术，效率8%以上年产能5MW染料敏化太阳电池制造技术，薄膜硅/晶体硅异质结电池中试制造技术，硅基高可靠BIPV系列组件制造装备技术等。

context: During the 12th Five-Year Plan period, the photovoltaic industry maintained steady and rapid growth. Products such as polycrystalline silicon and solar cells met the installation capacity requirements set by the national renewable energy development plan, while actively meeting the needs of the international market. Support was given to key enterprises to become stronger and more competitive. By 2015, the leading polycrystalline silicon enterprise reached a capacity of 50,000 tons, and key enterprises reached a capacity of tens of thousands of tons. The leading solar cell enterprise reached a capacity of 5 GW, and key enterprises reached a capacity of GW. There was one photovoltaic enterprise with annual sales revenue exceeding 100 billion yuan, and 3-5 photovoltaic enterprises with annual sales revenue exceeding 50 billion yuan. Additionally, there were 3-4 photovoltaic specialized equipment enterprises with annual sales revenue exceeding 1 billion yuan.

zh_context: “十二五”期间，光伏产业保持平稳较快增长，多晶硅、太阳能电池等产品适应国家可再生能源发展规划确定的装机容量要求，同时积极满足国际市场发展需要。支持骨干企业做优做强，到2015年形成：多晶硅领先企业达到5万吨级，骨干企业达到万吨级水平；太阳能电池领先企业达到5GW级，骨干企业达到GW级水平；1家年销售收入过千亿元的光伏企业，3-5家年销售收入过500亿元的光伏企业；3-4家年销售收入过10亿元的光伏专用设备企业。

context: Solid waste treatment and disposal equipment mainly include sludge treatment equipment, household waste treatment equipment, etc. Sludge treatment equipment includes sludge dewatering and drying, biological reduction, anaerobic digestion and incineration, sludge harmless treatment technology equipment, sludge biological fermentation and deodorization integrated device, sludge oxidation reduction complete set of equipment, activated sludge biofilm composite integrated treatment equipment, sludge biological leaching treatment equipment, oil sludge rotary continuous low-temperature pyrolysis equipment, oilfield drilling waste treatment and disposal equipment, sludge-coupled coal-electricity high-efficiency power generation and dehydration reuse device. context: The management of incentive funds is subject to the Measures for the Administration of Special Funds for the Development of Small and Medium-sized Enterprises. Provincial financial departments and small and medium-sized enterprise authorities should strengthen the management of relevant incentive funds according to their respective responsibilities and improve the efficiency of fund utilization. The incentive funds obtained by public service demonstration platforms must be used for the service of specialized and innovative small giant enterprises, and must not be used to balance the local financial budget or for the construction of the demonstration platform itself, work expenses, etc. If such problems are found during inspections and assessments, the relevant incentive funds may be deducted accordingly. The incentive funds obtained by key small giant enterprises should be autonomously arranged by the enterprises based on the development goals of specialization, expertise, and innovation. If it is found during inspections and assessments that financial funds have been obtained through false reporting or misappropriation, relevant regulations such as the Regulations on the Punishment of Financial Illegal Acts shall be followed for handling.

zh_context: 奖补资金管理适用《中小企业发展专项资金管理办法》。省级财政部门、中小企业主管部门应按职责分工加强有关奖补资金管理，提高资金使用效益。公共服务示范平台所获奖补资金须用于服务专精特新“小巨人”企业，不得用于平衡本级财政预算，不得用于示范平台自身建设、工作经费等；如检查考核发现存在此类问题的，酌情扣减有关奖补资金。重点“小巨人”企业所获奖补资金，由企业围绕“专精特新”发展目标自主安排使用；对检查考核发现以虚报、冒领等手段骗取财政资金的，按照《财政违法行为处罚处分条例》等有。关规定处理。

zh_context: 生物医药相关服务，主要包括工程和技术研究和试验发展、医学研究和试验发展、检测服务国民经、工程设计活动、兽医服务、其他技术推广服务、医院、临床检验服务等。医学研究和试验发展，主要包括缓释、控释、长效制剂新剂型工艺技术基础研究、速释制剂新剂型工艺技术基础研究、靶向释药新剂型工艺技术基础研究、透皮和粘膜给药制剂新剂型工艺技术基础研究、中药绿色制造、智能制造技术体系与装备开发研究、中药饮片炮制加工技术研究、化学药研究、生物制品研究、中药研究、基因测序专业技术服务、药物筛选专业技术服务、实验动物模型专业技术服务、规模化动植物转基因专业技术服务、生物实验室的管理。

context: By 2020, the pharmaceutical industry will experience stable growth in scale and efficiency, significant enhancement in innovation capabilities, comprehensive improvement in product quality, a more complete supply guarantee system, a noticeable acceleration in internationalization, and a substantial increase in overall industry quality.- Scale: The main business revenue will maintain a medium to high-speed growth, with an average annual growth rate exceeding 10%, and the proportion of the pharmaceutical industry in the industrial economy will significantly increase.- Technological Innovation: Research and development investment by enterprises will continue to increase. By 2020, the research and development intensity of the entire industry's large-scale enterprises will reach 2% or more. The quality of innovation will significantly improve, with an increased proportion of new drug registrations compared to overall drug registrations. A number of high-quality innovative achievements will be industrialized, and breakthroughs will be made in international drug registrations.- Product Quality: Standards for pharmaceuticals and medical devices will be improved, and quality management regulations will be effectively implemented at all stages. Product quality and safety assurance will be strengthened. The evaluation of the consistency of quality and efficacy of generic drugs in oral solid preparations will be basically completed. Over 100 formulation enterprises will achieve international advanced level Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) certification.- Green Development: By 2020, compared to 2015, energy consumption per unit of industrial value-added by large-scale enterprises will decrease by 18%, carbon dioxide emissions per unit of industrial value-added will decrease by 22%, water consumption per unit of industrial value-added will decrease by 23%, volatile organic compound (VOC) emissions will decrease by over 10%, and the level of green production of chemical raw materials will significantly improve.- Intelligent Manufacturing: By 2020, the automation and informatization level of the pharmaceutical production process will significantly improve. Key processes in large enterprises will be automated, and the utilization rate of Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) will reach over 30%. A number of intelligent manufacturing demonstration workshops will be established.- Supply Guarantee: The capacity to ensure the supply of essential drugs and commonly used low-priced drugs will be strengthened. The shortage of clinical drugs will be significantly improved. Generic versions of patented drugs urgently needed in clinical practice will be put on the market. The national pharmaceutical reserve system will be further improved, and the emergency research and development and production capacity to respond to public health emergencies will be significantly enhanced.- Organizational Structure: The pace of industry restructuring and integration will accelerate, and the concentration will continue to increase. By 2020, the top 100 enterprises will account for an increased proportion of the main business revenue by 10 percentage points, and large enterprises will further strengthen their leading role in industry development.- Internationalization: Pharmaceutical exports will maintain stable growth, and the proportion of export delivery value to sales revenue will strive to reach 10%. The export structure will significantly improve, with an increased proportion of formulations and medical device exports. Overseas investment will expand, international technological cooperation will deepen, and the ability for international development will significantly increase.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物医药++医药工业发展规划指南（节选）（工信部、国家发改委、科技部、商务部、原国家卫计委、原国家食药监总局/2016年10月26日）++nan++医药工业发展规划指南++2016-10++指导思想、基本原则和发展目标,主要目标
zh_context: 到2020年，规模效益稳定增长，创新能力显著增强，产品质量全面提高，供应保障体系更加完善，国际化步伐明显加快，医药工业整体素质大幅提升。——行业规模。主营业务收入保持中高速增长，年均增速高于10%，占工业经济的比重显著提高。——技术创新。企业研发投入持续增加，到2020年，全行业规模以上企业研发投入强度达到2%以上。创新质量明显提高，新药注册占药品注册比重加大，一批高质量创新成果实现产业化，新药国际注册取得突破。——产品质量。药品、医疗器械质量标准提高，各环节质量管理规范有效实施，产品质量安全保障加强。基本完成基本药物口服固体制剂仿制药质量和疗效一致性评价。通过国际先进水平GMP认证的制剂企业达到100家以上。——绿色发展。与2015年相比，2020年规模以上企业单位工业增加值能耗下降18%，单位工业增加值二氧化碳排放量下降22%，单位工业增加值用水量下降23%，挥发性有机物（VOCs）排放量下降10%以上，化学原料药绿色生产水平明显提高。——智能制造。到2020年，医药生产过程自动化、信息化水平显著提升，。大型企业关键工艺过程基本实现自动化，制造执行系统（MES）使用率达到30%以上，建成一批智能制造示范车间。——供应保障。国家基本药物、常用低价药供应保障能力加强，临床用药短缺情况明显改善，临床急需的专利到期药物基本实现仿制上市，国家医药储备体系进一步完善，应对突发公共卫生事件的应急研发和应急生产能力显著增强。——组织结构。行业重组整合加快，集中度不断提高，到2020年，前100位企业主营业务收入所占比重提高10个百分点，大型企业对行业发展引领作用进一步加强。——国际化。医药出口稳定增长，出口交货值占销售收入的比重力争达到10%。出口结构显著改善，制剂和医疗设备出口比重提高。境外投资规模扩大，国际技术合作深化，国际化发展能力大幅提升。

context: The manufacturing of new computers and information terminal devices mainly includes the manufacturing of complete computers, computer components, computer peripherals, industrial control computers and systems, other computer manufacturing, communication terminal equipment manufacturing, radar and supporting equipment manufacturing, and other electronic equipment manufacturing. context: High-energy storage and key electronic materials manufacturing mainly include the production of primary form plastics and synthetic resins, manufacturing of other specialty chemical products, plastic film manufacturing, specialty glass manufacturing, technical glass product manufacturing, specialty ceramic product manufacturing, graphite and carbon product manufacturing, lithium-ion battery manufacturing, nickel-hydrogen battery manufacturing, other battery manufacturing, and electronic specialty material manufacturing. The production of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes polyolefin materials, soft materials, and silicon-based composite materials. The manufacturing of other specialty chemical products mainly includes lithium hexafluorophosphate carbonate solution. Plastic film manufacturing mainly includes aluminum-plastic film, transparent conductive film materials, and electronic component-specific thin film materials. Specialty glass manufacturing mainly includes 6th generation and above glass substrates. Technical glass product manufacturing mainly includes glass ceramics (microcrystalline glass) and quartz-based optical fiber cable materials. Specialty ceramic product manufacturing mainly includes high-performance ceramic substrates, gas-sensitive ceramic materials, moisture-sensitive ceramic materials, photosensitive ceramic materials, and thermosensitive ceramic materials.

context: Solar energy materials manufacturing mainly includes the selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores, manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials, coating manufacturing, special glass manufacturing, graphite and carbon product manufacturing, forging and powder metallurgy product manufacturing, semiconductor device specialized equipment manufacturing, electronic specialized material manufacturing, etc. The selection of other commonly used non-ferrous metal ores mainly includes ilmenite. Manufacturing of organic chemical raw materials mainly includes silane. Coating manufacturing mainly includes high light utilization coating materials, heat-absorbing coating materials. Special glass manufacturing mainly includes photovoltaic conductive glass (TCO glass, etc.) and glass tubes for metal sealing. Manufacturing of graphite and carbon products mainly includes graphite materials for solar energy. Forging and powder metallurgy product manufacturing mainly includes desiccants. Semiconductor device specialized equipment manufacturing mainly includes photovoltaic cell packaging materials. Electronic specialized material manufacturing mainly includes monocrystalline silicon ingots, cadmium telluride, specialized silver paste, crystalline silicon materials, monocrystalline silicon wafers.

context: Promote the integration and application of artificial intelligence technology in the field of unmanned systems, and develop various forms of unmanned devices such as unmanned aircraft and unmanned ships. Support the research and application of micro and lightweight intelligent unmanned systems, break through the technology of structural design, intelligent materials, automatic cruising, remote control, image transmission, and other technologies of high-performance unmanned systems. context: The manufacturing of biomedical materials mainly includes the production of sanitary materials and medical supplies, special ceramic products, rare earth metal rolling processing, medical diagnosis, monitoring and treatment equipment manufacturing, etc. The production of sanitary materials and medical supplies mainly includes medical polymer materials (soft tissue repair and plastic surgery materials, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular system repair materials, drug release carriers and systems), medical consumables (skin masks, medical catheters, skin adhesives, tissue adhesives, blood purification and adsorption materials), and dental biomaterials. The manufacturing of special ceramic products mainly includes medical ceramic substrates (used for orthopedic ceramic substrates, dental ceramic substrates).

zh_context: 生物医用材料制造，主要包括卫生材料及医药用品制造、特种陶瓷制品制造、稀有稀土金属压延加工、医疗诊断、监护及治疗设备制造等。卫生材料及医药用品制造，主要包括医用高分子材料（软组织修复及整形外科材料、心脑血管系统修复材料、药物控释载体及系统）、医用耗材（皮肤掩膜、医用导管、皮肤粘合剂、组织粘合剂、血液净化及吸附材料）牙科用生物材料。特种陶瓷制品制造，主要包括医用陶瓷基材料（用于骨科陶瓷基材料、牙科陶瓷基材料）。

context: Accelerate the development of innovative drugs and biologics with significant clinical demand, promote the green and intelligent production technology of pharmaceuticals, strengthen scientific and efficient regulation and policy support, promote the internationalization of the industry, and accelerate the construction of a strong biopharmaceutical country. Promote the leapfrog upgrade of the biopharmaceutical industry. Accelerate the research and application of technologies such as gene sequencing, large-scale cell culture, targeted and sustained drug release, and green intelligent production to support the high-end development of the industry. Develop new antibodies, vaccines, gene therapy, cell therapy, and other biologics and formulations, promote innovation in chemical drugs and high-end formulation development, accelerate the research and development of characteristic innovative traditional Chinese medicine, and achieve original innovation in the prevention and treatment of major diseases. Support the scale development of biosimilars, carry out research and production of a large variety of drugs whose patents have expired, accelerate the upgrading of pharmaceutical equipment, improve the automation, digitization, and intelligence level of pharmaceuticals, further promote the standardized development of traditional Chinese medicine products, promote the integration of industrial standards with international standards, and accelerate internationalization. Develop innovative marine drugs, develop modern marine traditional Chinese medicine products with ethnic characteristics, promote the industrialization of reagent raw materials and intermediates, and form a cluster of marine biopharmaceutical industries. Develop industrial technology systems that are in line with international advanced levels, enhance the supporting capabilities of key raw materials and equipment, support the continuous innovation and development of biotechnological drugs. Column 11: New Drug Development and Industrialization Engineering. Focus on building a sustainable biopharmaceutical industry system, with a focus on emerging drugs such as antibody drugs, recombinant protein drugs, and new vaccines, promote the research and development, industrialization, and quality improvement of new drugs for major diseases, common diseases, rare diseases, and children's diseases that are clinically scarce, integrate various elements to form a batch of advanced product standards. Innovate the regulatory methods for biopharmaceuticals. Establish a more scientific and efficient drug evaluation and approval system, accelerate the pilot implementation of the drug marketing authorization holder system, accelerate the evaluation of generic drug quality and efficacy consistency, and explore the pilot implementation of the clinical experimental research accreditation system for new medical technologies. Improve the drug procurement mechanism and comprehensively promote reforms in medical pricing and industry regulation mechanisms.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物制造++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕67号）（国务院/2016年11月29日）++nan++“十三五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划++2016-11++加快生物产业创新发展步伐，培育生物经济新动力,构建生物医药新体系
zh_context: 加快开发具有重大临床需求的创新药物和生物制品，加快推广绿色化、智能化制药生产技术，强化科学高效监管和政策支持，推动产业国际化发展，加快建设生物医药强国。推动生物医药行业跨越升级。加快基因测序、细胞规模化培养、靶向和长效释药、绿色智能生产等技术研发应用，支撑产业高端发展。开发新型抗体和疫苗、基因治疗、细胞治疗等生物制品和制剂，推动化学药物创新和高端制剂开发，加速特色创新中药研发，实现重大疾病防治药物原始创新。支持生物类似药规模化发展，开展专利到期药物大品种研发和生产，加快制药装备升级换代，提升制药自动化、数字化和智能化水平，进一步推动中药产品标准化发展，促进产业标准体系与国际接轨，加速国际化步伐。发展海洋创新药物，开发具有民族特色的现代海洋中药产品，推动试剂原料和中间体产业化，形成一批海洋生物医药产业集群。准和具有国际先进水平的产业技术体系，提升关键原辅料和装备配套能力，支撑生物技术药物持续创新发展。专栏11新药创制与产业化工程。围绕构建可持续发展的生物医药产业体系，以抗体药物、重组蛋白药物、新型疫苗等新兴药物为重点，推动临床紧缺的重大疾病、多发疾病、罕见病、儿童疾病等药物的新药研发、产业化和质量升级，整合各类要素形成一批先进产品标。创新生物医药监管方式。建立更加科学高效的医药审评审批方式，加快推开药品上市许可持有人制度试点，加快仿制药质量和疗效一致性评价，探索开展医疗新技术临床实验研究认可制度试点。完善药品采购机制，全面推动医药价格和行业监管等领域体制机制改革。

context: Human society is entering a new stage of development characterized by digital productivity. Software plays an important role in the digital process, providing essential support and driving development towards networking, platformization, and intelligence. This in turn drives the iterative innovation and breakthroughs of new generation information technologies such as cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, 5G, blockchain, industrial internet, and quantum computing, accelerating the pace of digital industrialization. Software enables integration and development, empowering, valuing, and enlightening, comprehensively promoting the digitalization, networking, and intelligence transformation and upgrading of the economy and society, continuously stimulating innovative vitality of data elements, solidifying security guarantees for equipment, networks, control, data, and applications, accelerating the process of industrial digitalization, opening up broad development space for the digital economy, and promoting quality, efficiency, and dynamic changes in China's development.

zh_context: 人类社会正在进入以数字化生产力为主要标志的发展新阶段，软件在数字化进程中发挥着重要的基础支撑作用，加速向网络化、平台化、智能化方向发展，驱动云计算、大数据、人工智能、5G、区块链、工业互联网、量子计算等新一代信息技术迭代创新、群体突破，加快数字产业化步伐。软件对融合发展的有效赋能、赋值、赋智，全面推动经济社会数字化、网络化、智能化转型升级，持续激发数据要素创新活力，夯实设备、网络、控制、数据、应用等安全保障，加快产业数字化进程，为数字经济开辟广阔的发展空间，促进我国发展的质量变革、效率变革、动力变革。

context: Establish and improve the standard system for silicon-based semiconductor materials, improve the standards for 200-300mm silicon wafers and SOI wafers, establish standards for key materials such as photoresist, ultra-high purity specialty electronic gases, and PVD targets, and accelerate the localization of integrated circuit manufacturing materials. Establish standards for third-generation wide bandgap semiconductor materials such as silicon carbide, gallium nitride, and boron nitride, guiding the development of semiconductor devices towards higher efficiency, higher power density, and higher reliability. Conduct research on key technologies for same/different heteroepitaxy on large-size high-aluminum/high-indium composition nitride, silicon, silicon carbide, and nitride semiconductor substrates, and establish common technical standards for third-generation semiconductor epitaxial materials. Conduct research on the testing, evaluation, and related standards of key supporting materials for third-generation semiconductor packaging and testing, such as deep ultraviolet resistant, high moisture resistant, high thermal conductivity, and high refractive index packaging materials, high temperature resistant and high reliability interconnect materials, high thermal conductivity and reliable substrate materials, high insulation strength and high temperature resistant encapsulation materials, and high thermal conductivity and low coefficient of thermal expansion substrate materials. Improve the aerospace electronic standard system, conduct research on radiation-resistant wide bandgap semiconductor device design, and standard research on materials and structures for high temperature resistant and high reliability power devices.

zh_context: 建立和完善硅基半导体材料标准体系，完善200-300mm硅单晶片和SOI晶片标准，建立光刻胶、超高纯特种电子气体、PVD靶材等关键材料系列标准，加速集成电路制造材料国产化。建立碳化硅、氮化镓、氮化硼等第三代宽禁带半导体材料标准，指引半导体器件向更高效率、更高功率密度和更高可靠性发展。开展大尺寸高铝／高铟组分氮化物、硅、碳化硅、氮化物等半导体衬底上同／异质外延关键技术研究，建立第三代半导体外延材料共性技术标准。开展耐深紫外光高耐湿高导热高折射率封装材料、耐高温高可靠互联材料、高导热可靠基板材料、高绝缘强度耐高温灌封材料、高导热低热膨胀系数底板材料等第三代半导体封装测试关键配套材料的检测、评价和相关标准研究。完善宇航电子标准体系，开展抗辐照宽禁带半导体器件设计，耐极限温度及大温度高可靠功率器件封装材料及结构等标准研究。

context: Carry out research on the core technologies of the new generation of robots, including the combination of active/passive structures, modular flexible joints, joint variable stiffness elastic drive, human-machine compatibility design of the bio-mechanical interface and interface, human-machine safety coexistence, intelligent interaction, and collaborative operation. Develop a new generation of collaborative and assistive robots represented by collaborative multi-degree-of-freedom lightweight arms, collaborative dual-arm robots, and mobile manipulation arms, as well as experimental prototype systems of new generation human behavior-enhancing robots represented by upper limb exoskeletons, lower limb exoskeletons, and full-body exoskeletons. Lay the technical foundation for subsequent productization, achieve synchronization with the world in the research of new generation robot technologies, and seize the technological and industrial high ground.
