context: The construction of satellite navigation space systems and ground systems has been included in the unified planning and implementation of China's second-generation satellite navigation system national science and technology major projects. By 2020, a Beidou global satellite navigation system composed of 35 satellites will be built, forming a global service capability with positioning accuracy better than 10 meters and timing accuracy of 20 nanoseconds. According to the development goals and tasks determined by the National Satellite Navigation Industry Medium- and Long-Term Development Plan, combined with the national science and technology major projects of China's second-generation satellite navigation system, efforts will be made to actively improve the ground application service capability of the Beidou system. The Beidou satellite navigation ground-based augmentation system will be coordinated and deployed, integrating existing multi-mode continuous operation reference station network resources, and constructing a national-level multi-mode continuous operation reference station network to enhance the performance of system augmentation services, enabling real-time meter-level/decimeter-level, professional centimeter-level, and post-millimeter-level positioning services in China and surrounding areas. Comprehensive integration of basic information such as geographic information, remote sensing data, architecture, transportation, disaster prevention and reduction, water conservancy, meteorology, environment, and regional boundaries, to establish a national, high-precision location data comprehensive service system. The construction of an auxiliary positioning system will achieve seamless indoor and outdoor positioning in key areas and specific locations.
extended_context: 高端装备++航空航天++关于印发国家民用空间基础设施中长期发展规划（2015-2025年）的通知（发改高技[2015]2429号）（国家发展改革委、财政部、国防科工局/2015年10月26日）++nan++其他政策++2015-10++构建卫星遥感、通信广播和导航定位三大系统,卫星导航定位系统
zh_context: 卫星导航空间系统和地面系统建设已纳入中国第二代卫星导航系统国家科技重大专项统一规划和组织实施。到2020年，建成由35颗卫星组成的北斗全球卫星导航系统，形成优于10米定位精度、20纳秒授时精度的全球服务能力。根据《国家卫星导航产业中长期发展规划》所确定的发展目标和任务，结合中国第二代卫星导航系统国家科技重大专项，积极提高北斗系统地面应用服务能力。统筹部署北斗卫星导航地基增强系统，整合已有的多模连续运行参考站网资源，建设国家级多模连续运行参考站网，提升系统增强服务性能，具备我国及周边区域实时米级/分米级、专业厘米级、事后毫米级的定位服务能力。综合集成地理信息、遥感数据、建筑、交通、防灾减灾、水利、气象、环境、区域界线等基础信息，建立全国性、高精度的位置数据综合服务系统。建设辅助定位系统，实现重点区域和特定场所室内外无缝定位。

context: The text translates to:Biomedical engineering-related services mainly include hospitals, specialized hospitals, community health service centers (stations), health examination services, and clinical laboratory services. Hospitals mainly include the use of biotechnology and DNA technology for medical activities, remote imaging diagnosis services, and mobile imaging diagnosis and treatment services. Specialized hospitals mainly provide third-party tumor radiotherapy center services. Community health service centers (stations) mainly provide community blood purification center services, community chronic disease treatment center services, community rehabilitation therapy center services, and community rehabilitation training center services. Health examination services mainly include third-party medical imaging center services, health examination center services, and health record and information collection center services.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++4.2.5++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++生物产业,生物医学工程产业,生物医学工程相关服务
zh_context: 生物医学工程相关服务，主要包括医院、专科医院、社区卫生服务中心（站）、健康体检服务、临床检验服务等。医院，主要包括利用生物技术及DNA技术开展医疗活动、远程影像诊断服务、移动影像诊疗服务。专科医院，主要包括第三方肿瘤放射治疗中心服务。社区卫生服务中心（站），主要包括社区血净化中心服务、社区慢病治疗中心服务、社区康复理疗中心服务、社区康复训练中心服务。健康体检服务，主要包括第三方医学影像中心服务、健康查体中心服务、健康档案和信息采集中心服务。

context: Based on the characteristics of 5G network, such as large connectivity, high speed, low latency, and technologies like edge computing and high-precision positioning, this system collects data including video images from mobile cameras, safety helmet usage, personnel positioning, environmental monitoring, visualizing crane hooks (to prevent collisions), and facial recognition. It aims to meet the rapid deployment of information equipment and the needs of personnel mobility in construction sites.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++保障措施,进一步拓展能源领域5G应用场景,工地作业
zh_context: 基于5G网络大连接、高速率、低时延特性和边缘计算、5G高精度定位等技术，通过边缘云设备采集移动摄像机视频图像、安全帽、人员定位、环境监测、吊钩可视化（塔吊防碰撞）、人脸识别等数据，满足施工现场信息设备快速部署和人员移动作业需求。

context: Plastic film manufacturing mainly includes EVA encapsulation film, PET base film, PVF/PVDF backsheet protective film, and conductive film.
zh_context: 塑料薄膜制造，主要包括EVA封装胶膜、PET基膜、PVF/PVDF背板保护膜、导电薄膜。

context: Seize the opportunity of accelerating the adjustment of the global industrial competition pattern, rely on independent innovation, strengthen international cooperation, coordinate various elements such as resources, environmental protection, market, technology, and talent, reasonably layout major project construction, achieve breakthroughs in key technologies of core industries such as integrated circuits, new display devices, and software. Improve the integrated circuit industry system. Support backbone manufacturing enterprises in integrating advantageous resources, increasing innovation input, and promoting process upgrading. Continue to guide and support international chip manufacturing companies to increase investment in China, establish production bases and research and development centers. Improve the integrated circuit design support service system and promote industrial agglomeration. Guide chip design companies to strengthen cooperation with whole machine manufacturing companies, rely on whole machine upgrading to expand domestic effective demand. Support mergers and reorganizations among design companies and cultivate large enterprises with international competitiveness. Support the combination of major integrated circuit projects and major scientific and technological special projects, promote the design, development, and industrialization of high-end general-purpose chips, realize the industrial application of some special equipment, and form a relatively advanced and complete integrated circuit industry chain. Break through the development bottleneck of the new display industry. Coordinate planning, reasonable layout, focus on panel production, and improve the new display industry system. The state arranges guided funds and combines them with corporate capital market financing to broaden financing channels and enhance enterprise innovation and development capabilities. Industrialization of mature technologies and research and development of forward-looking technologies should be carried out simultaneously to gradually grasp the initiative in the development of the display industry. Make full use of global industrial resources, focus on strengthening industrial cooperation between the two sides of the Taiwan Strait, and strive to achieve key technological breakthroughs in the fields of new display panel production, integrated design of whole machine modules, and glass substrate manufacturing. Improve the independent development capability of the software industry. Relying on national major scientific and technological special projects, focus on improving the independent innovation capability of domestic basic software. Support important application software such as Chinese language processing software (including minority language software), information security software, and industrial software, as well as embedded software technology and product research and development, to achieve independent controllability of key software in key areas and promote the interactive development of basic software and CPUs. Strengthen the promotion and application of domestic software and industry solutions, and promote the integration and development of the software industry and traditional industries. Encourage large backbone enterprises to integrate advantageous resources, enhance enterprise strength and international competitiveness. Guide small and medium-sized software enterprises to gather in industrial bases and develop jointly, and improve the level of international cooperation in the software industry.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++电子信息产业调整和振兴规划（国务院/2009年4月15日）++nan++其他政策++2009-4++产业调整和振兴的主要任务,突破集成电路、新型显示器件、软件等核心产业的关键技术
zh_context: 抓住全球产业竞争格局加快调整的机遇，立足自主创新，强化国际合作，统筹资源、环保、市场、技术、人才等各种要素，合理布局重大项目建设，实现集成电路、新型显示器件、软件等核心产业关键技术的突破。完善集成电路产业体系。支持骨干制造企业整合优势资源，加大创新投入，推进工艺升级。继续引导和支持国际芯片制造企业加大在我国投资力度，增设生产基地和研发中心。完善集成电路设计支撑服务体系，促进产业集聚。引导芯片设计企业与整机制造企业加强合作，依靠整机升级扩大国内有效需求。支持设计企业间的兼并重组，培育具有国际竞争力的大企业。支持集成电路重大项目建设与科技重大专项攻关相结合，推动高端通用芯片的设计开发和产业化，实现部分专用设备的产业化应用，形成较为先进完整的集成电路产业链。突破新型显示产业发展瓶颈。统筹规划、合理布局，以面板生产为重点，完善新型显示产业体系。国家安排引导资金和企业资本市场筹资相结合，拓宽融资渠道，增强企业创新发展能力。成熟技术的产业化与前瞻性技术研究开发并举，逐步掌握显示产业发展主动权。充分利用全球产业资源，重点加强海峡两岸产业合作，努力在新型显示面板生产、整机模组一体化设计、玻璃基板制造等领域实现关键技术突破。提高软件产业自主发展能力。依托国家科技重大专项，着力提高国产基础软件的自主创新能力。支持中文处理软件（含少数民族语言软件）、信息安全软件、工业软件等重要应用软件和嵌入式软件技术、产品研发，实现关键领域重要软件的自主可控，促进基础软件与CPU的互动发展。加强国产软件和行业解决方案的推广应用，推动软件产业与传统产业的融合发展。鼓励大型骨干企业整合优势资源，增强企业实力和国际竞争力。引导中小软件企业向产业基地集聚和联合发展，提高软件行业国际合作水平。

context: In response to the structural reform of the supply side and the transformation and upgrading of the manufacturing industry, the development of cyber-physical systems and industrial internet is promoted to facilitate the transformation of production and operation management towards intelligence, refinement, and networking. Through technologies such as RFID, electronic identification of relevant production materials is implemented to achieve intelligent management of production processes and supply chains. Sensor technologies are utilized to enhance real-time collection and data analysis of production status information, thereby improving efficiency and quality, promoting safety production, and energy conservation. By embedding capabilities such as sensing, positioning, and identification in products, remote maintenance of products is realized, facilitating the transformation of manufacturing industry towards service-oriented.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++物联网++信息通信行业发展规划物联网分册（2016-2020年）（工信部规〔2016〕424号）（工信部/2016年12月18日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++主要任务,推动物联网规模应用,智能制造
zh_context: 面向供给侧结构性改革和制造业转型升级发展需求，发展信息物理系统和工业互联网，推动生产制造与经营管理向智能化、精细化、网络化转变。通过RFID等技术对相关生产资料进行电子化标识，实现生产过程及供应链的智能化管理，利用传感器等技术加强生产状态信息的实时采集和数据分析，提升效率和质量，促进安全生产和节能减排。通过在产品中预。置传感、定位、标识等能力，实现产品的远程维护，促进制造业服务化转型。

context: Combining the development trends of next-generation internet, Internet of Things, cloud computing, and other new technologies, vigorously promote the research and development of geographic information software, especially in the industrialization of core foundational software such as large-scale geographic information systems and high-performance remote sensing data automation processing, to achieve breakthroughs and reach international advanced levels.
extended_context: 高端装备++航空航天++关于促进地理信息产业发展的意见（节选）（国办发〔2014〕2号）（国务院办公厅/2014年1月22日）++nan++其他政策++2014-1++推动重点领域快速发展,提高地理信息软件研发和产业化水平
zh_context: 结合下一代互联网、物联网、云计算等新技术的发展趋势，大力推进地理信息软件研发，特别是在大型地理信息系统、高性能遥感数据自动化处理等核心基础软件产业化方面实现突破，达到国际先进水平。

context: Strengthen pollution control and ecological restoration, handle the relationship between development and emissions reduction, and promote harmonious coexistence between humans and nature. Strengthen comprehensive ecological and environmental governance. Deepen the battle against pollution prevention and control. Enhance coordinated control of multiple air pollutants and regional governance, increase efforts to control pollution in important rivers, lakes, and bays, and continue to promote soil pollution prevention and control. Strengthen the treatment of solid waste and new pollutants, promote waste classification and reduction, and resource utilization. Improve support policies for energy conservation, water conservation, and recycling of waste materials and other environmental protection industries. Strengthen zoning and control of ecological environment, scientifically carry out land greening, coordinate the governance of mountains, rivers, forests, farmland, lakes, grasslands, and deserts, protect biodiversity, and promote the construction of a nature reserve system with national parks as the main body, making our living environment greener and more beautiful. Promote the orderly progress of carbon peak and carbon neutrality work. Implement the action plan for carbon peak. Promote energy revolution, ensure energy supply, based on resource endowment, adhere to the principle of establishing before breaking, and plan comprehensively, promote low-carbon transformation of energy. Strengthen the clean and efficient use of coal, orderly reduce and replace, promote energy-saving and carbon reduction transformation, flexibility transformation, and heating transformation of coal-fired power plants. Promote the planning and construction of large-scale wind and solar power bases and their supporting adjustable power sources, strengthen the construction of pumped storage power stations, and improve the grid's capacity to accommodate renewable energy generation. Support the development of biomass energy. Promote the research and development and application of green and low-carbon technologies, build a green manufacturing and service system, promote energy conservation and carbon reduction in industries such as steel, non-ferrous metals, petrochemicals, chemicals, and building materials, and strengthen energy conservation in transportation and construction. Resolutely curb the blind development of high-energy-consuming, high-emission, and low-level projects. Enhance the carbon sequestration capacity of ecosystems. Promote the transformation of energy consumption dual control to carbon emissions dual control, improve incentive and constraint policies for pollution reduction and carbon reduction, develop green finance, and accelerate the formation of a green and low-carbon production and lifestyle.
extended_context: 通用++综合++关于深化“互联网+先进制造业”发展工业互联网的指导意见（国务院/2017年11月19日）++nan++其他政策++2017-11++亿元,持续改善生态环境，推动绿色低碳发展
zh_context: 加强污染治理和生态保护修复，处理好发展和减排关系，促进人与自然和谐共生。加强生态环境综合治理。深入打好污染防治攻坚战。强化大气多污染物协同控制和区域协同治理，加大重要河湖、海湾污染整治力度，持续推进土壤污染防治。加强固体废物和新污染物治理，推行垃圾分类和减量化、资源化。完善节能节水、废旧物资循环利用等环保产业支持政策。加强生态环境分区管控，科学开展国土绿化，统筹山水林田湖草沙系统治理，保护生物多样性，推进以国家公园为主体的自然保护地体系建设，要让我们生活的家园更绿更美。有序推进碳达峰碳中和工作。落实碳达峰行动方案。推动能源革命，确保能源供应，立足资源禀赋，坚持先立后破、通盘谋划，推进能源低碳转型。加强煤炭清洁高效利用，有序减量替代，推动煤电节能降碳改造、灵活性改造、供热改造。推进大型风光电基地及其配套调节性电源规划建设，加强抽水蓄能电站建设，提升电网对可再生能源发电的消纳能力。支持生物质能发展。推进绿色低碳技术研发和推广应用，建设绿色制造和服务体系，推进钢铁、有色、石化、化工、建材等行业节能降碳，强化交通和建筑节能。坚决遏制高耗能、高排放、低水平项目盲目发展。提升生态系统碳汇能力。推动能耗“双控”向碳排放总量和强度“双控”转变，完善减污降碳激励约束政策，发展绿色金融，加快形成绿色低碳生产生活方式。

context: Grasp the opportunities of integrating biotechnology and information technology, establish forward-looking cohorts of millions of healthy individuals and patients with key diseases, establish a multi-level precision medicine knowledge base system and a national biomedical big data sharing platform, focus on tackling core key technologies of precision medicine such as next-generation gene sequencing technology, omics research, and big data integration and analysis technology, develop a batch of precision application solutions and decision support systems for early screening, molecular typing, personalized treatment, efficacy prediction, and monitoring of major diseases, and promote the transformation of medical diagnosis and treatment models.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”国家科技创新规划（国发〔2016〕43号）（节选）（国务院/2016年7月28日）++nan++“十三五”国家科技创新规划++2016-7++发展人口健康技术,健全支撑民生改善和可持续发展的技术体系,精准医学关键技术
zh_context: 把握生物技术和信息技术融合发展机遇，建立百万健康人群和重点疾病病人的前瞻队列，建立多层次精准医疗知识库体系和国家生物医学大数据共享平台，重点攻克新一代基因测序技术、组学研究和大数据融合分析技术等精准医疗核心关键技术，开发一批重大疾病早期筛查、分子分型、个体化治疗、疗效预测及监控等精准化应用解决方案和决策支持系统，推动医学诊疗模式变革。

context: By utilizing smart monitoring devices and mobile internet, we will improve the online monitoring system for pollutant emissions, increase the types of pollutants being monitored, expand the monitoring scope, and establish a 24/7, multi-level intelligent multi-source perception system. We will establish a mechanism for sharing environmental information data, unify data exchange standards, promote the disclosure of information on regional pollutant emissions, air quality, water quality, etc., and achieve online queries and customized push notifications for the public through the internet. We will strengthen the collection and organization of environmental credit data for enterprises, and incorporate their environmental credit records into a nationwide unified credit information sharing and exchange platform. We will improve the environmental warning and risk monitoring information network, enhance the prevention level and emergency response capabilities for key risks such as heavy metals, hazardous waste, and hazardous chemicals.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++互联网++国务院关于积极推进“互联网+”行动的指导意见（国发〔2015〕40号）（国务院/2015年7月4日）++nan++国务院关于积极推进“互联网+”行动的指导意见++2015-7++重点行动,“互联网+”绿色生态,大力发展智慧环保
zh_context: 利用智能监测设备和移动互联网，完善污染物排放在线监测系统，增加监测污染物种类，扩大监测范围，形成全天候、多层次的智能多源感知体系。建立环境信息数据共享机制，统一数据交换标准，推进区域污染物排放、空气环境质量、水环境质量等信息公开，通过互联网实现面向公众的在线查询和定制推送。加强对企业环保信用数据的采集整理，将企业环保信用记录纳入全国统一的信用信息共享交换平台。完善环境预警和风险监测信息网络，提升重金属、危险废物、危险化学品等重点风险防范水平和应急处理能力。

context: The recycling and resource utilization of industrial solid waste, waste gas, and waste liquid mainly include coal mining and washing industry, condiment, fermented products manufacturing, liquor manufacturing, textile industry, leather, fur, feather and its products and footwear manufacturing, papermaking and paper products industry, coking, tire manufacturing, non-metallic mineral products industry, clay brick and tile manufacturing, black metal smelting and rolling processing industry, non-ferrous metal smelting and rolling processing industry, other metal processing machinery manufacturing, other cultural, office machinery manufacturing, other unspecified general equipment manufacturing, construction engineering machinery manufacturing, other special equipment manufacturing, automobile parts and accessories manufacturing, metal waste and scrap processing, non-metallic waste and scrap processing, thermal power generation, cogeneration, etc. Leather, fur, feather and its products and footwear manufacturing mainly include comprehensive utilization of solid waste in tanning processing and comprehensive utilization of wastewater in tanning processing. Papermaking and paper products industry mainly include comprehensive utilization of wastewater in papermaking enterprises, comprehensive utilization of alkali recovery white mud, and comprehensive utilization of wastewater sludge and deinking sludge. Coking mainly includes comprehensive utilization of waste gas in coking enterprises. Tire manufacturing mainly includes tire retreading.

zh_context: 工业固体废物、废气、废液回收和资源化利用，主要包括煤炭开采和洗选业、调味品、发酵制品制造、酒的制造、纺织业、皮革、毛皮、羽毛及其制品和制鞋业、造纸和纸制品业、炼焦、轮胎制造、非金属矿物制品业、粘土砖瓦及建筑砌块制造、黑色金属冶炼和压延加工业、有色金属冶炼和压延加工业、其他金属加工机械制造、其他文化、办公用机械制造、其他未列明通用设备制造业、建筑工程用机械制造、其他专用设备制造、汽车零部件及配件制造、金属废料和碎屑加工处理、非金属废料和碎屑加工处理、火力发电、热电联产等。皮革、毛皮、羽毛及其制品和制鞋业，主要包括制革加工固体废弃物综合利用、制革加工废水综合利用。造纸和纸制品业，主要包括造纸企业废水综合利用、碱回收白泥综合利用、废水污泥、脱墨污泥综合利用。炼焦，主要包括焦化企业废气综合利用。轮胎制造，主要包括轮胎翻新。

context: With the creation and application of new biotechnological tools as the core, we aim to build a core technological system for the bio-manufacturing of bulk chemical products, chemical polymer materials, and bulk fermentation products, continuously improving the economic viability and market competitiveness of bio-based products. We will establish bio-manufacturing routes for basic chemical products such as organic acids, chemical alcohols, olefins, alkanes, aromatic hydrocarbons, and organic amines, gaining a competitive advantage over petroleum-based routes and achieving large-scale production and application of bio-based methods. We will promote the development and application of bio-manufacturing and polymer modification technologies for chemical polymer materials, such as polyols, hydroxycarboxylic acids, and oleic acids, and drive the large-scale production and demonstration application of bio-based polyesters, bio-based polyurethanes, bio-based nylon, bio-based rubber, microbial polysaccharides, marine biomaterials, etc., realizing the chain, aggregation, and large-scale development of the bio-based materials industry. We will significantly enhance the independent innovation capability and international competitiveness of bulk fermentation products such as amino acids and vitamins, achieving a benign and high-end development of the industry.
extended_context: 生物医药++生物制造++“十三五”生物产业发展规划（节选）（发改高技〔2016〕2665号）（国家发改委/2016年12月20日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++推动重点领域新发展,推动生物制造规模化应用,提高生物基产品的经济性和市场竞争力
zh_context: 以新生物工具创制与应用为核心，构建大宗化工产品、化工聚合材料、大宗发酵产品等生物制造核心技术体系，持续提升生物基产品的经济性和市场竞争力。建立有机酸、化工醇、烯烃、烷烃、芳烃、有机胺等基础化工产品的生物制造路线，取得对石油路线的竞争优势，实现规模化生物法生产与应用；推进化工聚合材料单体多元醇、羟基羧酸、烯酸等的生物制造和聚合改性技术等的发展与应用，推动生物基聚酯、生物基聚氨酯、生物尼龙、生物橡胶、微生物多糖、海洋生物材料等规模化生产和示范应用，实现生物基材料产业的链条式、集聚化、规模化发展；大幅度提升氨基酸、维生素等大宗发酵产品的产业自主创新能力和国际竞争水平，实现产业的良性和高端化发展。

context: Cultivate service entities, promote energy-saving and environmental protection products, support technological equipment and service model innovation, improve policy mechanisms, and promote the development and growth of the energy-saving and environmental protection industry.

context: Improve the innovation and development capabilities of the bio-manufacturing industry, promote the large-scale production and application of bio-based materials, bio-based chemicals, and new types of fermented products, and promote the application demonstration of green bioprocesses in industries such as chemical engineering, medicine, textiles, and food. By 2020, the output value of the modern bio-manufacturing industry will exceed 1 trillion yuan, the proportion of bio-based products in the total chemical production will reach 25%, energy consumption and pollutant emissions will be reduced by 30% compared to traditional routes, making significant contributions to the green and sustainable development of China's economy and society.

zh_context: 提高生物制造产业创新发展能力，推动生物基材料、生物基化学品、新型发。酵产品等的规模化生产与应用，推动绿色生物工艺在化工、医药、轻纺、食品等。行业的应用示范，到2020年，现代生物制造产业产值超1万亿元，生物基产品在全部化学品产量中的比重达到25%，与传统路线相比，能量消耗和污染物排放降低30%，为我国经济社会的绿色、可持续发展做出重大贡献。

context: Artificial intelligence technology applications are being demonstrated in various fields such as manufacturing, agriculture and rural areas, logistics, finance, commerce, home furnishings, healthcare, education, government affairs, transportation, environmental protection, security, urban management, assistance for the disabled and elderly, and domestic services, in response to the urgent needs for local economic development and improvement of people's livelihoods. These applications aim to expand the scope of application scenarios and accelerate the deep integration of artificial intelligence with the real economy, promoting the widespread application of artificial intelligence in social and livelihood areas.

context: Motor and engine manufacturing mainly include automobile engine manufacturing, generator and generator set manufacturing, electric motor manufacturing, etc. Automobile engine manufacturing mainly includes Atkinson cycle engines, dedicated engines for range extenders, and dedicated engine electronic control units. context: Action goals: By 2023, the construction of the dynamic monitoring network and regulatory system for natural resources, ecological environment, national parks, water resources, and energy will be further improved. By 2025, the digitalization, networking, and intelligent level of natural resources regulation, ecological environment protection, national park construction, water resources protection, and energy utilization will be significantly enhanced, providing strong support for the construction of a beautiful China. Strengthen real-time perception, intelligent planning, and intelligent regulation of natural resources and land space. Optimize and improve basic information such as natural resources, land space, and natural geographical patterns, promote the improvement of dynamic perception technology capabilities covering natural resources development and utilization, asset management, land space planning implementation, farmland protection, ecological restoration, marine resources regulation, meteorological disasters, geological disasters, and marine disasters monitoring, and promote the construction of a three-dimensional one map of natural resources and a basic information platform for land space in accordance with the requirements of unified base map, unified standards, unified planning, and unified platform. Strengthen the intelligent application of comprehensive regulation, analysis and prediction, and macro decision-making, and provide data sharing and services for natural resources and land space. Build an intelligent and efficient digital governance system for ecological environment. Improve the intelligent monitoring and regulation level of ecological environment, improve the information platform for comprehensive management of ecological environment, support precise, scientific, and law-based pollution control. Promote regional ecological environment information-based collaborative governance, share relevant resources with public interest litigation, and enhance risk prevention and integrated protection capabilities. Support the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region and the Yangtze River Delta region in building information-based demonstration areas for coordinated air environmental governance, support the construction of information-based demonstration areas for water ecological environment system governance in the Yangtze River Economic Belt, the Yellow River Basin, and the Chengdu-Chongqing Twin City Economic Circle, and support the construction of demonstration areas for green ecological cities in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. Strengthen the capacity building for responding to climate change informationization, promote the development and utilization of climate resources, and promote green and low-carbon development. Improve the Belt and Road ecological environmental protection big data service platform, promote international cooperation in ecological environment standards, data resources, monitoring networks, and cloud service resources. Enhance the perception capability of forest and grassland ecological networks, improve the digital monitoring and evaluation system for the effectiveness of ecosystem protection. Strengthen the capacity building for law enforcement and supervision of the fishing ban in the Yangtze River, and improve the intelligent monitoring, evaluation, and protection management level of aquatic organisms. Promote the construction of smart water conservancy. Promote the integration of new generation information technology and water conservancy business, improve the monitoring system of major rivers, strengthen the application of water conservancy big data, and accelerate the orderly sharing of important water conservancy data such as hydrology and water resources. Enhance the ability of water situation monitoring and intelligent scheduling based on river basins. Strengthen national comprehensive water conservancy supervision and continuously improve the information management capacity for national water conservation. Build a smart energy system. Promote deep integration of energy and information fields, improve the informatization and intelligent level of power grid, oil and gas, and coal infrastructure, and promote the construction of an energy system that integrates generation, grid, load, storage, and interaction, coordinates multiple energies, and intelligently regulates energy demand. Implement the national energy management and supervision informationization project, and formulate unified energy supervision standards and regulatory data indicators.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十四五”国家信息化规划（中共中央网络安全和信息化委员会/2021年12月27日）++nan++“十四五”国家信息化规划++2021-12++优先行动,绿色智慧生态文明建设行动
zh_context: 行动目标：到2023年，自然资源、生态环境、国家公园、水利和能源动态监测网络和监管体系建设进一步完善；到2025年，自然资源监管、生态环境保护、国家公园建设、水资源保护和能源利用等数字化、网络化、智能化水平大幅提升，有力支撑美丽中国建设。加强自然资源和国土空间的实时感知、智慧规划和智能监管。优化完善自然资源、国土空间和自然地理格局等基础信息，推动涵盖自然资源开发利用和资产管理、国土空间规划实施、耕地保护、生态修复、海洋资源监管、气象灾害、地质灾害与海洋灾害监测等的动态感知技术能力提升，按照“统一底图、统一标准、统一规划、统一平台”的要求，推进自然资源三维立体“一张图”和国土空间基础。信息平台建设。强化综合监管、分析预测、宏观决策的智能化应用，提供自然资。源和国土空间数据共享与服务。打造智慧高效的生态环境数字化治理体系。提升生态环境智慧监测监管水平，完善生态环境综合管理信息化平台，支撑精准治污、科学治污、依法治污。推动区域生态环境信息化协同治理，与公益诉讼共享有关资源，提升风险防范和一体化保护能力。支持京津冀、长三角区域打造大气环境协同治理信息化示范区，支持长江经济带、黄河流域、成渝双城经济圈打造水生态环境系统治理信息化示范区，支持粤港澳大湾区打造绿色生态城市示范区。加强应对气候变化信息化能力建设，推进气候资源开发利用，促进绿色低碳发展。完善“一带一路”生态环保大数据服务平台，推动生态环境标准规范、数据资源、监测网络、云服务资源国际合作共建。提升林草生态网络感知能力，完善生态系统保护成效数字化监测评估体系。加强长江禁捕执法监管能力建设，提升水生生物智能监测评估和保护管理水平。推进智慧水利建设。推进新一代信息技术与水利业务融合，完善大江大河监测体系，加强水利大数据应用，加速推进水文、水资源等重要水利数据有序共享。以流域为单元提升水情测报和智能调度能力。加强国家水利综合监管，持续推进国家节水信息化管理能力提升。建设智慧能源系统。推动能源与信息领域深度融合，提升电网、油气、煤炭基础设施信息化和智能化水平，推动构建源网荷储互动、多能协同互补、用能需求智能调控的能源系统。实施国家能源管理与监管信息化工程，制定统一的能源监管标准规范和监管数据指标体系。

context: Intelligent measurement and control equipment manufacturing mainly includes metal cutting machine tool manufacturing, metal forming machine tool manufacturing, foundry machinery manufacturing, metal cutting and welding equipment manufacturing, machine tool functional components and accessories manufacturing, other metal processing machinery manufacturing, industrial automatic control system device manufacturing, experimental analysis instrument manufacturing, testing machine manufacturing, supply of application instruments and meters manufacturing, other general instrument manufacturing, and other special instrument manufacturing. Machine tool functional components and accessories manufacturing mainly includes CNC rotary table, other CNC machine tool accessories, and distributed control system. Other metal processing machinery manufacturing mainly includes machine tool fieldbus control system, machine tool programmable control system, machine tool embedded special control system, machine tool safety control system, machine tool digital servo control system, and machine tool network distributed servo system. Experimental analysis instrument manufacturing mainly includes intelligent measuring instruments and meters (referring to intelligent temperature, pressure, flow, and level measurement), intelligent actuators, special variable online measurement instruments and meters, intelligent experimental analysis instruments, and online analysis instruments. Testing machine manufacturing mainly includes online non-destructive testing instruments and online material performance testing instruments. Supply of application instruments and meters manufacturing mainly includes intelligent electric meters, intelligent water meters, intelligent gas meters, and intelligent heat meters.

zh_context: 智能测控装备制造，主要包括金属切削机床制造、金属成形机床制造、铸造机械制造、金属切割及焊接设备制造、机床功能部件及附件制造、其他金属加工机械制造、工业自动控制系统装置制造、实验分析仪器制造、试验机制造、供应用仪器仪表制造、其他通用仪器制造国民经、其他专用仪器制造等。机床功能部件及附件制造，主要包括数控平旋盘、其他数控机床附件、分散型控制系统。其他金属加工机械制造，主要包括机床现场总线控制系统、机床可编程控制系统、机床嵌入式专用控制系统、机床安全控制系统、机床数位伺服控制系统、机床网络分布式伺服系统。实验分析仪器制造，主要包括智能测量仪器仪表（指智能测量温度、压力、流量、物位）智能执行器、特殊变量在线测量仪器仪表、智能化实验分析仪器、在线分析仪器。试验机制造，主要包括在线无损探伤仪器、在线材料性能试验仪器。供应用仪器仪表制造，主要包括智能电表、智能水表、智能煤气表、智能热量表。

context: Based on the national conditions and looking towards the future, we will build an industrial internet ecosystem that is compatible with the development of our country's economy. We aim to make our country's level of industrial internet development at the forefront internationally, striving to achieve and even lead. By 2025, we will have basically formed a foundation of infrastructure and industrial systems with international competitiveness. The industrial internet network infrastructure will be established in various regions and industries. The industrial internet identification and resolution system will be continuously improved and scaled up. We will establish 3-5 industrial internet platforms that reach international standards. The industrial system will be relatively sound, with mastery of key core technologies and significantly enhanced supply capabilities, forming a group of internationally competitive leading enterprises. We will establish a relatively complete and reliable industrial internet security system. New technologies, new models, and new formats will be widely promoted and applied, pushing forward the integration of the two industries to a new level. In the initial stage from 2018 to 2020, we will initially build a low-latency, high-reliability, and wide-coverage industrial internet network infrastructure. We will initially construct an industrial internet identification and resolution system and initially form a platform system for industrial internet development with different focuses and collaborative aggregation. We will also establish an initial industrial internet security system. By 2035, we will have built internationally leading industrial internet network infrastructure and platforms, formed internationally advanced technology and industrial systems, comprehensively and deeply applied industrial internet, and developed innovative capabilities in advantageous industries. The security capabilities will be comprehensively enhanced, and key areas will achieve international leadership. By the middle of this century, the industrial internet network infrastructure will comprehensively support economic and social development. The innovation and development capabilities, technological and industrial systems, and integrated applications of the industrial internet will reach international advanced levels. Our comprehensive strength will enter the forefront of the world.
extended_context: 通用++综合++关于深化“互联网+先进制造业”发展工业互联网的指导意见（国务院/2017年11月19日）++nan++其他政策++2017-11++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 立足国情，面向未来，打造与我国经济发展相适应的工业互联网生态体系，使我国工业互联网发展水平走在国际前列，争取实现并跑乃至领跑。到2025年，基本形成具备国际竞争力的基础设施和产业体系。覆盖各地区、各行业的工业互联网网络基础设施基本建成。工业互联网标识解析体系不断健全并规模化推广。形成3-5个达到国际水准的工业互联网平台。产业体系较为健全，掌握关键核心技术，供给能力显著增强，形成一批具有国际竞争力的龙头企业。基本建立起较为完备可靠的工业互联网安全保障体系。新技术、新模式、新业态大规模推广应用，推动两化融合迈上新台阶。其中，在2018-2020年三年起步阶段，初步建成低时延、高可靠、广覆盖的工业互联网网络基础设施，初步构建工业互联网标识解析体系，初步形成各有侧重、协同集聚发展的工业互联网平台体系，初步建立工业互联网安全保障体系。到2035年，建成国际领先的工业互联网网络基础设施和平台，形成国际先进的技术与产业体系，工业互联网全面深度应用并在优势行业形成创新引领能力，安全保障能力全面提升，重点领域实现国际领先。到本世纪中叶，工业互联网网络基础设施全面支撑经济社会发展，工业互联网创新发展能力、技术产业体系以及融合应用等全面达到国际先进水平，综合实力进入世界前列。

context: The new generation of mobile communication network services mainly include fixed telecommunication services, mobile telecommunication services, and other telecommunication services. Other telecommunication services mainly include mobile voice services, mobile data communication services, video call services, multimedia MMS services, ringtone services, mobile reading services, other related services for fiber access, industry application services based on the Internet of Things, public utility services based on the Internet of Things, support services based on the Internet of Things, IPTV services, portable handheld device TV services, and fixed-mobile convergence services.

context: In response to the mass customization demands of smart factories, research on the reconfigurable technology of industrial control systems is conducted to develop a prototype platform for smart factories. This platform aims to achieve the reconfigurable capability of production line equipment, manufacturing processes, and cloud platform service resources. The key areas of research include reconfigurable technology for equipment controllers, production lines, industrial internet and cloud platforms, as well as the reconfigurable prototype platform for smart factories. The goal is to overcome the challenges of reconfigurable technology in equipment control systems, production line equipment, industrial internet, and cloud platform service resources, in order to realize an integrated reconfigurable technology in the prototype platform for smart factories.

context: Medical imaging equipment. Including multi-energy multi-slice spiral computed tomography (CT), permanent magnet magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) or high-field superconducting magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), magnetoencephalography (MEG), and functional near-infrared spectroscopy imaging (fNIRS), positron emission tomography (PET), high-performance ultrasound imaging (USI), and integrated multimodal hybrid imaging equipment; high-performance electronic endoscopy/laparoscopy (ES) (such as gastroscopy, laryngoscopy, bronchoscopy, laparoscopy, arthroscopy, etc.) and its ultrasound, optical coherence, fluorescence, confocal, and other composite modal imaging systems; high-performance digital radiography (DR), digital subtraction angiography (DSA), and specialized digital radiography for gastrointestinal, breast, bladder, oral, and other specialties; portable, portable, mobile, and vehicle-mounted multi-functional medical imaging systems and their supporting equipment. The core components include high-field superconducting magnets, superconducting RF array surface coils, low-temperature refrigerators for MRI, high-heat-capacity X-ray tubes, fast multi-slice CT detectors, amorphous silicon/oxide flat-panel X-ray detectors, magnetically compatible all-digital solid-state PET detectors, high-density array ultrasound probes, low-dose detectors, and other core components and key technologies. Medical imaging services. Including remote image diagnosis, mobile image diagnosis and treatment, third-party medical imaging centers, and other related supporting equipment and technologies.

context: By 2019, the scale of China's cloud computing industry reached 430 billion yuan, breaking through a number of core key technologies. The cloud computing service capabilities reached an international advanced level, significantly enhancing the driving effect on the development of the new generation information industry. The application level of cloud computing in manufacturing, government affairs, and other fields has significantly improved. The layout of cloud computing data centers has been optimized, with significantly improved utilization and intensification levels, and continuous improvement in green energy-saving levels. The PUE value of newly built data centers is generally better than 1.4. Over 20 cloud computing-related standards have been released, forming a relatively complete cloud computing standard system and third-party evaluation service system. The international influence of cloud computing enterprises has significantly increased, with 2-3 leading enterprises emerging with a large market share in the global cloud computing market. The security assurance capability of cloud computing network has significantly improved, and the network security supervision system and regulatory system have gradually become sound. Cloud computing has become the main form of information construction and an important support for building a strong network and manufacturing country, promoting a substantial improvement in the level of informatization in various economic and social fields.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++云计算++云计算发展三年行动计划（2017-2019年）（工信部信软〔2017〕49号）（工信部/2017年3月30日）++nan++其他政策++2017-3++总体思路和发展目标,发展目标
zh_context: 到2019年，我国云计算产业规模达到4300亿元，突破一批核心关键技术，云计算服务能力达到国际先进水平，对新一代信息产业发展的带动效应显著增强。云计算在制造、政务等领域的应用水平显著提升。云计算数据中心布局得到优化，使用率和集约化水平显著提升，绿色节能水平不断提高，新建数据中心PUE值。普遍优于1.4。发布云计算相关标准超过20项，形成较为完整的云计算标准体系。和第三方测评服务体系。云计算企业的国际影响力显著增强，涌现2-3家在全球云计算市场中具有较大份额的领军企业。云计算网络安全保障能力明显提高，网络安全监管体系和法规体系逐步健全。云计算成为信息化建设主要形态和建设网络强国、制造强国的重要支撑，推动经济社会各领域信息化水平大幅提高。

context: Promote the formation of an integrated general office system based on the government service extranet, expand the application scenarios of mobile general office, and improve government administrative efficiency. Improve the security of the national integrated platform, build a national integrated platform operation management system, coordinate the construction of a disaster recovery backup system for government service platforms, and ensure the security of government data. Create a market-oriented, rule-of-law, and internationalized business environment. Enhance the level of electronic document management and application, deepen the orderly and effective application of electronic licenses, electronic contracts, electronic invoices, electronic accounting vouchers, and other important areas of government services, finance and taxation, social management, and livelihood services. Promote the full-process online handling of government affairs involving enterprises, vigorously promote the full electronic transaction of public resources, and build a public resource trading system that covers the whole country, is transparent and standardized, interconnected, and intelligently supervised. Accelerate the establishment of a one-stop acceptance and hierarchical handling system for business environment demands, and strengthen proactive services for enterprises. Actively explore new applications of services such as big data and artificial intelligence, strengthen the interpretation and precise delivery of policies related to enterprises, and promote the effective implementation of policies. Promote the standardization, precision, and intelligence of government supervision. Actively promote Internet Plus supervision and smart supervision, improve the integrated online supervision system, improve the cross-regional, cross-departmental, and cross-level linkage response and collaborative supervision mechanisms, and achieve one entry, multiple inspections. Relying on the national Internet Plus supervision system, the national credit information sharing platform, and the national enterprise credit information disclosure system, build a credit supervision coordination mechanism with data synchronization, unified measures, and consistent standards, improve the construction of a national post-event supervision big data analysis and risk warning system, and facilitate public participation in Internet Plus supervision through channels and windows. Promote the establishment of a new type of supervision mechanism based on credit in various regions and departments, and expand the coverage of post-event supervision. Strengthen smart supervision in key areas such as food and drug safety, special equipment, industrial product safety, consumer rights protection, online transactions, advertising, and pricing.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十四五”国家信息化规划（中共中央网络安全和信息化委员会/2021年12月27日）++nan++“十四五”国家信息化规划++2021-12++重大任务和重点工程,打造协同高效的数字政府服务体系,提升一体化、跨层级、跨部门的协同办公能力
zh_context: 推动形成基于政务服务外网的一体化共性办公体系，拓展移动共性办公应用场景，提升政府行政效率。完善全国一体化平台安全。保障系统，建设全国一体化平台运营管理系统，统筹推进政务服务平台容灾备份系统建设，保障政务数据安全。打造市场化法治化国际化营商环境。提升电子文件管理和应用水平，深化电子证照、电子合同、电子发票、电子会计凭证等在政务服务、财税金融、社会管理、民生服务等重要领域的有序有效应用。推进涉企政务事项的全程网上办理，大力推进公共资源全流程电子化交易，构建覆盖全国、透明规范、互联互通、智慧监管的公共资源交易体系。加快建立营商环境诉求受理和分级办理“一张网”，加强涉企主动服务。积极探索大数据、人工智能等服务新应用，加强涉企政策宣传解读和精准推送，推动政策有效落实。推动政府监管规范化精准化智能化。积极推进“互联网+监管”和智慧监管，完善一体化在线监管系统，健全跨地区、跨部门、跨层级的联动响应和协同监管机制，实现“进一次门、查多项事”。依托全国“互联网+监管”系统体系、全国信用信息共享平台、国家企业信用信息公示系统，构建数据同步、措施统一、标准一致的信用监管协同机制，完善国家事中事后监管大数据分析和风险预警体系建设，畅通公众社会参与“互联网+监管”的渠道和窗口。推动各地区各部门建立健全以信用为基础的新型监管机制，扩大事中事后监管覆盖范围。强化食品药品、特种设备、工业产品安全、消费者权益保护、网络交易、广告、价格等重点领域智慧监管。

context: Establish a network-based integrated system for car design, manufacturing, and service, and build an intelligent connected car data management system. Utilize Internet of Vehicles technology to enhance vehicle recycling and recycling levels.

zh_context: 建立基于网络的汽车设计、制造、服务一体化体系，构建智能网联汽车数据管理体系。通过车联网实现对车辆运行数据的采集、分析与运用，形成多样化的应用服务和系统管理，为车辆安全运行提供保障。推动车辆精准化的营销推广、定制化的保养服务、个性化的保险套餐、透明化的维修服务和差异化的用车体验，实现基于大数据平台的个性化汽车服务的规模应用。利用车联网技术提升车辆回收和循环利用水平。

context: According to the Outline of the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development of the People's Republic of China, high-end equipment and system integration technologies represented by design and process technology, intelligent robot technology, and system control technology are the core of intelligent manufacturing. The research content is arranged according to the principles of reserving one generation, developing one generation, and promoting one generation. Breakthroughs are made in basic technologies and components of intelligent manufacturing, overcome a batch of intelligent equipment, develop automated production lines for manufacturing processes, establish corresponding technical and safety standards, enhance industrial competitiveness, seize the high-end of the manufacturing value chain, promote the upgrading and strategic adjustment of the manufacturing industry structure, and systematically layout innovation bases and platforms, cultivate innovative and entrepreneurial leaders and teams.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++智能制造科技发展“十二五”专项规划（节选）（国科发计[2012]193号）（科技部/2012年3月27日）++nan++其他政策++2012-3++总体思路、基本原则及发展目标,发展目标
zh_context: 根据《中华人民共和国国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要》，以设计与工艺技术、智能机器人技术和系统控制技术等为代表的高端装备和系统集成技术是智能制造的核心，按储备一代、研发一代、推广一代的原则安排相关研究内容，突破智能制造基础技术与部件、攻克一批智能化装备、研发制造过程自动化生产线，制定相应技术与安全标准，增强产业竞争力，抢占制造业价值链高端，促进制造业结构升级和战略调整，并系统布局创新基地和平台，培养创新创业领军人才和团队。

context: The manufacturing of high-energy storage and key electronic materials mainly includes the production of primary form plastics and synthetic resins, other specialty chemical products, plastic film, specialty glass, technical glass products, specialty ceramic products, graphite and carbon products, lithium-ion battery manufacturing, nickel-hydrogen battery manufacturing, other battery manufacturing, and electronic specialty material manufacturing. The production of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes polyolefin materials, soft materials, and silicon-based composite materials. The manufacturing of other specialty chemical products mainly includes lithium hexafluorophosphate carbonate solution. The manufacturing of plastic film mainly includes aluminum-plastic film, transparent conductive film materials, and electronic component-specific thin film materials. The manufacturing of specialty glass mainly includes glass substrates of 6th generation and above. The manufacturing of technical glass products mainly includes glass ceramics (microcrystalline glass) and quartz fiber optic cable materials. The manufacturing of specialty ceramic products mainly includes high-performance ceramic substrates, gas-sensitive ceramic materials, moisture-sensitive ceramic materials, photosensitive ceramic materials, and thermosensitive ceramic materials. The manufacturing of graphite and carbon products mainly includes graphite materials (such as artificial graphite and natural graphite) and hard carbon materials. The manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries mainly includes lithium-ion battery cells, modules, and systems.

context: In response to the structural reform of the supply side and the transformation and upgrading of the manufacturing industry, the development of cyber-physical systems and industrial internet is promoted to facilitate the transformation of production and operation management towards intelligence, refinement, and networking. Through technologies such as RFID, electronic identification of relevant production materials is implemented to achieve intelligent management of production processes and supply chains. Sensor technologies are utilized to enhance real-time collection and data analysis of production status information, thereby improving efficiency and quality, promoting safety production, and energy conservation. By embedding capabilities such as sensing, positioning, and identification in products, remote maintenance of products is realized, facilitating the transformation of manufacturing industry towards service-oriented.

context: Biotechnology drugs mainly include the large-scale preparation and production technologies of antibody drugs, gene engineering drugs, antibody drugs, nucleic acid drugs, stable expression cell line construction technologies, etc., used for the treatment of difficult-to-treat diseases such as malignant tumors, autoimmune diseases, neurological diseases, as well as for the emergency prevention and treatment of infectious diseases. These drugs utilize protein engineering technology, chemical modification technology, long-acting, sustained-release, controlled-release, and other biopharmaceutical technologies. They are used for the treatment of difficult-to-treat diseases such as malignant tumors, autoimmune diseases, neurological diseases, as well as for the emergency prevention and treatment of infectious diseases. They are characterized by low immunogenicity, good stability, strong targeting, long-acting, and high bioavailability. They include gene engineering protein drugs, cell therapy products, and gene therapy drugs targeting difficult-to-treat diseases such as malignant tumors. Specific immunoglobulin products are also included. Blood products that improve plasma utilization are beneficial. The large-scale preparation and production technologies of gene engineering drugs, antibody drugs, nucleic acid drugs, stable expression cell line construction technologies, etc., protein engineering technology, chemical modification technology, long-acting, sustained-release, controlled-release, and other biopharmaceutical technologies, as well as new carriers, adjuvants, stabilizers, and protectants for vaccines, and cell therapy-related technologies.

context: Wind power generation and related equipment and materials manufacturing mainly include the manufacturing of coatings, synthetic rubber, cement, fiberglass reinforced plastic products, specialized metallurgical equipment, metal shipbuilding, marine engineering equipment, underwater salvage equipment, power electronic components, wire and cable manufacturing, navigation, surveying, meteorological and marine specialized instrument manufacturing, electronic measuring instrument manufacturing, etc. Coating manufacturing mainly includes heavy-duty anti-corrosion coatings. Fiberglass reinforced plastic product manufacturing mainly includes offshore construction anti-corrosion fiberglass materials. Specialized metallurgical equipment manufacturing mainly includes large-scale flange forging equipment. Metal shipbuilding mainly includes specialized vessels and equipment for operation and maintenance. Marine engineering equipment manufacturing mainly includes equipment for submarine cable laying (including protective pipes) and offshore booster stations.

zh_context: 加强IPv6环境下工业互联网、物联网、车联网、云计算、大数据、人工智能等领域的网络安全技术、管理及机制研究，增强新兴领域网络安全保障能力。

context: With a focus on major diseases that seriously endanger the health of our people, breakthroughs will be made in 10-15 major core key technologies. Around 30 innovative drugs with strong innovation, high technological content, good market prospects, and independent intellectual property rights will be independently developed to improve the level of pharmaceutical equipment technology and enhance the international competitiveness of innovative drugs, meeting the public's medication needs. Column 1: Major innovative drugs. New drug target discovery. Key research will be conducted on large-scale structural genomics, fragment-based drug design, and target structure modification and optimization based on target structure, studying the multidimensional mechanisms of drug action and potential off-target effects, discovering and selecting appropriate drug targets, and providing therapeutic targets for original drug development. Vaccines and antibodies. Support research on viral vaccines, combination vaccines, gene recombinant protein vaccines, bacterial vaccines such as polysaccharide-protein conjugate vaccines, and therapeutic vaccines; support research on antibody-drug conjugates, bispecific antibodies, new target antibodies, and monoclonal antibody drugs. Small molecule targeted drugs. Combining novel biomarkers and drug intervention targets, research will be conducted on the novelty, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics of new chemical entities (NCEs), improving the accessibility and safety of drug delivery systems, and developing new small molecule targeted drugs. New traditional Chinese medicines. Highlighting major diseases and advantageous traditional Chinese medicine diseases, efforts will be focused on the development of new compound drugs derived from classical famous prescriptions, in-hospital preparations, famous old Chinese medicine experience prescriptions, as well as new drugs composed of traditional Chinese medicine components or monomers, creating clinically effective, safe, quality-controlled, and easy-to-use new traditional Chinese medicines. Pharmaceutical equipment. With digitization, networking, and intelligence as the main development directions, emphasis will be placed on the development of high-end production equipment for raw material machinery and equipment, formulation machinery and equipment, decoction pieces (traditional Chinese medicine) equipment, pharmaceutical packaging machinery and equipment, pharmaceutical testing equipment, and other equipment that meets the needs of the pharmaceutical industry, improving the market share of independent products.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”健康产业科技创新专项规划（国科发社〔2017〕149号）（科技部、国家发改委、工信部、原国家卫计委、体育总局、原食品药品监管总局/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,重点发展三类产品,重大创新药物
zh_context: 以严重危害我国人民健康的重大疾病为重点，突破10-15项重大核心关键技术，自主研制30个左右创新性强、科技含量高、市场前景好、拥有自主知识产权的新药，提升制药装备技术水平，提高创新药物的国际竞争力，满足公众用药需求。专栏1：重大创新药物。新药靶标发现。重点开展大规模结构基因组研究、基于片段的药物设计、以及基于靶标结构的药物结构修饰与优化研究，多维度研究药物作用机制、潜在的脱靶效应，发现和选择合适的药物靶点，为原创性药物研发提供治疗靶标。疫苗和抗体。支持病毒性疫苗、联合疫苗、基因重组蛋白质疫苗、多糖蛋白结合等细菌性疫苗及治疗性疫苗研究；支持抗体偶联药物、双特异性抗体、新靶点抗体及单克隆抗体药物研究。小分子靶向药物。结合新型生物标志物和药物干预靶标，开展新化学实体（NCE）药物的新颖性、优效性和药代研究，改善药物递送系统的可及性以及药物的安全性，研发新型小分子靶向药物。中药新药。突出重大疾病和中医优势病种，重点加强源于经典名方、院内制剂、名老中医经验方等中药复方新药以及中药组分或单体新药的研发，创制临床疗效突出、安全性高、质量可控、易于服用的中药新药。制药装备。以数字化、网络化、智能化为主要发展方向，重点发展原料药机械及设备、制剂机械及设备、饮片（中药）设备、药品包装机械设备、药品检测设备等面向医药产业需求的高端生产设备，提升自主产品市场占有率。

This will greatly enhance the core competitiveness of China's scientific instrument industry.

zh_context: 以关键核心技术和部件自主研发为突破口，聚焦高端通用和专业重大科学仪器设备研发、工程化和产业化，研制一批核心关键部件，显著降低核心关键部件对外依存度，明显提高高端通用科学仪器的产品质量和可靠性，大幅提升我国科学仪器行业核心竞争力。

context: Develop high-end intelligent remanufacturing technology research and development center, carry out green remanufacturing design, and further enhance the comprehensive performance of remanufactured products. Accelerate the innovation and industrial application of key common technologies in remanufacturing, such as additive manufacturing, special materials, intelligent processing, and non-destructive testing. Further breakthroughs in remanufacturing technologies for key components of aviation engines and gas turbines, medical imaging equipment, and strengthen the remanufacturing technology for shield tunneling machines, heavy-duty machine tools, complete internal combustion engines, and key components. Promote the application of industrial robots, large-scale port machinery, computer servers, and other remanufacturing technologies. Column 1: Innovation and industrial application of key technologies in high-end intelligent remanufacturing. Innovation and industrial application of remanufacturing technologies for key components of aviation engines and gas turbines. Carry out innovation and industrial application of remanufacturing technologies for key components such as compressor rotor blades (integral disks), directionally solidified turbine rotor and stator blades, directionally single crystal turbine rotor and stator blades, directionally solidified intermetallic compound turbine stator blades, and large thin-walled casings. Innovation and industrial application of remanufacturing technologies for key components of medical imaging equipment. Carry out innovation and industrial application of key technologies in remanufacturing CT tubes, high-voltage generators, high-speed liquid metal bearings, CT slip rings, and digitized detection modules for medical imaging equipment such as T and PET-CT.

zh_context: 培育高端智能再制造技术研发中心，开展绿色再制造设计，进一步提升再制造产品综合性能。加快增材制造、特种材料、智能加工、无损检测等再制造关键共性技术创新与产业化应用。进一步突破航空发动机与燃气轮机、医疗影像设备关键件再制造技术，加强盾构机、重型机床、内燃机整机及关键件再制造技术推。广应用，探索推进工业机器人、大型港口机械、计算机服务器等再制造。专栏1高端智能再制造关键技术创新与产业化应用。航空发动机与燃气轮机关键件再制造技术创新与产业化应用。开展航空发动机与燃气轮机压气机转子叶片（整体叶盘）、定向柱晶轮转子和静子叶片、定向单晶祸轮转子和静子叶片、定向金属间化合物祸轮静子叶片以及大型薄壁机匣等关键件再制造技术创新与产业化应用。医疗影像设备关键件再制造技术创新与产业化应用。开展T、PET-CT等医疗影像设备CT球管、高压发生器、高转速液态金属轴承、CT滑环、数字化探测模组的再制造关键技术创新与产业化应用。

context: We will vigorously develop new chip components based on Surface Mount Technology (SMT), actively support the research and industrialization of new components based on Micro-Electro-Mechanical Systems (MEMS) technology, and passive integrated components based on Low-Temperature Co-Fired Ceramics (LTCC) technology. We will strive to develop key electronic components such as relays, connectors, micro motors, and supercapacitors required for automotive electronic systems. We will accelerate the research and industrialization of nickel-hydrogen batteries, power-type and energy storage-type lithium-ion batteries, battery management systems, and battery grouping technologies for new energy vehicles. We will promote the development of low-cost fiber optic cables, optical devices, frequency devices, digital audio devices, and mixed integrated circuits industries around the development of next-generation communication technologies. We will actively develop high-performance and high-reliability sensors, power electronic components, ultra-thin lithium-ion batteries, and specialized vacuum electronic devices required for the development of strategic emerging industries such as the Internet of Things, new energy, and high-end equipment. We will accelerate the development of high-density interconnect boards, special printed circuit boards, printed circuit boards for light-emitting diodes (LEDs), and key core devices such as infrared focal plane detectors, ultraviolet detectors, and low-light image intensifiers required for modern optics. While focusing on the development of mature technologies, we will closely follow future technological trends, accurately grasp innovative technological directions, prioritize the support of innovative and common technologies, provide technological reserves for sustainable industrial development, and lay an important technological and industrial foundation for the structural adjustment, industrial upgrading, and transformation of the development mode of the electronic information manufacturing industry.

context: Encourage the construction of distributed energy storage systems on the user side. Research and formulate admission policies and technical standards for user-side energy storage, and guide and regulate the construction and operation of user-side distributed energy storage systems. Support electricity retailers with distribution network operating rights and eligible residential users to install energy storage, increase the proportion of locally consumed distributed energy, participate in demand response, and reduce energy costs, and encourage exploration of relevant business models. Improve support policies for user-side energy storage systems. In conjunction with power system reform, allow energy storage to participate in electricity trading through market-based approaches. Support user-side energy storage facilities of a certain scale to collaborate with power generation companies or participate as independent entities in ancillary services such as frequency regulation and peak shaving. Support the installation of energy storage in microgrids and off-grid areas. Encourage the use of multiple energy storage technologies to improve the reliability and quality of power supply in microgrids; actively explore new technologies and models for energy storage-enabled microgrids to participate in electricity trading and optimize grid operations. Encourage the development of economically viable energy storage systems to address or optimize electricity supply for populations without access to power.

context: It mainly includes seven parts: artificial intelligence, industrial big data, industrial software, industrial cloud, edge computing, digital twin, and blockchain. It is mainly used to guide the integration and application of new technologies in the manufacturing industry and improve the level of manufacturing intelligence. (1) Artificial intelligence standards. It mainly includes knowledge service standards such as machine learning, knowledge representation, knowledge modeling, knowledge fusion, and knowledge computation; platform and support standards such as application platform architecture and integration requirements; performance evaluation standards such as training data requirements, testing guidelines, and evaluation principles; application management standards for product lifecycle such as intelligent online detection and operation management optimization.(2) Industrial big data standards. It mainly includes industrial big data platform standards such as platform construction requirements, operation and maintenance, and detection evaluation; data processing standards such as industrial big data collection, preprocessing, analysis, visualization, and access; data management and governance standards such as data management system, data resource management, data quality management, master data management, and data management capability maturity; data circulation standards such as internal data sharing in factories and external data exchange.(3) Industrial software standards. It mainly includes software product and system standards such as functional definition, business model, quality requirements, and maturity requirements for products, tools, embedded software, systems, and platforms; software system integration and interface standards such as industrial software interface specifications, integration rules, and product line engineering; service and management standards such as lifecycle management, quality management, asset management, configuration management, reliability requirements, and testing and verification; industrial technology software standards such as industrial technology software reference architecture and industrial application software packaging.(4) Industrial cloud standards. It mainly includes resource standards such as platform construction and application, access, configuration, and management of industrial cloud resources and service capabilities; service standards such as implementation guidelines, capability assessment, and effectiveness evaluation.(5) Edge computing standards. It mainly includes standards such as architecture and technical requirements, interfaces, edge network requirements, data management requirements, and edge operating systems.(6) Digital twin standards. It mainly includes general requirements standards such as reference architecture and information model; functional requirements standards for different system levels; data interaction and interface standards for integration and collaboration between digital twin systems; testing and evaluation standards such as performance evaluation and compliance testing; digital twin service application standards for different manufacturing scenarios.(7) Blockchain standards. It mainly includes process management standards such as industrial product development and traceability, service and quality management based on blockchain technology; and business process standards such as supply chain finance, cross-border trade and electronic contracts, procurement, and logistics based on blockchain for manufacturing enterprises. The key focus of intelligent empowerment technology standards construction includes artificial intelligence standards such as knowledge service standards, performance evaluation standards, and platform and support standards for knowledge services, performance evaluation standards, and platform and support standards for intelligent online detection and operation management optimization in product lifecycle scenarios; edge computing standards such as architecture and technical requirements, interface standards, edge network requirements, data management requirements, and edge operating systems; digital twin standards such as general requirements, reference architecture, data interaction and interface, service applications; and blockchain standards such as industrial product traceability, industrial design copyright protection, trusted quality management, supply chain finance, and electronic contracts based on blockchain.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++国家智能制造标准体系建设指南（2021版）（工信部联科[2021]187号）（工业和信息化部、国家标准化管理委员会/2021年11月17日）++nan++其他政策++2021-11++建设内容,关键技术标准,智能赋能技术标准
zh_context: 主要包括人工智能、工业大数据、工业软件、工业云、边缘计算、数字孪生和区块链等7个部分。主要用于指导新技术向制造业领域融合应用，提升制造业智能化水平。（1）人工智能标准。主要包括机器学习、知识表示、知识建模、知识融合、知识计算等知识服务标准；应用平台架构、集成要求等平台与支撑标准；训练数据要求、测试指南与评估原则等性能评估标准；智能在线检测、运营管理优化等面向产品全生命周期的应用管理标准等。（2）工业大数据标准。主要包括平台建设的要求、运维和检测评估等工业大数据平台标准；工业大数据采集、预处理、分析、可视化和访问等数据处理标准；数据管理体系、数据资源管理、数据质量管理、主数据管理、数据管理能力成熟度等数据管理和治理标准；工厂内部数据共享、工厂外部数据交换等数据流通标准。（3）工业软件标准。主要包括产品、工具、嵌入式软件、系统和平台的功能定义、业务模型、质量要求、成熟度要求等软件产品与系统标准；工业软件接口规范、集成规程、产品线工程等软件系统集成和接口标准；生存周期管理、质量。管理、资产管理、配置管理、可靠性要求、测试验证等服务与管理标准；工业技。术软件化参考架构、工业应用软件封装等工业技术软件化标准。（4）工业云标准。主要包括平台建设与应用，工业云资源和服务能力的接入、配置与管理等资源标准；实施指南、能力测评、效果评价等服务标准。（5）边缘计算标准。主要包括架构与技术要求、接口、边缘网络要求、数据管理要求、边缘操作系统等标准。（6）数字孪生标准。主要包括参考架构、信息模型等通用要求标准；面向不同系统层级的功能要求标准；面向数字孪生系统间集成和协作的数据交互与接口标准；性能评估及符合性测试等测试与评估标准；面向不同制造场景的数字孪生服务应用标准。（7）区块链标准。主要包括基于区块链技术的工业产品研发和溯源、服务和质量管理等过程管理标准；以及制造企业基于区块链的供应链金融、跨境贸易和电子合同、采购和物流等业务流程标准。智能赋能技术标准建设重点。人工智能标准。智能在线检测、运营管理优化等面向产品全生命周期场景中的知识服务标准、性能评估标准、平台与支撑标准等。边缘计算标准。架构与技术要求、接口标准、边缘网络要求、数据管理要求、边缘操作系统等标准。数字孪生标准。通用要求、参考架构、数据交互与接口、服务应用等标准。区块链标准。基于区块链的工业产品溯源、工业设计版权保护、可信质量管理、供应链金融、电子合同等标准。

context: The safety management standards are used to guide industries in implementing general safety management requirements, mainly including data security management, secure information collaboration, management and maintenance of security, security certification, etc. (see Figure 6). Figure 6: Safety Management. (1) Data Security Management: It focuses on various types of data generated by IoT business applications, ensuring the security, controllability, and use of data in various stages, mainly including data security basic management and technical support in key stages such as collection, transmission, storage, processing, sharing, and destruction. (2) Secure Information Collaboration: It addresses the numerous types of IoT protocols, clarifies the standards for interconnection and interoperability of basic security-related data in IoT, and achieves secure interconnection and interoperability across protocols, mainly including interface specifications, testing methods, etc. (3) Management and Maintenance of Security: It standardizes the operation and maintenance management of terminals, gateways, and platforms in different IoT scenarios, mainly including system construction, security organization, personnel management, operational security, asset management, configuration management, remote maintenance security, vulnerability detection, emergency response and management, disaster recovery, etc. (4) Security Certification: It standardizes the certification management of different types of IoT terminals, gateways, and platforms, used for the mutual recognition and interoperability of security certification for different types of devices, mainly including certificate generation, certificate management, certificate replacement, etc.

zh_context: 安全管理标准用于指导行业落实通用安全管理要求，主要包括数据安全管理、安全信息协同、管理与维护安全、安全认证等（见图6）。图6安全管理。（1）数据安全管理：面向物联网业务应用产生的各类数据，保障数据在各环节的安全可控和使用，主要包括在采集、传输、存储、处理、共享、销毁等关键环节的数据安全基础管理和技术保障等。（2）安全信息协同：针对物联网协议类型众多，明确物联网基础安全相关数据互联互通标准，实现跨协议安全互联互通，主要包括接口规范、测试方法等。（3）管理与维护安全：规范不同物联网场景下终端、网关、平台的运维管理等方。面安全要求，主要包括制度建设、安全组织、人员管理、运行安全、资产管理、配置管理、远程维护安全、脆弱性检测、应急响应与管理、灾备恢复等。（4）安全认证：规范不同类型的物联网终端、网关、平台的认证管理，用于不。同类型设备的安全认证互通互认，主要包括证书生成、证书管理、证书更换等。

The second is the storage resource service. By using cloud storage services such as block storage and object storage on the cloud platform, it improves the economy, security, and reliability of data storage. The third is the network resource service. By using network services such as virtual private cloud, virtual private network, and load balancing on the cloud platform, it efficiently and securely utilizes cloud platform network resources. The fourth is the security protection service. By using security services such as cloud host security protection, network attack protection, application firewall, key/certificate management, and data encryption protection on the cloud, it enhances information security capabilities.

zh_context: 一是计算资源服务。使用云平台的各种弹性计算服务，实现计算资源集中管理、动态分配、弹性扩展和运维减负。二是存储资源服务。使用云平台的块存储、对象存储等云存储服务，提高数据存储的经济性、安全性和可靠性。三是网络资源服务。使用云平台的虚拟专有云、虚拟专有网络、负载均衡等网络服务，高效安全利用云平台网络资源。四是安全防护服务。使用云上主机安全防护、网络攻击防护、应用防火墙、密钥/证书管理、数据加密保护等安全服务，提高信息安全保障能力。

context: Comprehensive utilization of mineral resources mainly includes onshore oil extraction, onshore natural gas extraction, iron ore selection, magnesite selection, rare earth metal ore selection, other rare metal ore selection, clay and other sand and stone extraction, chemical mineral extraction, other mining industries, and other electricity production. Onshore oil extraction mainly includes comprehensive utilization of oil shale, comprehensive utilization of oil sands, comprehensive utilization of associated natural gas, development and utilization of coal-based oil shale resources, and comprehensive utilization of oil sands. Onshore natural gas extraction mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of coalbed methane, application of microbial coalbed methane extraction technology, and comprehensive utilization of shale gas. Iron ore selection mainly includes comprehensive development and utilization of medium and low-grade iron ore and associated minerals. Magnesite selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of magnesite tailings. Rare earth metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of rare earth metal ore tailings. Other rare metal ore selection mainly includes re-development and utilization of other rare metal ore tailings. Clay and other sand and stone extraction mainly includes re-development and utilization of sand and stone mine tailings, comprehensive utilization and deep processing of associated non-metallic mineral resources such as kaolin and alumina, and development and utilization of resources such as kaolin. Chemical mineral extraction mainly includes re-development and utilization of chemical mineral tailings. Other mining industries mainly include comprehensive utilization of geothermal energy.

zh_context: 支持智能交互、智能操作、多机协作等关键技术研发，提升清洁、老年陪护、康复、助残、儿童教育等家庭服务机器人的智能化水平，推动巡检、导览等公共服务机器人以及消防救援机器人等的创新应用。发展三维成像定位、智能精准安全操控、人机协作接口等关键技术，支持手术机器人操作系统研发，推动手术机器人在临床医疗中的应用。到2020年，智能服务机器人环境感知、自然交互、自主学习、人机协作等关键技术取得突破，智能家庭服务机器人、智能公共服务机器人实现批量生产及应用，医疗康复、助老助残、消防救灾等机器人实现样机生产，完成技术与功能验证，实现20家以上应用示范。

context: Cultivate the artificial intelligence industry ecosystem, promote the widespread application of artificial intelligence in key areas of the economy and society, and build an internationally leading technical system. Encourage leading companies or institutions to provide artificial intelligence research and development tools, as well as entrepreneurship consulting, talent training, and other entrepreneurial innovation services. Promote the application of artificial intelligence technology in various fields. Develop diversified, personalized, and customized intelligent hardware and intelligent systems, with a focus on the research and industrialization of smart homes, smart cars, smart agriculture, smart security, smart health, smart robots, and smart wearable devices. Encourage all industries to strengthen integration with artificial intelligence and gradually achieve intelligent upgrading. Utilize artificial intelligence to innovate urban management and build new smart cities. Promote the application of professional service robots and household service robots, and cultivate new high-end service industries. Column 5: Artificial Intelligence Innovation Project. Promote basic theoretical research and core technology development, achieve industrialization of neuromorphic chips, intelligent robots, and intelligent application systems, and embed new artificial intelligence technologies into various fields. Build an artificial intelligence public service platform and open research and development service platform for backbone enterprises to the society. Establish and improve the double innovation support service system for artificial intelligence.

zh_context: 培育人工智能产业生态，促进人工智能在经济社会重点领域推广应用，打造国际领先的技术体系。加快人工智能支撑体系建设。推动类脑研究等基础理论和技术研究，加快基于人工智能的计算机视听觉、生物特征识别、新型人机交互、智能决策控制等应用技术研发和产业化，支持人工智能领域的基础软硬件开发。加快视频、地图及行业应用数据等人工智能海量训练资源库和基础资源服务公共平台建设，建设支撑大规模深度学习的新型计算集群。鼓励领先企业或机构提供人工智能研发工具以及检验评测、创业咨询、人才培养等创业创新服务。推动人工智能技术在各领域应用。在制造、教育、环境保护、交通、商业、健康医疗、网络安全、社会治理等重要领域开展试点示范，推动人工智能规模化应用。发展多元化、个性化、定制化智能硬件和智能化系统，重点推进智能家居、智能汽车、智慧农业、智能安防、智慧健康、智能机器人、智能可穿戴设备等研发和产业化发展。鼓励各行业加强与人工智能融合，逐步实现智能化升级。利用人工智能创新城市管理，建设新型智慧城市。推动专业服务机器人和家用服务机器人应用，培育新型高端服务产业。专栏5人工智能创新工程。推动基础理论研究和核心技术开发，实现类人神经计算芯片、智能机器人和智能应用系统的产业化，将人工智能新技术嵌入各领域。构建人工智能公共服务平台和向社会开放的骨干企业研发服务平台。建立健全人工智能“双创”支撑服务体系。

context: Focus on the development of intelligent specialized equipment with functions such as perception, decision-making, and execution. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as new types of sensors, intelligent instruments and meters, automatic control systems, industrial robots, and other perception and control devices, as well as their servo, execution, and transmission components. Improve the integrated capability of complete system integration, promote automation, intelligence, and greenization in the manufacturing and usage processes, support the development and upgrading of key areas of the national economy such as advanced manufacturing, national defense, transportation, energy, agriculture, environmental protection, and comprehensive utilization of resources. Development goals: Sensors, automatic control systems, industrial robots, establish a sound system perception and integration coordination. Breakthroughs in intelligent devices represented by servo execution components and reaching international advanced levels. Significant improvement in the integration level of major complete sets of equipment and large-scale complete production line systems. Increase domestic market share. Significant improvement in the level of intelligentization in key areas. Intelligent manufacturing equipment industry system with capabilities, domestic market share reaching 50%, forming a group of internationally competitive industrial clusters and enterprises, overall level entering the international advanced ranks. Key actions: Accelerate the implementation of major scientific and technological projects for high-end CNC machine tools and basic manufacturing equipment. Strengthen research on key technologies such as new types of sensors, high-precision motion control, optimization control, system integration, and construction of public service platforms; improve the independent innovation capabilities of new types of sensors, intelligent instruments, precision testing instruments, automatic control systems, high-performance hydraulic components, industrial robots, and other typical intelligent devices. Industrialization and application demonstration: Implement the innovation and development project of intelligent manufacturing equipment, promote the industrialization of intelligent instruments and meters, automatic control systems, sensors, industrial robots, medium and high-end CNC systems and functional components, and key basic components. Improve the integration and innovation level of major complete sets of intelligent equipment, and promote the application of intelligent technology, intelligent measurement and control devices, and high-performance basic components in key areas such as petrochemicals, metallurgy, resource extraction, automobiles, power, mechanical processing, environmental protection, and comprehensive utilization of resources. Major policies: In the first demonstration application of major technical equipment, support the research and development, innovation, and industrialization of the first set of intelligent manufacturing equipment, and explore the insurance mechanism for the first set of equipment.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十二五”国家战略性新兴产业发展规划（节选）（国发[2012]28号）（国务院/2012年7月9日）++nan++其他政策++2012-7++重点发展方向和主要任务,高端装备制造产业,智能制造装备产业
zh_context: 重点发展具有感知、决策、执行等功能的智能专用装备，突破新型传感器与智能仪器仪表、自动控制系统、工业机器人等感知、控制装置及其伺服、执行、传动零部件等核心关键技术，提高成套系统集成能力，推进制造、使用过程的自动化、智能化和绿色化，支撑先进制造、国防、交通、能源、农业、环保与资源综合利用等国民经济重点领域发展和升级。专栏15智能制造装备产业发展路线图。时间节点2015年2020年。发展目标传感器、自动控制系统、工业机器人、建立健全具备系统感知和集成协调。伺服执行部件为代表的智能装置实现突破并达到国际先进水平，重大成套装备及大型成套生产线系统集成水平大幅度提升。提高国内市场占有率。重点领域制造过程智能化水平显著提高。能力的智能制造装备产业体系，国内市场占有率达到50%，形成一批具有国际竞争力的产业集聚区和企业集团，整体水平进入国际先进行列。重大行动关键技术开发：加快实施高档数控机床与基础制造装备科技重大专项。加强新型传感、高精度运动控制、优化控制、系统集成等关键技术研究及公共服务平台建设；提高新型传感器、智能化仪表、精密测试仪器、自动控制系统、高性能液压件、工业机器人等典型智能装置的自主创新能力。产业化与应用示范：实施智能制造装备创新发展工程，推进智能仪器仪表、自动控制系统、传感器、工业机器人、中高档数控系统与功能部件、关键基础零部件产业化。提高重大成套智能装备集成创新水平，实现智能技术、智能测控装置和高性能基础零部件在石化、冶金、资源开采、汽车、电力、机械加工、环保与资源综合利用等重点领域的推广应用。重大政策在重大技术装备首台（套）示范应用中，支持智能制造装备首台（套）研发创新及产业化，探索首台（套）装备保险机制。

zh_context: 大力发展新型功能材料、先进结构材料和复合材料，开展纳米、超导、智能。等共性基础材料研究和产业化，提高新材料工艺装备的保障能力；建设产学研结。合紧密、具备较强自主创新能力和可持续发展能力的高性能、轻量化、绿色化的新材料产业创新体系和标准体系，发布国家新材料重点产品发展指导目录，建立新材料产业认定和统计体系，引导材料工业结构调整。到2015年，突破一批国家建设急需、引领未来发展的关键共性技术；到2020年，关键新材料自给率明显提高。

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is as follows:The manufacturing of high-efficiency and energy-saving general equipment mainly includes the manufacturing of boilers and auxiliary equipment, the manufacturing of steam turbines and auxiliary machinery, the manufacturing of pumps and vacuum equipment, the manufacturing of gas compressors, the manufacturing of hydraulic power machinery and components, the manufacturing of pneumatic power machinery and components, the manufacturing of drying furnaces, melting furnaces, and electric furnaces, the manufacturing of fans and ventilators, the manufacturing of gas and liquid separation and purification equipment, the manufacturing of refrigeration and air conditioning equipment, the manufacturing of slide projectors and projection equipment, the manufacturing of cameras and equipment, the manufacturing of calculators and currency-specific equipment, and other unspecified general equipment manufacturing industries. The manufacturing of gas and liquid separation and purification equipment mainly includes the equipment for utilizing waste heat, waste gas, and excess pressure, the equipment for deep recovery of low-temperature flue gas waste heat, integrated equipment for dust removal, desulfurization, denitrification, and waste heat utilization, multi-nozzle opposed water-coal slurry gasification equipment, pulverized coal pressurized gasification gas equipment, non-slag-slag water-coal slurry grading gasification equipment, low-calorific gas gas turbine, closed-loop recovery technology equipment for low-pressure steam and condensate water, screw expansion power drive technology equipment, low-vacuum heating technology equipment for steam turbines, organic Rankine cycle power generation technology equipment, centralized heating technology equipment based on absorption heat exchange, high-efficiency heat exchanger equipment, accumulator equipment, condenser equipment, and comprehensive utilization technology and devices for mine ventilation and drainage thermal energy.
