context: Carry out research on the core technologies of the next generation of robots, including the combination of active and passive structures, modular flexible joints, joint variable stiffness elastic drive, human-machine compatibility design of the bio-mechanical interface and interface, coexistence of human-machine safety, intelligent interaction, and collaborative operation. Develop a new generation of collaborative multi-degree-of-freedom lightweight arms, collaborative dual-arm robots, human-assisted collaborative operation robots represented by mobile operating arms, and prototype systems of new generation body behavior-enhancing robots represented by upper limb exoskeletons, lower limb exoskeletons, and full-body exoskeletons. Lay the technical foundation for subsequent productization, achieve synchronization with the world in the research of new generation robot technology, and seize the high ground of technology and industry.

zh_context: 开展主/被动结合新型机构与驱动、模块化柔顺关节、关节变刚度弹性驱动、生物-机械界面与接口的人机相容性设计、人机安全共存、智能交互、协同作业。等新一代机器人核心技术研究，研制以协作型多自由度轻型臂、协作型双臂机器。人、移动操作臂等为代表的新一代互助协作型作业机器人和以上肢外骨骼、下肢外骨骼、全身外骨骼等为代表的新一代人体行为增强型机器人试验样机系统，为后续产品化奠定技术基础，实现新一代机器人技术研究与世界同步，抢占技术与产业制高点。

context: Develop equipment for disease prevention, diagnosis, treatment, and health promotion targeting the special needs of women and children. Develop diagnostic analysis software and equipment for prenatal and postnatal care. Promote the use of wearable equipment for maternal and child health care. Promote the application of equipment for the transportation, treatment, and life support of critically ill newborns, as well as early screening for infant-related diseases. Promote the remote, wireless, and customized development of equipment for women and children's health.

zh_context: 发展面向妇女、儿童特殊需求的疾病预防、诊断、治疗、健康促进等装备。攻关优生优育诊断分析软件及装备。研制孕产期保健、儿童保健可穿戴装备，推动危重症新生儿转运、救治、生命支持以及婴幼儿相关疾病早期筛查等装备应用。促进妇幼健康装备远程化、无线化、定制化发展。

context: By 2025, China will become a global source of innovation in robot technology, a hub for high-end manufacturing, and a new frontier for integrated applications. Breakthroughs will be made in core robot technologies and high-end products, with overall performance reaching international advanced levels and key component performance and reliability reaching the same level as similar international products. The annual growth rate of the robot industry's revenue will exceed 20%. A number of internationally competitive leading enterprises and a large number of innovative and high-growth small giant enterprises with strong capabilities will be formed, and 3-5 industry clusters with international influence will be established. The density of manufacturing robots will double. By 2035, China's comprehensive strength in the robot industry will reach an internationally leading level, and robots will become an important component of economic development, people's lives, and social governance.

zh_context: 到2025年我国成为全球机器人技术创新策源地、高端制造集聚地和集成应用新高地。一批机器人核心技术和高端产品取得突破，整机综合指标达到国际先进水平，关键零部件性能和可靠性达到国际同类产品水平。机器人产业营业收入年均增速超过20%。形成一批具有国际竞争力的领军企业及一大批创新能力强、成长性好的专精特新“小巨人”企业，建成3～5个有国际影响力的产业集群。制造业机器人密度实现翻番。到2035年，我国机器人产业综合实力达到国际领先水平，机器人成为经济发展、人民生活、社会治理的重要组成。

context: Cultivate and strengthen high-quality enterprises. Encourage backbone enterprises to cultivate robot leading enterprises with ecological dominance and core competitiveness through mergers and acquisitions, joint ventures, and cooperation. Promote enterprises to deepen their presence in segmented industries, strengthen specialized and differentiated development, and create a group of specialized and innovative hidden champions and individual champion enterprises in the fields of robot complete machines, components, and system integration. Promote strong, stable, and secure supply chains. Encourage backbone enterprises to target weak links in key components and high-end complete machine products, and accelerate the research and development, engineering verification, and iterative upgrading of precision gears, lubricants, encoders, core software, and other supporting enterprises. Support collaborative innovation among upstream, midstream, and downstream companies in the industrial chain, and promote the integrated development of large, medium, and small enterprises to build a sound industrial ecosystem. Strengthen international industrial security cooperation and promote diversification of the robot industry supply chain. Build advantageous characteristic clusters. Promote rational regional layout, guide resources and innovative elements to gather in regions with a good industrial foundation and great development potential, and cultivate advantageous clusters with strong innovation capabilities and a good industrial environment. Support clusters in strengthening technological innovation, focusing on segmented fields, providing highly specialized robot products and system solutions, improving public services such as technology transfer, inspection and testing, and talent training, and cultivating characteristic cluster brands.
extended_context: 高端装备++智能制造++“十四五”机器人产业发展规划”（节选）（工信部联规〔2021〕206号）（工业和信息化部、国家发展和改革委员会、科学技术部、公安部、民政部、住房和城乡建设部、农业农村部、国家卫生健康委员会、应急管理部、中国人民银行、国家市场监督管理总局、中国银行保险监督管理委员会、中国证券监督管理委员会、国家国防科技工业局、国家矿山安全监察局/2021年12月28日）++nan++其他政策++2021-12++主要任务,优化产业组织结构
zh_context: 培育壮大优质企业。鼓励骨干企业通过兼并重组、合资合作等方式，培育具有生态主导力和核心竞争力的机器人领航企业。推动企业深耕细分行业，加强专业化、差异化发展，在机器人整机、零部件和系统集成等领域，打造一批专精特新“小巨人”企业和单项冠军企业。推进强链固链稳链。鼓励骨干企业瞄准关键零部件、高端整机产品的薄弱环节，联合配套企业加快精密齿轮、润滑油脂、编码器、核心软件等研发、工程化验证和迭代升级。支持产业链上中下游协同创新、大中小企业融通发展，构建良好产业生态。加强国际产业安全合作，推动机器人产业链供应链多元化。打造优势特色集群。推动合理区域布局，引导资源和创新要素向产业基础好、发展潜力大的地区集聚，培育创新能力强、产业环境好的优势集群。支持集群加强技术创新，聚焦细分领域，提供专业性强的机器人产品和系统解决方案，完善技术转化、检验检测、人才培训等公共服务，培育特色集群品牌。

context: Manufacturing of electronic specialized equipment and instruments mainly includes the manufacturing of electronic measuring instruments and national economy. High-energy storage and key electronic materials manufacturing mainly include the manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins, manufacturing of other specialized chemical products, manufacturing of plastic films, manufacturing of special glass, manufacturing of technical glass products, manufacturing of special ceramic products, manufacturing of graphite and carbon products, manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries, manufacturing of nickel-hydrogen batteries, manufacturing of other batteries, manufacturing of electronic specialized materials, etc. The core industry of electronics mainly includes the manufacturing of new electronic components and equipment, manufacturing of electronic specialized equipment and instruments, manufacturing of high-energy storage and key electronic materials, manufacturing of integrated circuits, etc. Manufacturing of integrated circuits mainly includes the manufacturing of semiconductor device specialized equipment, manufacturing of integrated circuits, etc.

context: Solar energy equipment and production equipment manufacturing mainly includes special glass manufacturing, steam turbine and auxiliary machinery manufacturing, other prime mover equipment manufacturing, foundry machinery manufacturing, metal cutting and welding equipment manufacturing, pump and vacuum equipment manufacturing, gas and liquid separation and purification equipment manufacturing, construction materials production special machinery manufacturing, oil refining and chemical production special equipment manufacturing, electrical machinery special equipment manufacturing, semiconductor device special equipment manufacturing, other electronic special equipment manufacturing, generator and generator set manufacturing, power electronic component manufacturing, photovoltaic equipment and component manufacturing, lead-acid battery manufacturing, other battery manufacturing, household air conditioner manufacturing, solar appliance manufacturing, other non-electric household appliance manufacturing, testing machine manufacturing, other special instrument manufacturing, optical instrument manufacturing, etc. Pump and vacuum equipment manufacturing mainly includes continuous roll-to-roll multi-point distributed co-evaporation coating equipment, solar absorber coating equipment, large-scale coating machine. Gas and liquid separation and purification equipment manufacturing mainly includes vacuum tube exhaust equipment, molten salt synthesis equipment. Construction materials production special machinery manufacturing mainly includes glass bending and tempering equipment, laminated glass bending equipment, metal/glass sealing equipment. Oil refining and chemical production special equipment manufacturing mainly includes oil-salt heat exchangers.

zh_context: 太阳能设备和生产装备制造，主要包括特种玻璃制造、汽轮机及辅机制造、其他原动设备制造、铸造机械制造、金属切割及焊接设备制造、泵及真空设备制造、气体、液体分离及纯净设备制造、建筑材料生产专用机械制造、炼油、化工生产专用设备制造、电工机械专用设备制造、半导体器件专用设备制造、其他电子专用设备制造、发电机及发电机组制造、电力电子元器件制造、光伏设备及元器件制造、铅蓄电池制造、其他电池制造、家用空气调节器制造、太阳能器具制造、其他非电力家用器具制造、试验机制造、其他专用仪器制造、光学仪器制造等。泵及真空设备制造，主要包括连续卷对卷多点分布式共蒸法镀膜设备、太阳能吸热涂层的镀膜设备、大型镀膜机。气体、液体分离及纯净设备制造，主要包括真空管排气设备、熔融盐合成设备。建筑材料生产专用机械制造，主要包括玻璃弯曲钢化设备、夹胶玻璃弯曲设备、金属/玻璃封接设备。炼油、化工生产专用设备制造，主要包括油盐换热器。

context: Orthopedic repair and implant materials and instruments. Key development of internationally leading load-bearing bone-inducing repair materials, absorbable bone fixation products, high wear-resistant, long-lasting new artificial hip, artificial knee, and artificial intervertebral disc products. Oral implant repair materials and systems. Key development of highly biocompatible oral implant repair bodies, digital precise tooth preparation devices, and oral three-dimensional imaging surgical navigation systems. Key breakthroughs in key technologies such as all-ceramic dentures, zirconia ceramic blocks, nano-crystalline powder preparation, and three-dimensional imaging-guided implantation. New cardiovascular and cerebrovascular interventional instruments. Key development of a new generation of fully degradable vascular stents, small-diameter artificial blood vessels, new artificial heart valve systems, intelligent ablation devices, and catheters. Key breakthroughs in technologies such as controllable degradation and drug release of vascular stents, anticoagulation and anti-thrombosis of small-diameter artificial blood vessels, decalcification of heart valves, anticoagulation, and anti-proliferation. Central nervous system repair and regeneration materials. Key development of internationally leading central nervous system repair materials and products that promote central nervous system regeneration in spinal cord and brain nerve repair, and research and development of implantation catheters and auxiliary surgical systems for central nervous system regeneration.
extended_context: 生物医药++医疗器械++“十三五”医疗器械科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科办社〔2017〕44号）（科技部办公厅/2017年5月26日）++nan++其他政策++2017-5++重点任务,推进重大产品研发，突破核心部件瓶颈,生物医用材料类
zh_context: 骨科修复与植入材料及器械。重点开发具有国际领先水平的可承载骨诱导修复材料，可吸收骨固定产品，高耐磨、长耐久新型人工髋、人工膝及人工椎间盘等产品。口腔种植修复材料与系统。重点开发高生物相容性的口腔种植修复体、数字化精确牙体预备装置、口腔三维影像手术导航系统。重点突破全瓷义齿氧化锆瓷块、纳米晶粉体制备、三维影像引导种植等关键技术。新型心脑血管植介入器械。重点开发新一代全降解血管支架、小口径人造血管、新型人工心脏瓣膜系统、智能消融设备和导管等产品。重点突破血管支架可控降解及药物缓释、小口径人造血管抗凝血与抗栓塞、心脏瓣膜缓钙化、抗凝血、抗增生等技术。中枢神经修复与再生材料。重点开发具有国际领先水平可促进中枢神经再生的脊髓、脑神经修复的中枢神经修复材料和产品，研发中枢神经再生的植入导管等器械及辅助手术系统。

context: The comprehensive utilization of mineral resources mainly includes energy minerals, coalbed methane (coal mine gas) comprehensive development and utilization, ferrous metal minerals, non-ferrous metal (including rare metal) minerals, and non-metallic minerals, etc. Energy minerals include the development and utilization of coal-based oil shale, kaolin clay, etc., coal tar deep processing engineering technology, oil sands, oil shale, shale gas, geothermal comprehensive utilization, digital mines, automated mining and ore dressing technology and equipment. The comprehensive development and utilization of coalbed methane (coal mine gas) includes high-performance air drilling rigs, complete sets of continuous tubing equipment, horizontal well drilling and completion, staged fracturing and drilling measurement and geological guidance equipment, high-pressure hydraulic jetting tools, coalbed methane-specific fracturing and extraction equipment, efficient compression and liquefaction equipment, and manufacturing and application of gas engine equipment. Coal and gas outburst warning monitoring, rapid determination instrument for gas parameters, safe and efficient power generation, concentration, and liquefaction equipment for wind drainage gas and low-concentration gas, surface extraction equipment for coalbed methane in mining (empty) areas, underground directional long-hole drilling rigs, fracturing and production-increasing equipment manufacturing and application, and microbial coalbed methane extraction technology.

context: Intelligent high-end equipment refers to equipment that plays an important driving role in the upgrading of industrial technology and the development of strategic emerging industries. It is mainly reflected in the major core technologies and major technical equipment related to high-end equipment manufacturing. The focus is on the research of precision workstations for chassis, high-end manufacturing equipment, intelligent engineering machinery and complete sets of equipment, and manufacturing equipment for new energy products. This lays the technical foundation and industrial foundation for high-end equipment, greatly enhancing the international competitiveness of high-end equipment and intelligent manufacturing technology in China. Precision workstations for chassis aim to master the key technologies for the design and manufacturing of precision workstations for chassis, and initially break the long-term dependence on imports of precision workstations for chassis in China, leading the development of high-end CNC machine tool design and manufacturing technology. Intelligent engineering machinery and complete sets of equipment aim to develop intelligent engineering machinery and complete sets of equipment, develop 8-meter diameter hard rock tunnel boring machines, 12-meter diameter deep-buried mud-water composite shield machines, and major engineering machinery and equipment to meet the increasing urgent demand for large-scale tunneling and major engineering machinery and equipment in national infrastructure construction. Manufacturing equipment for new energy products aims to overcome the core technologies for manufacturing solar cells and semiconductor lighting products, and develop complete sets of equipment represented by MOCVD and PECVD to enhance the industry's independent research and development and competitive capabilities.

zh_context: 智能化高端装备是指对产业技术升级、战略新兴产业发展具有重要带动作用的装备，集中体现在高端装备制造相关的重大核心技术和重大技术装备。重点研究箱体类精密工作母机、高端制造装备、智能化的工程机械与成套装备、新能源产品制造装备等，奠定高端装备的技术基础和产业基础，极大增强我国高端装备和智能制造技术的国际竞争力。箱体类精密工作母机，掌握箱体类精密工作母机设计制造关键技术，初步打破我国箱体类精密工作母机长期依赖进口的现状，引领高端数控机床设计制造技。术发展；智能化的工程机械与成套装备，智能化工程机械成套装备，开发8米直。径硬岩掘进机和12米直径大埋深泥水复合盾构及重大工程机械装备，满足国家基础建设对大型隧道掘进和重大工程机械装备日益增长的迫切需求；新能源产品制造装备，攻克太阳能电池和半导体照明产品制造核心技术，研发以MOCVD、PECVD为代表的成套装备，提升行业自主研发和竞争能力。

context: Focus on improving the performance and quality of core equipment and components for intelligent manufacturing, building an intelligent manufacturing system, strengthening basic support, actively carrying out demonstration applications, forming several internationally renowned brands, and promoting intelligent manufacturing equipment to a new level. Accelerate the research and industrialization of high-end CNC machine tools and intelligent machining centers, break through major functional components such as multi-axis, multi-channel, high-precision CNC systems, and servo motors, and develop and promote the application of high-end CNC machine tools, basic manufacturing equipment, and integrated manufacturing systems that are precise, high-speed, efficient, flexible, and have network communication capabilities. Breakthroughs in intelligent sensing and control equipment, intelligent detection and assembly equipment, intelligent logistics and warehousing equipment, and intelligent agricultural machinery equipment, carry out research and development and promote the application of the first set of equipment, and improve quality and reliability.

context: The safety management standards are used to guide industries in implementing general safety management requirements, mainly including data security management, secure information collaboration, management and maintenance of security, security certification, etc. (see Figure 6). Figure 6: Safety Management. (1) Data Security Management: It focuses on various types of data generated by IoT business applications, ensuring the security, controllability, and use of data in various stages, mainly including data security basic management and technical support in key stages such as collection, transmission, storage, processing, sharing, and destruction. (2) Secure Information Collaboration: It addresses the numerous types of IoT protocols, clarifies the standards for interconnection and interoperability of basic security-related data in IoT, and achieves secure interconnection and interoperability across protocols, mainly including interface specifications, testing methods, etc. (3) Management and Maintenance of Security: It standardizes the operation and maintenance management of terminals, gateways, and platforms in different IoT scenarios, mainly including system construction, security organization, personnel management, operational security, asset management, configuration management, remote maintenance security, vulnerability detection, emergency response and management, disaster recovery, etc. (4) Security Certification: It standardizes the certification management of different types of IoT terminals, gateways, and platforms, used for the mutual recognition and interoperability of security certification for different types of devices, mainly including certificate generation, certificate management, certificate replacement, etc.

zh_context: 安全管理标准用于指导行业落实通用安全管理要求，主要包括数据安全管理、安全信息协同、管理与维护安全、安全认证等（见图6）。图6安全管理。（1）数据安全管理：面向物联网业务应用产生的各类数据，保障数据在各环节的安全可控和使用，主要包括在采集、传输、存储、处理、共享、销毁等关键环节的数据安全基础管理和技术保障等。（2）安全信息协同：针对物联网协议类型众多，明确物联网基础安全相关数据互联互通标准，实现跨协议安全互联互通，主要包括接口规范、测试方法等。（3）管理与维护安全：规范不同物联网场景下终端、网关、平台的运维管理等方。面安全要求，主要包括制度建设、安全组织、人员管理、运行安全、资产管理、配置管理、远程维护安全、脆弱性检测、应急响应与管理、灾备恢复等。（4）安全认证：规范不同类型的物联网终端、网关、平台的认证管理，用于不。同类型设备的安全认证互通互认，主要包括证书生成、证书管理、证书更换等。

context: By 2020, the innovative development pattern of China's satellite navigation industry will be basically formed, and the scale and internationalization level of industrial applications will be greatly improved. The industry scale will exceed 400 billion yuan, and the Beidou satellite navigation system and its compatible products will be widely used in important industries and key areas of the national economy, gradually popularizing in the mass consumer market. The contribution rate to the domestic satellite navigation application market will reach 60%, and the important application areas will exceed 80%, possessing strong international competitiveness in the global market. - Optimization and upgrading of the industrial system: The construction of the national satellite navigation industry infrastructure will be further improved, forming a competitive navigation and positioning, time service industry chain. A number of satellite navigation industry clusters will be formed, cultivating industry backbone enterprises and innovative small and medium-sized enterprises, and constructing public service platforms with wide coverage and strong support capabilities. A complete and well-structured industrial system will be initially formed. - Significant enhancement of innovation capabilities: Research and development funding will gradually increase. On the basis of overall consideration of research layout, existing scientific and technological resources will be fully integrated and utilized to promote the construction of key satellite navigation application technology laboratories, engineering (technology) research centers, and enterprise technology centers, enhancing continuous innovation capabilities. Breakthroughs will be made in key core technologies such as chips and embedded software, forming a number of patents and technical standards with intellectual property rights, supporting industry technological progress and application model innovation. - Significant improvement in application scale and level: Satellite navigation technology will be widely applied in various economic and social fields, basically meeting the needs of economic and social development. The Beidou and other satellite navigation systems will be fully applied in important fields such as energy (electricity), finance, and communication. In key industries, personal consumer markets, and social public service areas, the scale application of the Beidou and other satellite navigation systems will be achieved. - Basic capability of open and compatible global services: The service performance of the Beidou satellite navigation system will be further improved, achieving compatibility and interoperability with other satellite navigation systems. The international competitiveness of Beidou applications will be significantly enhanced, and the application scope will be more extensive.
extended_context: 高端装备++航空航天++关于印发国家卫星导航产业中长期发展规划的通知（节选）（国办发〔2013〕97号）（国务院办公厅/2013年9月27日）++nan++其他政策++2013-9++指导思想、基本原则和发展目标,发展目标
zh_context: 到2020年，我国卫星导航产业创新发展格局基本形成，产业应用规模和国。际化水平大幅提升，产业规模超过4000亿元，北斗卫星导航系统及其兼容产品在国民经济重要行业和关键领域得到广泛应用，在大众消费市场逐步推广普及，对国内卫星导航应用市场的贡献率达到60%，重要应用领域达到80%以上，在全球市场具有较强的国际竞争力。——产业体系优化升级。国家卫星导航产业基础设施建设进一步完善，形成竞争力较强的导航与位置、时间服务产业链，形成一批卫星导航产业聚集区，培育一批行业骨干企业和创新型中小企业，建设一批覆盖面广、支撑力强的公共服务平台，初步形成门类齐全、布局合理、结构优化的产业体系。——创新能力明显增强。研究与开发经费投入逐步提升，在统筹考虑科研布局的基础上，充分整合利用现有科技资源，推动卫星导航应用技术重点实验室、工程（技术）研究中心、企业技术中心等创新平台建设，增强持续创新能力。突破芯片、嵌入式软件等领域的一批关键核心技术，形成一批具有知识产权的专利和技术标准，支撑行业技术进步和应用模式创新。——应用规模和水平明显提升。卫星导航技术在经济和社会各领域广泛应用，基本满足经济社会发展需求。在能源（电力）、金融、通信等重要领域，全面应用北斗等卫星导航系统；在重点行业和个人消费市场以及社会公共服务领域，实现北斗等卫星导航系统规模化应用。——基本具备开放兼容的全球服务能力。北斗卫星导航系统服务性能进一步提升，实现与其他卫星导航系统的兼容与互操作，北斗应用的国际竞争力显著提升，应用范围更加广泛。

context: Breakthroughs in key technologies such as new sensing, high-precision motion control, and intelligent fault diagnosis, vigorously promote the development and industrialization of ubiquitous perception and automatic control systems, industrial robots, key components, and other devices, carry out integrated innovation of typical intelligent equipment and systems such as robot-based automated forming and processing equipment production lines, automated warehousing and sorting systems, and digital workshops, promote the demonstration application of intelligent manufacturing technology and equipment in typical fields such as petroleum processing, coal mining, power generation, environmental protection, textiles, metallurgy, building materials, machining, and food processing. By 2015, the domestic market share of intelligent measurement and control devices and components with independent intellectual property rights will reach 30%, master the key core technologies of intelligent manufacturing systems, achieve breakthroughs and reach international advanced levels in intelligent devices represented by sensors, automatic control systems, industrial robots, servo and executive components, significantly improve the integration level of major complete sets of equipment and production line systems, and basically meet the needs of key areas of the national economy and national defense construction.

zh_context: 突破新型传感、高精度运动控制、故障智能诊断等关键技术，大力推进泛在感知自动控制系统、工业机器人、关键零部件等装置的开发和产业化，开展基于。机器人的自动化成形与加工装备生产线、自动化仓储与分拣系统以及数字化车间。等典型智能装备与系统的集成创新，推进智能制造技术和装备在石油加工、煤炭开采、发电、环保、纺织、冶金、建材、机械加工、食品加工等典型领域中的示范应用。到2015年，具有自主知识产权的智能测控装置及零部件国内市场占有率达到30%，掌握智能制造系统关键核心技术，以传感器、自动控制系统、工业机器人、伺服和执行部件为代表的智能装置实现突破并达到国际先进水平，重大成套装备及生产线系统集成水平大幅提升，基本满足国民经济重点领域和国防建设的需要。

context: In order to address the bottleneck constraints of the navigation industry's organic coreless problem, efforts will be made to strengthen the research and development and application of Beidou chips and terminal products, accelerate the improvement of product maturity and core competitiveness. To meet application needs, key breakthroughs will be made in a batch of basic cutting-edge and common key technologies, such as fusion chips, integrated navigation, application integration, indoor and outdoor seamless positioning, etc., and a batch of high-performance and low-cost navigation devices and products will be developed to greatly enhance innovation capabilities. Existing scientific and technological resources will be integrated to promote the construction and development of key laboratories, engineering (technology) research centers, enterprise technology centers, etc., in satellite navigation application technology, and to build China's satellite navigation industry's technological innovation system.

zh_context: 针对导航产业“有机无芯”的瓶颈制约，着力加强北斗芯片和终端产品的研发和应用，加快提升产品成熟度和核心竞争力；适应应用需求，重点突破融合芯片、组合导航、应用集成、室内外无缝定位等一批基础前沿和共性关键技术，开发一批高性能低成本的导航器件与产品，大力提升创新能力；整合现有科技资源，推动卫星导航应用技术重点实验室、工程（技术）研究中心、企业技术中心等建设和发展，构建我国卫星导航产业技术创新体系。

context: Accelerate the development and industrialization process of 5G chips, modules, terminals, gateways, and other industry-oriented products. Promote chip companies to enrich their product systems, accelerate the hierarchical classification research and development of modules, optimize module environmental adaptability, continuously reduce power consumption and costs, and enhance original innovation capabilities and industrial foundation support capabilities. Support and guide the intelligent transformation of high-end equipment, pre-install 5G capabilities in production and research and development, open interface protocols, and strengthen the underlying support capabilities for 5G industry applications. Promote the construction of public service platforms such as 5G testing laboratories and innovation centers.

zh_context: 加快推动面向行业的5G芯片、模组、终端、网关等产品研发和产业化进程，推动芯片企业丰富产品体系，加快模组分级分类研发，优化模组环境适应性，持续降低功耗及成本，增强原始创新能力和产业基础支撑能力。支持和引导高端装备智能化改造，在生产和研发中预置5G能力，开放接口协议，强化5G行业应用底层支撑能力。推进5G检测实验室、创新中心等公共服务平台建设。

context: With the focus on whole machine and major information application as the driving force, we will strengthen technological innovation, model innovation, and institutional innovation, focus on the development of the design industry, strengthen the chip manufacturing industry, improve packaging and testing capabilities, enhance the independent development capabilities of key equipment, instruments, and materials, and promote the growth and strengthening of the integrated circuit industry. We will focus on the development of the chip design industry and develop high-performance integrated circuit products. We will break through high-end general chips such as CPU/digital signal processors (DSP)/memory, and focus on the development of network communication chips, mixed-signal chips, information security chips, digital TV chips, RFID chips, sensor chips, automotive electronic chips, and other large-scale and wide-ranging products, as well as dedicated integrated circuit products in the fields of integration of the two industries, strategic emerging industries, and key areas, to form system solution capabilities. We will strengthen the scale of chip manufacturing industry and enhance advanced and characteristic process capabilities. We will continue to support the technological upgrading and capacity expansion of 12-inch advanced process manufacturing lines and 8-inch/6-inch characteristic process manufacturing lines. We will accelerate the research and development and application of 45-nanometer and below manufacturing process technologies, strengthen the development of standard process, characteristic process module, and IP core. We will improve the level and capability of packaging and testing industry, develop advanced packaging and testing technologies and products. In line with the important development direction of diversified integrated circuit products, we will vigorously develop advanced packaging and testing technologies, promote the progress of high-density stacked three-dimensional packaging products, support the upgrading of packaging process technologies and capacity expansion. We will improve the level of testing technology and the scale of the industry. We will improve the industrial chain, break through key special equipment, instruments, materials, and electronic design automation (EDA) tools. We will promote the industrialization process of 8-inch integrated circuit equipment, support the research and development of 12-inch integrated circuit production equipment, materials, tools, and instruments, form a complete set of processes, promote the large-scale application of domestic equipment on production lines, promote close cooperation among various links in the integrated circuit industry chain, establish test platforms, and accelerate industrialization.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划（工信部/2012年2月24日）（工信部/2012年2月24日）++nan++其他政策++2012-2++主要任务与发展重点,发展重点,集成电路
zh_context: 以重点整机和重大信息化应用为牵引，加强技术创新、模式创新和制度创新，着力发展设计业，壮大芯片制造业，提升封装测试水平，增强关键设备、仪器及材料自主开发能力，推动集成电路产业做大做强。着力发展芯片设计业，开发高性能集成电路产品。围绕移动互联网、信息家电、物联网、智能电网和云计算等战略性新兴产业和重点领域的应用需求，突破CPU/数字信号处理器（DSP）/存储器等高端通用芯片，重点开发网络通信芯片、数模混合芯片、信息安全芯片、数字电视芯片、RFID芯片、传感器芯片、汽车电子芯片等量大面广产品，以及两化融合、战略性新兴产业重点领域的专用集成电路产品，形成系统方案解决能力。壮大芯片制造业规模，增强先进和特色工艺能力。持续支持12英寸先进工艺制造线和8英寸/6英寸特色工艺制造线的技术升级和产能扩充。加快45纳米及以下制造工艺技术的研发与应用，加强标准工艺、特色工艺模块开发和IP核的开发。提升封测业层次和能力，发展先进封测技术和产品。顺应集成电路产品向功能多样化的重要发展方向，大力发展先进封装和测试技术，推进高密度堆叠型三维封装产品的进程，支持封装工艺技术升级和产能扩充。提高测试技术水平和产业规模。完善产业链，突破关键专用设备、仪器、材料和电子设计自动化（EDA）工具。推进8英寸集成电路设备的产业化进程，支持12英寸集成电路生产设备、材料、工具、仪器的研发，形成成套工艺，推动国产装备在生产线上规模应用，推进集成电路产业链各环节的紧密协作，建立试验平台，加快产业化。

context: By 2023, the construction of new infrastructure for the industrial internet will progress in both quantity and quality, and new models and formats will be widely promoted, leading to a significant improvement in the overall strength of the industry. The new infrastructure will be further improved, with preliminary construction of industrial internet network infrastructure covering various regions and industries, and the establishment of 30 5G fully connected factories in 10 key industries. The innovative enabling effect of the identification resolution system will be highlighted, with over 120 secondary nodes established. Three to five comprehensive industrial internet platforms with international influence will be created. The national industrial internet big data center system will be basically completed, with the construction of 20 regional-level sub-centers and 10 industry-level sub-centers. The effectiveness of integrated applications will be further demonstrated, with widespread adoption of new models and formats such as intelligent manufacturing, networked collaboration, personalized customization, extended services, and digital management. The production efficiency of key enterprises will increase by more than 20%, and the adoption rate of new models will reach 30%, providing a solid foundation for the digitalization, networking, and intelligent development of the manufacturing industry, while continuously improving quality, efficiency, cost reduction, greenness, and safety. The ability for technological innovation will be further enhanced, with significant improvement in the innovative capacity of industrial internet infrastructure, breakthroughs achieved in key technologies in areas such as networks, identification, platforms, and security, and enhanced supply capabilities in industrial chips, software, and control systems. A unified, integrated, and open industrial internet standard system will be established, with breakthroughs in the development of key standards in relevant fields. The development of the industrial ecosystem will be further improved, with the cultivation and development of over 40 innovative leading enterprises with annual revenue exceeding 1 billion yuan, and the formation of 1 to 2 internationally influential leading enterprises. Five national-level industrial internet industry demonstration bases will be cultivated to promote the modernization of the industrial chain and supply chain. The security capabilities will be further enhanced, with effective implementation of classified and graded management of network security for industrial internet enterprises, the establishment of 200 benchmarking enterprises and 100 excellent solutions in key industrial sectors, the cultivation of a group of leading security service enterprises with strong comprehensive strength, and the creation of a number of industrial internet security innovation demonstration parks. A comprehensive industrial internet security technology monitoring service system covering the entire network, multi-party collaboration, and efficient operation will be basically completed.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++互联网++工业互联网创新发展行动计划（2021-2023年）（工信部信管〔2020〕197号）（工信部/2020年12月22日）++nan++工业互联网创新发展行动计划++2020-12++总体要求,发展目标
zh_context: 到2023年，工业互联网新型基础设施建设量质并进，新模式、新业态大范围推广，产业综合实力显著提升。--新型基础设施进一步完善。覆盖各地区、各行业的工业互联网网络基础设施初步建成，在10个重点行业打造30个5G全连接工厂。标识解析体系创新赋能效应凸显，二级节点达到120个以上。打造3～5个具有国际影响力的综合型工业互联网平台。基本建成国家工业互联网大数据中心体系，建设20个区域级分中心和10个行业级分中心。--融合应用成效进一步彰显。智能化制造、网络化协同、个性化定制、服务化延伸、数字化管理等新模式新业态广泛普及。重点企业生产效率提高20％以上，新模式应用普及率达到30％，制造业数字化、网络化、智能化发展基础更。加坚实，提质、增效、降本、绿色、安全发展成效不断提升。--技术创新能力进一步提升。工业互联网基础创新能力显著提升，网络、标识、平台、安全等领域一批关键技术实现产业化突破，工业芯片、工业软件、工业控制系统等供给能力明显增强。基本建立统一、融合、开放的工业互联网标准体系，关键领域标准研制取得突破。--产业发展生态进一步健全。培育发展40个以上主营业务收入超10亿元的创新型领军企业，形成1～2家具有国际影响力的龙头企业。培育5个国家级工业互联网产业示范基地，促进产业链供应链现代化水平提升。--安全保障能力进一步增强。工业互联网企业网络安全分类分级管理有效实施，聚焦重点工业领域打造200家贯标示范企业和100个优秀解决方案。培育一批综合实力强的安全服务龙头企业，打造一批工业互联网安全创新示范园区。基本建成覆盖全网、多方联动、运行高效的工业互联网安全技术监测服务体系。

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is as follows:Other aviation equipment manufacturing and related services mainly include aviation-related equipment manufacturing, electric motor manufacturing, communication system equipment manufacturing, communication terminal equipment manufacturing, aerospace repair, information system integration services, etc. Electric motor manufacturing mainly includes aerospace electromechanical equipment and systems. Communication system equipment manufacturing mainly includes CNS/ATM gateway systems, aviation telecommunications networks (ATN) processing systems, aviation mobile general systems (such as D-ATIS, DCL, VDL, AeroMacs, etc.) (including: D-ATIS, DCL, VDL, AeroMacs, etc.), satellite navigation landing systems (GLS), tower information integration systems, and remote tower systems. Communication terminal equipment manufacturing mainly includes airport surface movement guidance and control systems, airspace surveillance electro-optical search and tracking systems, remote wide-area video intelligent monitoring systems, and head-up display systems (HUD) for aircraft.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2.2.2++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++高端装备制造产业,航空装备产业,其他航空装备制造及相关服务
zh_context: 其他航空装备制造及相关服务，主要包括航空相关设备制造、电动机制造、通信系统设备制造、通信终端设备制造、航空航天器修理、信息系统集成服务等。电动机制造，主要包括航空用机电设备及系统。通信系统设备制造，主要包括CNS/ATM网关系统、航空电信网（ATN）处理系统、航空移动通用系统（如D-ATIS、DCL、VDL、AeroMacs等）（包括:D-ATIS、DCL、VDL、AeroMacs等）、卫星导航着陆系统（GLS）、塔台信息集成系统及远程塔台系统。通信终端设备制造，主要包括机场场面活动引导与控制系统、空域预警光电搜索跟踪系统、远程大范围视频智能监控系统、机载平视显示系统（HUD）。

context: Support the research and development of key technologies such as miniaturization and reliability design, precision manufacturing, integrated development tools, and embedded algorithms. Support the research and development and application of intelligent sensors based on new requirements, new materials, new processes, and new principles. Develop new types of intelligent sensors with broad market prospects, such as bio sensors, gas sensors, pressure sensors, flow sensors, inertial sensors, distance sensors, image sensors, and acoustic sensors. Promote technological innovation in materials such as piezoelectric materials, magnetic materials, infrared radiation materials, and metal oxides. Support the research and development of new intelligent sensors based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) and complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS) integration processes. Develop intelligent sensors based on new principles such as magnetic sensing, ultrasonic waves, non-visible light, and biochemistry for new application scenarios. Promote high-precision, high-reliability, low-power, and low-cost intelligent sensors. By 2020, significant improvements in the performance of piezoelectric sensors, magnetic sensors, infrared sensors, and gas sensors will be achieved. Acoustic sensors with a signal-to-noise ratio of 70dB and an acoustic overload point of 135dB will be mass-produced. Pressure sensors with an absolute accuracy of less than 100Pa and a noise level of less than 0.6Pa will be commercially available. Magnetic sensors with a weak magnetic field resolution of 1pT will be mass-produced. Achieve international advanced levels in analog simulation, design, MEMS processes, packaging, and personalized testing technologies. Possess system design capabilities in key areas such as mobile wearable devices, the Internet, and automotive electronics.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++突破核心基础,智能传感器
zh_context: 支持微型化及可靠性设计、精密制造、集成开发工具、嵌入式算法等关键技术研发，支持基于新需求、新材料、新工艺、新原理设计的智能传感器研发及应用。发展市场前景广阔的新型生物、气体、压力、流量、惯性、距离、图像、声学等智能传感器，推动压电材料、磁性材料、红外辐射材料、金属氧化物等材料技术革新，支持基于微机电系统（MEMS）和互补金属氧化物半导体（CMOS）集成等工艺的新型智能传感器研发，发展面向新应用场景的基于磁感、超声波、非可见光、生物化学等新原理的智能传感器，推动智能传感器实现高精度、高可靠、低功耗、低成本。到2020年，压电传感器、磁传感器、红外传感器、气体传感器等的性能显著提高，信噪比达到70dB、声学过载点达到135dB的声学传感器实现量产，绝对精度100Pa以内、噪音水平0.6Pa以内的压力传感器实现商用，弱磁场分辨率达到1pT的磁传感器实现量产。在模拟仿真、设计、MEMS工艺、封装及个性化测试技术方面达到国际先进水平，具备在移动式可穿戴、互联网、汽车电子等重点领域的系统方案设计能力。

context: With rare earth functional materials, advanced energy materials, high-performance membrane materials, and functional ceramics as the focus, we will vigorously enhance the guarantee capability of functional materials in major projects. With superconducting materials, intelligent/biomimetic/metamaterials, extreme environment materials, and other cutting-edge new materials as the breakthrough, we will seize the commanding heights of materials frontier.

zh_context: 以稀土功能材料、先进能源材料、高性能膜材料、功能陶瓷等战略新材料为重点，大力提升功能材料在重大工程中的保障能力；以超导材料、智能/仿生/超材料、极端环境材料等前沿新材料为突破口，抢占材料前沿制高点。

context: Carry out key technology research on major vaccine development, antibody production, immunotherapy, gene therapy, cell therapy, stem cells and regenerative medicine, human microbiome analysis and regulation, etc. Develop a batch of innovative pharmaceutical bioproducts and build a pharmaceutical biotechnology industry system with international competitiveness.

context: Manufacturing of specialized environmental protection equipment mainly includes lead paste desulfurization and resource utilization technology equipment for waste lead-acid batteries, recycling technology equipment for failed cobalt-nickel materials, complete set of equipment for crushing waste steel above 4000 horsepower, ambient temperature grinding and continuous regeneration rubber technology and equipment for waste tires, complete set of equipment for recycling and processing waste plastic composite materials, complete set of equipment for modified asphalt with waste tire rubber powder, waste tire whole tire cutting and crushing machine, waste tire decomposition oil and carbon black production unit, paper-plastic-aluminum separation unit, rubber-plastic separation and synthesis unit, deep cleaning unit for waste plastic rubber, waste plastic recycling and granulation unit, inorganic modified polymer recycling and utilization unit, complete set of equipment for sorting and dismantling waste electrical and electronic products, harmless treatment equipment for waste motor products, complete set of equipment for recycling and purifying copper-containing heavy metal waste electronic products, complete set of equipment for recycling and purifying copper-containing heavy metal sludge, waste household appliances and waste printed circuit board material separation equipment, direct utilization equipment for various plastic mixtures, waste liquid collection equipment for scrapped vehicles, specialized sealed containers for waste liquid from scrapped vehicles, automated dismantling equipment for scrapped vehicles, ignition devices for safety airbags in scrapped vehicles, precious metal recycling technology and equipment for scrapped vehicles, body crushing technology and equipment, body material sorting technology and equipment, oil-water separation environmental protection facility equipment.

context: By 2020, a technologically advanced, prosperous, and well-supported big data industry system will be basically formed. The revenue from big data-related products and services will exceed 1 trillion yuan, with an average annual compound growth rate of around 30%. The construction of a data powerhouse will be accelerated, providing strong industrial support for the realization of a manufacturing and network powerhouse. - Advanced and controllable technological products. Secure and controllable technological products will be developed in the field of big data infrastructure software and hardware. The international advanced level will be achieved in data acquisition, storage management, and processing platform technologies. Leading positions will be held in algorithms and tools for data mining, analysis, and application. A number of independently innovative and technologically advanced products, solutions, and services that meet major application needs will be developed.- Enhanced application capabilities. Industrial big data applications will comprehensively support intelligent manufacturing and industrial transformation and upgrading. Big data will be widely and deeply applied in innovation, entrepreneurship, government management, and people's livelihood services. The capabilities of technology integration, business integration, and data integration will be significantly improved, enabling collaborative management and services across levels, regions, systems, departments, and businesses. A new model of data-driven innovation and development will be formed. Based on existing statistics on the electronic information industry and industry sampling estimates, the revenue of China's big data industry was about 280 billion yuan in 2015.- Prosperous development of the ecological system. Several big data backbone enterprises with outstanding innovation capabilities will be formed. A number of specialized data service innovative small and medium-sized enterprises will be cultivated. Ten internationally leading core big data enterprises and 500 big data application and service enterprises will be nurtured. A relatively complete big data industry chain and preliminary big data industry system will be formed. Ten to fifteen comprehensive big data pilot zones will be established, along with several big data industrial clusters. Several demonstration bases for new industrialization of big data will be created.- Strengthened support capabilities. A comprehensive big data standard system covering technology, products, and management will be established. Regional and industry-specific big data industry and application alliances and organizations will be established. Specialized service institutions for big data consulting, research, testing and evaluation, technology and intellectual property rights, investment and financing, etc., will be nurtured. One to two open-source communities with standardized operations and certain international influence will be built.- Strong data security guarantee. Data security technology will reach international advanced levels. The national data security protection system will be basically established. The data security technology guarantee capability and security system will basically meet the needs of national strategy and market applications. The regulations and systems for data security and personal privacy protection will be relatively sound.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++大数据++大数据产业发展规划（2016-2020年）（工信部规〔2016〕412号）（工信部/2016年12月18日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++指导思想和发展目标,发展目标
zh_context: 到2020年，技术先进、应用繁荣、保障有力的大数据产业体系基本形成。大数据相关产品和服务业务收入突破1万亿元1，年均复合增长率保持30%左右，加快建设数据强国，为实现制造强国和网络强国提供强大的产业支撑。——技术产品先进可控。在大数据基础软硬件方面形成安全可控技术产品，在大数据获取、存储管理和处理平台技术领域达到国际先进水平，在数据挖掘、分析与应用等算法和工具方面处于领先地位，形成一批自主创新、技术先进，满足重大应用需求的产品、解决方案和服务。——应用能力显著增强。工业大数据应用全面支撑智能制造和工业转型升级，大数据在创新创业、政府管理和民生服务等方面广泛深入应用，技术融合、业务融合和数据融合能力显著提升，实现跨层级、跨地域、跨系统、跨部门、跨业务的协同管理和服务，形成数据驱动创新发展的新模式。基于现有电子信息产业统计数据及行业抽样估计，2015年我国大数据产业业务收入2800亿元左右。——生态体系繁荣发展。形成若干创新能力突出的大数据骨干企业，培育一批专业化数据服务创新型中小企业，培育10家国际领先的大数据核心龙头企业和500家大数据应用及服务企业。形成比较完善的大数据产业链，大数据产业。体系初步形成。建设10-15个大数据综合试验区，创建一批大数据产业集聚区，。形成若干大数据新型工业化产业示范基地。——支撑能力不断增强。建立健全覆盖技术、产品和管理等方面的大数据标准体系。建立一批区域性、行业性大数据产业和应用联盟及行业组织。培育一批大数据咨询研究、测试评估、技术和知识产权、投融资等专业化服务机构。建设1-2个运营规范、具有一定国际影响力的开源社区。——数据安全保障有力。数据安全技术达到国际先进水平。国家数据安全保护体系基本建成。数据安全技术保障能力和保障体系基本满足国家战略和市场应用需求。数据安全和个人隐私保护的法规制度较为完善。

context: Relying on internet platforms to provide artificial intelligence public innovation services, accelerate breakthroughs in core AI technologies, promote the widespread application of AI in smart homes, smart terminals, smart cars, robots, and other fields, cultivate several leading global AI development backbone enterprises and innovation teams, and form an innovative, active, open, and collaborative industrial ecosystem. (Responsibilities include the Development and Reform Commission, Ministry of Science and Technology, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, Cyberspace Administration, etc.)

context: The new technology and innovation entrepreneurship services mainly include research and development services, inspection and testing certification services, standardization services, other professional technical services, intellectual property and related services, innovation and entrepreneurship services, and other technology promotion services. Research and development services mainly include natural science research and experimental development, engineering and technical research and experimental development, agricultural science research and experimental development, medical research and experimental development, social humanities research, etc. Inspection and testing certification services mainly include inspection and quarantine services, testing services, measurement services, certification and accreditation services, etc. Standardization services mainly include standardization services. Other professional technical services mainly include meteorological services, earthquake services, marine meteorological services, remote sensing and mapping services, other surveying and geographic information services, energy and mineral geological exploration, solid mineral geological exploration, water, carbon dioxide and other mineral geological exploration national economy, basic geological exploration, geological exploration technical services, planning and design management, etc. Intellectual property and related services mainly include property insurance, lawyer and related legal services, intellectual property services, vocational skills training, etc. Innovation and entrepreneurship services mainly include entrepreneurship guidance services, science and technology intermediary services, entrepreneurship space services, etc.

zh_context: 新技术与创新创业服务，主要包括研发服务、检验检测认证服务、标准化服务、其他专业技术服务、知识产权及相关服务、创新创业服务、其他技术推广服务等。研发服务，主要包括自然科学研究和试验发展、工程和技术研究和试验发展、农业科学研究和试验发展、医学研究和试验发展、社会人文科学研究等。检验检测认证服务，主要包括检验检疫服务、检测服务、计量服务、认证认可服务等。标准化服务，主要包括标准化服务。其他专业技术服务，主要包括气象服务、地震服务、海洋气象服务、遥感测绘服务、其他测绘地理信息服务、能源矿产地质勘查、固体矿产地质勘查、水、二氧化碳等矿产地质勘查国民经、基础地质勘查、地质勘查技术服务、规划设计管理等。知识产权及相关服务，主要包括财产保险、律师及相关法律服务、知识产权服务、职业技能培训等。创新创业服务，主要包括创业指导服务、科技中介服务、创业空间服务等。

context: Solar energy equipment and production equipment manufacturing mainly includes special glass manufacturing, steam turbine and auxiliary machinery manufacturing, other prime mover equipment manufacturing, foundry machinery manufacturing, metal cutting and welding equipment manufacturing, pump and vacuum equipment manufacturing, gas and liquid separation and purification equipment manufacturing, construction materials production special machinery manufacturing, refining and chemical production special equipment manufacturing, electrical machinery special equipment manufacturing, semiconductor device special equipment manufacturing, other electronic special equipment manufacturing, generator and generator set manufacturing, power electronic component manufacturing, photovoltaic equipment and component manufacturing, lead-acid battery manufacturing, other battery manufacturing, household air conditioner manufacturing, solar appliance manufacturing, other non-electric household appliance manufacturing, testing machine manufacturing, other special instrument manufacturing, optical instrument manufacturing, etc. Special glass manufacturing mainly includes photovoltaic conductive glass. Steam turbine and auxiliary machinery manufacturing mainly includes sliding parameter steam turbine. Other prime mover equipment manufacturing mainly includes solar energy prime mover. Foundry machinery manufacturing mainly includes multicrystalline silicon ingot casting equipment. Metal cutting and welding equipment manufacturing mainly includes laser welding equipment for solar thermal products. Pump and vacuum equipment manufacturing mainly includes molten salt pump, thin film copper indium gallium selenide absorption layer co-evaporation coating equipment.

context: Improve the comprehensive development and utilization level of mineral resources and the comprehensive utilization rate, with a focus on major solid wastes such as coal gangue, fly ash, tailings, associated minerals, smelting slag, industrial by-product gypsum, construction waste, and crop straw. Support large-scale, industrialized, and high-value utilization, and encourage the application of these wastes as substitutes for primary non-metallic minerals, sand, and gravel resources. While ensuring safety and environmental protection, explore the application of phosphogypsum in soil improvement, underground filling, road construction, etc. Promote the resource utilization of construction waste and promote the on-site regeneration of discarded pavement materials. Accelerate the high-value utilization of crop straw, improve the collection, storage, and transportation system, and strictly control burning. Accelerate the demonstration construction of comprehensive utilization of major solid wastes. By 2025, the annual utilization of major solid wastes will reach about 4 billion tons; by 2030, the annual utilization will reach about 4.5 billion tons.

zh_context: 提高矿产资源综合开发利用水平和综合利用率，以煤矸石、粉煤灰、尾矿、共伴生矿、冶炼渣、工业副产石膏、建筑垃圾、农作物秸秆等大宗固废为重点，支持大掺量、规模化、高值化利用，鼓励应用于替代原生非金属矿、砂石等资源。在确保安全环保前提下，探索将磷石膏应用于土壤改良、井下充填、路基修筑等。推动建筑垃圾资源化利用，推广废弃路面材料原地再生利用。加快推进秸秆高值化利用，完善收储运体系，严格禁烧管控。加快大宗固废综合利用示范建设。到2025年，大宗固废年利用量达到40亿吨左右；到2030年，年利用量达到45亿吨左右。

context: The manufacturing of polymer nanocomposites mainly includes the production of coatings, primary form plastics and synthetic resins, synthetic fiber monomers (polymers) manufacturing, other synthetic materials manufacturing, other specialty chemical products manufacturing, other synthetic fiber manufacturing, plastic film manufacturing, glass fiber and product manufacturing, etc. The production of coatings mainly includes polyester resin nanocoatings, phenolic resin nanocoatings, epoxy resin nanocoatings, and other nanocoatings. The manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes synthetic resin nanomaterials, polyimide nanomaterials, unsaturated polyester resin nanomaterials, and other primary form plastic nanomaterials. The manufacturing of synthetic fiber monomers (polymers) mainly includes synthetic fiber monomer nanomaterials and synthetic fiber polymer nanomaterials. The manufacturing of other synthetic materials mainly includes boron fiber nanoproducts and polymer nanocomposites. The manufacturing of other specialty chemical products mainly includes adhesive nanomaterials and other specialty chemical nanoproducts.

zh_context: 高分子纳米复合材料制造，主要包括涂料制造、初级形态塑料及合成树脂制造国民经、合成纤维单（聚合）体制造、其他合成材料制造、其他专用化学产品制造、其他合成纤维制造、塑料薄膜制造、玻璃纤维及制品制造等。涂料制造，主要包括聚酯树脂纳米涂料、酚醛树脂纳米涂料、环氧树脂纳米涂料、其他纳米涂料。初级形态塑料及合成树脂制造国民经，主要包括合成树脂纳米材料、聚酰亚胺纳米材料、不饱和聚酯树脂纳米材料、其他初级形态塑料纳米材料。合成纤维单（聚合）体制造，主要包括合成纤维单体纳米材料、合成纤维聚合体纳米材料。其他合成材料制造，主要包括硼纤维纳米产品、高分子纳米复合材料。其他专用化学产品制造，主要包括胶粘剂纳米材料、其他专用化学纳米产品。

context: Basic software development mainly includes artificial intelligence optimized operating systems, artificial intelligence middleware, and function libraries.

context: Tumor treatment equipment. This includes electronic linear accelerators with advanced features such as real-time motion tracking, image guidance, conformal therapy, and intensity modulation, as well as radiation therapy systems with proton/heavy ion cyclotrons and their high-precision treatment planning systems; tumor thermal therapy, ablation, and cryotherapy equipment such as magnetic induction, high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU), radiofrequency, microwave, argon-helium knife, and their treatment monitoring systems; boron neutron capture therapy systems and their targeted drugs. Surgical treatment equipment. This includes intraoperative positioning, intraoperative imaging, intraoperative monitoring, image-guided navigation equipment, and their information systems; digital, integrated surgical, interventional, intraoperative, and minimally invasive treatment equipment, as well as their information systems; abdominal, thoracic, urological, orthopedic, interventional, and other surgical assistive robots and their accompanying minimally invasive surgical instruments; high-performance lasers, ultrasound, plasma, high-frequency, and other new surgical instruments, as well as digital anesthesia machine workstations with functions such as anesthesia depth monitoring and control. Rehabilitation treatment equipment. This includes implantable neurostimulators, multi-chamber cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillators, artificial electronic cochlea; sound and photodynamic therapy and their sensitizers; ultrafast electromagnetic pulses, ultra-high static electric fields, high-power lasers, electromagnetic fields, electromagnetic waves, ultrasound, optics, mechanics, and other rehabilitation therapy equipment; rehabilitation training and treatment robots with real-time 3D muscle strength assessment, gait analysis, balance assessment control, limb coordination, functional electrical stimulation (FES), biofeedback, motion monitoring, sensory testing, and other functions; rehabilitation training and assessment systems for muscle function training, behavior, psychology, and cognitive intervention. Specialized treatment equipment. This includes ophthalmic excimer laser therapy devices, urological laser therapy devices, endoscopic laser therapy devices, oral treatment equipment; image fusion-based cardiac conduction three-dimensional mapping and radiofrequency ablation therapy systems; traditional Chinese medicine treatment equipment based on traditional medical principles. Life support equipment. This includes high-performance ventilators with new ventilation modes, artificial heart-lung machines, extracorporeal membrane oxygenation systems, and cardiac function assist devices; continuous blood purification systems, hemodialysis machines, peritoneal dialysis machines, artificial liver treatment devices, blood perfusion, plasma adsorption, plasma exchange equipment, and consumables; intensive care systems, automated defibrillators, cardiopulmonary resuscitation devices. Rehabilitation treatment services. This includes supporting equipment and technologies related to third-party tumor radiation therapy centers, community blood purification centers, community chronic disease treatment centers, community rehabilitation therapy centers, and community rehabilitation training centers.

Develop the information economy in the Hong Kong and Macau regions.

context: With the goal of achieving breakthrough technological innovation by mastering principles, grasping the direction of technological development, focusing on applications and industrial needs, clarifying development priorities, and strengthening the research and industrialization of low-cost, low-power, high-precision, high-reliability, and intelligent sensors, efforts will be made to break through the core common technologies of the Internet of Things, such as chips, software, and instruments. Accelerating the research and development of key technologies such as sensor networks, smart terminals, big data processing, intelligent analysis, and service integration, promoting the integration and development of the Internet of Things with new generation mobile communications, cloud computing, next-generation Internet, satellite communications, and other technologies. context: The electronic information manufacturing industry is a strategic, foundational, and leading industry of the national economy. It serves as the technological support and material foundation for accelerating industrial transformation and upgrading, as well as the construction of an information-based society in the national economy and society. It is also an important cornerstone for ensuring national defense construction and national information security. The Twelfth Five-Year Plan period is a crucial period for China to adhere to the path of new industrialization, accelerate the transformation of economic development mode, and comprehensively build a moderately prosperous society. It is also a period for the electronic information manufacturing industry to adjust its structure, transform its mode, enhance its core competitiveness, improve the quality and efficiency of development, and become stronger. In order to implement the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development, and in accordance with the overall deployment and requirements of the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for Industrial Transformation and Upgrading, the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for Informationization of National Economic and Social Development, and the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for Information Industry Development, the Twelfth Five-Year Plan for the Development of the Electronic Information Manufacturing Industry has been formulated as a guiding document for the development of the electronic information manufacturing industry during the Twelfth Five-Year Plan period.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++政策措施,切实加强组织实施,电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划（工信部/2012年2月24日）（工信部/2012年2月24日）
zh_context: 电子信息制造业是国民经济的战略性、基础性、先导性产业，是加快工业转型升级及国民经济和社会信息化建设的技术支撑与物质基础，是保障国防建设和国家信息安全的重要基石。“十二五”时期是我国坚持走新型工业化道路、加快转变经济发展方式、全面建设小康社会的关键时期，也是电子信息制造业调结构、转方式、增强产业核心竞争力、提升发展质量效益、由大变强的攻坚时期。为贯彻落实《国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划纲要》，按照《工业转型升级“十二五”规划》、《国民经济和社会发展信息化“十二五”规划》及《信息产业“十二五”发展规划》的总体部署和要求，编制《电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划》，作为“十二五”期间电子信息制造业发展的指导性文件。

context: Break through the weak links in the industrial chain, improve the technical level and industrialization capability of high-brightness, power-type LED epitaxial wafers and chips, and enhance the independent development capability of the industry. Strengthen research on packaging structure design, new packaging materials, new processes, phosphor performance, multi-primary-color phosphors, and heat dissipation mechanisms, focusing on improving the light extraction efficiency, phosphor efficiency, and heat dissipation performance of devices, and enhancing the packaging capability of power-type LED devices. Accelerate the research and industrialization of upstream raw materials for LEDs, such as substrates, metal organic compounds (MO) sources, ultra-high purity gases, phosphors, high-performance epoxy resins, and organic silicone gels, achieve mass production and application of key production equipment and instruments such as metal organic chemical vapor deposition (MOCVD), improve the supporting capability of the industry, and perfect the LED industrial chain. Promote applications in landscape lighting, LCD backlighting, outdoor large-screen displays, and indoor commercial lighting. Accelerate the formulation of LED-related basic standards and product standards, and improve the LED standard system. Enhance product standard compliance testing, accelerate the construction of national-level LED device and light source testing institutions, and improve testing capabilities and service capabilities. Strengthen industry guidance and management, and promote the healthy, scientific, and orderly development of the LED industry.

context: With the rapid development of modern information society, the public's demand for innovative and comprehensive spatiotemporal information services is becoming increasingly strong. In the future, the Beidou satellite navigation system, based on its characteristic advantages such as short message communication, will greatly expand its applications in key areas of the national economy, industries, public services, and the mass market. The integration of mobile communication and internet technology in location-based services will effectively promote the upgrading of the satellite navigation application industry structure and unleash a broader market space. However, in the context of global competition among multiple satellite navigation systems and the rapid development of the industry, China's satellite navigation industry still faces prominent problems. Firstly, the construction of China's satellite navigation system lags behind the development needs of the industry, and the applications mainly rely on foreign systems. Secondly, there is a lack of overall planning, with insufficient capacity and duplication of ground application infrastructure. Thirdly, there is a lack of independent innovation capability, with a weak grasp of core technologies and integration application capabilities. There is a significant gap between related products and solutions and international advanced levels, resulting in severe market pressure on the Beidou satellite navigation system application market. Fourthly, related policies, regulations, and standards are not yet sound, with low industry concentration and a lack of leading enterprises. The development environment of the industry urgently needs to be optimized. Therefore, it is necessary to accelerate the construction of China's global satellite navigation system, promote the transfer of civil application systems to the Beidou satellite navigation system, and promote the healthy and sustainable development of China's satellite navigation industry.
extended_context: 高端装备++航空航天++关于印发国家卫星导航产业中长期发展规划的通知（节选）（国办发〔2013〕97号）（国务院办公厅/2013年9月27日）++nan++其他政策++2013-9++现状和形势,我国卫星导航产业具有广阔的市场空间，但面临系统建设滞后于产业发展需求、核心技术受制于人和产业发展环境亟待优化等多重压力
zh_context: 随着现代信息社会快速发展，社会公众对创新性和综合性的时空信息服务需求日益强烈，未来基于短报文通信等特色优势的北斗卫星导航系统，在国民经济关键领域、行业、公共服务及大众市场的应用将得到极大拓展，融合移动通信、互联网技术的位置服务应用，将有力推动卫星导航应用产业结构升级，释放出更加广阔的市场空间。但是，在全球卫星导航多系统并存竞争和产业快速发展的背景下，我国卫星导航。产业仍面临突出问题：一是我国卫星导航系统建设滞后于产业发展需求，应用主。要依赖国外系统；二是缺乏统筹规划，地面应用基础设施整体能力不足与重复建设并存；三是自主创新能力不足，不掌握核心技术，集成应用能力薄弱，相关产品和解决方案与国际先进水平差距较大，北斗卫星导航系统应用市场空间被严重挤压；四是相关政策、法规、标准尚不健全，产业集中度低，缺少龙头企业，产业发展环境亟待优化。因此，需要加快我国全球卫星导航系统建设，推动民用应用系统向北斗卫星导航系统的转移，促进我国卫星导航产业健康可持续发展。

context: Promote the development and industrialization of innovative drugs with targeted, highly selective, and new mechanisms of action in the treatment of major diseases such as tumors, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, diabetes, immune system disorders, viral infections, and drug-resistant bacterial infections. context: Network operation services mainly include next-generation mobile communication network operation services, next-generation internet operation services, fiber optic broadband network operation services, next-generation broadcasting and television network operation services, satellite communication operation services, and industrial internet operation services. Fiber optic broadband network operation services include fiber optic access services for home users, which refers to fiber-to-the-home services provided to households (individuals) users. Fiber optic access services for enterprise users refer to the use of fiber optics to provide internet broadband access services to enterprises. Other related access services refer to other equipment and network services related to fiber optic access, such as the construction and services of user local networks. Fiber optic rental services refer to the rental business of channels, communication fibers, wavelengths, and other fiber optic services provided by operators to customers. Rental digital circuit services refer to the rental of digital circuits, providing users with high-speed digital information transmission services.

context: With application-oriented approach, breakthrough key technologies of big data, promote the research and development and industrialization of products and solutions, innovate technology service models, and form a technologically advanced and ecologically complete technical product system. Accelerate the research and development of key technologies of big data. Focus on forward-looking layout in areas such as data science theory system, big data computing systems and analysis, and big data application models, strengthen basic research on big data. Play the role of enterprise innovation main body, integrate industry, academia, research, and application resources to jointly tackle key technologies of big data collection, transmission, storage, management, processing, analysis, application, visualization, and security. Breakthrough key technologies of big data basic technologies such as large-scale heterogeneous data fusion, cluster resource scheduling, distributed file systems, general-purpose computing framework technologies for multitasking, as well as computing engine technologies such as stream computing and graph computing. Support frontier technology innovations such as deep learning, brain-like computing, cognitive computing, blockchain, and virtual reality, enhance data analysis and processing capabilities and knowledge discovery capabilities. Combine with industry applications, develop intelligent data application technologies such as big data analysis, understanding, prediction, decision support, and knowledge services. Breakthrough new chip and integration architectures, memory computing with billion-level concurrency, EB-level storage, green computing, and other technologies for computing, storage, sensing, communication, etc. for big data, promote the coordinated development of software and hardware. Cultivate a secure and controllable big data product system. With application as the traction, emphasize independent research and development as well as introduction and absorption, accelerate the formation of a secure and controllable big data product system. Focus on breakthroughs in core information technology equipment for big data application infrastructure, information security products, as well as basic products such as new transaction-oriented relational databases, columnar databases, NoSQL databases, large-scale graph databases, and next-generation distributed computing platforms. Accelerate the development of next-generation business intelligence, data mining, data visualization, semantic search, and other software products. Combine with the demand for data lifecycle management, cultivate platform products for big data collection and integration, big data analysis and mining, big data interactive perception, and data resource management based on semantic understanding. Develop technology products for big data retrieval, analysis, and display with industry characteristics, targeting key industry application needs, and form mature big data solutions and services in vertical fields. Innovate big data technology service models. Accelerate the innovation of big data service models, cultivate new models and new formats for data-as-a-service, enhance big data service capabilities, and reduce the threshold and cost of big data applications. Develop technical services for data collection, cleaning, analysis, transaction, security protection, and other stages of the data lifecycle. Promote the integration of big data and cloud computing service models, promote the development of public cloud computing services such as massive data, large-scale distributed computing, and intelligent data analysis, and enhance the capabilities of third-party big data technology services. Promote the deep integration of big data technology services with industries and cultivate big data service models for vertical fields.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++大数据++大数据产业发展规划（2016-2020年）（工信部规〔2016〕412号）（工信部/2016年12月18日）++nan++其他政策++2016-12++重点任务和重大工程,强化大数据技术产品研发
zh_context: 以应用为导向，突破大数据关键技术，推动产品和解决方案研发及产业化，创新技术服务模式，形成技术先进、生态完备的技术产品体系。加快大数据关键技术研发。围绕数据科学理论体系、大数据计算系统与分析、大数据应用模型等领域进行前瞻布局，加强大数据基础研究。发挥企业创新主体作用，整合产学研用资源优势联合攻关，研发大数据采集、传输、存储、管理、处理、分析、应用、可视化和安全等关键技术。突破大规模异构数据融合、集群资源调度、分布式文件系统等大数据基础技术，面向多任务的通用计算框架技术，以及流计算、图计算等计算引擎技术。支持深度学习、类脑计算、认知计算、区块链、虚拟现实等前沿技术创新，提升数据分析处理和知识发现能力。结合行业应用，研发大数据分析、理解、预测及决策支持与知识服务等智能数据应用技术。突破面向大数据的新型计算、存储、传感、通信等芯片及融合架构、内存计亿级并发、EB级存储、绿色计算等技术，推动软硬件协同发展。培育安全可控的大数据产品体系。以应用为牵引，自主研发和引进吸收并重，加快形成安全可控的大数据产品体系。重点突破面向大数据应用基础设施的核心信息技术设备、信息安全产品以及面向事务的新型关系数据库、列式数据库、NoSQL数据库、大规模图数据库和新一代分布式计算平台等基础产品。加快研发新一代商业智能、数据挖掘、数据可视化、语义搜索等软件产品。结合数据生命周期管理需求，培育大数据采集与集成、大数据分析与挖掘、大数据交互感知、基于语义理解的数据资源管理等平台产品。面向重点行业应用需求，研发具有行。业特征的大数据检索、分析、展示等技术产品，形成垂直领域成熟的大数据解决。方案及服务。创新大数据技术服务模式。加快大数据服务模式创新，培育数据即服务新模式和新业态，提升大数据服务能力，降低大数据应用门槛和成本。围绕数据全生命周期各阶段需求，发展数据采集、清洗、分析、交易、安全防护等技术服务。推进大数据与云计算服务模式融合，促进海量数据、大规模分布式计算和智能数据分析等公共云计算服务发展，提升第三方大数据技术服务能力。推动大数据技。术服务与行业深度结合，培育面向垂直领域的大数据服务模式。

context: In principle, it should be the city where the national independent innovation demonstration zone or national high-tech zone is located, and it has clearly identified the development of artificial intelligence as a key industrial direction. The core industry of artificial intelligence has a scale of over 5 billion yuan, and the related industry of artificial intelligence has a scale of over 20 billion yuan.

context: Focus on the integrated development of the new generation of information technology and energy, carry out research on common key technologies such as intelligent sensing and intelligent measurement in the energy field, special robots, digital twins, as well as energy big data, artificial intelligence, cloud computing, blockchain, and the Internet of Things, promote the deep integration of traditional industries such as coal, oil and gas, power plants, and power grids with digital and intelligent technologies, carry out pilot demonstrations of various energy plants and regional smart energy system integration, and lead the transformation and upgrading of the energy industry.

zh_context: 聚焦新一代信息技术和能源融合发展，开展能源领域用智能传感和智能量测、特种机器人、数字孪生，以及能源大数据、人工智能、云计算、区块链、物联网等数字化、智能化共性关键技术研究，推动煤炭、油气、电厂、电网等传统行业与数字化、智能化技术深度融合，开展各种能源厂站和区域智慧能源系统集成试点示范，引领能源产业转型升级。

context: High-quality aluminum manufacturing mainly includes aluminum extrusion processing. Aluminum extrusion processing mainly includes high-performance aluminum alloy sheets (2000, 7000 series, and 5A06 aluminum alloy, aluminum lithium alloy), large-sized aluminum alloy pre-stretched thick plates (2000, 7000 series aluminum alloy and 6061 aluminum alloy), extruded profiles (2000, 7000 series, and 5A06 aluminum alloy, aluminum lithium alloy), pipes (2000, 7000 series, and 5A02, 6061 aluminum alloy), bars (2000, 7000 series, and 5A06 aluminum alloy), weldable aluminum alloy sheets (5000 series aluminum alloy with Mg content greater than 3.5%), integral wall panel profiles (used for cabins, etc.), automotive aluminum materials, automotive high-performance aluminum alloy sheets (more than ten types of alloys including GB/T33227-2016 standard 6014, 6016~S, 6016~IH, 6A16, 5182~RSS, 5754), aluminum reinforcement parts for automotive collision prevention systems (6000 series aluminum alloy), aluminum alloy profiles for automotive structures (5000, 6000, 7000 series aluminum alloy), plates for automotive body panels (aluminum magnesium silicon (copper) alloy), automotive air conditioning heat dissipation components - aluminum and aluminum alloy foil strips and composite strips.

zh_context: 高品质铝材制造，主要包括铝压延加工。铝压延加工，主要包括高性能铝合金薄板（2000、7000系及5A06铝合金、铝锂合金）、大规格铝合金预拉伸厚板（2000、7000系铝合金及6061铝合金）、挤压型材（2000、7000系及5A06铝合金、铝锂合金）、管材（2000、7000系及5A02、6061铝合金）、棒材（2000、7000系及5A06铝合金）、可焊铝合金薄板（Mg含量大于3.5%的5000系铝合金）、整体壁板型材（用于舱室等）、汽车用铝材、汽车用高性能铝合金板（GB/T33227-2016标准6014、6016~S、6016~IH、6A16、5182~RSS、5754等十余种合金）、汽车防碰撞系统用铝加强件（6000系铝合金）、汽车结构用铝合金型材（5000、6000、7000系铝合金）、汽车车身板用板（铝镁硅（铜）合金）、汽车空调散热件-铝与铝合金箔带及复合带材。

context: Breakthroughs in key technologies such as microfluidic chip, single molecule detection, and automated nucleic acid testing have led to the development of major products such as fully automated nucleic acid testing systems, high-throughput liquid phase suspension chips, medical biomass spectrometers, and rapid pathological diagnosis systems. Research and development of a series of diagnostic reagents for early diagnosis and precise treatment of major diseases, as well as high-precision diagnostic products suitable for primary medical institutions, aim to enhance the competitiveness of China's in vitro diagnostic industry.

context: Looking towards 2030, select another batch of major scientific and technological projects that reflect the national strategic intent, striving for breakthroughs. Starting from longer-term strategic needs, adhere to what should be done and what should not be done, striving to take the lead in breakthroughs in aviation engines and gas turbines, deep-sea space stations, quantum communication and quantum computing, brain science and neuromorphic research, national cybersecurity, deep space exploration and in-orbit service and maintenance systems for spacecraft, independent innovation in seed industry, clean and efficient utilization of coal, smart grid, integrated information network of heaven and earth, big data, intelligent manufacturing and robotics, key research and application of new materials, comprehensive environmental governance of the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region, and health security. According to the principle of mature one, start one, start implementation in batches in an orderly manner. Column 3: Scientific and Technological Innovation 2030 - Major Projects. Major Engineering: 7. Key research and application of new materials. Key development of carbon fiber and its composites, high-temperature alloys, advanced semiconductor materials, new display and its materials, special alloys for high-end equipment, rare earth new materials, military new materials, etc., breakthroughs in core key technologies such as preparation, evaluation, and application. Scientific and Technological Innovation 2030 - Major Projects and National Key Science and Technology Projects form a systematic layout that combines both long-term and short-term goals. In the field of electronic information, form an overall layout covering the development of high-end chips and core software and hardware, breakthroughs in cutting-edge technologies, and the construction of information capabilities; in the field of advanced manufacturing, form an overall layout covering basic materials, key technologies, major strategic products, and equipment research and development.

zh_context: 面向2030年，再选择一批体现国家战略意图的重大科技项目，力争有所突破。从更长远的战略需求出发，坚持有所为、有所不为，力争在航空发动机及燃气轮机、深海空间站、量子通信与量子计算、脑科学与类脑研究、国家网络空间安全、深空探测及空间飞行器在轨服务与维护系统、种业自主创新、煤炭清洁高效利用、智能电网、天地一体化信息网络、大数据、智能制造和机器人、重点新材料研发及应用、京津冀环境综合治理、健康保障等重点方向率先突破。按照“成熟一项、启动一项”的原则，分批次有序启动实施。专栏3科技创新2030—重大项目。重大工程：7.重点新材料研发及应用。重点研制碳纤维及其复合材料、高温合金、先进半导体材料、新型显示及其材料、高端装备用特种合金、稀土新材料、军用新材料等，突破制备、评价、应用等核心关键技术。科技创新2030—重大项目与国家科技重大专项，形成远近结合、梯次接续的系统布局。在电子信息领域，形成涵盖高端芯片及核心软硬件研制、前沿技术突破和信息能力构建的整体布局；在先进制造领域，形成涵盖基础材料、关键技术、重大战略产品和装备研发的整体布局。

context: Implement the pure electric drive technology transformation strategy, based on the three verticals and three horizontals research and development system, break through the basic frontiers and core key technologies of battery and battery management, motor drive and power electronics, intelligent technology for electric vehicles, fuel cell power systems, plug-in/extended-range hybrid systems, and pure electric power systems. context: The recycling and resource utilization of industrial solid waste, waste gas, and waste liquid mainly include coal mining and washing industry, condiment, fermented products manufacturing, liquor manufacturing, textile industry, leather, fur, feather and its products and footwear manufacturing, papermaking and paper products industry, coking, tire manufacturing, non-metallic mineral products industry, clay brick and tile and building block manufacturing, black metal smelting and rolling processing industry, non-ferrous metal smelting and rolling processing industry, other metal processing machinery manufacturing, other cultural, office machinery manufacturing, other unspecified general equipment manufacturing, construction engineering machinery manufacturing, other special equipment manufacturing, automobile parts and accessories manufacturing, metal waste and scrap processing, non-metallic waste and scrap processing, thermal power generation, cogeneration, etc. Leather, fur, feather and its products and footwear manufacturing mainly include comprehensive utilization of solid waste in tanning processing and comprehensive utilization of wastewater in tanning processing. Non-metallic mineral products industry mainly includes comprehensive utilization of waste gas in building materials enterprises.

zh_context: 工业固体废物、废气、废液回收和资源化利用，主要包括煤炭开采和洗选业、调味品、发酵制品制造、酒的制造、纺织业、皮革、毛皮、羽毛及其制品和制鞋业、造纸和纸制品业、炼焦、轮胎制造、非金属矿物制品业、粘土砖瓦及建筑砌块制造、黑色金属冶炼和压延加工业、有色金属冶炼和压延加工业、其他金属加工机械制造、其他文化、办公用机械制造、其他未列明通用设备制造业、建筑工程用机械制造、其他专用设备制造、汽车零部件及配件制造、金属废料和碎屑加工处理、非金属废料和碎屑加工处理、火力发电、热电联产等。皮革、毛皮、羽毛及其制品和制鞋业，主要包括制革加工固体废弃物综合利用、制革加工废水综合利用。造纸和纸制品业，主要包括造纸企业废水综合利用、碱回收白泥综合利用、废水污泥、脱墨污泥综合利用。炼焦，主要包括焦化企业废气综合利用。轮胎制造，主要包括轮胎翻新。非金属矿物制品业，主要包括建材企业废气综合利用。

context: Efforts are being made to address major common problems such as homogenization and low value of basic materials products, heavy environmental burden, low energy efficiency, and resource constraints. Key technologies and domestically produced equipment for the design, development, manufacturing process, process optimization, and intelligent green transformation of basic materials are being breakthroughs, and advanced production demonstrations are being carried out.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”国家科技创新规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕43号）（国务院/2016年07月28日）++nan++“十三五”国家科技创新规划++2016-07++发展新材料技术,构建具有国际竞争力的现代产业技术体系,重点基础材料
zh_context: 着力解决基础材料产品同质化、低值化，环境负荷重、能源效率低、资源瓶颈制约等重大共性问题，突破基础材料的设计开发、制造流程、工艺优化及智能化绿色化改造等关键技术和国产化装备，开展先进生产示范。

context: Manufacturing of refrigeration and air conditioning equipment mainly includes energy-saving industrial and commercial refrigeration equipment (energy efficiency level 11), energy-saving office and commercial air conditioning equipment (energy efficiency level 12), energy-saving technology devices for enterprise intelligent air conditioning systems (energy efficiency level 13), and low-temperature water-direct-fired single and double-effect lithium bromide absorption chiller.
zh_context: 制冷、空调设备制造，主要包括节能型工商用制冷设备（能效等级为11级）、节能办公和商用空调设备（能效等级为12级）、企业智能空调系统节能技术装置（能效等级为13级）、低温水-直燃单双效溴化锂吸收式冷温水机。

context: Key technologies include ultra-pure refining, defect control, microstructure regulation, preparation of complex and large-scale components, multi-purpose technology for deformation and casting of high-temperature alloys, single crystal high-temperature alloys and powder metallurgy high-temperature alloys, special-purpose high-temperature and corrosion-resistant alloys, etc.
