zh_context: 生物基、淀粉基新材料制造，主要包括聚乳酸（PLA）、聚羟基烷酸（PHA）、聚对苯二甲酸丙二醇酯（PTT）、聚丁二酸丁二醇酯（PBS）、聚有机酸复合材料、淀粉基塑料、生物基聚酯、生物基聚氨酯、葡甘聚糖材料、非主粮变性淀粉基生物降解材料、微生物多糖材料、生物基材料助剂、可降解高分子材料与淀粉共混的环境友好材料可降解聚乳酸、聚羟基烷酸、聚氨基酸和聚有机酸复合材料和产品、生物可降解聚酯。

context: (1) Comprehensive testing, verification, and evaluation platform for rail transit system safety. Construct a key system comprehensive testing, verification, and evaluation platform that integrates detection, certification, accreditation, and safety assessment, with features such as complex domestic and international operating environments, coupling of special working conditions, multidisciplinary big data integration, and intelligent interaction. This platform provides support for the domestic and international market access of rail transit systems and equipment. (2) Comprehensive data application service platform for rail transit systems. Based on real-time data from transportation objects, infrastructure, mobile equipment, command and dispatch systems, and natural environment, construct a comprehensive data application service platform for rail transit systems that integrates functions such as large-capacity real-time storage, big data-driven computation, transportation scheduling management, disaster and accident emergency command, and equipment operation and maintenance guidance. This platform provides support for the efficient and safe operation of rail transit systems throughout their lifecycle. (3) Comprehensive performance research and evaluation platform for rail transit systems. In response to the characteristics of high energy consumption of rail transit systems and high proportion of urban environment electricity load, carry out comprehensive performance testing and verification of new materials, new structures, and new energy units. Construct a comprehensive performance testing and evaluation platform for rail transit systems to comprehensively enhance the overall performance of rail transit systems. This platform provides support for the comprehensive improvement of rail transit system performance.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”交通领域科技创新专项规划（节选）（国科发高〔2017〕121号）（科技部交通运输部/2017年06月07日）++nan++其他政策++2017-06++发展重点,轨道交通,创新能力
zh_context: （1）轨道交通系统安全综合测试验证评估平台。构建具有国内外复杂运用环境及特殊工况耦合、多学科大数据融合、智能交互等特点，集检测检验、认证认可、安全评估一体化的关键系统综合测试验证评估平台，为轨道交通系统及装备国内外市场准入提供支撑。（2）轨道交通系统综合数据应用服务平台。基于运输对象、基础设施、移动装备、指挥调度系统、自然环境的实时数据，构建集大容量实时存储、大数据驱动运算、运输调度管理、灾害事故应急指挥、装备运维指导等功能于一体的轨道交通系统综合数据应用服务平台，为保障轨道交通系统全生命周期的高效和安全运营提供支撑。（3）轨道交通系统综合效能研究与评估平台。针对轨道交通系统能耗巨大和城市环境用电负荷占比高的特征，开展新材料、新结构及新能源等单元综合效能试验验证，构建轨道交通系统全局综合效能试验评估平台，为全面提升轨道交通系统综合效能提供支撑。

context: In the fields of deck machinery, drilling packages, platform lifting systems, oil and gas production modules, liquefied natural gas (LNG) loading and unloading systems, etc., several brands have been formed. In the fields of deepwater mooring systems, dynamic positioning systems, deepwater pipe-laying systems, underwater operation systems, umbilical cables and flexible risers, LNG transportation and re-gasification systems, marine observation/monitoring equipment, underwater carriers, and offshore communication network equipment, design, construction, and application have been achieved, realizing demonstration applications of underwater production systems within 500 meters.
extended_context: 高端装备++海洋工程装备++海洋工程装备制造业持续健康发展行动计划（2017-2020年）（节选）（工信部联装[2017]298号）（工业和信息化部、发展改革委、科技部、财政部、人民银行、国资委、银监会、海洋局/2017年11月27日）++nan++其他政策++2017-11++发展目标,关键系统和设备研制能力明显增强
zh_context: 在甲板机械、钻井包、平台升降系统、油气生产模块、液化天然气（LNG）装卸系统等领域形成若干品牌；在深海锚泊系统、动力定位系统、深海铺管系统、水下作业系统、脐带缆和挠性立管、LNG转运及再气化系统、海洋观测/监测设备、水下运载器、海上通信组网装备等领域实现设计建造和应用，实现500米以内水下生产系统示范应用。

context: 1. Internet Applications. (1) Upgrade of Internet applications (rolling). Continue to encourage and support mainstream Internet portals, social media, video, e-commerce, search, gaming, and other applications, as well as mainstream mobile app stores, internet browsers, email, file downloads, and other application software for IPv6 upgrade and deployment. Encourage and support the top 100 domestic commercial websites and applications to support IPv6 access. In the case of IPv4/IPv6 dual-stack connection, the above applications must prioritize support for IPv6 access. (2) IPv6 transformation of city-level and above government websites. Continue to promote the upgrade and transformation of existing e-government systems, complete the upgrade of the e-government external network, complete the upgrade and transformation of city-level and above government portal websites, and complete the transformation of public management and public welfare service platforms in areas such as public security, finance, healthcare, etc. (3) IPv6 transformation of city-level and above news and broadcasting television media websites. Complete the upgrade and transformation of city-level and above news and broadcasting television media websites, and fully support IPv6 for new businesses and applications. (4) IPv6 application in industrial internet (rolling). Continuously carry out network transformation in factories and enterprises, promote the large-scale deployment of innovative applications in the industrial internet, and continuously improve the relevant standards for IPv6 application, management, security, etc. in the industrial internet.2. Network Infrastructure. (1) IPv6 interconnection of backbone networks (rolling). Add and expand IPv6 backbone network interconnection nodes in China, with interconnection bandwidth reaching 5Tbps. (2) Expansion of IPv6 network international entry and exit points (rolling). Continuously expand the international entry and exit points of IPv6 networks, further enhancing the interconnection capability with the international next-generation internet. (3) Construction of IPv6 capabilities in broadcasting and television networks (rolling). Improve the IPv6 backbone network of broadcasting and television, implement IPv6 upgrade and transformation of cable television access networks in western regions, and basically achieve IPv6 deployment throughout the process of broadcasting and television content, platforms, networks, and terminals. (4) Upgrade of mobile and fixed terminals (rolling). Fully deploy IPv6-supported mobile terminals, fixed network terminals, and broadcasting and television integrated terminals, and accelerate the replacement of existing terminals.3. Application Infrastructure. (1) IPv6 upgrade of large-scale data centers (rolling). Carry out the transformation of large-scale data centers, complete the relevant system upgrades, and achieve coordinated development with network infrastructure. (2) IPv6 upgrade of content delivery networks and cloud service platforms (rolling). Complete the transformation of the top 10 content delivery networks and the top 10 cloud service platforms, forming optimized scheduling capabilities for IPv6 traffic. (3) Construction of IPv6 development monitoring platform (rolling). Increase monitoring indicators and objects, continuously improve the functionality and performance of the monitoring platform. Regularly evaluate the development of IPv6 in enterprises, industries, and regions.4. Network Security. IPv6 network security enhancement plan (rolling). Continuously upgrade and transform relevant network security protection systems. Thoroughly implement the network security level protection system, network real-name system, and IPv6 address record management measures. Continue to carry out research on relevant network security technologies, management, and mechanisms, strengthen network data security management and personal information protection capabilities, and ensure network security.5. Key cutting-edge technologies. Next-generation internet technology innovation projects (rolling). Continuously carry out technological breakthroughs and industrialization of IPv6-supported chips, operating systems, terminals, network devices, and security systems. Further accelerate the innovation of internet new architecture, as well as cutting-edge basic technologies such as new addressing and routing, intrinsic network security, network virtualization, etc. Strengthen the experimental verification and application demonstration of new network technologies and applications, continuously improve the productivity transformation level of innovation achievements, significantly enhance the independent innovation capability of network information technology, and form future network technology advantages.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++互联网++推进互联网协议第六版（IPv6）规模部署行动计划（国务院/2015年5月7日）++nan++其他政策++2015-5++实施步骤,2019年－2020年重点工作
zh_context: 1．互联网应用。（1）互联网应用升级（滚动）。继续鼓励和支持主流互联网门户、社交、视频、电商、搜索、游戏等应用，以及主流移动应用商店、互联网浏览器、电子邮件、文件下载等应用软件的IPv6升级和应用部署。鼓励和支持国内用户量排名前100位的商业网站及应用支持IPv6接入。在IPv4/IPv6双栈连接的情况下，上述应用均需优先支持IPv6访问。（2）市地级以上政府网站IPv6改造。继续推进既有电子政务系统升级改造，全。面完成电子政务外网升级。完成市地级以上政府门户网站升级改造。完成综治、金融、医疗等领域公共管理、民生公益等服务平台改造。（3）市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站IPv6改造。完成市地级以上新闻及广播电视媒体网站升级改造，新上业务及应用全面支持IPv6。（4）工业互联网IPv6应用（滚动）。持续开展工厂企业网络改造，推动工业互联网创新应用的规模部署，不断完善工业互联网IPv6应用、管理、安全等相关标准。2．网络基础设施。（1）骨干网IPv6互联互通（滚动）。新增和扩容我国IPv6骨干网互联节点，互联带宽达到5Tbps。（2）IPv6网络国际出入口扩容（滚动）。持续扩容IPv6网络国际出入口，进一步提升与国际下一代互联网的互联互通能力。（3）广播电视网络IPv6能力建设（滚动）。完善广电IPv6骨干网，实施西部地区有线电视接入网IPv6升级改造，基本实现广播电视内容、平台、网络、终端全流程IPv6部署。（4）移动和固定终端升级（滚动）。全面部署支持IPv6的移动终端、固定网络终端以及广播电视融合终端，加快存量终端的淘汰替换。3．应用基础设施。（1）大型以上数据中心IPv6升级（滚动）。开展大型以上数据中心改造，完成相关系统升级，实现与网络基础设施的协同发展。（2）内容分发网络和云服务平台的IPv6升级（滚动）。完成排名前10位的内容分发网络和排名前10位的云服务平台全部云产品改造，形成IPv6流量的优化调度能力。（3）IPv6发展监测平台建设（滚动）。增加监测指标和对象，不断完善监测平台功能和性能。定期开展企业、行业、区域IPv6发展情况评测。4．网络安全。IPv6网络安全提升计划（滚动）。持续升级改造相关网络安全保障系统。深入落实网络安全等级保护制度、网络实名制和IPv6地址备案管理办法，继续开展相关网络安全技术、管理及机制研究工作，强化网络数据安全管理及个人信息保护能力，确保网络安全。5．关键前沿技术。下一代互联网技术创新项目（滚动）。持续开展支持IPv6的芯片、操作系统、终端及网络设备、安全系统的技术攻关和产业化。进一步加快互联网新型体系结构，以及新型编址与路由、内生网络安全、网络虚拟化等前沿基础技术创新，加强网络新技术、新应用的试验验证和应用示范，不断提升创新成果的生产力转化水平，显著增强网络信息技术自主创新能力，形成未来网络技术先发优势。

context: Based on the scale development of the solar power generation industry, gradually transform the current industry system focused on component sales into an industry system centered around engineering construction and lifecycle management. Relying on existing conditions, establish an industry service system that supports the comprehensive development of the solar power generation industry, guided by the national energy development strategy, led by professional technical institutions, and oriented towards market demand. Improve the standard system in areas such as solar resource evaluation, solar power plant planning and design, construction and installation, and operation and maintenance. Establish and improve the construction and operation service system for solar power generation, enhance the specialized service capabilities in site selection, planning, design, construction and installation, and maintenance of solar power plants. Improve the statistical information of the solar power generation industry and form a monitoring system for solar power generation information.
extended_context: 新能源++大型风电++关于印发太阳能发电发展“十二五”规划的通知（节选）（国能新能〔2012〕194号）（国家能源局/2012年7月7日）++nan++其他政策++2012-7++重点任务,建立完善太阳能发电产业体系
zh_context: 以太阳能发电产业的规模化发展为基础，逐步将目前以主要部件销售为重点的产业体系转变为以工程建设和全生命周期管理为核心的产业体系。依托现有条件，建立以国家能源发展战略为指导，以专业技术机构为主体，以市场需求为导向，支撑太阳能发电产业全面发展的产业服务体系。完善太阳能资源评价、太阳。能电站规划设计、施工安装、运行维护等领域的标准体系。建立完善的太阳能发。电建设运行服务体系，提高太阳能电站选址、规划、设计、施工安装、检修维护的专业化服务能力。完善太阳能发电产业信息统计，形成太阳能发电信息监测体系。

context: Focus on the software industry chain, accelerate the 'shortcomings, strengths, and service optimization' to solidify the upstream basic software capabilities in the development environment, tools, and other industrial chain, enhance the software level in the middle of the industrial chain such as industrial software, application software, platform software, embedded software, etc., increase the supply of information technology service products in the downstream of the industrial chain, and improve the modernization level of the software industry chain. Focus on strengthening basic software. Improve desktop, server, mobile terminal, and in-vehicle operating system products and supporting toolkits, promote the integration, adaptation, and optimization of operating systems with databases, middleware, office suites, security software, and various applications. Accelerate the research and development and application promotion of distributed databases, hybrid transactional analysis processing databases, shared memory database clusters, and other products. Carry out the research and development of high-performance and high-reliability middleware key products and components. Enrich security software products and services such as data backup, disaster recovery, and industrial control system protection. Promote the research and development and application promotion of related products of software integrated development environment and key testing tools. Focus on breakthroughs in industrial software. Develop computer-aided design, simulation, calculation, and other tool software, vigorously develop key industrial control software, and accelerate the industrial deployment of high-value-added operation and maintenance and business management software. Develop industry-specific industrial software for key areas such as CNC machine tools, integrated circuits, aerospace equipment, ships, as well as new energy and intelligent connected vehicles, strengthen integration and verification, and form systematic service capabilities. Column 1: Key basic software shortcomings. Operating system. Strengthen the overall architecture design and technical path planning of the operating system, promote joint research and development of key operating system technologies among chip design, operating system, system integration enterprises, research institutes, and universities, improve the compatibility of the operating system with underlying hardware and interoperability with upper-layer applications. Database. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as full-memory high-speed data engines, high-reliability data storage engines, distributed data processing and task scheduling architectures, large-scale parallel graph data processing, etc. Promote the application of high-performance databases in key industries such as finance, telecommunications, and energy. Development support software. Improve the integration and stability of software development tools, break through key technologies such as code resource reuse and recommendation, large-scale cross-language analysis, etc. Accelerate the research and development of testing tools such as program static analysis, dynamic testing, simulation testing, and automated testing platforms. Design and simulation system software. Breakthroughs in key technologies such as three-dimensional geometric modeling engines, constraint solving engines, etc., explore open industrial software architecture, system-level design and simulation, and other technical paths. Focus on supporting the development of three-dimensional computer-aided design, multi-physics field computer-aided calculation such as structure/fluid, model-based system engineering, and other product research and development. Electronic Design Automation (EDA). Establish a joint technical research and development mechanism for EDA developers, chip design companies, foundries, etc., break through key technologies for the entire process of digital, analog, and mixed-signal circuit design, verification, physical implementation, and manufacturing testing, and improve advanced process toolkits. Industrial control software. Focus on industrial control systems such as programmable logic controllers (PLCs), distributed control systems (DCS), safety instrumented systems (SIS), etc., carry out joint research and development and adaptation migration of software products with multi-point, low-latency, high-reliability, and low-energy consumption, promote the development of safety monitoring and management systems for manufacturing enterprise-side security functions, and accelerate the integrated application of products in key industries. Collaborative development of application software. Focus on key industries such as finance, construction, energy, transportation, etc., accelerate breakthroughs in financial core business systems, building information modeling and fire simulation, smart energy management, intelligent traffic management, intelligent office, etc. Research and promote software products related to the Beidou satellite navigation system. Develop new-generation software integration application infrastructure around new infrastructure construction such as 5G base stations, big data centers, etc. Encourage leading companies in the industry to collaborate with software companies to jointly develop industry-specific software products. Proactively layout emerging platform software. Accelerate the cultivation of internationally competitive software technologies and products in fields such as cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, 5G, blockchain, industrial internet, etc. Support the development of new lightweight platforms such as mini-programs and quick applications. Accelerate the research and development of software technologies in frontier areas such as the sixth-generation mobile communication (6G), quantum information, satellite internet, brain-like intelligence, and cultivate a batch of landmark products. Column 2: Strengthen emerging platform software strengths. Cloud computing. Accelerate the research and development of technologies such as ultra-large-scale distributed storage, elastic computing, virtual isolation, heterogeneous resource scheduling, etc., speed up the iteration and upgrade of cloud operating systems, and layout the next-generation cloud computing software system. Encourage enterprises to build high-performance cloud platforms, optimize the layout of public clouds, industry-specific clouds, and regional hybrid cloud platforms. Improve cloud security levels and intelligent cloud service capabilities. Big data. Support key technological innovations such as high-performance data acquisition, high-capacity storage, massive information processing, heterogeneous data management, real-time monitoring of sensitive information, chip integration of storage and computing, platform security control, etc. In key areas such as industry, communication, finance, medical care, emergency response, agriculture, public security, transportation, power, etc., develop a batch of leading software products and solutions. Artificial intelligence. Support the research and development of artificial intelligence algorithm libraries, toolkits, etc. Accelerate the development of new machine learning, biometric recognition, natural language understanding, new human-computer interaction, intelligent control and decision-making, and other products and services. Promote the construction of open platforms for artificial intelligence. Blockchain. Accelerate the research and development of key technologies such as blockchain consensus algorithms, encryption algorithms, efficient and secure smart contracts, distributed systems, etc. Support the construction of underlying technology platforms and blockchain service platforms. Strengthen key areas of application such as financial technology, supply chain management, and government services. Virtual reality and augmented reality. Promote technological innovations such as three-dimensional graphics production, dynamic environment modeling, real-time motion capture, fast rendering processing, etc., develop virtual reality-related development tool software and industry solutions. Actively cultivate embedded software. Carry out research and development of embedded software systems for major equipment needs such as CNC machine tools, intelligent robots, new energy and intelligent connected vehicles, communication equipment, aerospace engines, etc. Breakthroughs in embedded operating systems, embedded database core technologies, accelerate the research and development and application promotion of related products. Optimize information technology services. Facing the needs of digitalization, networking, and intelligent applications, strengthen algorithm services in typical scenarios, promote technological innovations related to enterprise-level business continuity management (BCM). Improve the information technology service system around digital management consulting, integrated integration, intelligent operation and maintenance, etc., and enhance specialized information technology service capabilities in key industries and fields. Support the construction of an information technology service ecosystem with perception, control, and decision-making capabilities. Column 3: Demonstration of information technology service applications. Strengthen the research and development of key information technology services. Carry out technological research and development in data governance, data analysis, knowledge graphs, data security containers, intelligent monitoring and early warning, multi-source data integration, etc., and build a new information technology service technical system. Promote intelligent service applications for industry enterprises. For industries such as finance, telecommunications, energy, etc., promote the construction and application of intelligent information technology service platforms and build an intelligent service system. Select key enterprises to carry out the construction and application of digital transformation support platforms, and cultivate a group of digital transformation solution providers.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++软件++“十四五”软件和信息技术服务业发展规划的通知（工信部规〔2021〕180号）（工信部/2020年11月30日）++nan++其他政策++2020-11++主要任务,推动软件产业链升级
zh_context: 围绕软件产业链，加速“补短板、锻长板、优服务”，夯实开发环境、工具等产业链上游基础软件实力，提升工业软件、应用软件、平台软件、嵌入式软件等产业链中游的软件水平，增加产业链下游信息技术服务产品供给，提升软件产业链现代化水平。聚力攻坚基础软件。完善桌面、服务器、移动终端、车载等操作系统产。品及配套工具集，推动操作系统与数据库、中间件、办公套件、安全软件及。各类应用的集成、适配、优化。加速分布式数据库、混合事务分析处理数据库、共享内存数据库集群等产品研发和应用推广。开展高性能、高可靠的中间件关键产品及构件研发。丰富数据备份、灾难恢复、工业控制系统防护等安全软件产品和服务。推进软件集成开发环境相关产品和关键测试工具的研发与应用推广。重点突破工业软件。研发推广计算机辅助设计、仿真、计算等工具软件，大力发展关键工业控制软件，加快高附加值的运营维护和经营管理软件产业化部署。面向数控机床、集成电路、航空航天装备、船舶等重大技术装备以及新能源和智能网联汽车等重点领域需求，发展行业专用工业软件，加强集成验证，形成体系化服务能力。专栏1关键基础软件补短板。操作系统。加强操作系统总体架构设计和技术路径规划，推动芯片设计、操作系统、系统集成企业与科研院所、高校开展操作系统关键技术联合攻关，提升操作系统与底层硬件的兼容性、与上层应用的互操作性。数据库。突破全内存高速数据引擎、高可靠数据存储引擎、分布式数据处理与任务调度架构、大规模并行图数据处理等关键技术。推动高性能数据库在金融、电信、能源等重点行业关键业务系统应用。开发支撑软件。提升软件开发工具集成性、稳定性，突破代码资源复用与推荐、大规模跨语言分析等关键技术。加速程序静态分析、动态测试、仿真测试、自动化测试平台等测试工具研发。设计仿真系统软件。突破三维几何建模引擎、约束求解引擎等关键技术，探索开放式工业软件架构、系统级设计与仿真等技术路径。重点支持三维计算机辅助设计、结构/流体等多物理场计算机辅助计算、基于模型的系统工程等产品研发。电子设计自动化软件（EDA）。建立EDA开发商、芯片设计企业、代工厂商等上下游企业联合技术攻关机制，突破针对数字、模拟及数模混合电路设计、验证、物理实现、制造测试全流程的关键技术，完善先进工艺工具包。工业控制软件。聚焦可编程逻辑控制器（PLC）、分布式控制系统（DCS）、安全仪表系统（SIS）等工业控制系统，开展多点位、低延时、高可靠、低能耗软件产品的联合攻关和适配迁移，推动制造企业侧安全监测与管理系统等安全功能开发，加快产品在重点行业的集成应用。协同攻关应用软件。面向金融、建筑、能源、交通等重点行业领域应用。需求，加快突破金融核心业务系统、建筑信息建模和建筑防火模拟、智慧能。源管理、智能交通管理、智能办公等应用软件。研发推广北斗卫星导航系统相关软件产品。围绕5G基站、大数据中心等新型基础设施建设，发展新一代软件融合应用基础设施。鼓励行业龙头企业联合软件企业，协同研发行业专用软件产品。前瞻布局新兴平台软件。加快培育云计算、大数据、人工智能、5G、区块链、工业互联网等领域具有国际竞争力的软件技术和产品。支持小程序、快应用等新型轻量化平台发展。加快第六代移动通信（6G）、量子信息、卫星互联网、类脑智能等前沿领域软件技术研发，培育一批标志性产品。专栏2新兴平台软件锻长板。云计算。加快超大规模分布式存储、弹性计算、虚拟隔离、异构资源调度等技术研发，加速云操作系统迭代升级，布局下一代云计算软件体系。鼓励企业构建高性能云平台，优化公有云、行业专有云、区域混合云平台布局。提升云安全水平和智能云服务能力。大数据。支持高性能采集、高容量存储、海量信息处理、异构数据管理、敏感信息实时监测、存算一体芯片、平台安全管控等关键技术创新。在工业、通信、金融、医疗、应急、农业、公安、交通、电力等重点领域，研发一批技术领先软件产品和解决方案。人工智能。支持人工智能算法库、工具集等研发。加快发展新型机器学习、生物特征识别、自然语言理解、新型人机交互、智能控制与决策等产品和服务。推动人工智能开放平台建设。区块链。加快区块链共识算法、加密算法、高效安全智能合约、分布式系统等关键技术研发。支持区块链底层技术平台、区块链服务平台等建设。加强金融科技、供应链管理、政府服务等重点领域应用。虚拟现实和增强现实。推动三维图形生产、动态环境建模、实时动作捕捉、快速渲染处理等技术创新，发展虚拟现实相关开发工具软件和行业解决方案。积极培育嵌入式软件。面向数控机床、智能机器人、新能源和智能网联汽车、通信设备、航空发动机等重大装备需求，开展嵌入式软件系统研发。突破嵌入式操作系统、嵌入式数据库核心技术，加快相关产品研发与应用推广。优化信息技术服务。面向数字化、网络化、智能化应用需求，加强典型场景下的算法服务，推进企业级业务连续性管理（BCM）相关技术创新。围绕数字化管理咨询、一体化集成、智能运维等，完善信息技术服务体系，提升。重点行业和领域专业化信息技术服务能力。支撑构建具备感知力、控制力和决策力的信息技术服务生态。专栏3信息技术服务应用示范。加强信息技术服务关键技术研发。开展数据治理、数据分析、知识图谱、数据安全容器、智能监控预警、多源数据集成等技术研发，构建新型信息技术服务技术体系。推进面向行业企业智能服务应用。面向金融、电信、能源等行业，推动智能信息技术服务平台的建设应用，构建智能服务体系。选取重点企业开展数字化转型支撑平台建设应用，培育形成一批数字化转型解决方案提供商。

context: Other professional technical services mainly include meteorological services, earthquake services, marine meteorological services, remote sensing surveying and mapping services, other surveying and geographic information services, energy and mineral geological exploration, solid mineral geological exploration, water, carbon dioxide and other mineral geological exploration, basic geological exploration, geological exploration technical services, planning and design management, etc. Remote sensing surveying and mapping services mainly include surveying and mapping services other than satellite application services. Energy and mineral geological exploration mainly includes high-tech energy and mineral geological exploration services. Solid mineral geological exploration mainly includes high-tech solid mineral geological exploration. Water, carbon dioxide and other mineral geological exploration mainly include high-tech water, carbon dioxide and other mineral geological exploration. Basic geological exploration mainly includes high-tech basic geological exploration. Geological exploration technical services mainly include high-tech geological exploration technical services.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++9.1.4++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++相关服务业,新技术与创新创业服务,其他专业技术服务
zh_context: 其他专业技术服务，主要包括气象服务、地震服务、海洋气象服务、遥感测绘服务、其他测绘地理信息服务、能源矿产地质勘查、固体矿产地质勘查、水、二氧化碳等矿产地质勘查国民经、基础地质勘查、地质勘查技术服务、规划设计管理等。遥感测绘服务，主要包括除卫星应用服务以外的测绘服务。能源矿产地质勘查，主要包括利用高技术开展的能源矿产地质勘查服务。固体矿产地质勘查，主要包括利用高技术开展的固体矿产地质勘查。水、二氧化碳等矿产地质勘查国民经，主要包括利用高技术开展的水、二氧化碳等矿产地质勘查。基础地质勘查，主要包括利用高技术开展的基础地质勘查。地质勘查技术服务，主要包括利用高技术开展的地质勘查技术服务。

context: Rare earth special alloy manufacturing mainly includes non-ferrous metal alloy manufacturing. Non-ferrous metal alloy manufacturing mainly includes dysprosium iron, neodymium iron, gadolinium iron alloy, holmium copper alloy, and aluminum scandium alloy.

context: With rare earth functional materials, advanced energy materials, high-performance membrane materials, functional ceramics, and special glass as the focus, we will vigorously enhance the guarantee capability of functional materials in major projects. With advanced carbon materials represented by graphene and high-end carbon fibers, superconducting materials, intelligent/biomimetic/metamaterials, and extreme environment materials as breakthrough points, we will seize the high ground of materials frontier.
extended_context: 通用++综合++“十三五”国家科技创新规划（节选）（国发〔2016〕43号）（国务院/2016年07月28日）++nan++“十三五”国家科技创新规划++2016-07++发展新材料技术,构建具有国际竞争力的现代产业技术体系,先进功能材料
zh_context: 以稀土功能材料、先进能源材料、高性能膜材料、功能陶瓷、特种玻璃等战略新材料为重点，大力提升功能材料在重大工程中的保障能力；以石墨烯、高端碳纤维为代表的先进碳材料、超导材料、智能/仿生/超材料、极端环境材料等前沿新材料为突破口，抢占材料前沿制高点。

context: The satellite communication application system mainly includes communication satellite ground user terminals, portable multimedia terminals, and cost-effective ground communication systems that use new satellite communication technologies (new protocols). The ground user terminals for communication satellites, portable multimedia terminals, and cost-effective ground communication systems that use new satellite communication technologies (new protocols), low-orbit data collection satellite application terminals, emergency disaster reduction satellite communication application systems, broadband/high-frequency/laser satellite communication application systems, and ground terminal equipment and key supporting components related to the four major businesses of satellite fixed communication, satellite mobile communication, TV satellite live broadcasting (satellite digital audio broadcasting), and internet broadband access. Mobile satellite communication equipment. Satellite search and rescue system ground station (MEOLUT) and user beacons. Digital content delivery services based on satellite live broadcasting technology, and integrated information network services between space and ground. Chip products and antenna products suitable for satellite communication application systems.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++2.3.2++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++2017-01++高端装备制造产业,卫星及应用产业,卫星通信应用系统
zh_context: 卫星通信应用系统，主要包括通信卫星地面用户终端、便携式多媒体终端以及采用卫星通信新技术（新协议）的高性价比地面通信系统等。通信卫星地面用户终端、便携式多媒体终端以及采用卫星通信新技术（新协议）的高性价比地面通信系统，低轨数据采集卫星应用终端，应急减灾卫星通信应用系统，宽带/高频/激光卫星通信应用系统，与卫星固定通信业务、卫星移动通信业务、电视卫星直播业务（卫星数字音频广播）和互联网宽带接入等四大业务相关的地面终端设备及其关键配套件。移动中卫星通信设备。卫星搜救系统地面站（MEOLUT）与用户信标。基于卫星直播技术的数字内容投递服务、天地一体化信息网络服务。适应于卫星通信应用系统的芯片产品、天线产品等。

context: One is database services. Utilizing cloud database systems to achieve cross-platform and cross-business collaborative management of various types of data. Two is big data analysis services. Utilizing cloud-based big data platforms to promote data resource aggregation, including data collection, storage, analysis, mining, and collaborative applications. Three is middleware platform services. Utilizing cloud-based middleware services to build distributed system architectures to meet the needs of the Internet+ transformation. Four is Internet of Things (IoT) platform services. Connecting massive IoT terminal devices to the cloud platform to achieve efficient and visualized online device management. Five is software development platform services. Through cloud-based development platforms, software lifecycle management is conducted to quickly build development, testing, and runtime environments, standardize development processes, reduce costs, and improve efficiency. Six is artificial intelligence platform services. Utilizing the computing resources of the cloud platform to develop intelligent services such as speech recognition, image recognition, and facial recognition, thereby enhancing business intelligence levels.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++按需合理选择云服务,平台系统类服务
zh_context: 一是数据库服务。利用云数据库系统，实现各类数据跨平台、跨业务的协同管理。二是大数据分析服务。利用云端大数据平台推动数据资源集聚，进行数据采集、存储、分析、挖掘和协同应用。三是中间件平台服务。利用云上中间件服务，构建分布式系统架构，满足“互联网+”转型的需要。四是物联网平台服务。将海量物联网终端设备接入云平台，实现设备高效可视化在线管理。五是软件开发平台服务。通过云上开发平台进行软件生命周期管理，快速构建开发、测试、运行环境，规范开发流程、降低成本、提高效率。六是人工智能平台服务。利用云平台的计算资源，形成语音识别、图像识别、人脸识别等智能服务能力，提升业务智能化水平。

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is as follows:The manufacturing of chemical drugs and raw materials mainly includes the production of new anti-infective drugs against viruses, drug-resistant bacteria, deep-seated and multiple fungi, drug-resistant tuberculosis bacteria, and other microorganisms (such as chlamydia, mycoplasma, malaria, parasites, etc.). It also involves the isolation and purification of drug production, chiral synthesis and separation, biocatalytic synthesis, and crystal preparation.

zh_context: 化学药品与原料药制造，主要包括抗病毒、抗耐药菌、抗深部和多重真菌、抗耐药结核杆菌、抗其他微生物（如衣原体、支原体、疟疾、寄生虫等）的新型抗感染药物、药物生产的分离纯化、手性合成和拆分、生物催化合成、晶型制备等。

context: By 2021, a government-guided and multi-party participation mechanism for energy storage standardization will be established, promoting the establishment of a relatively systematic energy storage standard system, and strengthening the revision of key technical standards for energy storage and the internationalization of energy storage standards.
extended_context: 新能源++先进核电++关于加强储能标准化工作的实施方案（国能综通科技[2020]3号）（国家能源局/2020年1月9日）++nan++其他政策++2020-1++总体要求,工作目标
zh_context: 到2021年，形成政府引导、多方参与的储能标准化工作机制，推进建立较为系统的储能标准体系，加强储能关键技术标准制修订和储能标准国际化。

context: The manufacturing of new computers and information terminal devices mainly includes the manufacturing of complete computers, computer components, computer peripherals, industrial control computers and systems, other computer manufacturing, communication terminal equipment manufacturing, radar and supporting equipment manufacturing, and other electronic equipment manufacturing. Communication terminal equipment manufacturing mainly includes low-power data acquisition terminals, mobile e-books, mobile TVs, satellite handheld devices, portable multimedia terminals, personal navigation information terminals, and digital integrated application (3S+C) terminals. Radar and supporting equipment manufacturing mainly includes navigation radar equipment, blind landing and traffic control equipment, radar altimeters, weather radar, air raid warning radar devices, blind bombing equipment, radar transmitters/responders, radar antennas and reflectors, and other radar equipment.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++1.1.2++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新一代信息技术产业,下一代信息网络产业,新型计算机及信息终端设备制造
zh_context: 新型计算机及信息终端设备制造，主要包括计算机整机制造、计算机零部件制造、计算机外围设备制造、工业控制计算机及系统制造、其他计算机制造、通信终端设备制造、雷达及配套设备制造、其他电子设备制造等。通信终端设备制造，主要包括低能耗数据采集终端、移动电子书、移动电视、卫星手持机、便携式多媒体终端、个人导航信息终端、数字化综合应用（3S+C）终端。雷达及配套设备制造，主要包括导航用雷达设备、盲降及交通控制设备、雷达测高设备、气象雷达、空袭警报雷达装置、盲目投弹设备、雷达发射/应答器、雷达天线及其反射器及零件、其他雷达设备。

context: Industrial pollution site remediation equipment, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with toxic and hazardous chemicals, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with organic pollutants, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with radioactive sources, selection and cultivation of plants for heavy metal hyperaccumulation, equipment for the safe disposal of plant remediation harvests, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with heavy metals such as chromium slag and mercury. Soil and site remediation equipment mainly includes mining reclamation and ecological restoration technology equipment, agricultural soil pollution remediation technology equipment, and industrial pollution site remediation equipment. Mining reclamation and ecological restoration technology equipment includes soil ecological restoration and pollution control, and joint control of soil and groundwater in typical polluted sites. Agricultural soil pollution remediation technology equipment includes equipment for the remediation of pesticide-contaminated sites and rapid ex situ bioremediation of pesticide-contaminated sites. Industrial pollution site remediation equipment includes equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with toxic and hazardous chemicals, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with organic pollutants, equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with radioactive sources, selection and cultivation of plants for heavy metal hyperaccumulation, equipment for the safe disposal of plant remediation harvests, and equipment for the treatment and remediation of soil contaminated with heavy metals such as chromium slag and mercury.

context: Promote green manufacturing, shared manufacturing, and intelligent manufacturing comprehensively, and support enterprises in creating green factories. Accelerate the green transformation of industries such as steel, petrochemicals, chemicals, non-ferrous metals, building materials, light industry, and textiles. Guide enterprises to increase the use of renewable energy, strengthen demand-side management of electricity, and promote the substitution of fossil fuels with electric power, hydrogen energy, and biomass energy. Encourage enterprises to use unconventional water sources such as seawater, wastewater, and rainwater, carry out water-saving and pollution reduction technology transformations, and create a group of water-saving benchmark enterprises. Encourage enterprises to adopt advanced clean production technologies and efficient end-of-pipe treatment equipment, promote the resource utilization and harmless treatment of water, air, and solid pollutants. Accelerate the coordinated disposal of municipal solid waste in cement kilns and improve the level of coordinated disposal of urban waste in industrial kilns. Carry out comprehensive and intelligent green transformation of enterprises, and build green data centers. Support the construction of energy and water resource management centers to enhance the level of management informatization.

zh_context: 全面推行绿色制造、共享制造、智能制造，支持企业创建绿色工厂。加快实施钢铁、石化、化工、有色、建材、轻工、纺织等行业绿色化改造。引导企业加大可再生能源使用，加强电力需求侧管理，推动电能、氢能、生物质能替代化石燃料。推动企业利用海水、废污水、雨水等非常规水，开展节水减污技术改造，创建一批节水标杆企业。鼓励企业采用先进的清洁生产技术和高效末端治理装备，推动水、气、固体污染物资源化、无害化利用。加快推进水泥窑协同处置生活垃圾，提升工业窑炉协同处置城市废弃物水平。对企业开展全要素、全流程绿色化及智能化改造，建设绿色数据中心。支持建设能源、水资源管控中心，提升管理信息化水平。

context: Plant Interventional Biomaterials and Services mainly include biomedical interventional devices, biomedical materials, and biomedical material services. Biomedical interventional devices include medical catheters and guide wires for vascular imaging/central venous/balloon dilation, drug elution and biodegradable cardiovascular stents, cerebral vascular stents, and large artery stents; congenital heart occluders, mechanical/biological artificial heart valves, polyester/expanding polytetrafluoroethylene/biological/biomedical ceramics artificial blood vessels, artificial joint prostheses for hip/knee/shoulder, bone-inducing artificial bones, soft/hard artificial lenses, ophthalmic implants such as artificial corneas/amniotic membranes, artificial ligaments made of polyester/carbon fiber/biological materials; and new biomedical interventional devices based on tissue engineering, bioprinting, and 3D printing.

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is as follows:The manufacturing of high-efficiency and energy-saving general equipment mainly includes the manufacturing of boilers and auxiliary equipment, the manufacturing of steam turbines and auxiliary machinery, the manufacturing of pumps and vacuum equipment, the manufacturing of gas compressors, the manufacturing of hydraulic power machinery and components, the manufacturing of pneumatic power machinery and components, the manufacturing of drying furnaces, melting furnaces, and electric furnaces, the manufacturing of fans, the manufacturing of gas and liquid separation and purification equipment, the manufacturing of refrigeration and air conditioning equipment, the manufacturing of projectors and projection equipment, the manufacturing of cameras and equipment, the manufacturing of calculators and currency-specific equipment, and other unspecified general equipment manufacturing industries. The manufacturing of pneumatic power machinery and components mainly includes the manufacturing of energy-saving pneumatic components. The manufacturing of drying furnaces, melting furnaces, and electric furnaces mainly includes the manufacturing of energy-saving furnace burners, energy-saving mechanical coal feeders and similar devices, energy-saving industrial electric furnaces, energy-saving non-electric heat treatment furnaces for metals, energy-saving roller kilns, energy-saving tunnel kilns, energy-saving shuttle kilns, energy-saving pusher kilns, energy-saving protective atmosphere kilns, energy-saving nitriding kilns, energy-saving firing kilns, energy-saving drying ovens, step-type heating furnaces for steel billets, other energy-saving kilns and furnaces. The manufacturing of fans mainly includes the manufacturing of energy-saving fans, energy-saving industrial fans, energy-saving industrial ventilation hoods, circulation air hoods, and ventilation equipment (energy efficiency grades 1 and 2).

context: Build a high-end product chain. Sort out key links in big data products such as data generation, collection, storage, processing, analysis, services, and security, and establish a big data product map. In the data generation and collection process, focus on improving the compatibility of heterogeneous data sources and the efficiency of large-scale data collection and processing. In the data storage and processing process, focus on promoting the research and development of high-performance storage and computing systems and edge computing systems, and create dedicated hyper-converged hardware solutions. In the data analysis and service process, focus on promoting the research and development and application of systems such as multi-mode data management, big data analysis, and governance. Innovate high-quality service chains. Accelerate the development of big data services towards specialization, engineering, and platformization, focusing on data cleaning, data annotation, data analysis, data visualization, and other needs. Innovate new service models and formats for big data services, develop new service models such as intelligent services, value network collaboration, and integrated development and operation. Encourage companies to open up data in search, e-commerce, social networking, and develop third-party big data service industries. Cultivate high-quality big data service providers around comprehensive service needs such as diagnostic consulting, architecture design, system integration, and operation and maintenance. Optimize the industrial value chain. Taking the digital transformation of the manufacturing industry as the guide, cultivate specialized and scenario-based big data solutions for the entire process of research and development design, production manufacturing, operation management, and sales services. Build a multi-level industrial Internet platform system, enrich the platform's database, algorithm library, and knowledge base, and cultivate a batch of industrial apps for specific scenarios. Promote the deep application of industrial big data, cultivate new models such as data-driven platform design, networked collaboration, personalized customization, intelligent production, extended services, and digital management, and standardize the development of new formats such as gig economy, shared manufacturing, industrial e-commerce, and supply chain finance. Column 3: Industrial Big Data Value Enhancement Action. Raw material industry big data. Support comprehensive use of equipment IoT, production and operation, and external environment data by raw material enterprises such as steel, petroleum, pipeline networks, hazardous chemicals, non-ferrous metals, and building materials, establish analysis models, improve the intelligent and precise level of resource exploration, mining, processing, storage, transportation, etc., and achieve process optimization, energy saving and emission reduction, and safe production. Equipment manufacturing industry big data. Support equipment manufacturing enterprises in integrating data flow throughout the entire value chain of research and development, procurement, manufacturing, management, and after-sales, and develop new models and formats such as data-driven product research and development, simulation optimization, intelligent production, predictive maintenance, precision management, and remote operation and maintenance, to improve product quality, reduce production costs, and accelerate service innovation and upgrading. Consumer goods industry big data. Support consumer goods enterprises in integrating online and offline data, develop personalized recommendation algorithms, realize customized production of products, and fine-tune channel operations to promote accurate supply and demand matching. Support companies in establishing quality traceability databases covering the entire process, accelerate integration with the national product quality supervision platform, and achieve traceable and manageable product quality. Electronic information industry big data. Support electronic information manufacturing enterprises in accelerating the application of big data in scenarios such as product sales forecasting and demand management, production planning and scheduling, supply chain analysis and optimization, and product quality management, accelerate product iteration and innovation, optimize production processes, improve product quality, and ensure the stability of the industrial chain and supply chain. Extend the value chain of industries. Accelerate the construction of industry big data platforms, improve the level of data development and utilization, promote the assetization and productization of industry data, and realize the re-creation and value enhancement of data. Create mature application scenarios that serve the government, society, and enterprises, and use data innovation to drive management and model innovation, and promote the vigorous development of financial technology, smart healthcare, etc. Continuously carry out pilot demonstrations of big data industry development, promote the integration and application of big data in various industries and fields, and increase the promotion of excellent application solutions. Column 4: Action for the Development and Utilization of Industry Big Data. Communication big data. Accelerate the large-scale deployment of 5G networks and promote the upgrading of gigabit fiber-optic networks. Expand the interconnection nodes of backbone networks and establish a number of international communication entry and exit points. Improve the seismic resistance of public communication facilities in earthquake-prone areas, strengthen the construction of super base stations in mountainous areas, and plan and reserve mobile base stations to enhance the anti-destruction capability of public communication networks. Internally, strengthen the development, utilization, and security governance capabilities of data, improve enterprise management efficiency, and externally empower industry applications to support market supervision. Financial big data. Through big data actuarial, statistics, and model construction, help improve the modern financial regulatory system, fill in the gaps in regulatory institutions, and promote financial innovation under prudent regulation. Optimize risk identification, credit assessment models, and enhance data-driven risk management capabilities. Medical big data. Improve electronic health records, cases, electronic prescriptions, and other databases, and accelerate the sharing of data among medical and health institutions. Promote telemedicine and applications such as medical image-assisted interpretation and clinical diagnosis. Enhance the regulatory capacity of medical institutions and medical behaviors, and promote the reform of medical, medical insurance, and pharmaceutical linkage. Emergency management big data. Build a monitoring and perception network for safety production, increase the aggregation and sharing of natural disaster data, and enhance the capability of obtaining data at disaster sites. Build and improve emergency management databases for disaster risk surveys, monitoring and early warning, and play the role of big data in monitoring and early warning, regulatory law enforcement, decision-making assistance, rescue operations, and social mobilization. Promote intelligent application models such as data supervision, data disaster prevention, and data nuclear disaster, and achieve deep integration of big data and emergency management business, continuously improve the modernization level of emergency management. Agriculture and water conservancy big data. Utilize big data in agriculture production, economic operation, resource and environmental monitoring, and agricultural product production and sales, promote precision sowing, precise fertilization and pesticide application, and precise harvesting of field crops, and promote intelligent applications in facility horticulture and livestock and aquaculture. Promote the construction of a smart water conservancy system, improve water situation monitoring and intelligent scheduling capabilities based on river basins. Public security big data. Strengthen the compliant application of data such as identity verification. Promote the construction of an intelligent public security big data platform, coordinate the new generation of public security information infrastructure, strengthen the governance and service of police data resources, strengthen the correlation analysis of public safety data across industries and regions, continuously improve the capabilities of safety risk prediction and early warning, precise crackdown on illegal crimes, precise intelligent security and control, and convenient and efficient public security governance. Transportation big data. Strengthen the collection and analysis of data related to vehicles and transportation infrastructure, provide support for the development and application of autonomous driving and vehicle-road coordination technologies. Innovate applications such as travel planning, traffic flow monitoring and analysis, promote intelligent management of highways, coordinated traffic signal control, and priority passage for public transportation. Promote the sharing and application of data in transportation and logistics, and promote the development of multi-modal transportation such as railways, highways, waterways, and aviation. Power big data. Based on big data analysis and mining algorithms, optimization strategies, and visualization technologies, strengthen the deep application of big data in power generation, transmission and transformation, distribution, and consumption. Use big data to assist in the intelligent upgrading of power plants, carry out extensive collection of electricity information, and online energy efficiency analysis, achieve interactive optimization of power generation, grid, load, and storage, synergistic complementarity of multiple energy sources, and intelligent demand control. Credit big data. Strengthen the collection, sharing, openness, and application of credit information. Use technologies such as artificial intelligence and autonomous learning to build credit big data models, improve the intelligent identification, judgment, analysis, and processing capabilities of credit risks. Improve a new type of regulatory mechanism based on credit, guided by credit risks, and optimize the allocation of regulatory resources. Deepen the application of credit information in financing, credit, business cooperation, public services, etc., strengthen credit risk prevention, and continuously optimize the living environment. Employment big data. Use big data such as online recruitment, mobile communication, and social insurance to monitor changes in the labor market, timely grasp changes in enterprise employment and labor employment and unemployment situations, better analyze and judge the employment situation, and make scientific decisions. Social security big data. Accelerate the digital transformation of social security operations, carry out data mining and application work through scientific modeling and analysis methods, build a digital panorama for insured units and individuals, support personalized services and precision supervision. Build a social security big data management system and accelerate the sharing of social security data. Improve risk prevention and control classification management, strengthen business operation monitoring, and establish a systematic and regular data audit mechanism. Urban safety big data. Build a city safety risk monitoring and early warning system, realize effective aggregation of urban operation data in areas such as urban construction, transportation, municipal services, and high-risk industries, use advanced technologies such as cloud computing and artificial intelligence to monitor, monitor, and early warn urban safety risks, and improve urban safety management level.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++集成电路和半导体++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知（发改高技〔2022〕390号）（发改委等部门/2022年3月14日）++nan++关于做好2022年享受税收优惠政策的集成电路企业或项目、软件企业清单制定工作有关要求的通知++2022-3++主要任务,构建稳定高效产业链
zh_context: 打造高端产品链。梳理数据生成、采集、存储、加工、分析、服务、安全等关键环节大数据产品，建立大数据产品图谱。在数据生成采集环节，着重提升产品的异构数据源兼容性、大规模数据集采集与加工效率。在数据存储加工环节，着重推动高性能存算系统和边缘计算系统研发，打造专用超融合硬件解决方案。在数据分析服务环节，着重推动多模数据管理、大数据分析与治理等系统的研发和应用。创新优质服务链。围绕数据清洗、数据标注、数据分析、数据可视化等需求，加快大数据服务向专业化、工程化、平台化发展。创新大数据服务模式和业态，发展智能服务、价值网络协作、开发运营一体化等新型服务模式。鼓励企业开放搜索、电商、社交等数据，发展第三方大数据服务产业。围绕诊断咨询、架构设计、系统集成、运行维护等综合服务需求，培育优质大数据服务供应商。优化工业价值链。以制造业数字化转型为引领，面向研发设计、生产制造、经营管理、销售服务等全流程，培育专业化、场景化大数据解决方案。构建多层次工业互联网平台体系，丰富平台数据库、算法库和知识库，培育发展一批面向细分场景的工业APP。推动工业大数据深度应用，培育数据驱动的平台化设计、网络化协同、个性化定制、智能化生产、服务化延伸、数字化管理等新模式，规范发展零工经济、共享制造、工业电子商务、供应链金融等新业态。专栏3工业大数据价值提升行动。原材料行业大数据。支持钢铁、石油、管网、危险化学品、有色、建材等原材料企业综合运用设备物联、生产经营和外部环境等数据，建立分析模型，提升资源勘探、开采、加工、储存、运输等全流程智能化、精准化水平，实现工艺优化、节能减排和安全生产。装备制造行业大数据。支持装备制造企业打通研发、采购、制造、管理、售后等全价值链数据流，发展数据驱动的产品研发、仿真优化、智能生产、预测性维护、精准管理、远程运维等新模式新业态，提升产品质量，降低生产成本，加快服务化创新升级。消费品行业大数据。支持消费品企业打通线上线下全域数据，开发个性化推荐算法，实现产品定制化生产、渠道精细化运营，促进供需精准对接。支持企业建立覆盖全流程的质量追溯数据库，加快与国家产品质量监督平台对接，实现产品质量可追溯可管理。电子信息行业大数据。支持电子信息制造企业加快大数据在产品销售预测与需求管理、产品生产计划与排程、供应链分析与优化、产品质量管理与分析等全流程场景中的应用，加速产品迭代创新，优化生产流程，提升产品质量，保证产业链供应链的稳定性。延伸行业价值链。加快建设行业大数据平台，提升数据开发利用水平，推动行业数据资产化、产品化，实现数据的再创造和价值提升。打造服务政府、服务社会、服务企业的成熟应用场景，以数据创新带动管理创新和模式创新，促进金融科技、智慧医疗等蓬勃发展。持续开展大数据产业发展试点示范，推动大数据与各行业各领域融合应用，加大对优秀应用解决方案的推广力度。专栏4行业大数据开发利用行动。通信大数据。加快5G网络规模化部署，推广升级千兆光纤网络。扩容骨干网互联节点，新设一批国际通信出入口。在多震地区提高公共通信设施抗震能力，强化山区“超级基站”建设，规划布局储备移动基站，提高通信公网抗毁能力。对内强化数据开发利用和安全治理能力，提升企业经营管理效率，对外赋能行业应用，支撑市场监管。金融大数据。通过大数据精算、统计和模型构建，助力完善现代金融监管体系，补齐监管制度短板，在审慎监管前提下有序推进金融创新。优化风险识别、授信评估等模型，提升基于数据驱动的风险管理能力。医疗大数据。完善电子健康档案和病例、电子处方等数据库，加快医疗卫生机构数据共享。推广远程医疗，推进医学影像辅助判读、临床辅助诊断等应用。提升对医疗机构和医疗行为的监管能力，助推医疗、医保、医药联动改革。应急管理大数据。构建安全生产监测感知网络，加大自然灾害数据汇聚共享，加强灾害现场数据获取能力。建设完善灾害风险普查、监测预警等应急管理大数据库，发挥大数据在监测预警、监管执法、辅助决策、救援实战和社会动员等方面作用，推广数据监管、数据防灾、数据核灾等智能化应用模式，实现大数据与应急管理业务的深度融合，不断提升应急管理现代化水平。农业及水利大数据。发挥大数据在农业生产、经济运行、资源环境监测、农产品产销等方面作用，推广大田作物精准播种、精准施肥施药、精准收获，推动设施园艺、畜禽水产养殖智能化应用。推动构建智慧水利体系，以流域为单元提升水情测报和智能调度能力。公安大数据。加强身份核验等数据的合规应用。推进公安大数据智能化平台建设，统筹新一代公安信息化基础设施，强化警务数据资源治理服务，加强对跨行业、跨区域公共安全数据的关联分析，不断提升安全风险预测预警、违法犯罪精准打击、治安防控精密智能、惠民服务便捷高效的公共安全治理能力。交通大数据。加强对运载工具和交通基础设施相关数据的采集和分析，为自动驾驶和车路协同技术发展及应用提供支撑。开展出行规划、交通流量监测分析等应用创新，推广公路智能管理、交通信号联动、公交优先通行控制。通过对交通物流等数据的共享与应用，推动铁路、公路、水利、航空等多方式联运发展。电力大数据。基于大数据分析挖掘算法、优化策略和可视化展现等技术，强化大数据在发电、输变电、配电、用电各环节的深度应用。通过大数据助力电厂智能化升级，开展用电信息广泛采集、能效在线分析，实现源网荷储互动、多能协同互补、用能需求智能调控。信用大数据。加强信用信息归集、共享、公开和应用。运用人工智能、自主学习等技术，构建信用大数据模型，提升信用风险智能识别、研判、分析和处理能力。健全以信用为基础的新型监管机制，以信用风险为导向，优化监管资源配置。深化信用信息在融资、授信、商务合作、公共服务等领域的应用，加强信用风险防范，持续优化民生环境。就业大数据。运用网络招聘、移动通信、社会保险等大数据，监测劳动力市场变化趋势，及时掌握企业用工和劳动者就业、失业状况变化，更好分析研判就业形势，作出科学决策。社保大数据。加快推进社保经办数字化转型，通过科学建模和分析手段，开展社保数据挖掘和应用工作，为参保单位和个人搭建数字全景图，支撑个性服务和精准监管。建设社保大数据管理体系，加快推进社保数据共享。健全风险防控分类管理，加强业务运行监测，构建制度化、常态化数据稽核机制。城市安全大数据。建设城市安全风险监测预警系统，实现城市建设、交通、市政、高危行业领域等城市运行数据的有效汇聚，利用云计算和人工智能等先进技术，对城市安全风险进行监控监测和预警，提升城市安全管理水平。

context: The manufacturing of biopolymer mainly includes the production of bio-based and starch-based new materials. The production of bio-based and starch-based new materials mainly includes oligosaccharides, new halogen-free flame retardant bio-based composites, low melting point melt-spun spandex, biodegradable agricultural film special materials, biomass thermoplastic composites, high-performance bio-based nylon engineering plastics, biodegradable carbon dioxide copolymer resins and polyols, polyhydroxyalkanoate (PHA) materials, copolyesters of dicarboxylic acids and diols (PBAT, PXT, PTF), cellulose triacetate, polyhydroxy fatty acid esters (PHA), polycarbonate (PPC), polyamide (PA), and bio-based plasticizers.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++3.3.8.2++战略性新兴产业分类(2018)++2018-11++新材料产业,先进石化化工新材料,生物基合成材料制造,生物基聚合物制造
zh_context: 生物基聚合物制造，主要包括生物基、淀粉基新材料制造。生物基、淀粉基新材料制造，主要包括低聚糖、新型无卤阻燃生物基复合材料、低熔点熔纺氨纶、可生物降解农业地膜专用料、生物质热塑复合材料、高性能生物基尼龙工程塑料、生物降解二氧化碳共聚物树脂及多元醇、聚羟基烷酸酯（PHA）材料、二元酸与二元醇共聚酯（、PBAT、PXT、PTF）三醋酸纤维素、聚羟基脂肪酸酯（PHA）、聚碳酸亚内酯（PPC）、聚酰胺（PA）、生物基增塑剂。

context: The translation of the Chinese text to English is:The manufacturing of primary form plastics and synthetic resins mainly includes polyolefin materials, soft materials, and silicon-based composite materials.
zh_context: 初级形态塑料及合成树脂制造，主要包括聚烯烃类材料、软材料及硅基复合材料。

context: Resource recycling mainly includes the recycling of regenerated metals, waste rubber, harmless recycling of waste plastics, harmless recycling of waste electrical and electronic products, dismantling and recycling of scrapped cars, recycling of waste new energy vehicle power batteries, recycling of waste solar equipment, harmless recycling of waste textiles, recycling of waste mineral oil, and recycling of waste biomass. The recycling of waste biomass includes the production of wood-plastic and biomass polyurethane foam materials from straw, residual materials from forest product processing, waste plastics, and other waste materials. It also includes foaming technology, cellulose and lignin liquefaction technology devices. Waste biomass materials such as straw, household waste, kitchen waste, residual materials from forest product processing, garden and green waste, and urban feces are used to produce fiber ethanol or molded fuel, as well as energy-saving and water-saving urban feces collection and transportation devices. The performance of domestically produced conversion enzymes is improved, conversion costs are reduced, raw material ratios for preparing molded fuel are determined, dedicated equipment is prepared, and small boilers for using molded fuel and charcoal are used. Carbon dioxide bioconversion clean energy equipment, waste oil regeneration base oil complete equipment, low-energy consumption melting gasification cracking complete equipment, biomass coal-fired boilers, and efficient power generation devices coupling agricultural and forestry residues with coal electricity.
extended_context: 通用++综合++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++7.3.6++战略性新兴产业重点产品和服务指导目录(2016 版)++2017-01++节能环保产业,资源循环利用产业,资源再生利用
zh_context: 资源再生利用，主要包括再生金属、废橡胶、废塑料无害化再生利用、废旧机电产品无害化再生利用、报废汽车拆解和再生利用、废旧新能源汽车动力蓄电池回收利用、废旧太阳能设备再生利用、废旧纺织品无害化再生利用、废矿物油再生利用、废弃生物质再生利用等。废弃生物质再生利用，包括秸秆、林产品加工剩余物、废塑料等废弃材料制成木塑、生物质聚氨酯泡沫材料，发泡技术、纤维素和木质素的液化技术装置。秸秆、生活垃圾、餐厨垃圾、林产品加工剩余物、园林绿化垃圾、城市粪便等废弃生物质材料制成纤维乙醇或成型燃料，节能节水型城市粪便收集输送装置。提高国产转化酶的性能并降低转化成本、制备成型燃料的原料配比、制备专用设备和使用成型燃料及木炭的小型锅炉专用燃烧设备、二氧化碳生物转化清洁能源装备、废油再生基础油成套装备、低能耗熔融气化裂解成套装备、生物质型煤锅炉、农林残余物耦合煤电高效发电装置。。

context: Research and formulate national information security strategies and plans, strengthen top-level design. Implement the information security level protection system, carry out corresponding levels of security construction and management, and ensure the registration, rectification, and supervision of information systems. Strengthen the work of emergency response for network and information security, improve emergency plans, and enhance guidance and coordination for the construction of network and information security disaster recovery facilities. Improve the information security certification and accreditation system, strengthen information security product certification work, and reduce duplicate testing and fees.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++下一代信息技术++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知（国发〔2013〕31号）（国务院/2013年8月16日）++nan++关于印发“宽带中国”战略及实施方案的通知++2013-8++加快能力建设，提升网络与信息安全保障水平,夯实网络与信息安全基础
zh_context: 研究制定国家信息安全战略和规划，强化顶层设计。落实信息安全等级保护制度，开展相应等级的安全建设和管理，做好信息系统定级备案、整改和监督检查。强化网络与信息安全应急处置工作，完善应急预案，加强对网络与信息安全灾备设施建设的指导和协调。完善信息安全认证认可体系，加强信息安全产品认证工作，减少重复检测和重复收费。

'62 High-performance high-precision copper alloy wire: (1) tensile strength ≥475MPa, elongation ≥6%, conductivity ≥90%IACS, softening temperature ≥350℃, diameter 0.080-0.300mm; (2) tensile strength ≥500MPa, elongation ≥2%, conductivity ≥80%IACS, diameter 0.050-0.100mm. '63 High-frequency microwave, high-density packaging copper-clad laminate, ultra-thin copper foil: (1) high-frequency microwave copper-clad laminate: dielectric constant (DK) 3.50±0.05 (10GHz), high-frequency loss <0.004 (10GHz), glass transition temperature >200℃, peel strength >0.8N/mm; (2) high-density copper-clad laminate: glass transition temperature >250℃, plane expansion coefficient <28ppm/℃; (3) ultra-thin copper foil: thickness ≤6μm, unit area weight 50-55g/m2, tensile strength ≥400MPa, elongation ≥3.0%, roughness: smooth surface ≤0.543μm, matte surface ≤3.0μm, high-temperature oxidation resistance: constant temperature (140℃/15min) without oxidation discoloration; (4) rolled copper foil for high-frequency high-speed substrates: typical thickness and accuracy 12±0.5μm, unit area mass 100-111g/m2, width and accuracy 520±1.5mm, tensile strength (room temperature) ≥460MPa, tensile strength (180℃×30min) ≤210MPa, elongation (room temperature) ≥0.7%, elongation (180℃×30min) ≥4%, no oxidation in air at 200℃×60min, roughness of M surface (Rz) ≤1.3μm, peel strength ≥0.7N/mm; ultra-low profile rolled copper foil: surface roughness Rz ≤0.9μm, peel strength ≥0.8N/mm, sliding bending performance ≥150,000 times, FCCL 180° bending test ≥5 times. context: Break through the weak links in the industrial chain, improve the technical level and industrialization capability of high-brightness, power-type LED epitaxial wafers and chips, and enhance the independent development capability of the industry. Strengthen research on packaging structure design, new packaging materials, new processes, phosphor performance, multi-primary-color phosphors, and heat dissipation mechanisms, focusing on improving the light extraction efficiency, phosphor efficiency, and heat dissipation performance of devices, and enhancing the packaging capability of power-type LED devices. Accelerate the research and industrialization of upstream raw materials for LEDs, such as substrates, metal organic compounds (MO) sources, ultra-high purity gases, phosphors, high-performance epoxy resins, and organic silicone gels, achieve mass production and application of key production equipment and instruments such as metal organic chemical vapor deposition (MOCVD), improve the supporting capability of the industry, and perfect the LED industrial chain. Promote applications in landscape lighting, LCD backlighting, outdoor large-screen displays, and indoor commercial lighting. Accelerate the formulation of LED-related basic standards and product standards, and improve the LED standard system. Enhance product standard compliance testing, accelerate the construction of national-level LED device and light source testing institutions, and improve testing capabilities and service capabilities. Strengthen industry guidance and management, and promote the healthy, scientific, and orderly development of the LED industry.
extended_context: 新一代信息技术++电子信息++电子信息制造业“十二五”发展规划（工信部/2012年2月24日）（工信部/2012年2月24日）++nan++其他政策++2012-2++主要任务与发展重点,发展重点,发光二极管（LED）
zh_context: 突破产业链薄弱环节，提升高亮度、功率型LED外延片及芯片技术水平和产业化能力，增强产业自主发展能力。加强对封装结构设计、新封装材料、新工艺、荧光粉性能、多基色荧光粉、散热机理的研究，着力提高器件封装的取光效率、荧光粉效率和散热性能，增强功率型LED器件封装能力。加快LED上游原材料如衬底、金属有机化合物（MO）源、超高纯气体、荧光粉、高性能环氧树脂、有机硅胶的研发和产业化，实现金属有机化学气相沉积设备（MOCVD）等关键生产设备和仪器的量产和应用，提高产业配套能力，完善LED产业链。推进景观照明、液晶显示背光源、户外大屏幕显示以及室内商业照明等应用。加快LED相关基础标准、产品标准制定，完善LED标准体系。增强产品标准符合性检测，加快国家级LED器件、光源检测机构的建设，提高检测水平和服务能力。强化行业引导和管理，促进LED产业健康科学有序发展。

context: With application-oriented approach, breakthrough key technologies of big data, promote the research and development and industrialization of products and solutions, innovate technology service models, and form a technologically advanced and ecologically complete technical product system. Accelerate the research and development of key technologies of big data. Focus on forward-looking layout in areas such as data science theory system, big data computing systems and analysis, and big data application models, strengthen basic research on big data. Play the role of enterprise innovation main body, integrate industry, academia, research, and application resources to jointly tackle key technologies of big data collection, transmission, storage, management, processing, analysis, application, visualization, and security. Breakthrough key technologies of big data basic technologies such as large-scale heterogeneous data fusion, cluster resource scheduling, distributed file systems, general-purpose computing framework technologies for multitasking, as well as computing engine technologies such as stream computing and graph computing. Support frontier technology innovations such as deep learning, brain-like computing, cognitive computing, blockchain, and virtual reality, enhance data analysis and processing capabilities and knowledge discovery capabilities. Combine with industry applications, develop intelligent data application technologies such as big data analysis, understanding, prediction, decision support, and knowledge services. Breakthrough new chip and integration architectures, memory computing with billion-level concurrency, EB-level storage, green computing, and other technologies for computing, storage, sensing, communication, etc. for big data, promote the coordinated development of software and hardware. Cultivate a secure and controllable big data product system. With application as the traction, emphasize independent research and development as well as introduction and absorption, accelerate the formation of a secure and controllable big data product system. Focus on breakthroughs in core information technology equipment for big data application infrastructure, information security products, as well as basic products such as new transaction-oriented relational databases, columnar databases, NoSQL databases, large-scale graph databases, and next-generation distributed computing platforms. Accelerate the development of next-generation business intelligence, data mining, data visualization, semantic search, and other software products. Combine with the demand for data lifecycle management, cultivate platform products for big data collection and integration, big data analysis and mining, big data interactive perception, and data resource management based on semantic understanding. Develop technology products for big data retrieval, analysis, and display with industry characteristics, targeting key industry application needs, and form mature big data solutions and services in vertical fields. Innovate big data technology service models. Accelerate the innovation of big data service models, cultivate new models and new formats for data-as-a-service, enhance big data service capabilities, and reduce the threshold and cost of big data applications. Develop technical services for data collection, cleaning, analysis, transaction, security protection, and other stages of the data lifecycle. Promote the integration of big data and cloud computing service models, promote the development of public cloud computing services such as massive data, large-scale distributed computing, and intelligent data analysis, and enhance the capabilities of third-party big data technology services. Promote the deep integration of big data technology services with industries and cultivate big data service models for vertical fields.

zh_context: 以应用为导向，突破大数据关键技术，推动产品和解决方案研发及产业化，创新技术服务模式，形成技术先进、生态完备的技术产品体系。加快大数据关键技术研发。围绕数据科学理论体系、大数据计算系统与分析、大数据应用模型等领域进行前瞻布局，加强大数据基础研究。发挥企业创新主体作用，整合产学研用资源优势联合攻关，研发大数据采集、传输、存储、管理、处理、分析、应用、可视化和安全等关键技术。突破大规模异构数据融合、集群资源调度、分布式文件系统等大数据基础技术，面向多任务的通用计算框架技术，以及流计算、图计算等计算引擎技术。支持深度学习、类脑计算、认知计算、区块链、虚拟现实等前沿技术创新，提升数据分析处理和知识发现能力。结合行业应用，研发大数据分析、理解、预测及决策支持与知识服务等智能数据应用技术。突破面向大数据的新型计算、存储、传感、通信等芯片及融合架构、内存计亿级并发、EB级存储、绿色计算等技术，推动软硬件协同发展。培育安全可控的大数据产品体系。以应用为牵引，自主研发和引进吸收并重，加快形成安全可控的大数据产品体系。重点突破面向大数据应用基础设施的核心信息技术设备、信息安全产品以及面向事务的新型关系数据库、列式数据库、NoSQL数据库、大规模图数据库和新一代分布式计算平台等基础产品。加快研发新一代商业智能、数据挖掘、数据可视化、语义搜索等软件产品。结合数据生命周期管理需求，培育大数据采集与集成、大数据分析与挖掘、大数据交互感知、基于语义理解的数据资源管理等平台产品。面向重点行业应用需求，研发具有行。业特征的大数据检索、分析、展示等技术产品，形成垂直领域成熟的大数据解决。方案及服务。创新大数据技术服务模式。加快大数据服务模式创新，培育数据即服务新模式和新业态，提升大数据服务能力，降低大数据应用门槛和成本。围绕数据全生命周期各阶段需求，发展数据采集、清洗、分析、交易、安全防护等技术服务。推进大数据与云计算服务模式融合，促进海量数据、大规模分布式计算和智能数据分析等公共云计算服务发展，提升第三方大数据技术服务能力。推动大数据技。术服务与行业深度结合，培育面向垂直领域的大数据服务模式。

context: Accelerate the industrialization of rare earth magnetic materials and their application devices, and carry out application verification of sensors, servo motors, and other devices. Adjust the variety structure of superhard materials, develop low-cost, high-precision synthetic diamond and cubic boron nitride materials, break through the stability and wear resistance issues of steel used in ball screw, and solve the constraints of high-end CNC machine tool special tool materials.
